50a2(rgyud): rten gsum po dbang byed pa'o// skye gnyis rdo rje'i rigs dang ni// gzugs bzang bu mo gzhan yang rung / ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar// rgyal gyi sbyor bas bsgrub par ba// go re tsa nas bsgrub na su// me tog dar ni rkur gnas la/ 
50a3(rgyud): sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// lan brgya du ni bzlas par bya// chu bo chen por zhugs na su// lte ba man chad chur bcug ste// lag pa thal sbyar dbus bzung nas// rig pa stong du bzlas par bya// snyim pa chu yis pa/ 
50a4(rgyud): ba dang bcas pas sgrub pos 'atung bar bye/ de nas don/ grub 'gyur te/ smud pos ngag ni grub pa yis// rgyal po chung ma pa/ des padag/ yid kyis 'gugs 'gyur gdon maH// ka ra'i ro'o ma
50a5(rgyud): ni nadamar po yang dag bzung nas ni/ rig pa lan bdun pa seM 'bras la// skye gnas dbus su gzhug bya ste/ me tig de ni ba sbyar nas// gsang ba'i gnasu bzhag par bya// gnyis med ye shes
50a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas// brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya// sgrub po rtse gcig yid kyis ni// me tog de ni blangs na su// me tog gis ni gang bsnan pa// de yi mod la dbang du 'gyur// brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang // yan
50a7(rgyud): lag tshogs kun gzhan dbang ste// mngon gyur sems na ldog pa ru// skad cigs ni/ dbang byedar gyur// 'di ni mngon sum grub pa yi// de na yod dbang du byed pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// rnal 'byar
50a8(rgyud): ma rnams 'gugs pa'i cho ga 'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'o// gang zhig bris pa tsam gyi sa// rdo rje sems dpa'ang brlag 'gyur zhing // dngos grub myur du ster 'gyur ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba'i da
50b1(rgyud): gyur rdo rje ste// de bzhin gzhan yang pad+ma'o// kun nas rnam par 'phro ba yaM// mkha' go ma yi sa bon dgod// dbus rdo rje phag mo ni// shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs// yi ge'i dgod pas dgod par bya// rim pa
50b2(rgyud): de ltar brjod pa la// zha lazhi ba'i yid kyi suM/ dzaM tsan yis go gang blo// ma mo'i gnas dang dur khrod du/ gas chan bzhin khrod bcas/ chags pa lan dbang po gas// rgyas lags ser de bzhin to// dadang
50b3(rgyud): ni sgom byas nas// tsa rigs par ni sprul pa bya// bu mo gzhin nur ro la ni// gos ni 'bade blangs ni su// rnaMs brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// de nyid las byung sol ba yis// sna tshogs rdo rje kha bzhi la// sngags dang sbal
50b4(rgyud): bris nas ni// lan bdun du ni bzlas na sa// gang gi khyim du sbas gyur pa// de nag shin rje'i grong khar du// nyi ma bdun gyis 'ge bar 'gyur// de yi rkang pa'i sbubs dang / bum pa la sogs dag kyang rung / 
50b5(rgyud): rus pa'i phur bu'i sbu gur ni// 'khrul 'khor 'di ni bcug bya ste/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'ang yos ni// 'tsho 'gyur 'dir ni gdon ma za// las rnams kun la sgrub pa pas// cho ga dang na ldan par bya// rang gis gzung
50b6(rgyud): sngags kyis ni// bskal pa bye ba brgyas mi 'grub// las 'di mchog tu shes pa ste// sngags gzhan rgyas pas ci zhig bya// de dag thams cad spangs na su// 'di ni 'bad bzung bar ba// gang dang gang gi bsam
50b7(rgyud): gtan gyis// sgrub pos bzlas pa brtsams par bya// sbyor ba de dang de dag gis// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// ji ltar nor bu dag pa ni/ rdzas gang la rten de gzugs 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje mkha' go yang / 
50b8(rgyud): yang dag bsam gtan mchog 'dzin 'gyur// bsam pa gang dang gis ni// mi rnams yid ni yang dag spyod// de dang de yi dngos 'gyur te// sna tshogs gzugs can no shu bzhin// de nyid bsdus dang 'das pa te/ 
51a1(rgyud): gzhan yang sngon dang tha ma yi/ de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga can// bya ba'i rgyud rnams thams cad du/ ji srid me yis 'jig gi bar// de der 'gro ba ston mongs 'gyur// thams cad du ni spangs pa sa
51a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus pha rol 'joms pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam ldan pa'o// rdo rje slob dben bdag nyid che// myur du dngos grub skye 'gyur ba// 'brel du yang dag yid ches byed// sgrub pos phyag rgya
51a3(rgyud): spror yis// snyon mi rmongs par 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig mi ldan mi dag la// klog gam gal ta byin gyur na// dam pa'i bdag nyid bcom nas ni// ngan 'gro rnam su ltung bar 'gyur// g.yon gyi rgyud ni dmigs su
51a4(rgyud): spyi bo g.yon gyi spyod pa bya// thams cad g.yon pas byas na ni/ myur/ dngos grub 'grub 'gyur zhes// sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ rdo rje ma kha 'grebad pa'i mchog rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin pa
51a5(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje ma/ \u0f7f'gro las// dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o// 
51a6(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// sgrub po'i bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i mchog/ ga bur dang ni gu gum dang // gan d+ha gan d+ha pa ta ste// shing tshe dang ni sug
51a7(rgyud): smal bcas/ ku sum dang ni de bzhin chu// bi si ta dang kun du ru// de bzhin ri yi zhag dang ni/ ri skye sau dang ni sbu gu'i zhag// di yo mar khu so dang ni// de bzhin lag skyes kyi ni rdul// gang kyi chu dang snying po dang // rgya mtsho lnga
51a8(rgyud): skyes de dag ni// lus can rnam la phan byed pa// gang gang la ni gangs chu bzhin// de ltar bco brgyad rdzas rnams ni// bcud kyis lan mchog phan byed yin// de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni// yon yan lag chog/ 
51b1(rgyud): bshad/ tsam pa ka dang bku la// na ga ge sa ku mud// ut+pal she bA li ka dang / sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang pri yang ku/ ku sum ni nyid dgo/ shri pha la dang po so 'cha'// ka prI ta dang la ku tsha// sku ba dang ni brta ki/ a ru ra dang / 
51b2(rgyud): ba ru ra// bal ta ka s+thu ru ra// i la tsa dang pun ka/ a rand dang ma ris/ de bzhin du na po bi ling // bca' ba dang ni shu dag dang // yung ba dang nai ru rta dang // bca' sga dang ni sgo skya dang // rlan can gyi nano pa dang / nAg pa la dkar po
51b3(rgyud): dang / de bzhin rgan pa gzhon nur byed// glang chen dag dang ra mdzes dang // 'dzag dang byis pa stug po dang // ral pa dmar po smyo byad dang // mtshan mo'i shing dang myur 'gro dang // kA tam pa dang gsar shing ste// de bzhin du ni
51b4(rgyud): sha r-i sha/ ka rany+dza dang shri khru dang // nim pa dang ni bi la si// de bzhin ga du ma dza ri/ pa la sha dang tsan+da gnyis// de bzhin a gar nag po dang // gur gum gur shing ba ra ka/ sbrang rtsi mo k+Sha pus ka ra/ ma
51b5(rgyud): tog 'bras bu rtsa ba dang // shan pa shong dang ro nyid// khu byung zangs kyi gtsug pud can// bya rog dang ni gar ra dang // rma ba ti ba pu ga ron dang // dang srong bu stob sa 'phel bar byed// ra dong ri bong ri dgas dang / sa li ga dang phag
51b6(rgyud): dang na// khyad par du ni bya ba rnams// nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// me tog 'bras bu shun pa'i chang // de bzhin du ni 'bra yi chang // gzhan yang chang gi bye brag dag/ mdor bsdus nas ni btung ba'i mchog/ 
51b7(rgyud): 'di dag skyes pa bud med kyi// stobs rnams bskrad pa'i sman yin te/ bza' dang btung dang gzhib pa dang // bldag pa dang ni mur ba dang // sna sman mgo bor bsku ba dang // bkru ba dang ni dil phyis dang // bza' dang btung
51b8(rgyud): sogs de dag ni// rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba mchog/ da ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// rdzas dang bco brgyad dag tu sbyar// sbom po phra mo'i sbyor ba rnams// skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang // chung ngu la sogs dbye ba ste/ rlung dang mkham
52a1(rgyud): // pa bad kan sogs// re re zhing yang gsum du 'dod// nag po dkar po sngo bsangs te/ 'dzag dang de bzhin 'pho ba la'o// ngag dang 'dza' ba shes par ma ste// khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa yin// dpa' bo gcig
52a2(rgyud): dang skye gnyis rtsa// 'bras bu chen po ska ba gsum// lhang tshor dang ni dngul chu bzhi// bdud rtsi yi ni snying po lnga// dus dag de bzhin drag ci ste// bdun po yal ga mdab sogs bcas// skam sa deng ni rlan can yul// mar dang
52a3(rgyud): mar nag bkru sman no// rno dang dngul chu'i zasu sbyin// rang skyur dang ni yung ba dang// cha mnyam dngul chi'i 'bras bu ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer bsres nas ni// sbrang rtsi yi ni thigs pa glags// thal sman lan tshwas bu gar sgrub// 
52a4(rgyud): ro ni ska ba rnams dang yang // lhang cher dkar po'i skye mi sbyin// dngul chu drug char bya ba mchog/ sbyang byed don ni rgab 'joms// ni tshad ldan 'tshang byede// 'bras bus bya ba byang bar 'gyur// sngon
52a5(rgyud): du gser shig blung ba yis// rang skyon 'joms pa'i tshig yin// de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang // thal ba'am rdul ni glags par bya// dron mau blugs na skra dkar skye// gang chen mig yau bcung blangs la/ 
52a6(rgyud): gi'i tshad du btso bar bya// de nas slar ni phyung nasu// arga'i shing gi khu ba glugs// tshos pa'i 'od kyis snying mig 'joms// tsan+do dang ni ngas na// sgrog skya dang ni ker sa dang / oM tra pa ti'i rus pa dang // de bzhin du na
52a7(rgyud): me tog gzung // bya gr-i dang ni kun du ru// sa ri ba dang sen mo dang / nor bu zla 'od na ga sar// thigs pa'i rgyun dang ka ta ma pa// tsa ba kor so ba dang // shi shu ba li ba ud pa la// rang skyer dang ni bcas pa ru// 'dzag pa
52a8(rgyud): dngul chu kha tshos bya// phyung na sbrul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur// khrag dang smyo byed mtshan shing glugs/ skra dkar gyi ni nyes pa 'joms// rgas dang mdze nad sel bar byed// rnon po thol sman bcas pa yin/ k+Sha
52b1(rgyud): shing bskus na gzhang 'brum 'joms// lto skas ma snyings rdzas kyi las// bcud dang bcud len mar zhag bsngags// shi ri sha yi rtsas kyang gzag// mgor gnas la skyes ldan par ba// mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs
52b2(rgyud): ba gso// gsol te 'khrul na 'bras bu'i lam/ tshad las 'das na dug tu 'gyur// de nas lpags pa shun pa dang / me tog dang ni 'bras bu sogs// kha dang skra dang mngar ba dang / chu dang skyur po la sogs pas/ 
52b3(rgyud): khyad par du ni btso bya ba// kha med rdzar ni btso bar bya// kha dang bcas par sreg pa ste// tshar bcad pa dang mnan pa yis// kha med pa dang thod pa'i dbyibs// 'od ma dang ni byi rog mchu// de dag btso ba'i zhi kha rdza/ 
52b4(rgyud): ba~M yi ni tshad bzhi ni// yib dang khros dang 'thor ba dang // bzhi pa chu ru 'bros pa'o// shin tu tshos par gyur na ni// 'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang // khrol khrol sgra ni sgrogs pa yin// btsir dang mnye dang dkrug pa
52b5(rgyud): dang / de bzhin du ni brdung ba'o// sbrang rtsir btso dang bu bar brtse glang chen btso dang seng+gar bco// rnon por byas te btso bar bya// mnyes pa sa dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur// blo gos 'khrul pa med pa yis// 
52b6(rgyud): rim gyis rim gyis mnye bar bya// cha yi tshad byas gso ba ni// sbyar nas 'gyur gyi gzhin du min// de nas tshe gzhan bcas pa la// gau ri kar ni'i phye ma ni// lugs las bzlog pa'i lam btsugs la// tshad ldan
52b7(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du btso// du ru ka dang ba li ka/ tsaka kra mar de'i sa bon dang / ba la ta ka shi kA 'bras// ba ri tsa ta ku su ma/ ud pa la ma li ka sa bon// bar dang rus ba ka si dang // si ri sa sku sa bon dang // sbrang rtsi bo son pa
52b8(rgyud): la sha/ zhig rje'u ni ches pa dang / de dag skyo ma bskyed phyir glugs// de dag ni rtogs byis la/ yid la sems pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis/ bu mo'i bcud ni drangs te glugs// 'di yi rab tu bsgrub par bya// 
53a1(rgyud): du nam yang ma yin// bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni// mang po'i bar du brtag par bya// lhang tsher dngul chu shing chen ni// de tsha 'bras bu smin par 'gyur// bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni// byed pa po dang
53a2(rgyud): za bor 'gyur// lha yis rgya mtsho bsrubs pa bzhin// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha yis par// stobs ldan bzung ba gnasu 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni tshad dang ldan// dngul cha rma ba'i mgrin 'dra dang // sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal
53a3(rgyud): ba'i gzugs// chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bzhi// sa l-i'i dri dang dri zhim dang // de bzhin chang dang chang man di/ cha gnyis dang ni cha gsum dang // bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing // bong tsho de ran dang ring ba dang // yan
53a4(rgyud): lag rtsub 'dod megon pa ring // mig ni zangs ltar dmar pa ste// stobs ldan sngo bsangs nu ma med// rked pa'i khad par sngar ba shad dang / sbrang rtsi lta bu'i de dang ldan// sgrub po dbang po'i yon tan
53a5(rgyud): byed/ di rnams thabs kyis sbyangs yin te// rtsub dang gnyen dang yan lag mkhrad// stobs ldan zhes ni bya ba yin// de dong 'khyud las byung ba na// rdzas ni yongasu sbyor ba de// rnon po dang ni lhang tsher la/ bun
53a6(rgyud): ming du ni bsten nas// zha nya blags pas 'joms par 'gyur// ren kha dang ska bar 'gyur// de nas rangab sgyur nang du ni/ lci bas bcas na nyes pa 'byung // de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang / phag gi zhag dang tshil dang khwaH
53a7(rgyud): bcas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byung // slar yang tsu ta dza ti na// tshwa dang dmar po nyid dang ni// ba ni dza ri dang tsam pa dang // smyo byad cha mnyam dngul chu cig/ de dang mnyam pa'i sbrang rtsi chu// mnyes na nyes pa zad par
53a8(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas ma he'i rmig par ni// char be'i chu dang bcas pa la// zangs kyi phye ma mkhar phye dang // smin sman phye ma blugs shing btso// chos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug/ de yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin// 
53b1(rgyud): de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis// sbyangs na snum zhing stobs ldan la// slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni// mnyes pas snum zhing rtsa bar 'gyur// ra gan tsu ta'i shing dang ni// zangs dang yungs pa la sogs drag/ byin pas
53b2(rgyud): nyes pa cher gcod 'gyur// de nas tsan+ta'i shing dang ni// sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang sen mo dang / thal sman 'bus zos shing phye dang // ma he ha ta mo k+Sha dang // pus ka ra dang brta gi/ sku ba sin du ba ri phye// bcas par ma yi rkang / 
53b3(rgyud): du gzhug/ cung zad bzhag ste phyung na su// rdo yi gtun du menye bar bya// 'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni// brtso dza rgod mo'i kha 'dra dang // ka ra nad yi chu yi dbyibs// bong bu'i gdong dang rnga mo'i gdong // kha chen 'di dag
53b4(rgyud): bcing ba dang // tshar bcad pa la bsngags pa yin// gang yang 'khrul 'khor kha che ba// rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'ad dang // 'o ma'i dbebs la dA la sogs dang // mtshon cha ral gri'i shugs 'dab// kang ka
53b5(rgyud): ni mgrin pa 'ang // nyes pa tshar gcod pa la bsngags// ga/ zhan yang dngul chu bcings pa la// bshad pa de dag rje suM gzu / bzhi cha lus pa btso yin te// phyed lus stobs tsheni btso ba yin/ 
53b6(rgyud): dngul chur rten po'i dri ma ni// de bzhin du ni sbyar bar ba// spang ba dang ni rtogs pa dang // rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o// de nas ljang tsher rdul phye dang // bcas par rtsi yi nang du blugs// ban du zhes bya'i phye ma ni// 
53b7(rgyud): spyo mar bcas pa'i nang du btug// lhang cher dngul gyi rnon po ya/ cho ga yis ni so sor bcing // de nas cung zhig ngal bas bya// bzhag po mi yo gnas sam ni/ chu yi shing la brtan par bya// lci ba~M 'am 'bras
53b8(rgyud): kyi phung po'ang rung / rdo ba yi ni nang dag dang // ba lang ma ha sogs pa'i lhas// bye ma yi ni phung por sba// de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni// gzugs dang sgra dang di ro sogs// tshad dang mtshan ma ji bzhin brtag/ la la'i
54a1(rgyud): // 'bras bu la la'i rtsa// kha cig me tog mdab ma dang // shan pa dang ni rus pa'ang rung // rnal 'byor pa yis long spyod ni// rnam pa sna tshogs blta bar ba// bcos pa'ang bcos min yo byad ni// rnyed na rdo rje
54a2(rgyud): 'dzin 'dar 'gyur// de ya stobs can bcud bral na// sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur// dngul chu lhang tsher kha dog ni// sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te// khrag dang mkhris pa skyed byed yin// dmar pos khrag kyang skyed pa/ 
54a3(rgyud): byed// dkar pos zug zar skyed 'gyur zhing // srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin// ljang ser dag ni ma smi dang // ser skya lam ni 'gag 'gyur zhing // nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'tshing // nyes pa dag ni brgyad ldan pas// blo da
54a4(rgyud): ldan pas dang de bza'// sngo dang nag po bcud chen yin// de ltar bcud lan rnam dpyad ra// chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan// dngul tshwa'i 'ol se cig dang ni// rgya mtsho las byung nyis 'gyur ldan// bzhi 'gyur gyi
54a5(rgyud): ni me tog btsos// sna sman blag pa'i mchog yin te// khrag dang dngul/ chu bcu 'gyur du// rim gyis sprul ta bza' bar ba// da phan cha de ni 'a bras bu med// dngul chubaso bas rmongs pa dang // khyad par du ni
54a6(rgyud): bsad kyang rung // sngar bstan pa yi me tog dang / byang chub sems dang bcas te bze'o// thams cad du ni snga dro ba za'o// cho ga'i rim pa 'di yino// ljang cher chu dang dngul chun// dgongs mo 'dus blag par bya// zla ba la ni rnam
54a7(rgyud): lam// nyi ma la ni nyi ma ste// de dang de nas sbyin par bya// de ltar yul dang dus dang ni// rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag/ yid bzhungs la sogs 'phel byed yin// mkha' go kun dang mnyam byor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' gro re
54a8(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'agro las// bcud kyis lan gyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// 
54b1(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya// yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni// bshad kyis grub pa po rnams nyon// bad mchog bla ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha' goms ni thams cad khyab// ye shes ldan
54b2(rgyud): ba'i rang skyes gnas// yul dang yul du mngon par skyo// 'di ni mkha' gri ma zhes bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po la/ brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin// ku lu ta dang ma ru yi// yul du
54b3(rgyud): gnas pa ma mo ste// san+d+hi dang ni nag rar// rigs kyi gtso mo rnams yin// lam pa ka dang sau raSh+Ta ra// gang gnas rigs kyi lha ma yin// kha bo'i ri dang kany+tsi na// gang yod byis bcas mo zhes bya// pany+tsa la yi yul dag/ 
54b4(rgyud): dang / gri ha de ba tA dag na/ lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas// ka ling ka/ dang ko sa lar// bertul zhugs 'dzin no ma sha chun za// pra ta pu ri zhe sa bya dang / tri sha ku nir sbom dbang phyug/ khaN+Da ro ha zhes pa ga/ 
54b5(rgyud): pul+lI ra dang dzA lan+tar// tsaN+Da li yi bud med gnas// o tra dang ni kAM ru yi// yul du bu mo chen mo ste/ bI kau Ta~M zhes bya dang // rA ma shA ri'i bu mo'ang 'dod// go dA ba ri ar bu dar/ mkha'agro ma yi dbang phyug mchog/ gas
54b6(rgyud): gling ji ltar bsten pa bzhin// ur+yan yang ni de bzhin no// yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang // dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste// kun kyang 'dod pa'i gzugs can me// yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin// de nas bac+doMs la/ 
54b7(rgyud): lha mos slar mchod cing phyag byas te// 'di skad ces gsol to// mkha 'gro ma yi khyad par dang // zhing skong 'jigs pa chen po yi// ming dang zhing gi ming da ni// gnas rnams kyi ni khyad par dang // gang du sgrub pa pos
54b8(rgyud): thos na// the tsom med par 'grub 'gyur ba/ de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// nga yos gang la'
55a1(rgyud): ma bshad pa'i// gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i// gang yin khyod ni zhu 'dod pa// leg so lagaso lha mo che// sgyu ma chen por rang 'gro ga// bshad kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// An+da ha sa
55a2(rgyud): yul gnas pa// zhi ba'i gdong zhes grags pa ste// rgyal po'i lha mo'i skye gnas 'byung // rdo rje yi ni mtshon cha bsnams// yul der gnas pa'i lha mi de/ ka taM pa yi shing la rten// dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i// 
55a3(rgyud): k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ ko la kir ni dpal chen mo// gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba// gtsigs pa'i gzugs can lha mo ste// rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig su rung // grong khyer dar gnas dag shul tson// ri
55a4(rgyud): yaM rtse mor brtan te gnas// me yi gdong ba zhes bya ba/ kA tra pA la mdzes pa'i gdong // dar nar ni bde byed ma// sme brdzogs chen po skye gnas byung // lha me gau yi mtshon cha bsnams// chos kyi/ 
55a5(rgyud): dbang phyug gsol ba mo// zhing der gnas par grags ste// tal na shing la brten te gnas// gyen du 'bar skr-i zhes bya ba// k+Sha tra pA la gar+b+hags pa che// da bA ko Ti rna mo che// stobs po che yi skye gnas
55a6(rgyud): 'byung // lha mo lag na mdung can te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ gnas dar lha mo dag chen mo// b+ha Ta'i shing la brten te gnas// k+She tra pA la lus chen po// mchog dbang phyug rgya zhes bya// bi ra dza ra ni phyi // 
55a7(rgyud): ste ba dan gyi ni phyag na bsnams// zhi ba'i gzugs can lha mo che// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol ba// zhing dang gnas pa ma 'bar ma// a mra'i shing la brten te gnas// ha har dgo pa sgre chen po// sems can
55a8(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs par byed// e ru dang ni me lce'i/ ba/ zod pa dge ba'i skye gnas byung // lha mo rdo rje shag ti bsnams// zhing dang shin tu myos pas gnas// grong khyer deng gnas lha modo// gser shing la ni/ 
55b1(rgyud): / brten te gnas// dil bu sgra zhes bya ba yi// k+Sha tra ba la dpa' bo che// pra ta pu ri dmar sar te// 'jigs pa chen mo'i spyan dang ldan// lha mo gtun shing mtshon cha bsnams// gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba'o// 
55b2(rgyud): zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo dang / dza ta'i shing la brtan te gnas// byin chen zhes bya'o zhing skyong no// shin tu gcig shing 'dzag su rung // a la pu ring bong zhon ma// rab tu gtum pa'i skye gnas byung // phyag na zhags pa
55b3(rgyud): 'jigs tshan mo// zhing der mos pas yang dag gnas// phyogs dang gnas pa'i lha me do// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo// glang chen rna ba zhes bya ba'i// zhing skyes mchog chen las skyes pa'o// kha che'i yul du
55b4(rgyud): lang na// gtum pa'i skye gnas las byung ma// rdo rje lcags sgrogs thogs nas ni// sgra rnams 'joms la mchog tu brtson// gnas dang gnas pa'i lha mo de// ri yi rtsa la brten te gnas// sbu gu'i
55b5(rgyud): byin pa can zhes bya'i// k+Sha tra pA la 'jigs chen po// ma ru'i yul dri rim pa mo// 'dzegs gdong dpa' do'i skye gnas 'byung / lcags klu zhags thogs lha mo de// zhing dang shin tu myos pas gan
55b6(rgyud): yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de// dab chen la ni brten te gnas// gtsigs pa zhes bya'i zhing skyed ni// rmongs par byed pa'i bzhin yangs pa'o// nag rang na thing gshol ma// sme brtsegs yan lag skye gnas byung
55b7(rgyud): ro langs can ni 'ong tshan ma// dpa' bo kun la dngos grub stsol// gnas dar gnas pa'i bzang mo de// spa yi shing gi ldam rang gnas// spu yi ben pa zhes bya ba'o// k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa chen/ puN+Da bad+d+ha'i yu
55b8(rgyud): du ri// tsa mur+b+hi zhes bya ba ste// stobs po che yi skye gnas byung // kha T+wAM ga yis lag brgyan// lha ma spyod dang grol bar bye// sdig pa ma lus zang byed pa// bum bcas bya'i zhing skyong ni/ zhing de ni ni yang dag gnas
56a1(rgyud): / dza lan+d+ha ni bzhin dang ma// chags pa'i rigs kyi sku gnas 'byung // rdo rje lcags sgrog thegs nas ni// bde ba'i mchog ni kun la ster// grong khyer mchog der gnas lha mo// khang pa brtseg ma
56a2(rgyud): brten te gnas// ral pa gsum zhes bya ba yi// zhing skyong shin tu gtsigs pa che// be ta bu rir glog gdang // gtsigs pa'i skye gnas yang dag byung // lha ma dbyig pau shag ti thogs// bsam pa thad rdzogs byed ma// 
56a3(rgyud): zhing der gnas pa'i lha mod// dag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// dril bu'i sgra zhes bya ba yi/ k+She tra pA las smad pa min// 'ug pa'i gdang can 'jig su rung // so 'dar ni me lce'i gdong // zangs gi yis ni
56a4(rgyud): lag brgyan// sha chen gyi ni stan la gnas// bde ba'i dbang phyug rag ster ba// zhing dor gnas pa'i lha mo che// shal ma la yi shing lag/ nas// bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i k+She ta pA la 'jigs
56a5(rgyud): chen po// tsa ri tA yi yul du ni// ka rany+dza gnas zhes bya ba// shag tig tshogs pa'i skye gnas byung / shag ti yi ni phyag rgya thogs// dril bu chen po zhes bya ba// k+She tra ba la stobs po che// sprul dang ldan pa'i
56a6(rgyud): gyen sgra can// gdug pa thams cad 'jigs pa mdzad// ur+than du ni lha mo che// gsang ba zhes byar sgra gnas byung // lha mo rdo rje thugs sgrogathogs// shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs// sgra chen nas
56a7(rgyud): bya dag bo'i gzugs// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// gnas mchog dang gnas lha de// a she ka yi shing brten gnas// dza lan+d+ha ra gtum ni// zhi ba yi ni skye gnas byung // lag na zangs kyi par te thogs// dpa
56a8(rgyud): phyug thams cad ster ba mi// gnas dar gnas pa drag chen mo// gser shing la ni brten te gnas// skyed pa zhes pa'i dpa' bo che// bdud rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed// k+She re ker ni skye bo'i ma// dag cing
56b1(rgyud): sngo la stobs chen la// ral gri lag thogs lha mo che// dngos grub thams cad ster ba mo// lha mo chen mo gyen ska 'bar// sa la'i shing la brtan te gnas// lhun po chen po zhes bya ba'i// k+Sha tra pA la zhing dar gnas// 
56b2(rgyud): ma ya pu rar 'dod ma ste/ 'dzegs pa'i gdong gi ste gnas byung // rdo rje shag ti dge ba thogs// grub po rnams la stobs ster ba// gzugs sngon 'jigs po chen mo ste// 'byung po'i shing la brten te gnas// 
56b3(rgyud): der gnas 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ bu ta nar ni a mra ke/ ngag rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa// thong gshol dang na ga ya thogs// sems can thams cad dbang byed ma// da ru
56b4(rgyud): la tan te gnas// sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed// brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya ba'i/ k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas// rgyal ba'i khab tu dza nas// khrag chen gyi ni skye gnas byung // rdo rje lcags kyur
56b5(rgyud): yang dag ldan// pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar mdzad// zhing dang ga na sa~M nga'i lha mod// ji la'i sgra 'byin 'jigs par byeng // rna chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni// rtag tu dang nye bar gnas// 'ong yul du
56b6(rgyud): ni lhan skyes te// rang byung gi ni skye gnas byung // chu srin rgyal mtshan lag na thogs// zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can ta// yulo deng gnas pa'i lha mo de// brag gi khyim la brten te gnas// long spyod zhes bya'i
56b7(rgyud): dpa' bo che// k+She tra pA la dka' ba'o// ma la bar ni dbang bskur ma// tho ba yi ni phyag rgya thogs// sgrub pa po la rtag tu brtse// grags dang dpal dang bkra shis steng// zhing dang gnas pa'i lha mo de/ mngar pa'i shing la
56b8(rgyud): brten te gnas// skyes bu'i dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i// zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug yod// zhing 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang / dpa' bo rnams ni dngos grub ste// rtag tu mtshan mo 'phyan pa dang // rtag tu mtshan mo 'du ba bye
57a1(rgyud): / mkha' la spyod pa rnyed dka' ba'i// dngos grub yangs pa ster 'gyur te// sgrub pa po yo las rnams ni// thams cad 'grub 'gyur ba com med/ de nas dngos grub kun steng ba'i// mchod pa'
57a2(rgyud): cho ga bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa de bzhin du// mar me de yi khyad par dang // gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar mchod// sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs// bza' ba'i rdzas ni thad dang // de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga yi mchog/ 
57a3(rgyud): g.yon gyi char ni snod yin te// g.ya su khro bo bstan par bya// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ gong dang bzhi mdor zhing dang ni// khad par du ni kha stong dang // sems can snod dang thang da na
57a4(rgyud): khyad par du ni tshul gnas// nag po drag po dag chen po// lha sbyin mnyam du sten pa dang / nag po gtsigs pa 'jigs byed dang / rgalas 'das dang log 'den rnams// rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang / 
57a5(rgyud): 'jigs byed ma dang u ma dang // rgyal dang rnam par rgyal/ ma dang / mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ nag po bzang mo nag chen mo/ nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor me// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// dag du lda
57a6(rgyud): dang 'phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar ma ma// 'jib byed gong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mor gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma// tha~Md phreng dang can kha T+wAM ma// sbrul chen la
57a7(rgyud): gri dgra sta can// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma// de nyid tshon mo'i mkha' gro lnga// las kun rje su sgrub byed pa// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mo che// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te
57a8(rgyud): rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa me/ rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yi/ thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cog/ oM ka kA ka d+ha na b+ha ba ban+d+han kha khA d+ha na sarba duSh+TAn/ ha na ha na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka s+ya kAts+tsha ku ru ts+tsha
57b1(rgyud): / badz+ra baT phaT dzaHswA hA// bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang ste/ lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ni// las rnams thad sgrub par sgom// oM b+hak+Sha bA k+Sha/ sarba yo ga shwa ri hA
57b2(rgyud): swA hA// la sogs sbyor ba dza bzhin du// gtor ma'i las ni sbyar ba ste/ zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ bas dang sdang dang btsang ba la// sgrub pos gtor mi de nyid kyis// las rnams thams cad bsgrub bya zhing // 
57b3(rgyud): shes lcags kyu'i bye brags// rang 'dod lha ni tshim par bya// zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong // gong khar ri yi rtse mo ru// 'byung po thams cad tshogs gyur par// 'dus na sgrub po la mchog ster// gnas la
57b4(rgyud): sogs par rtag gnas shing // sgrub pa pon gus ldan la// lha mo rnams kyis mchog ster bar// sgrub pa po la the tsom ma da// gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa'o// ro yi bsgrub pa bshad par bya/ 
57b5(rgyud): rgan po ma yin rdza med cing // mdza dang shu ba la sogs sde ngas/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis 'byung po'i nyi ma la bsgrub bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi khadang par dang // lha yi chu yis bka bar bya// 
57b6(rgyud): khu chen pos byug pa dang // bdug pa chen pos de bdug bya// maN+Dal gru bzhi byas nas ni// da dbus 'bad pas gru gsum bya// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag lo gson// zhes pa la sogs sngon bzhid brjod
57b7(rgyud): ha hA hi hA hAM hwA ha ha// zhes bya'i rgod pa rnams par brgyad// sgrub pa po yis chos bzhin bya// me la gnas pa'i sa bon ni// rlung gi sa bon gyis phye ba// spyi gtsug du ni sbyar byas la// sa yi stang du mche ngar bya/ 
57b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor me yi dbus gnas par// 'bad pa yi ni myur du blta// sgrub bos bdag nyid bsam bya ba/ skye gnas dbu su rom bzhin blta// 'bar phreng gi ni rgya mtsho ste// pho nya 'od dang bcas blta zhes// mkha
58a1(rgyud): 'gro gro dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ rdo rje la 'gro bad pa'i mchog dro sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs rgyud gyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdornam pa 'gro las 'dun
58a2(rgyud): gnas nges pa dang // sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang // lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa dang // de bzhin po nya'i khyad par dang // 'byung
58a3(rgyud): bo gdon gyi rig pa che// gang gzhan lus srul la sogs pa// de bzhin sngags kyi phreng ba rnams// da ni khyod la bshad kyis nyon// grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khyud dang ni ldan pa yi/ dkyil 'khor nyams dag
58a4(rgyud): 'dri bar bya// dngos grub kun gyi yon tan gnas// 'dod yom lnga yis rabargyan pa// mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// ro la g.yogs pa'i ras sam naM// mtshan gyis brgyab pa'i ras dag dang // bu btsas
58a5(rgyud): ba yi ra sa dang ni// baglang kaM ba la sogs la// dam tshig \u0f7fna gyi 'di mkhan gyis// sgrub po mchog gis 'di du gzhug/ ches brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ 
58a6(rgyud): de nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa// mngon sum du ni mdun gnas 'gyur// tshangs pa mo dang zhi ba mo// gzhon nu mau dang phag mo dang // dbang mo dang ni tsa mur+t+ti// tshogs kyi dbang mo sreg byad ma// rim pa gnyis
58a7(rgyud): pa yi'o// dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang // lus ngan dang ni yi dregs gtso// sreg byed bdan bral rlung gi lha// rim pa gsum pa yi'o// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / mig dmar dang ni gza' lhag dang // phur bu dang ni pa
58a8(rgyud): bsangs// spen pa dang ning du'o// rim pa bzhi pa yi'o// tshangs pa khyab 'jug de bzhin du// ru rje skem byed sgo bzhig/ sa dang chung me dang rU/ 'thung po chen po'i khams rnams dang / mkha 'gro mdang
58b1(rgyud): / mar me ma// 'jib byed 'phrog byed bcas pa'i gtso// 'byung po las kyang 'byung ba'i gzugs// sgrub bos cho ga bzhin du sgrub// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri ba
58b2(rgyud): byang dbus kun nas zlum por ni// ri mo mdzes pas bskor bar bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris nas ni// ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul gyi// dbu su khro bo chen po bri// zhal cig phyag bzhi pa ste// zhal gyi mche
58b3(rgyud): rlung drang gtsigs// khre dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal// sku mdog sngon po drag chen po/ thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs// yi dregs la zhon nyi mar bzhugs// sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad// gar dang ldan
58b4(rgyud): zhing stag lpags panabs// spyan gsum shin tu gsal// ba'i gzugs// rdo rje 'bar ba ba den gsum// khrag gang ba yi gshor dadang bcas// mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag
58b5(rgyud): gis 'phyar// shar du mkha' gro ma dri sta// lho yi phyog su 'phrog byang ma// 'jigs byed lha mo nub tu bri/ byang du lha mo 'bar ma'o// lha ma phag mo zhes bya ba// phyag ban yig hU~M las byung // sku mdog sngon
58b6(rgyud): grag chen mo// pag gos dngos can 'dzegs par byed // mda' dang de bzhin gzhu dang ni// rgyal mtshan thod po thogs pa'o// zhi ba mo ni pham las byung // mdog dmar gzi brjid chen mo ste/ thod pa dang ni lcags kyung / 
58b7(rgyud): kheD+ga rung ba'o'o// gnodu ma ni hi las byung // kha dag sar mo phyag bzhing / mdung rtsi gsum dang bdun gsus mnga' nga ba'u ning bzhin no// tsa ma smin po las zung // mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste// khanA dang thod pa
58b8(rgyud): dang gsher dang de bzhin tsam ru/ ngam las byung ba'i tshangasapa mo// mdog dgar lag pa bzhi pa ste/ bad+mad ni 'od pa dang / de bzhin gzhananam dang gzhu'o// tshigs kyi dbang mog las cung / sngo bsangs mngon
59a1(rgyud): // sta lag bzhi ma// mdung rtsa gsum dang thod pa dang / bgrang phreng g.yas g.yon lag du thogs// khab 'jug ma ni bam las byung // mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste/ chang dang chu yi thod pa dang // 'ag
59a2(rgyud): pa kha D+ga bzhin gzhan// dbang po i las byung ba ste// mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje shag ti thod pa dang // sngags mdzub dang ni 'gas pa nyid// thams cad gyer sna 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs kyis ni rgyad pa ste
59a3(rgyud): ro yi sten bzhugs spyad gsum dang // sngags gi lpags pa rkang dkris pa'o// shar sna tshangs pa bri bya ste/ mdog dkar lag pa bzhi dang ldan// thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang // ril ba spyi blugs pad+ma thogs// bang du
59a4(rgyud): bzhin khyab 'jug ste// mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan// mdung dang rade bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dang ni dbyug pa mchog/ lho ru ru tra br-i bya ste// du ba'i mngag can lag pa bzhi// rtse gsum mdung dang
59a5(rgyud): pa dang / zhags pa dang ni bgrang drang thogs// nub tu skem byed bye bya ste// mdog sar lag pa bzhi dang ldan// shag ti dang ni dbyug pa dang / dpa' bo'i thod pa bgrang phreng thogs// dbang ldan khyu mchog
59a6(rgyud): stan la zhon// kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni rtsa gsum thogs// gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang po glang chan zhen pa ste// mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje dang ni thod pa thogs// ga
59a7(rgyud): gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// ma ni lug stan la zhon// kha dog dmar po la bzhi pa// ma thab nyid dang thod pa dang / gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// gshin rje ma ha'i stan la zhon/ kha dog sngon po lag bzhi pa/ 
59a8(rgyud): dbyug pa dang ni thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o// bden bral mi re'i stan bzhugs pa/ kha dog ljang ku lag bzhi pa// kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis skrag sta thal sbyar ba'o// 
59b1(rgyud): chu la chu srin stan la bzhugs// kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa// zhags pa dang ni thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o// rlung ni sha ba'i stan la bzhugs// du ba'i mdog can lag bzhi pa/ bad
59b2(rgyud): dang ni thod pa thogs// gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o// lus ngan gter gyi stan la gnas// kha dog ser po lag bzhi po// rin chen dang ni tho ba thogs// gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o// bza' dang
59b3(rgyud): skad ma thams cad kyang // rang rang dam tshigs las byung zhing // rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stabs chen po// rang rang stan la gnas par bsam// ma mo rnams kyang kun gyi ma// 'byung ba'i rig pa gzhan da bzhin// las
59b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad sgrub pa yi// pho nya'i sgrub thabs de nas bshad so sor stobs kyi tshar bcad pa// nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma// le/ spyod la dga'i sgrub pa pos// pho nya'i las ni brtsam par
59b5(rgyud): bya/ zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpe' sgom pas te/ swakyi rgyal po bskul ba yis// thams cad bral bzhin byed par 'gyur ra// dur khrod dang ni shing gcig tu// da ni dkyil 'kho
59b6(rgyud): brtsam par bya// shar dang bya dang nub dang ni/ de bzhin du ni lce phyogasu// drug drug du ni byas na su// de nas mchod pa brtsam par bya// gnas la sogs pa nyi shu bani// rim pa bzhin du yongasu bskor dri dang me tog
59b7(rgyud): bzhin du// mar ma dang ni dri yo chu// de yi chu yis bkang ba yo/ bum pa'ang gas kyis mdzes par bya// nyin mtshan phrugs gcig gnas gyur cing // de nas mtshan cig gnas par bya// gnas sogs yang
59b8(rgyud): phyag byas nas// de nas bzod pa gsol par bya// dpa' bo yi ni ston mo yis// dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya// de ltar byas pa'i sngags pa yis// phyi nas las ni brtsams par ba// gzhan du dus min 'chi/ 
60a1(rgyud): ba dang / dmyal bar nges par sreg 'gyur te// bgegs kyis nye bar gtses nas ni// nges par dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i dri mkhan gyis// 'byung po'i nyi ma la rnyed pa'i// 
60a2(rgyud): btsas la sogs ras la ni/ tshon rtsi khrag dang sras na su// steng du skyes pa'i nang bzhag nas// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// yi dwags sen rtsi mar chen dang // she chen gyis ni bdug par bya// de la di yis sgos
60a3(rgyud): nasu// de bzhin yi dregs me tog mchod// lha mtshan po mchod pa 'dis// me 'bar ma ni mchog tu mnyes// shing gcig gi ni drung du ni// cho ga bzhin du 'bum bzlas bya// rgyal po la sogs pa'i dus ni// slob dpo
60a4(rgyud): g+hi ni 'dri ru gzhug/ sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// gzugs bzang bzhon pa phun sum tshogs// rgyu rnams kun gyis rgyan pa ste// gos ni sa ra bo bgos par shrI/ lag gnyis gyen du thal mo sbyar// me
60a5(rgyud): ba ni kun tu 'od// sgrub po'i mdun du bkra nas ni// 'bade cho ga bzhin ma ga bya// me tog dmar dang di la sogs// sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya// sha dang nya sha rtsong la sogs// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma skyi
60a6(rgyud): rdzas lnga dag gi dngos po yis// mchod nas 'bum du bzlas na ni// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste// gnyis pa la ni nyid do// gsum par shing ni gi yo 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// dam tshig phyag rgya bstan nas ni// 
60a7(rgyud): sngags ni de la brjod par ba// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bor bzhag ste brjod bya ba// oMd pa shA ri hU~M/ puHphuHphuHdam tshigs sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bdud rtsi lnga yis bgrang ba yi// dam tshig chu ni sbyin
60a8(rgyud): bar bya// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas bzung bar bya// rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pa/ byin gyis rlobs la ngasgrubs shig/ de nas shin tu mdzes ma yis// bza' dang btung sogs ston ma
60b1(rgyud): dpagasar zho gnyis ni star 'gyur te// rbad pa nyid du long spyod pa// 'dod la dga' ba'i 'bar byed ma// gal te grub par ma gyur na// dag mo yi ni sa bon gyis// gzir te 'bum du bzlas par bya// sa bon gyis ni gzing
60b2(rgyud): gyis mar ma ma yi spyi bo 'gems// rtag tu sems can de ni brtson pas// 'bar ma chung mar bsgrub par bya// nyen cig lha mo shes rab che// gzhan yang mkha' go sgrub pa'i thabs// thang kau khas gnyis bas nasu// 
60b3(rgyud): lhag par gnas te mchod gtor nas// de nas ri mo 'di ru gzhug/ dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// lag na bsdigs 'dzub lcags kyu
60b4(rgyud): thogs// skra grol bas ni rnam par mdzes// ma 'bar 'od zer shinaHgsal// ha har dgod cing mig yon ma// sa la khrag gis byugs na su// gnas der bris sku dgram par bya// me tog dmar po/ 
60b5(rgyud): la sogs dang // dri dang 'dug pa'i khyad par gyis// nye bar mchod pa 'i gtor ma dgang // sha dang nya dang tsong la sogs// bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma ni sgom zhing thos// 'bum phrags
60b6(rgyud): gis 'grub par 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar na su// khar bcug nas ni bgad par bya// oM DA ki ni hUM phuHphuH// sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang po sa ni g.yo 'gyur te// gnyis pa la ni mdun du dgod// gsu
60b7(rgyud): pa mdun du snang 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni bka' ni do// bdud rtsi lnga yi khad par gyi// dam tshig 'bade byin nas ni// g.yog mo ru ni bsgrubs pa yis// ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya// dgra rnams bas di cang smad pa dang / 
60b8(rgyud): yan lag 'azir ba gang 'dod pa'i// las la sogs pa'i thams cad ni// g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis gdon zan// rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis// sngon du bldan pa'i tshig bzhin/ 
61a1(rgyud): / mkhas pas gzingar bar byas te badz+ra/ rad gi ni lpags pa la// 'bade thad ka brkyang bar bya// 'jib byed ma ni 'di ru gzhug/ kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ lus la rgyan gyis rgyan pa dang // mdzes pa / 
61a2(rgyud): gos ni gyon par bri// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // g.ya su dgra sta dgod par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar// mkhas pa yis ni sgrub bya ste// lci ba yis ni byugs bya la// me tog sna tshogs dgram
61a3(rgyud): bar bya// me tog bdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong // bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang la sbyin// 'bad bsam gtan gnas par bzla
61a4(rgyud): oM A kaR+Sha yaHpu phaT/ lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas// !gus pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyod bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor pa lis 'bum bzlas pas// 'ji byad man 'grub 'gyu/ 
61a5(rgyud): te/ dang po khyi ni ngu ba'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod// gsu pa la ni mtshon thogs nas// bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed// ba ni par mdun du gnas nas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol/ 
61a6(rgyud): smras// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig dag ni byin su// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul po bad gis khyod bsgrub so// de nas nyi ma re re zhing // gsar srang pad phyed ster bar 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyi/ 
61a7(rgyud): ma grub na// ro langs snying pos gzir ta bzla/ sa bon 'di las gzir tsam gyis// 'jib byad ma yi mgo 'gemaso// chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyog su// kam po dzi ni bsgrub par bya// ba glang la sogs ko ba ni// brkyang ste
61a8(rgyud): 'brog byed ma 'drir gzhug/ lus ni skal gyis rgyan pa ste// kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// skra grol bas ni rnam par rgyan// gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes// ral gri dang ni nag pa thogs// 
61b1(rgyud): ha har dgod cing rnam par gtsigs// khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni// di dang me tog bdag pas bdug/ sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs// nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// sngon bzhin
61b2(rgyud): lha yi gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing zlos// 'bum gcig gos ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bab// gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni dadun
61b3(rgyud): du gnas// bdud rtsi lnga yi khad par gyis// dam tshig de nas 'bad sbyin// oM kaM kAM buMHpuHswA hA// la gnyis khu tshur bcings na su// de yi sngags ni brjod par bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar nas
61b4(rgyud): ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod y+ra gau ti se'i grangs kyi rtse ru ni/ brtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la// slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang // rgyal po'i bu mo 'am gzha na yang rang //  'dod pa ni khrid shog/ gser dang dngul dang zangs
61b5(rgyud): la sogs// bza' dang bgo dang btung ba dang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyi ra te 'ong // lha yi bu mo 'am mi'ang rung // ti si'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni// ji ltar 'a dod bzhin khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// 
61b6(rgyud): las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid ye shes mkha' go ru// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms na su// de ni rkang pa g.yon pa yin// mnan to lnga brgyar bzlas na ni// gdon ma za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te des kyang
61b7(rgyud): ma grub na// dpa' bo'i dbusu bkug nas ni// dum bu dum bur btung bar bya// kri zhes bya ba dang gsod pa dang // hU~M gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis// thams cad du ni bza' bar bas// ngas ni bsgrubs pa'i rnal 'byor ma thad kyi
61b8(rgyud): dbang phyug ma'ang / gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// ba la ta ka nag po'i shing // ma sdar ba yi dbus ni// khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni/ nyi ma bidan hU~M zhes pa// brjod cing sbyin
62a1(rgyud): / byas nas ni// mkha'agro rnams 'chi 'gyur bas// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas shang kar sgrub pa'i babs// nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma/ dur khrod dang ni shing gcig dang / mu 'gram lam gyi bzhi
62a2(rgyud): sgrub/ dam tshig can gyi 'di mkhan gyis// tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshad dag tu/ dpa' bo yi ni ras la bri// gru gsum dkyil 'khor dge ba ste/ dkyil 'khor zlum pa'i tshul du bya// sku mdog sngon po glang / 
62a3(rgyud): li zhon// lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs// 'o mtshan gyen 'greng zhi ba'i gzugs// ral ba'i cod pan mdung dang ldan// zhal bani pa la phyag bzhi pa// bod pa'i phreng bas rnam pa klungs// kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa nyid/  drin/ 
62a4(rgyud): gzhan no gshor dang ldan//  shang bcing ldan pas mchod bya ste// 'byu po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// sngags 'di yis ni bkug nas// 'bum du bzlas par bsgrub par bya/ oM ka pA la mA la a laM kr-i ta shar hUM / sa
62a5(rgyud): gats+tsha mA gats+tsha ru dA ya swA hA/ spyan dang ba'i sngag so// oM AHru d+ya dz+dzahU~M/ swA hAM/ 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ gal te grub par ma/ gyur na// de nas de ni bsreg par bya// grub nas bya ba zod ni/ 
62a6(rgyud): byed par 'gyur te gzhan du min// de nas yang dag bshad pa ba// nor lha yaM ni sgrub pa'i thabs// ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'i 'gam// 'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdo dag tu/ sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor mchog ni
62a7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// sor ni bcu gnyis chad dag tu/ khyad par du ni bsgrub par bya// khaM dog nag po shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// 'khor lo dang ni dbyig pa bsnams// thod pa pad+ma de bzhin// rin chen byin
62a8(rgyud): cod pan dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// bshing gi tsa dang ni khu ba khrag/ mchod pa nyid sbyin bya zhing // mi yi sha yis bdug byas na// dngos grub nye bar byed par 'gyur// oM AHbadz+ra nA ra ya na hA hUM swAhA
62b1(rgyud): / spyar drang ba'i sngag so// oM ma ma tsakra sA d+ha ya sarba a su ra dman dz+nyA swAhA/ stong phrag brgyar ni bzlas pa yis// lha ma yin ni kun gyi sgod/ 'jug pa'i nus dang ldan 'gyur zhing // sgyu ma thams cad ston byad // ngab rnams
62b2(rgyud): 'dul nus shing // rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ cho ga'i rim po'i dzi nyid kyis/ de nas tshangs pa'ang bsgrub pa ste/ chu la 'gram ni dben pa dang // khyad par bad+mo'i tshal du smrab// kha dog sar pa phag poni pa/ gdong
62b3(rgyud): bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas// zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // mchod phyir thogs kyis rnam par rgyan// pad+ma dang ni bgrong phreng dang // dbyug pa dang ni thod pa bsnams// sgrub pa po yis gtso bo yis// bris sku dag ni dmigs na su/ 
62b4(rgyud): yid 'ong sna tshogs dri zhom ni// gur gum tsan+da la sogs pa// dri chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing // rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yis// mchod pa'i tshe gi rim de dag/ b+ha ga'i dbusu sbyin par bya// oM brah+ma gats+tsha
62b5(rgyud): hUM AHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngag so// oM b+hud+b+ha bsta tra bi dur+Na ru N+ye b+hiH/ da ba sa d+ha ma hi d+ha yi ye na pra tso da ya ta/ 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang / na
62b6(rgyud): bskyed pa dang mdzor spyod sogs// las rnams tha~Md nus 'gyur te/ bzlas dang sbyin sreg kun gyi 'grub/ khyod la yang dag bshad pa yin// nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo// bgegs kyi rgyal po sgrub po'i thabs// 
62b7(rgyud): ma mo'i khyim ni nyams dga' bar// sgom pa dge ba byas nas ni// blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas// 'bade brisku dmigs par bya// kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba// skyil krung byed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// zhal
62b8(rgyud): gcig po la spyan gsum pa// ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan// 'od zer dmar po 'bar zhing 'khrug/ mi che ba btsigs pa 'jigs par bri// dag sta dang ni gtun shing dang / mnga' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te/ 
63a1(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga dang lcags kyu dang / khrag gi gang ba'i thod pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje ral gri ste/ gzhan yang sha chen thod pa rnams/ mu sun di dang bdar gsum// shag ti dang ni bcu gnyis/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha/ 
63a2(rgyud): sar+b+ba rA ma sA d+ha ya hU~M hUMdzaHswA hA// spya drang ba'i sngag so// oM aHga hA swA hA// bzlas pa'i sngagaso// stong dag brgyas ni 'grub 'gyur te// de nas las ni brtsam par bya// lan cig bzlas nas thig le dag/ sngags
63a3(rgyud): bas byas na skal bzeng 'gyur// rgyal po sgor yang mchod 'thob ste// dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur// bgegs rnams ma lus bskrad pa dang // 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster bar// 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med// 
63a4(rgyud): cho ga'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis/ ma me rnams kyi sgrub thabs mcheg/ spyo de'i rim pa de nyid kyis// bza' rnams kyang ni sgrub par 'dod// oM sarba nAk+Sha tra ga ha mang+ga l+ye b+h+yaHswA hA// bza' zad kyi sngag so// in
63a5(rgyud): bya ba dang po ste// swA hA'i mtha' can byin rlab cis// mkha' gro kun dza/ mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' da zhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi
63a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim par bya ba ste bcu dgu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing bag byas te// 
63a7(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// ye shes de nyid khyad par dang // lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags// rnga rnams gang la bton gyur dang // de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bsha du/ 
63a8(rgyud): gsol// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul pa// rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis// de dag gzhan las shin+ta gtso// bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du// dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid// yang ngo mar ngo'i / 
63b1(rgyud): bragis// nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin// dus ni byur dang ring bdag/ yan lag mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas// dbugs ni rnam par rgod gyur na/ lus
63b2(rgyud): can drag dang gnyis kyis 'chi// snga dro ro hi ta'i dusu// da yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya// sna dang mig gi gnas dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa// lce dang so yi mtshams dang ni// de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi re la dang // snying la
63b3(rgyud): da blte ba dang // brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan/ chu so dang ni mtshan dag dang // mgo dang spyi gtsugs ni phyogs// dbugs ni chad cing chang gyur pa'i// lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru/ 'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed// nyin
63b4(rgyud): grangs kyi tshad kyis ni// 'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtse// sgro ga/ cig nas na nyon dag tu// gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa// yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni// zhag ni su brgya drug cu ru// bgos pa min
63b5(rgyud): tshad dag ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// lo gnyis ni dang ni zla ba dag/ dus kyi gang su bstan pa dang // nyan zhag dag ni bco brgyad//  yi tshad ni yang dag brjod// nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mthara'// 
63b6(rgyud): gal te rlung ni rgyur gyur na// lo gnyis dang na de bzhin du// zla ba dag tu 'tshe 'gyur zhing // de bzhin lo gnyis zla ba ni// rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// 'tsho 'gyur dus kyi gangs yin// gal te nyi/ 
63b7(rgyud): dgu rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis zla nga bzhi dang ni/ nyin zhag nyi ma'i grang su ni// lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin// gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis las ni mi 'tsho'o// gal te nyon zhag bcu gcig tu// sgo
63b8(rgyud): gcig nas ni rgyu ba dag/ lo gcig zla ba dgu dang ni// nyini zhag bco brgyad dag las ni// mi 'tshe mdzes ma khyod la bshad// nyin zhig bcu gnyis rgyun ni// lo gcig dang ni zla ba ni// dbyangs kyi grangs dang nyin zhag ni
64a1(rgyud): / dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho'o// gal te nyin ma bcu gsum du// g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni// lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag/ rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma dgu las mi 'tsho zhes// mdzes ma'i gdong
64a2(rgyud): khyod la bshad// gal te bdun phrag gnyi sasu ni// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyud// lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni// nyi ma bcu yi pad dag las// 'tsho bar mi 'gyur de yin// che tshad nges par bstan pa yin// gang zhig
64a3(rgyud): mau lnga gsum du// g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyun// lo gcig na ni gdon mi za// gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyi su ni// g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba dag// de yi tshe tshad nges pa dag / zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni// 
64a4(rgyud): mi 'tshe bar ni ngas bshad// gal te nyin zhog bcu bdun du// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyun// de nas de yi cha tshad ni// zla ba dgu dang nyin zha ga ni// bco brgyad dag las mi 'tshe bar// gdon mi za bar bshad pa shA
64a5(rgyud): nyin zhag bco brgyad rgyun ni// zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni// nya zhag nyi ma'i grang su ni/ de yis dbus ni bshad pa yin// gal ta nyan zhag bcu dgu ru// de yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag / ji srid 'tsho bar bshad pa
64a6(rgyud): bya zla ba dag ni bdud do ni// nyan nag dus kyi grangs las no// 'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon min// gal te nyin zhag nyi shu ni// rgyu ba zla ba dag na ni// de mi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur// gal te nyan zhag nyi shu gcig nyisan
64a7(rgyud): lam nas rlung rgyu ba// zla ba lnga dang nyi ma ni// nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tsho'o// nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyu na// zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las// mi 'tsho bar ni yang dag brjod// gal te nyin zhag/ 
64a8(rgyud): nyi shu gsum// sgo gcig nas na rlung rgyun/ zla ba bani dang nyi ma ni// dus kyi grangs las mi 'chi brjid// nyi shurtsa bzhin rgyu ba dang / zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni// bcug cig dag las mi 'tsho'o// nyin nag nyi shu lad+hun// 
64b1(rgyud): zla ba gsum las mi 'tshe'o// de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i// gangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya// bcu dang gnyis kyi rtsis las ni// bar bar gyi ni bstan pa yin// cha dang cha yis rim bzhin du// bar bar nyi ma
64b2(rgyud): gsal bar byas// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir// dus de dag ni bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams ni dus// shin tu phra ba ngas bshad pa// khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni// de dag blta zhing yis
64b3(rgyud): bya sgo ni stong du ltas 'bab pa// sna yi bar sha chad gyur na// nyin zhag bdun gyis the tsom med// cha shas dgu ni yang dag gnas// de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las// migo chu ni chad gyur na// nyi ma ldan 'chi ba
64b4(rgyud): 'gyur// cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba// steng du bltas te 'gro ba las/ rna ba g.yon dang 'gam pa yi/ ngos kyi mtshan mngag las ni/ nyin zhag cig las mi 'tsho'o// cha shas bcu gcig gnas pa
64b5(rgyud): yid gsal bar steng du 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yas par rten pa yis// nyin zhag bco brgyad dag na 'chad// cha shas bcugani/ sa de bzhin gnas// lce yi skud pa nag mthong na// lus can dus
64b6(rgyud): kyi nyin zhag 'chi// cha shas bcu gsum brten pa yi// de bzhin steng du 'bar ba yi/ steng 'og so ni 'thams gyur na// 'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'den// srog ni dus grangs nyams 'gro// dbyangs yig bcu pa
64b7(rgyud): brten pa ni/ mgrin pa'i bla na gnas pa'i rtsa/ steng du bltas pa zhes grags kyi// nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tsho'o// ma shas bco lnga gnas pa yi/ snying du bltas pa'i mchog da la/ brang gi dri ba zhom gyur na/ 
64b8(rgyud): phyed na ni gdon miza// cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag/ lte ba'i dbus gyur steng bltas pa// sen mo'i khrag ni mang gyur na// nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal// slar yang cha shas bcu bdun ni// gnas/ 
65a1(rgyud): / pa'i 'dra yi mtshan ma las// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhin// mchi 'gyur 'dir mi gdon mitha cha shas btsod rgyang gnas pa yi/ byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// de bzhin steng du bltas pa yis// nyin zhag nyi ma'i
65a2(rgyud): grangs kyis 'chi// bcu dgu yi ni cha shas gnas/ chu so de bzhid sdang bltas pas// de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis// 'chi 'gyur 'di ni ji tsamang/ cha shas nyi shu gnas pa yaM/ pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'iH/ sdeng
65a3(rgyud): bltas pa mchog dbang phyug// mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi ni// grangs kyis 'chi 'gyur the tsom me// re'u bag bcu gnyis brtsis pa la// bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag 'i yi rim gyis de sbyangs te// bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa
65a4(rgyud): dang / sum cu rtsa drug bco brgyad kyis// zla ba la sogs go ri/ rnams bzhin// rims kyi rim gyis dbri bar bya// lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni// bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus ni// lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes mkha'
65a5(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa'ade bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha 'gro las rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbu
65a6(rgyud): 'byung ba nas bya ba'i rim par bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// sgro dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang // rtswa ni gang bar gnas pa yi// yon skyon sogs ji ltar blta/ de rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te/ ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal ba
65a7(rgyud): ba chen pos bshad gsol// gang du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid// bshad kyis lha mo mnyan par gyis// sngon du bdag nyid sbyang byas la// phyi nas las na brtsam par bya// gzugs med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i// bad chen zla ba
65a8(rgyud): lta bu 'dzag/ slar yang gzug su gnas pa ste/ rnam pa kun gyis rgyan pa'o// cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// khan dung du ltas te 'phyang / go 'phangs gnas pa'i gnas ni// kun dazla'ang dag tu dag/ rnam nas me
65b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi ni// lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog/ rten du gyur ba'i pad+ma gang // zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par rgyan// de ni cha dang cha yi gzugs// gong bu gnas pa zhes byar brjod// de nas gzhan yang bshad pa pa// gnas kyi
65b2(rgyud): mtha' ni dag par bya// dag nas srin pa 'pho ba yi// gzhan du na ni don mang 'gyur// dgang ba yis ni lus bkang na// dug dang rims kyis tsha ba 'brog/ bum can gyis sgo bcings na/ sgo yi sbu gu dag par 'gyur// 'thor bas
65b3(rgyud): sna tshogs rdul du bya// rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur// rnam shes dbreg pa'i cho ga dang // gzhan du 'gro ba'ang bshad par ba// de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar ba// gnas gnyis dag ni bsams nas// rlung
65b4(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rlung gi dbusu ma yis ni// yang drang yang du dbye bar bya// A li ki lir ldan pa yis// sa bon der ni sbyar bor bya/ rnal 'byor pa yis khad par du// 'byung dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya
65b5(rgyud): 'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis// bsnan dang ldan par bsam par bya// 'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la// me tog lta bur bsnun par bya/ rnal 'byor pas ni 'byung bzlas te// bdag nyid las ni phyi rol pa// 'jam
65b6(rgyud): pa 'byung bar 'tshe bya ste// de kho na nyid mnyam par sgom// mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgom na ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsomang// de nas pha rol lus la ni// sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul// nyi ma'i lam nas dang phyung ste
65b7(rgyud): lha mo cha shas ldan par bya// bsgrub bya'i stong khar zhugs nas ni// rlung dang ma yis 'bar ba dag/ nga yi rnam shes bzung nas ni// lus kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug// bsgrub pa'i rnam shes bsdus nas// 'o ga 'a
65b8(rgyud): lo sbyar bar bya// ji srang zad par shes par du// de srid lkugs te gnas par 'gyur/ 'chi ngaba'i dus lab 'gyur na// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang / rims la sogs pas ma bag par/ rong du 'pho ba mchog yin// de nas
66a1(rgyud): // gzhan lus la 'jug pa// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor ba yis bcings na su// rtag tu srog dang rtsol bar bya// khyod kyis gan su sbyar nas ni// rang gi
66a2(rgyud): lus ni yongs btang ste// rim gyis sbyor bas phye na su// cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis// sngags pa gzhan gyi lus la 'jug/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// rang gi lus la sbyar bar 'dod// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag
66a3(rgyud): gis// mnyam par gzhag ste gang byed pa// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang // mkha' gro ma dang spong bas mchod// gang gi rong nas thos gyur pa// da ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon// de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan
66a4(rgyud): sems kyi// bsam pa rjes shes par bya// sgom dang bzlas pa'i khyu dbar gyi// sbyor ba'i dam po skye bar 'gyur// gang gis lam nas bsam na/ ni/ 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tso med// 'khor lo gang zhig
66a5(rgyud): sngar bstan par// zhugs te nyan pa gnyisu ni// 'jig rten gsum dang 'das nas ni// ma stag bzhin du rnam par 'khor// rlung gis bskyod pa'i me yis ni// shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na// zla dag
66a6(rgyud): tsam gyis nges par ni// ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur// sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes migs mthong gyur pa// shin tu ring na gnas pa yang // sgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong // bstan dang ma bsta/ 
66a7(rgyud): gang ci'ang rung // de kun nga yis yang dag bshad// nyon cig lha mo sgyu mche/ dag pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang // gang gis lam nas 'gro ba yis// thar pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba// mchog dang tha ma'i bye brag rnams// ma
66a8(rgyud): bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha// thig lar gzugs can mtho ris te// steng nas 'gro bar steng gi ni// myur du 'gro ba byed par 'gyur// sna nas gnod sbyin gan su ste// rna ba dag ni grub pa/ 
66b1(rgyud): lhang gal te mig las ye shes 'gro// mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur// srid pa'i sgo las yi drags te// de bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o// chu min gyis ni dmyal bar ltung // thar pa'i lam las gzhan du'adre/ 
66b2(rgyud): sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis// sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi sgo yi bu gar bsgom par ba// de la 'og gi sgo ru ni// chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam// chu dang chu min sgo la ni// me
66b3(rgyud): yi sa bon 'bar ba ste// de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// dbugs ni bum pa can du sgom// lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can// rlung gi sa bon rtsa bar te// thig
66b4(rgyud): le sgra dang ldan pa yi// rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya// 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// sgra dang sgra yis 'phrul bar byed/ dus la bab na 'pho bya ste/ dus min lnga rnams gsod par 'gyur// lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis/ 
66b5(rgyud): ni/ dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur// de bas 'chi ba'i mtshan/ ma ni// mkhas pas 'bade shes par bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngar ba/ snyan pa'i// sngon chen ba ba phun sum tshogs// sgrub po
66b6(rgyud): rnams kyis smin pa la// steng gi rtsa ba bza' bar bya// chu dang skya reng ldan pa dag// g.yon pa'i bdud rtsir sbyar byas la// zos na zhi dang rgyas pa ste// dug dang rims kyi tsha ba 'phrog/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ba rnyings/ 
66b7(rgyud): dang smin pa 'joms par byed// lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis// na mkhar 'gro ba brjod par bya// rlung dang mo yau bya brags// rkang pa'i 'khor long sbyor byas te// yid kyis rab tu zhing sbyar nas// namakha' la ni 'gre'
66b8(rgyud): zhing mkha' go kun gyis bskor nasu// lha yi lus kyi kun tu rtse/ ji srid zla nyi yod kyi bar// de srid na mkhar gnas par 'gyur// slar yang lugs las bzlog pa yi// kha dog dkar po'i pad+ma bas// bsgrub bya'i dang
67a1(rgyud): // sbyar da di// rtag tu dag gi dngos grub byed/ rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba// rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa ltar// rang gi kha nas byung na su// bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim par bya// nyi ma bdun gyis dngos dru
67a2(rgyud): tu 'gyur te gzhan du yang ma yin// rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi// lus la thom par gyur pa dang // de yi sems na bzung na su// bdag la gzhug ste me la ni// bsam ta rlung dang me sbar bas// de yi lus ni 'khrug
67a3(rgyud): par 'gyur// tshigs dgu las ni sdang gzhan gyis// mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste// nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang // mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // rku 'breg 'dod la sbed pa yang // lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te// 
67a4(rgyud): sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur shing // srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro/ ji ltar 'dam las skyes pa yi// pad+ma med yid 'ong ba// de bzhin lus gyi 'das las ni// ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gre// mkha'
67a5(rgyud): 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rjesems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las// gong du
67a6(rgyud): 'pha ba'i bsam gtan dang // seng ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung ba'i rim par bya ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// g.yas kyi char
67a7(rgyud): rnal 'byer pa// g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid// sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa// mkha 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// g+ho g+ha// thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa// 'bar byed ma'i mtshan ma'o// gu g+ha/ mthe bong 'chir bar byed pa ni// 
67a8(rgyud): 'jib byed ma'i mtshan ma'o// mr-i g+ha/ lag pa rnam par rdebs pa ni// blo ldan 'phrog byed rtag yin// lu g+hu/ sna cir sbyor mo rdabs pa ni// thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin// daMSh+TA/ shi ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa// rnal/ 
67b1(rgyud): 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// ga // gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa// nga yi snying sdug gogs pa'o// a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'chir byed pa// 'dus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o// b+hak+kha yo// lag pa rtsal
67b2(rgyud): 'ju byed pa// khyod kyi khyim dungs byin pa'o// dra ri ti/ lag pa snying khar nyed byed na// da ni nga yi yang 'ong ba'o// ru tsa ba ta ba ta/ sna rtsa khu tshur 'chang ba ni// mdo zhes ston pa'o// shAr+ya tra/ lag pa brkyang ste lhor rje
67b3(rgyud): ma phun sum ldan par yod zhes pa'o// trika sa ha/ lte ba ru ni nyid byed na// kha zas za bar 'dod pa'o// tsaN+Da li ka/ 'dzub mo bdun du stor byed na// zha gnag gtul drag pa'o// nI la den+ta ba ta/ smin ma la ni reg byang na/ 
67b4(rgyud): 'di 'dod pa ni de lta ston// a na ga yu ta/ lce ni 'grel bar byed pa dag/ da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o// dur ti/ kun tu lta bar byed pa ni// tshes grang sa shes par 'dod pa'o// ta ra ga na// chas gcig nas ma
67b5(rgyud): brtsams na su// mtha bsar mo bri bar bya// nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa// sngar bstan bzhin du mdun du rag/ gi ri/ stang du lta bar byed pa ni/ nyin phyed dga' bas rol pa'o// sa mtsha ya// 'dzum dang bcas
67b6(rgyud): par lta byed cing // lag pas lag pa bzung na su// rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa// nor zas byin zhes bya ba'o// dzi na pa ta/ la gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na// da ltar gogs la 'dod zhes pa'o// salpa ta/ bab bong yis ni srin
67b7(rgyud): lag la// dag pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'o// so na/ mtha bong khra bo bza' la sogs// sUR+Ya/ mkha' gsun dang mnyam spyor ba'i// rdo mkha'agro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje se dang bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo gyis
67b8(rgyud): gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las/ rnal 'byor ba dang rnal byar ma rnams kying gi phyag rgya'i brda yis rol pa'i tshiga'i rim pa da pa ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// rnamos sngar yang
68a1(rgyud): // mdzad/ glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas// e ba si ta ya/ ru Na na~M b+ha dza ni ta ma d+h+ya ma// ga ma a ga ma hA dA ma ya ni sa// ni ga ma sA Shi gI ma d+hu ba ti si re re sa ri rI sa ni sa ma d+h+ya/ ma sar su ti nis ras ni
68a2(rgyud): ra b+ha ga ma ya/ d+ha mA d+ha ma/ sa ra pa pA ma a a pa bA ad na mi te/ mo zhes bya'o// shar du ma'o// gshin rjer ni bra'o// nub tu ni mi'o// byang du ni ku'o// ma mtsham su d+hi sa'o// bdan bral du ni ma ka'o// rlung mtsham su ni tA
68a3(rgyud): dbang ldan du ni bi mo'o// i ni chur po'o// a ni zla ba la skye ba'o// u ni lha'i bla ma'i 'o// oM ni pa ba sangs kyi'o// o ni nyi ma'i bu'i'o// a ni gza'i bdag por bong cano// a ni nyi ma'o// gza' rnams kyi ni tshig las/ 
68a4(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya// zla ba ka ka ra la dbang // nyi mo gdong lnga pa lnga ste// bza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa// rA si gnyis gnyis lan spyod/ smang gshong 'khor lo khyod kyis bshad// skar ma dus dang
68a5(rgyud): nyi ma yi// bye brag dag ni mo 'tshal te// bde ba chen pos ba sha du ga sol// bka' stsal pa// lug dang ro hi ta sogs pa// gang gi 'chi ba bshad kyis nyon// mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya// zla ba dang ni chos
68a6(rgyud): grangs dang // skar ma yi ni dus dang ldan// gdon dang nad ni de bzhin te// sgang gshong rA si tshad ma ni// gang zhig las ni skyes pa'i brjod// ba tra yi ni nyi ma la// dgun zla ra ba'i zi yi// bza' ni mgo dmar dag dang ni// rgyu
68a7(rgyud): skar smin dag ldan gyur pa// de ni de yi 'tsho dus yin// sus kyang bsgrub par mi nuso// khyu mcho gi ni nyi ma la// lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs dang // spro zhing 'gul ba'i nad kyis ni// 'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ 
68a8(rgyud): de bzhin dgun zla 'bring po yi// gza' la ga dang ni snang mar ldan// nyi ma bzhi pa da la ni// dgongs mo'i 'chi 'gyur the tsomed// dgun zla tha chungs lha mo che// sker ma mgo dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni gza' lag bcas
68b1(rgyud): pa la// 'khrig pa'i mi ni gang yin pa// nyi ma dag la 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la// skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni pa ba sangs 'jom zhing // nyi ma snga gro'i dus dras la ni// karka Ta ni 'chi bar 'a/ 
68b2(rgyud): dpying zla 'bri po'i gnyis lnga la// skad ma mchu dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni nyi ma dag la ni// skran dang gzer ba'i nad kyis ni// bu mo'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi la// skar ma lha mtshams ldan pa dang // gza
68b3(rgyud): ni mog dper dag la ni// srang ga ma ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig le// nag pa dang ni mi dmangal// sdig pa'i ma ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla tha chung ches dgu la// skar mgo bzhin ldan pa dang // gzhu
68b4(rgyud): yi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de dag nges par ldan gyur na// 'tsho 'gyur bang na par nga yis bshad// ston zla ra ba'i bdun pa la// skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la// chu srin mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// ston
68b5(rgyud): zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la// skar ma tha skar ldan pa dang // gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la// bum pa'i mi zad par 'gro/ ston zla tha chungs sgra ma che// nyi ma dag ni brgyad pa la// skar ma nam grur ldan pa dang / 
68b6(rgyud): gza' ni spen par bcas pa la// nya'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// sngon du skye dus shes bya ste// phyi nas dus ni brtsi bar bya// gzhan du dus ni smra ba dag/ thams cad don med nyid du 'gyur// skye dus shin tu mnyam gzhag ste// zhi dang / 
68b7(rgyud): drag po dpyad par bya// tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs pa// de nas da ltar lung bstan zhes// mkha' ga kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje ma kha 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo can gyis
68b8(rgyud): gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' ga las gza' dang nyi ma'i nges par 'chi ba tshar bcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // ltas kyi mtshan nyid ge ba ni// rab tu ba
69a1(rgyud): kyis lha me nyon// A li ka li mnyam byas la// sde tshan du ni bsdeb par bya// dbyangs dang gsal byed dang po sogs// bltas te ming ni bzung bar bya// cha shas ldan la snying stobs can// de yi rigs ni/ 
69a2(rgyud): par ba// mtha' yas la sogs klu rnams dang // nyi ma la sogs de bzhin gza'// mkha' gro ma sogs ma mo rnams// de yi rigasu rab tu gags// lha rnams thams cad nyidang ni// sngags rnams thabs cad la skyes
69a3(rgyud): skye ba thams cad skyes byed ma// des na ma zhes bya bar brjod// a yig dang ni de bzhin A/ kaNe Ta dang yang dag ldan// ta ba dang ni ya sha ste// sdi dgu yi ni yi ge'o// i drang slar yang lha mo I// de bzhin gzhan yang
69a4(rgyud): kha tsha Tha// tha pa dang ni r-i Sha nyid// sde tshan gnyis pa yin par brjod// u dang lha mo de bzhin u// ga dza Ta dang yang dag ldan// da ba dang ni las/  te// de dag snga tshan gsum pa yin// yi ge aM dang de bzhin
69a5(rgyud): ai ru de bzhin slar yang g+ha dz+nyA D+ha// d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin// 'di dag/ sde tshan bzhi pa yin// oM yig da ni oM yig dang // oM zhes bya dang tshig dag bcas// slar yang nga nya Nan ma// 'di dgu sde tshan lnga
69a6(rgyud): yin// kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bani dang // lhag ma lnga dang bcas par bya// de dag skye bo thams cad kyi// sku dang 'jig par yang dag gnas// yi ge bcu gnyis sgyu 'phrul che// 'tsho dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod// dag rAs
69a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba// skad ma kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba nyi ma'i bya dgi so// de bzhin 'og dang steng du blta// brtan pa nyid dang g.yo ba nyid// gnyis po gnyisu brjed pa yin// rkyang ba dang ni sbyar ba ste// ring dang thung dang pham dang
69a8(rgyud): rgyal// de las stang gi rgyal ba ste// 'og ni 'tshe bar shes pa bya// nyi ma'i rgyu bar 'gro ba yi// gza' dang rA lis skar ma rnams/ nyi ma la ni gnas te 'char// dA sa~M gza' dang gsum par 'dod// dbugs rgyub
69b1(rgyud): yang dag ldan// thams cad ra sir shes par bya// karka Ta dang glang po'i dgra/ de bzhin gzhon nu ma dang srang // cha shas dag dang yang dag ldan// gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur// sdig pa dang ni cha skyes dang // 
69b2(rgyud): khyu mchog dang ni bum par bcas// cha shas lnga yi tshad dang ldan// gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur// nya dang lug dang de bzhin du// gzhu dang zung du sprod pa dang // cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sdom bzhin
69b3(rgyud): du 'char bar 'gyur// slar yang ltas dang bcas pa yi// gza' rnams 'char ba bshad par bya// 'bras bu'i mong dang ldan par bya// ltas chen 'byung ba mnyamo par gyis// nag mo dang / gtsigs ma dang / 'dzag su rung ma
69b4(rgyud): dai / rga las 'das ma dang / log 'dren ma dang / gtum mo dang / ngag mo'i gzugs can ma dang / dka' zlog lA ma dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam parang rgyal ma dang / mi thub ma dang / gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / 
69b5(rgyud): mo bzang mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / nig mo sbom mo dang / dbang me dang / zla ba mo dang / drag mo dang / sdang ma dang / 'phyang ma dang / sum cu'i da bang mo dang / 'phrog byed ma dang / 'bar ma dang / 'ji bad ma dang
69b6(rgyud): lha mo 'di rnams ming dang ni// ltas tshan nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu ste// nyis 'gyur du ni byas ni su// dbang po'i cha dang yang dag ldan// ltas ni lhag ma bzung na su// ltas ni shes pa
69b7(rgyud): nyid bya// nag mo dang ni 'jigs rung dang // dge mo'i gzugs dang dka' zlog nyid// nag sbom ma dang rgyal ma dang // dag me sum cu'i dbang mo dang // 'phrog byed ma dang 'jib byed ma// bcu po 'di dag rtsub par grags
69b8(rgyud): bgo ma lan dang 'akris dang // grong dang tshong 'dus gzugs pa dang // lam du smag dang zab mo dang / chen po'i sar ning byung ba sogs// ltas de las ni 'bras med pas// dag pa'i las rnams mi bya ste// di de nas la
70a1(rgyud): sgyu mche// bzang po'i las ni spang bar bya// dge bas kyang ni gsod 'gyur na// drag mo'i las kyis smos ci dgos// lus la gnas pa'i dbugs dang ni// phyi rol gza' dang rA si ste/ phyi dang nang du
70a2(rgyud): pa yi// rgyu ba shes na 'grub par 'gyur// gza' gang yin pa dbyangs zhes bya// dbyangs gang yin pa de nyid kyang // rA si nyid shes par bya// dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin du// skar ma'ang dbyangs kyi gzugasu blta// phan tshun
70a3(rgyud): sbyor ba ma gtogs par// 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyuraro// g.yeb 'char la g.yo ba'i las// brtan pa la ni mi g.ye bar// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren ma ste// phyi dang nang du bcas pas gsal// mkha' go kun dang mnya
70a4(rgyud): sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' go bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las gza' rnams kyi rgyu ba dang sde can gyi
70a5(rgyud): ltos kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // da ni gang+gA2 dang skar ma ru// bcas pa'i rgyu ba bshad kyi nyon// nyi ma rgyu ba'i nyin/ mo ni// thun phyed lnga dang bdun pa la// bya ba ci yang mi 'a
70a6(rgyud): zla ba yi ni bzhi dang drag/ mig dmar gyi ni gsum dang lnga// gza' lha gnyis dang bzhi pa la// gdon mi za bar 'joms par 'gyur// bla mas dang po gsum pa la// 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// ngan spong gi ni gi
70a7(rgyud): pa dang bdun pa la ni shes par bya// dal ba yi ni dang po dang // dag pa la ni 'chi bar byed// rigs de dag gi 'char ba yi// dus ni yongasu chad par bstan// de dag thun mong mtshan nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi gzhan bsha
70a8(rgyud): nyon// lnga nas nyi shu lnga yi bda'ang dag ni brjod bya ste// de las chu gsum gsum gyi bar du re re spe ba bar bya// dgun zla tha chungs nyi ma la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug/ gsuM drung zla ste zla lhag tshes phyogs mdag/ 
70b1(rgyud): yon tan// thig la de dag gi ni 'tshe ba yang dag bshad pa yin// lnga las bcu yi bar dang de bzhin bcu nas ni// bco lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni// de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du sbyar bar bya// de nas bsgrub pos
70b2(rgyud): bya ba gnas skabs 'gyur ba bshad par bya// zla ba gang la gnas pa yis// dang por skar ma bgrang bar bya// nyi ma yi ni chu tsho dag/ ji snyed 'das pa de da ni/ zla ba'i gnas skabs rgyu ba'i phyir// de ni drug cur bsgyur ba phye
70b3(rgyud): slar yang nyi tshe zla ba bsnun// drug ru ni bsgyur byas la// mda' dang sreg byed ro yi ni// dbang por bcas pas de bzhin bcad // bcu gnyis ngag gi nang nas ni// lhag ma'i cha shas gzung bar bya// lhag ma'i cha shas de
70b4(rgyud): yi ni/ sgyid sdug gnas skabs myong bar 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan gyi skyer ba yis// lhag ma'i cha tshod du ni brjod// dang po'i zla ba'i bar gnas pa// de yi bya ba nyams par 'gyur// gnyis pa bkra shis shis
70b5(rgyud): pa ste gsum pa 'chi ste gsod par 'gyur// bzhi pa rgod tshim par 'gyur// lnga pa nor te rnyed par 'gyur// dag pa rims te lus 'jig la gyur// bdun pa la ni dga' ba ste// tshim pa nyid ni 'thob pa/ 
70b6(rgyud): 'gyur// brgyad pa 'jig rten brlag par 'gyur// zla ba dgu par gnas pa yis// lus ni ngag dang bcas par 'gyur// bcu pa dga' mgur rtse 'gyur zhing // sna tshogs pas ni rgyal bar 'gyur// bcu gcig sna tshogs
70b7(rgyud): 'jigs pas gdung // bcu gnyis pa ni long spyod// bde ba chen pos brgyal bar 'gyur// lug la sogs pa bstan pa yis// zla ba rim pa bzhin du rgyu// mkha'ag kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' go pa
70b8(rgyud): rdo rje sede de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha 'a gro las thang rgyu ba'i rim par phye ba nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos mchod
71a1(rgyud): // cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sgra gshong 'khor lo khyod bshad pa// nga rnams dab bci 'ang dang // dus kyi grangs ni ji bzhin gsungs// rgyu ba yi ni khyad par dag/ 'di la bdag ni the tsom skyes/ 
71a2(rgyud): bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// sgyu ma kun gyis rnal rol pa// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// dus kyi bgrang ba lus med cing // thams cad du ni thams cad gnas// dngos po kun la khyab pa ste// lus la gnas kyang lus
71a3(rgyud): mi skye// dus nyid dus ni med pa dang // 'jog rten 'di ni 'jig rten man// bangan pa dang ni brdzun pa min// lnga khyod kyis ni sngar bshad par// bsam gyis mi khyab dus mtshan nyid// gang zhig khyod kyis bshad pa de/ don dam
71a4(rgyud): shin tu rnyed dka' ba// lus las 'das shing da mad pa/ rnal 'byor pa yis ji ltar rtogs// skye bo kun la sman slad du// dadu gas kyi nges pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
71a5(rgyud): ba nad med rlung dang dral ba dang // khams ni snyoms par gnas pa dang // ran par za zhing tshul bzhin rgyu// de yi mig btsums bzung bar bya/ mig btsums mig ni btsums pa ste// mig btsungs drag pa cha shas ni
71a6(rgyud): gcig ces bya bar brjod pa yin// yul tsam drug ni skad cig ste// skad cig drug ni thang gcig yin// thang cig drug ni cung zad yin// dus kyi go rims bya ba 'dris/ sum cu thams par bsgyur ba la// yi ge lI
71a7(rgyud): ba'i dus zhes brjod// yi ge lci ba bcu la ni// srog gcig zhes bya dusu bshad// de ni bcu gsum sbyar ba las// da yang gnyi su bsgyur ba ni// srang gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin// srang ni drug cu tham pa la
71a8(rgyud): chu tshod gcig tu bzhed pa yin// de brgyad thun cig zhes bya'o// de bzhi la ni nyin gcig/ nyin mtshan dus na mnyam pa la// mtshan mo 'ang de dang mnyam par bshad// chu srin nas ni sbal ba'i bag/ nyi ma 'phe
71b1(rgyud): bar brjod pa ste// lha mo srang ni gsum gsum gyis// nyin re bzhin ni spel bar bya// chu srin las ni 'das nas// mtshan mo srang ni gsum gsum 'di/ tshad ma de dag bstan pa'i phyir// zangs ma srang ni bcu gnyis la// snod
71b2(rgyud): dpangasu sor brgyad dang // rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis pa// legs pa nyid du brdung bar bya// gser ni 'ol sa sum cu las// sor drug pa yi tshad tsam du// zur ma lags par brdungs nas ni// thung ma de yos bu ga ni// rmas
71b3(rgyud): ma'i snod la mkhas pas dbugs// chu ni rnyog ma med pa las// srang ni dag tsu'i tshad du bya// srang 'dis chu tshod tshad yin te// skye ba rnams la phan phyir bshad// chu tshod dang ni yud tsam ste// thun byed dang ni thun gcig dang / 
71b4(rgyud): dang mtshan mo'i tshad kyis ni// rim bzhin zla pyad zla bar spel// zla ba gnyis ni dus yin te// de gsum nyi ma 'gro ldog brjod// nyi ma 'a go ldo gnyis la ni// lo gcig nyi du brjod pa yin// mkha' go kun da
71b5(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' gro bde ba'i mchog/ sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsu des// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' gro las dus 'byung
71b6(rgyud): ba'i rim par phye ba ste// nyi shu rtsa dag pa'o// de nas skar ma'i rigs gang yin// mder bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// tha skar dang ni mgo dang rgyal// de bzhin du ni mA so dang / ma bzhi lha mtshams de bzhin du// nam gas
71b7(rgyud): ri gro zhun btsas// lha yi tshogs zhes brjod pa yin// snar ma pra dang chu stod dang // khrims sto dang ni bra nya dang // lag dang mgo dang chu smad dang // khrums smad mi yi tshogs yino// smin dag dang ni mchu dang ni// mon gru dang ni
71b8(rgyud): mon gre dang // skag dang nag pa snron dang ni// sa ga dang ni sdums rnams ni// srin po yi ni rig yin par// bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la bshad// sman dag rgyal ni ra yin te// mgo dang snar mi klu yin// lag dang snrums ni khyi y-i
72a1(rgyud): // te/ lha mtshams nib so bag gi rigs// mchu dang ga ni byi ba'o// skag ni byi lang bshad pa ste/ nag pa sa ga stag yi no//  bo dang khrims stod gnyis po naM// khyu mchog zhes ni bshad pa ste// stobs 'dod pa/ 
72a2(rgyud): ni shes par bya// me bzhi dang ni sa ri gnyis// ma her shes pa stobs kyi mchog/ tha skar dang ni khrums smad gnyis// rta yi rigs zhes bya bar gagis// chu stod dang ni go zhun gnyis// spre'u'i rigasu brjod pa yin// bra nya dang ni ma
