143b1(rgyud): pa'i sa bon ni// na mkha' rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs// sa bon de yi mtha' yi ge/ e yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa// dpa'o gcig pu mi skyed pa'o// de ltar 'khor lo mkha' rang bzhin// de ltar rkang pa dgu po ni// rnal 'byor ma
143b2(rgyud): tshogs yi ge ste// khams gsum gyi ni sngags rang bzhin// sngags kun spyod pa'i sbyong bdag nyid// mkha' gro'i dam tshig la bzhugs nas// ngos grub thams cad rab gsol ba'i// bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsung so// 
143b3(rgyud): lo gsum pa'i nus pa yis// ji ltar 'dod pa 'i las byar// rnal 'byor rnams kyi las dusu// sgyu mas thams cad rmongs par bya// rdo rje ma bdag slar langs nas/ 'khor lo gzhan gyi rnal 'byor ldan// mchog tu mi 'gyur
143b4(rgyud): gtso bo la// bdag med ma yi dam 'khyud // ta yi sngags kyis gnyis pa sbyor// bya gnas me dang rlungs bon// bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags che// de yi gnyis pa sa bon// a yi yi ges dgang ba'o// 'byung ba
143b5(rgyud): bo bzhi rang bzhin// pa yig ra yig oM yig sbyar// gsu po rlung gi rang bzhin// ta yi yi ge aM yig ldan// slar yang rnam shes sa bon// ka yi sde yi dbus gnas pa// e yi yi ges rnar rgyan// rnal phyo
143b6(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya rang bzhin// slang la yang ni brjod par bya'o// tshig 'di thabs shes dbyer mdangos// sa mtha' dang ni ni yi sngags// slar la yang ni brjod par bya// skyed cing sdud par byed gzug so// par a yigs bon gcig
143b7(rgyud): dam pa yi yi ge'o// na mtha' A li yi ge ldan// gzhom du med la skyes pa'o// ta'i mtha' makun 'joms pa'o// kaka dang ni rtsa gnas la/ byas gsu sbyar zhing zig lo sbyin// rnal 'byor mthun 'khod pa'o// de bzhin
143b8(rgyud): ni kha kha dang / gsum ba ce ru gnas pa'o// ba pa sel bar byed pa'i rgyu/ d+hA na li ni sngags kyi tshig lan gnyi su ni brjod par bya// rtogs pazad 'joms par byed// ya sde'i mtha' ma y-i ni sngags// rdo rje bu ga rgyan po'o/ tsa sdel
144a1(rgyud): / dbus gnas sa bon/  ma stan la yong su gnas// gti mug zabar byed pa'o// sa mthar gnos med dbus ma'o// sha sde'i gsub pa bstan can/ e si yi ge rnam par rgyud// sna tshogs mkha 'a gro ma sa
144a2(rgyud): 'bod pa yi ni sngags// she Sha ya yi sngags kyi tshig// khan gnyi su na brjod par bya// ye shes can rlom nga rgyal 'joms// byang chub byang chub med nyid// de ltar rkang pa bcu gnyis ni// sa dang rnal 'byor las rang bzhin// bcu gnyis sa
144a3(rgyud): rnams khyab bdag/ bcom ldan lha yis 'di gsung so// ya ga rnams kyi gnas sogs kyi// brda yis de nyid pha rol 'gro// bdag las sems can thams cad skyes/ seMn las kyang bdag byung // bdag de rtag tu med gyur nas/ 
144a4(rgyud): sgyu ma rmi lam de bzhin gshegs// 'khrul 'khor 'din stobs che ste// las rnams ji lta bar ni byung // rdo rje mkha 'gro mtshan nyid bu// dus 'dir bda' gyur ba'o// 'khor lo lnga pa 'di rnamasu// mya ngan 'das pal
144a5(rgyud): bir bya// lha sogs thams cad rgyun tu gsod// de rnams pa mas cad rtag tu 'gro la// bka' stsal ba ka yi gnyis pa'i sa thon// rnal byi ma'i tshogs de nyidado// Ta bzung ba mtha'i stan can te// maM gis cod pan
144a6(rgyud): brgyan par bya// de la a yi yi ges dag // 'gro ba dag rang bzhi no// ka sde'i dbus gnas sa bon// dugis rag pa 'phrog par byed// ka yi sa bon stong rang bzhin/ na yi mtha' ma a yig ldan// me 'brang ba yis dang ldan te/ 'dzin
144a7(rgyud): ba yi ni sa bon ni// skyod pa'i khyab dag chen po'o// ta yo sde yi bzhi pa ni// a yi dbyangs kyis brgyan pa yi// srid pa dang bral ba li gzugs// nyi ma a yig ldan ro langs// ta mtha'i sa bon bzung bar bya// dbyangs kyi gsum
144a8(rgyud): bas mgol brgyan// sa gsum thad gsod pa'o// ba sde'i mthar yis bon ni// yid kyi sgra btog med byed/ samatha'i A yi dag ldan pa/ yang yang ba shes ni rtog pa'o// ma gnyis ha gnyis brjod par bya// chings pa'i pa
144b1(rgyud): bzhin 'phrog cing 'phrog/ pa yi sa bon a yig rgyun// pa nags kun nyams bzung de nyid// sha yi yi kas i dang ldan// sang+ga za ba yi ni sngags// ta'i sngags slar yang 'chi med skye// ba mtha' a yi yi gas dgang // thig
144b2(rgyud): las cod pan la reg pa'o// rgya la 'chi ba rtogs pa yin// sa yi ge dbyangs gnyis brjod phyir rgyan// sngon du 'phrog par byed pa'o// sha gnas sa bon dur khrod// ta mtha' i dang ldan pa ni// thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o// 
144b3(rgyud): pa sde'i mtha' ma i dbyangs ldan// sdang ba'i yid de 'dzin chen po// na yig u stan rtog kun sel// pa snga gnyis pa'i sa bon no// A yig mgor rig thig le gnas// byang chub sgrub pa yi ni sngags// thur du
144b4(rgyud): ba'i rlung giso// tadang nga yi yi ges nyes/ sa ni 'jig sa par byed sngag so// ba ra a yi sa bon gcig sum cu rtsa gsum skye dub 'joms// ya snga'i mtha' ma sa nan pa// ye shes kyi ni dag byad/ 
144b5(rgyud): 'gram gnas sa bod// me yi rna pa rgyan pa'o// rnal 'byor po yi mi shes 'joms// sa yig a yi yi gos dag / bug/ 'tshed pa ni nyams par byed// yi snga gsum mgo la rgyan// chos dang chos
144b6(rgyud): spong rang bzhin// d+ha yig ya dang srung ba ste// bsam gtan sngags kyi rang bzhi no// ta sde'i mtha' ma bzung bya ste// gong khyer ltar snang dngos po med// ya sde'i gnyis po'i sa za ni// gti mug rang bzhin 'bar po'o// sa yig
144b7(rgyud): yi ges ngabye// seng ge ma ha 'joms pa'o// nyi mar yang ni gnas pa ni// rnal 'byor ma kun rgyal po'o// pa sde'i mtha' ma a dbyangs rgyal// sgyu mar sems can des 'dzin// 'dzin pa'i sa bon a yig rgyan// de kho na yi
144b8(rgyud): shes thog// de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi po// sems can kun gyi mi shes gsod// dam pa'i sngags dngos gzugs bdag nyid// 'byin cing sdud par byed pa'o// 'byung po thams cad 'jigs byed pa// bcom ldan lha yis 'di
145a1(rgyud): // gsung so// 'khor lo rnam pa'i gzugs bdag nyid// phag mo'i thugs khar rgyan pa ste// stong nyid snying rje dper med par// gsod pa dang ni mi gsod pa'o// sde'i dbus na stan can// gsum de'i mgo
145a2(rgyud): thig la sbyin// theg pa mchog chos cano// ta sde'i gnyis pa'i yi ga ni// i yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o// mu stegs rnal 'byor nyams byed pa'o// ta yig rtogs par byed pa'o// ta sde'i gzhor gnas A dang ldan// byang
145a3(rgyud): chub mtha' med 'dzin pa'o// gnas pa la phyangs gsum rgyan// rnal 'byor ma kun 'chang ba'o// na sngags i yogs rgyan pa'o// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi la mo// sum+b+ha na mi tshig rkang ste// lan gnyis ni brjod pa
145a4(rgyud): byang tshig drug rtogs pa'i de nyid// de bzhin du ni sa m+b+ha'i sngags// rnal 'byor ma yi mchod rang bzhin// ha na'i sdug na lan gnyis brjod// sdang ba'i theg pa nyams par byed// ba a ma
145a5(rgyud): ge gcig/ dbang po rang dang ngo bo gzhan// Na a aM g-i yo ges dgang // sa bon 'di ni yon tan sngags// sa yig rtsa kun 'aHga pa'o// ba yi ga ra yi yig rgyan ri// pa gnas na mkha' la 'jug pa'o/ 
145a6(rgyud): sa ya~M yig gnas kun gyi gzugs// ya sde'i mtha' ma A yis dgang // rlung ni srog ye sheso// na yig A yi yi ges dgang // byang chub gang du'ang mi rtog pa'o// thag le mgo la blta bar bya// bsnga'i mtha' ma sbra
145a7(rgyud): chen gzugs// sa mtha' A l-is dgang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma yaM tshogs srog// pa mthar a dang ldan pa la// oM gcod pan la rgyan pa'o// chos kun gyi ni sprin rang bzhin// sa yig dam chos mi shes gsod// ts+tshe snga
145a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'o// song ba 'khor bar skye ba med// ta sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni// da ni don med pa snang ba'o// na la i dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten ma lus 'ching ba nyid// glo sngags gnon pas 'khor ba gcod
145b1(rgyud): d+ha yi sa bon 'gro kun 'joms// spros pa med par byed pa'o// mU yi yi ge sa bon ni// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi las// de ltar byed bcas tshig bcu bzhi// rtsa yi 'khor lo yi ni mtha'o// bum pa can la sogs
145b2(rgyud): pa'i las// rnal 'byor gang dang gang 'dod byed// 'khor lo drug rab sbyor bas// ci 'dod las kyi rang bzhin te// bdag po sbyor ba grub nus can// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// gtsug tor la sog skye gnas mtha
145b3(rgyud): lus ngag sems shes na mkha' las// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis// de nyid byang chub rnams shes bya// 'dir ni thabs kyi cha dang ni// shes rab kyi yang cha ru brjod// yang na yi ge re re yaM// bar bar du
145b4(rgyud): ste slar yang ni// dri sngags lhan skyes rang bzhin te/ 'kho ra lo yi ni khyad par gyi// nye ba'i las rnams byed pa'o// daMbyA ka rA li yaM sngags// 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhi no// ma sngags ba sngags bu de'i snga
145b5(rgyud): rna ba yini ring bzhino// shrI he ru ka de bas+ya gra ma ha tsi nr-i/ sngags tshig sna yi rang bzhin// gnyis med rnam pa'i chos las ni/ gnyisu sems can 'dzin pa ste/ shes rab la ni 'di steng pa// bcom
145b6(rgyud): ldan bla masa'i gsungaso// nyan thos la sogs mu stegs rnams// mi shes pa yi phyugs thams cad de rnams ye shes 'thob bya'i phyir// tshul lugs 'di ni bstan pa'o// ha sra na ne yi ni sngags// yul rgya
145b7(rgyud): gzugs la reg pa'o// dz+wa li ta ta dza se'i sngags// sngags kyi tshig ni yid kyi yul// dz+wa la mu kha'i tshig lus yul// bing ga lo tsa na yi sngags// sogs rnam par shes pa'o// badz+ra sha rI rI'i sngags// lus kyi rnam
145b8(rgyud): par shes pa'o// badz+ra sa na yi ni sngags// sna yi yul la reg pa'o// mi li ta yi sngags kyi tshig/ sna yi rnam par shes po'o// tsi li te yi sngags kyi tshig/ dbyangs kyi bdag po yi ni yul// ha sngags gnyis brjod
146a1(rgyud): / sgra yi yul// sgra dang dbyangs gnyis kyi rnam shes// de ltar sngags tshig byed bcas bdun// 'chi dang skye ba kun gyi sngags// phag mo la ni bad dgar ba'i// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs te// 
146a2(rgyud): laka ko sbyong bdag nyid// yul dang dbang po sogs gsod pa'o// sems can gang dang gang rnams kyi// yul gyi chu skyes las skyes te// sems can de dang de rnams kyi rang rang las rnams kyis gsod pa'o// yul la
146a3(rgyud): sogs pa 'joms pas na// shes rab 'khor lor dab shad// rgyu dang rgyud rnams kyi ni las// sgrub pa'i snying por ye she so// sa mtha' dag po'i dbyangs stan can// zla du ma thig les mgo la brgyad// lan gnyis
146a4(rgyud): ni brjod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i gzugs// kha gnyis d+hu gnyil cu gnyis// las rnams kyi de dngos po ste// srog dang mnyam du gnas pa'o// a dr-i ta~M ma hA yo gi nI/ pa wi ta si d+hi'i sngags
146a5(rgyud): tshig/ de yang lus mtha' yi ni gzugs// de d+hi tshig gnyis gam tshi gnyis ha mi tshig gnyis ha tshiganyis// khro bcu'i yi ge gshin rje ni// mthar byed la sogs kyi gor bya// ba sngo'i bzhi pa'i sa
146a6(rgyud): la/ I yig mgo la reg pa'o// ma so'i sngags ni tshig kun te// mkha' gro ma yi rang bzhin// de ltar sngags tshig bcu gnyis ni// rten 'brel bcu gnyis slu ba ste// ston pa dam tshig chen po ga so// bcom ldan
146a7(rgyud): 'das kyis 'di gsung so// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyi// las kyi lhan cig thugs byed pa'o// pho nya rnams bskyed pa'i yi ge/ 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i rang bzhin can// 'khor lo yi ge min da ltar// po nyi
146a8(rgyud): bzhin med pa'o// rnam smin de las rnam skyes pa// so so'i ming du 'du shes te// 'jam rdor la sogs dngos po yis// a ba d+hU tI'i mtshan nyid bya// sa ha dpa'o gcig sngags tshig/ de bzhin gshegs dag sa/ 
146b1(rgyud): bon te yon tan mtha' med 'chad pa'o// hA yi sa bon yi ge bzhi// ho gcig ho gnyis brjod par bya// yi ge bdun po lpags sog khams// te lo kya bi nA sha'i sngags// sdang ba la ni cho ga'o// sha ta sa ha sra ko tri/ ta
146b2(rgyud): ga ta pa ri bA ra// sa mtha' U yi dbyangs kyis spras// zla ba'i dum bu theg las rgyan// de ltar sngags kun nyer sdud pa'o// ha U aM sngags kyi rang bzhin// de ltar sngags kyi tshig ni bzhi// rnal 'byor ma skyed dngos
146b3(rgyud): grub 'gyur// bkas gnang dngos grub rab 'jug pa// bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsung so// mkha' ge sdom pa mngon brjo dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor rgyud rnamasu gsungs pa'o// las
146b4(rgyud): kyi chags kyi dngos grub ster// bkang snang 'khor lo'i rab sbyor bas// l+la/ ba 'gyur sbyor ba gzhan gyis min// slang yangs mtha' dbyangs lnga pa'i// drang na gnas pa'i stan can la// zla dum thog
146b5(rgyud): les rgyan pa'o// tshogs de kho na'i sa bon// pa dang gnas pa rnal 'byer ma'i// tshogs ni bskyed par byed pa'o//  yig 'bar bar byed pa'i sngags// sing ha ru pe khaHsngags tshig/ bgegs kyi gci
146b6(rgyud): brlag byed pa'o// ga dza ru pe gaHyi sngags// sems can kun gyi bgegs byed pa'o// trai lo kyang re yi tshig/ rab mchog po nya kun bskyed pa'o// sa mud me kha la ga ha gnyis kyi tshig/ rgya mtsho wA bu'i ska rag smras
146b7(rgyud): de ni sngags kyi ska rag so// hUM dang phan gyi yi ge ni// mkha' go ma yi khyab dgo/ bI rA dwai te hUM sngags tshig/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// tha ma la 'dus byas skyes pa'o// de ltar rkang pa bdun sngags te// ye
146b8(rgyud): sa yi rang bzhin gyis/ bcom ldan rdo rjes 'di gsungs te// sems can las las grub po'i mthar// de yi go 'iphangs mchog tu 'gro/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'tshong ba'i ming// slang yang skye zhing lam la gnas// sgyum
147a1(rgyud): / rnam pa sgyu ma min// rang gi bdag nyid so sor dag/ hU~M ha gnyis ma hA ba shu mo hA na'o// tshig 'khor ba'i rmongs pa'o// lo ga shwa ri tA gi sngags// ni ba yi ni gzugasa'o// DA ki nI lo ka nAM bar+d+ha ni'i tshi
147a2(rgyud): 'jig rten byang chub tu 'jug byed// t+ya me hUM phaTa'i sngags kyis tshig/ mtha' bzhi pon ston pa'o// b+h+rUM ta rdza sa na yi tshig/ mu stegs ye shes 'joms pa'o// de ltar sngags cho ga bdun pos ni// las kyi dbya bye
147a3(rgyud): bste pad+ma'i mdab ma re re la// sngags kyi yi ge rnaM gnas pa'o// dpa'o sngags kyi gzugs gnas pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// 'khrul 'khor chen po bcu gnyis de// bdag mdza' bo yis ni
147a4(rgyud): gsungs// las thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor ni/ bcu gnyis rnams kyis lhan cig bya// 'khor lo chen po rire ru// nges pa so so'i las bya'o// phrad pa rnams ni bcu gnyis// bsgrub bya'i ming
147a5(rgyud): gis bsgrub par bya// pa mtha' sa mtha' a dang ldan/ ya mtha' I li dbyangs dang bcas/ yig na mtha' yig dang / mtha' dzin sid d+ha tshig/ bid bye'i tshig dang shwa ri'i sngags// 'dru
147a6(rgyud): ma dang na ma thon// hU~MhUM lan+da dum mig les brgyan// bskyar la yang ni brjod par bya// ba drung gnas dang Ti yig ste// hU~M dang ni s+yA hA bcas// sngags 'di lteb mchog yis// sgrub bya ming dang bcas par 'arjod/ 
147a7(rgyud): gnyis rnams dang lta bcas la// de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsung so// sa zin yi ge nyi shu bzhi// pul+li ra sogs bsres pa'o// dpal he ru ka rdo rje phag mo// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur// sngags 'di yi
147a8(rgyud): ni mthu stobs ni/ bye ba stong phragasungs pa yi// mtha' med gcung las dpa' tshe yis// de canini stong po bsdus pa yin// rgyud gzhan du ni gsungs pa'o sngags/ sngags 'di mi ni bsgrub thabapo// bzlas med pa
147b1(rgyud): med yi ge med / gzugs med pasam gtan de bzhin med// lha dran pa yi ye shes kyis/ dngos grub thams cad skyed pa'o// dbugs 'jug pa yi du su ni/ yi ge thams cad bas par bya/ 'byin pa rnams kyi sbyor kun skye/ mun
147b2(rgyud): pa'i dasu shes par bya// gnas dus rnal 'byor dbang phyugs// sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dod mi bya// dbugs rgyu de ltar shes bya ste// byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi rtogs// gang gi slob ma dbang bskur ba/ de nyid gzhi rnams bcwa
147b3(rgyud): paso jig pa chen por yod smon la// phyi nas sngags ni rab bstan bya// sngon du phag mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// pi byed nas ha ru ka'i'o// rdo rje bu mo 'am de nas gzhan// deng ni shes rab gzhug par bya// rgyud gnan du ni
147b4(rgyud): la tshul 'di bstan par mi bya'o// ye shes bya'i rang bani na can/ a bad+hU ti dkyil 'khor bya// ye shes rnam pa pag mo yis shes bya dpal he ru kang 'khyud// spyan gsum dag po 'i gzugs
147b5(rgyud): can ma// zhal bzhi mche ba gtsigs pa ste/ phyag ni bcu gnyas rnams dang ldan// dkar mo dang ni 'jigs byed gnon// sku la phyag rgya lnga la sogs// 'jig dus me lta'i 'od zer can// phyag yas rdo rje dang gi
147b6(rgyud): gug// dgra sta Da ma ru de bzhin/ rtse gsum lus med lpags pa ste/ phyag yon pas kyang de bzhin// g.yon du del bu thod pa dang // zhags pa kha T+wAM ga dang ma'o// dbu skra grol zhing gtsar bu ma/ mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa mo
147b7(rgyud): sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams dang ni ldan/ dngul thod pa'i drang ba can// 'dod chags rdo rjes rgyas btab ste// yang na ha ru ka yi so// yan lag lnga rjes dris nyer dbyugs// zhabs gdub dpung brgyan rnams dang ldan// lA rdzas
147b8(rgyud): me tog phreng bas klubs// rtsa bran zla gnas rdo rje ni/ dpral bar rtag tu 'dzin pa mo// g.yas brkyang ba ni zhabs dang ldan// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mdun du// sku las 'bar ba'i phreng ba spro// he ru ka mig sman nag
148a1(rgyud): / po 'ang // ral pa'i cod pan mdun du'o// sta gi lpags pa'i sham thams can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par klubs// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed ldan// spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs
148a2(rgyud): ba ste/ zhal ba ni pal 'jigs par byed// phyag bcu gnyis par rig par bya// brgya pad mgo bos rgyan pa ste// mchod pyi thogs dngapal ba dang // 'bar ba'i brang can gtsigs pa po// skye gnas phyag rgya pha gnyis kyis
148a3(rgyud): lhag ma rdo rje phag me'i'o// gal te he ru ka gtse be/ de cha phag mo'i phyag gnyi su'o// gling pa'o lpags pa 'dzin pa po// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid// zag med rnal 'byor bad chen bzang // sr-i dang mya ngan 'das pa'i gzu
148a4(rgyud): gnyis po snying por sbyin pa dag// lhag ma rnal 'byor ma rnams ni/ mkha' go ma sogs ro mji ltar/ zod dus la sogs sngags rig pas/ dab bo kun kyang sbyin par bya// re re yi yang de yi rgyud// ji ltar sngon gyi rdza su
148a5(rgyud): rkyang ma dang ni ngo ma'i rtse// shes rab da ni thabs 'du ba'i rtse/ ni a badz+rA tI sI// gang der ro mnyam son pa'o// khor lo gsum na nyis 'gyur zhes bya// mkha'agro ma sogs ro mdza bzhin/ e ru ka
148a6(rgyud): dang rdor pag mo// 'bum tshe stong phrag yas te// phyag gnyis la sogs nas brtsams nas// gzhani gang rnams derna pa po// dbang por yul ni mi lta zhing / phyag dang bzhugs tshul la sogs med/ bsgoms pas spros
148a7(rgyud): kun bzung ste// gti mug da ni spang bar gyis// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ skad cig la sogs de sbyor can// snying khang sa bon rnam par dgod// spro dang bsdu ba la sogs bya// dkyil 'khor spyan dang mchod pa
148a8(rgyud): dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs te// stong nyid la sogs ri rab mthar// ra ba dang ni gur la sogs// sa yi chang ni rdo rje'i thig/ 'khor lo drug tu bri ba'o// ji ltar mngon rtogs mtshan nyid kyi// rnam pa sna tshogs
148b1(rgyud): bya thabs dang man ngag thams cad ni// mdzes ma bdagis kun bshad// der ni gtor ma sbyin bya ste// sa sogs lnga rnams kyis chod bya// yi ge 'bar ba'i yig rnams kyis/ sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya'o// 'a
148b2(rgyud): ba'i gnyis 'phel yig rnams kyis// srog gis gtu mo 'bar bar bya// steng du kha bltas rtsa sreg ste// de bzhin ye shes mkha' go skyes// mkha'agro ma sogs ma lus dang // rnam par shes la sogs thom pas// 
148b3(rgyud): bsregs pas 'i bong can te 'dzag dpa'i thathams cadamanyam spyo ba// rdo rje sems dpang bde tshemachog rdo rjeg pa 'grod banon ga shegs/ bcom ldan padag pos 'digasu so// nga ma mkhar ma rgya
148b4(rgyud): 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen pa las// rdo rje phag mo bskyed ba dang / gtso mo dang 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor/ sgom pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te 'din le'u gnyis pa'o// 
148b5(rgyud): nas mkha' gro ma sogs kyi// ji ltar bskyed pa rab bshad bya// mkha' go ma'i sbyor brten nas// bcom ldan 'das ni mchog tu rtsen// phag mo gzugs ni mtha' yas pa'ang // spros bad ba'i sdom pa'o// lus kyi
148b6(rgyud): po'i dbye ba yis// mtha' yas gzugs can mkha' go ma// lus kyi bde ba la brta nas// 'dod pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ dga' ba gsum dang rtsa gsum ste// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par 'dod// sangs rgyas sku yi
148b7(rgyud): nyams chen po// de'i rang bzhin las sna tshogs 'phro// mkha' go ma yi gnas rten nas// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rang bzhi no// 'ja m+bu'i gling ni chen po yo// dum bu bcu gnyis kyi dbusu// shar gyi yul du gnas pa la/ 
148b8(rgyud): kha dog gnog lha mo// dus sbyor ro hi ti chu srin dang / rgyal dang nyi ma dag bskyed dang/ rtsa yi dngos po srog 'bab pa'o// lha mo phyi nang bdag nyid// bcom ldan gzugs can ma gnas te// phyag bzhi ma la kha dog gnas/ sma/ 
149a1(rgyud): // gsuM mche ba gtsigs shing dag pa ste// phyag brgya lnga mngon 'dzin pa mo// ro la zhon ma skra grol ma// g.yas brkyang zhabs dang ldan pa mo// dag mo thod pa'i phreng can ma// g.yas pa DaM ru gri gug can// g.yon par
149a2(rgyud): thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ spre zhing sdud pa'i sku can ma// sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor dbusu bzhag par bya// snying po'i yi gnyi shu gnyis// mikha go ma dang bcas pasbyor/ oM shrI oM badz+ra hiT+Ta he ke tu ni ru ye/ 
149a3(rgyud): d+hUdz+dzahUM ki R+Sha nA pa dza Ta la Ta sa sA b+hai ha ra hUM hU~M phaT swAhA// dkyil 'khor ba yi lha mo rnams// yi ge rdo rje can du 'dod// mkha' gro mtho ga 'joms pa'i mthar// rigs kyi rtsar ni rab tu grags/ mkha' go ma'i gnas
149a4(rgyud): bsgrubs na su// de ni phag mo gnas par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa bdun lta rnams ni// rang 'da'i thabs dang gnyis med pade/ ming gi sbyor bas/ shes bya ba// dgos pa rnams mang man no/ sum cu rtsa bdu
149a5(rgyud): gyi na rgyud// bde ba che las bskyed par 'gyur// gang phyir bdag po ma'agro ma// rgyud da mkha go ma'i rig so// bdag po khyod la bdag 'di'o// ji ltar bdage bskyed 'gyur ba// mkha' gro ma la bde ster ba'i/ kharjes
149a6(rgyud): ni mnyes byas nas// khyod bskyed pa ni bshad kyis nyon// rang gi rgyud ni ma nyams pa// Da yig gsang ba'i bug bdag nyid// gzhu yi rnam pa srog dang ldan// lus kyis gzugs can yang dag pa// yul dang dbang po'i bag
149a7(rgyud): nyid can/ byang chub sems kyi bag le tshe/ rgyud i zhes bya'i ming can te// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i bad chen du// rtsa yi 'khor lo la khyab gyur// ka yig ka gzugs kyang de bzhin/ 'od gsal sprul bya sprul pa'o// phrin
149a8(rgyud): las kyis ni khams kun gyis// zhi ba'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba che// dga' ba med ces mi 'gyur kyang // brjod min lhan skyes tshon gyis mdzes// mi gzugs rtag tu bde chen pos// sgyu 'phrul nges par 'gro bar gyu
149b1(rgyud): I ni 'byung po che kun dang // dbang phyug la sogasu ni ston// lug dang mar ser yid bzang gis// de yi gzhi ni skyed par 'gyur// 'di na mkha' go ma yi ming // las kyi dus bzhin mtshon par bya// klu rnams yang dag
149b2(rgyud): dgug bya dang // char 'bebs gzhug phyir bzhu pa dang / lha rnams dang ni 'byung po kun// rgyal po rnams kyi'ang 'phrul chen dang // dbang dang mngon spyod rengs pa dang / bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs pa// mngon spyod
149b3(rgyud): dus las shes par bya// rang rang gling du bskyed pa ste// shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug pas// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor dbang pos sems phra zhing // shin tu phra bas der 'jug 'gyur// 
149b4(rgyud): don du de dang ded// rang bdag sbyor bas mdzad par 'gyur// stong gsum stong ni chen po ru// gang du khyab bdag kun spyod 'gyur// dar ni dum/ du bcu gnyi su// rang rang gtso mo rnal 'byor ma// tha ma dang
149b5(rgyud): long spyod spyod rnamasu// rdzu 'phrul che rnams kun spyod 'gyur/ nyi brgya phrag bcu drug// dbugs rgyu bar ni shes par bya// brgya phrag / co brgyad srog rnams kyis// 'pho bar 'dir ni brjod pa
149b6(rgyud): byang bcu gnyis rnams ni nyon zhag 'gyur// dus sbyor bcu gnyis rim pa'o// dus sbyor gsum bsgyur byas na su// dus kyi pho nya mo kun spyod// dus brgya'i phyed kyis pho nya mo// ra re rnam par shes par bya// lnga bcu
149b7(rgyud): gsum gyi yang dag par// nyin zhag gcig la spyod pa'o// de rnams yi ger yang dag bshad// a yig la sogs k+Sha mtha' can// yon tan 'phang ma yin bstan pas// gsum ragyur brgya phrag phye dang bcas// 
149b8(rgyud): de rnams pho nya mor nges bshad// 'di na mikha' go ma phyag rgya// mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan// sa 'og rnams na'ang gnas pa mo// rnal 'byor ma rnams rnam gsum ni// zhing sngags lhan cig skyes ra // gang zhi
150a1(rgyud): / gang gis lhag gnas pa// de ni de yid gsal mthong 'gyur// rigs kyi khyad par la rten nas// 'dod pa'i spyod skyes gnas bcan// tsa ru'i bza' ba de rnam su// ye shes gzugs can phyugs chen
150a2(rgyud): bza' min bza' bya dang yang ni// mtshon min gsal bar mtshon par bya// mtshan nyid mtshan nyid min pa spong // da ni spong bar rab spong ba'o// rjes 'dzin tshar gcad la chags pa'ang // gang zhig gang gis rang rang dngos
150a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang ni chos gnas par bya/ byas te mngon sbyor sbyor ba yis// a ba d+hU tA'i srog gi rlung // brtan pa phag sogs rnal 'byor ma// maM brtan srog/ rlung rnams kyi// dngos grub gsal bar mi 'gyuraro// lha mo rnanam
150a4(rgyud): snang gis rgyan gdag/ rdo rje 'dzin bdag mi bskyod pas// pho nya mo snga/ gas sum cu drug/ dus las rang dang rang gi rigs// ji ltar bdag no// 'i rig dang ni// phyag dang mtshan ma rim ji ltar// yang na nges
150a5(rgyud): bar brjod pa ru// mngon rtogs mtshan nyid las shes bya// bol+la ka/ la sbyor las// lha mo ring nyid zhu bar zhugs// skad cig de la ma lus pa'i// dkyil 'khor thams cad ro nyam lta/ lha mo na mkha'i nang snang
150a6(rgyud): 'di yis mnga' bdag bskul ba bya// mchog tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rol cig rol// shes rab thabs kyi mi dgongs pa grub par mdzod// 'jig rten rnams la khyod kyi thugs rje bsgoms// ji ltar lha dang lha min ma lus
150a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas mdzod// byang chub rdo rje 'dzin pas bde chen gyis ni mnyes par mdzod// khyod ni stong nyid ting 'dzin la zhugs ma ci// rdo rje pad+mo rol pas dang ni ngas rtogs mdzod// gang gis lhan cig stong nyid ting 'dzin la khyod
150a8(rgyud): bzhugs// mnga' bdag khyod kyis khams bzhi'i sa bon 'dzag par mdzod/ oM ba d+hU ti'i rang bzhin gtumo ldang bar 'gyur// sa gsum sreg par byed gang du'ang mi mthong // mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bos 'bar zhing rabar ba
150b1(rgyud): 'gyur nga lhan skyes rang bzhin gyis ni mkha' go ma rnams dga' bar mdzod// rga ba dang ni 'chi bar snang ba ma mthong // thugs kyi rgyal ba mgon po yis ni 'di dag sad par mdzod// sgyu mas sems can khams ni bsgral
150b2(rgyud): bar mdzod// glu chen po 'di gsan nas// rnal 'byor 'khor lo can rab sad// sgyu ma lta bu'i 'gro ba kun// brtan pa la sogs 'gro ba ni// mthong bzhin rang gi 'khor lo can// na mkhar thim pa sku cher 'gyur// lhan skyes
150b3(rgyud): sogs kyis sprul pa can// gnyis po gcig pa'i sku chen po// dang po'i sangs rgyas rang bzhin ce na// thams cad kyi ni chos kyi sku// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud thob nas// rnal 'byor rgyud rnams la yid ches// slob dpon sems
150b4(rgyud): kyi rdo rje yang // dbu ma'i tshul gyi spyod yu'o// de nyid phyir bstan thob pa las// dbu ma chen po'i mtshan nyid// grub mtha'i man ngag spyod yul ni// mkhas pa rnams kyi'ang spyod yul min// grub mtha' mngon sum lnga
150b5(rgyud): shes bya// man ngag kyang ni rjes dpag las// shes bya bla ma'i zhalas kun// de mkhas sangs rgyas spyod yulo// byis pa'i rigs kyi rnam sa bya// mngon nga rgyal can spyod yul min// dpa' bo tham
150b6(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' god bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po lnga
150b7(rgyud): mkha' go ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid// bde ba la kun tu spyod pa'i las kyi de kho na nyid kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i cho ga ste le'u gsum pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// lA ma ji ltar gnas pa ni// ji ltar sngon
150b8(rgyud): gyi sangs rgyas kyis// bad ba la kun tu spyad par las kyang kha na nyid kyi/ gsungs pa bdags gsal bya tsam// rdo rje sdom pa bcom ldan 'das// phag mo rnal 'byor sdom pa ste// 'khor lo sdom pa mkha' ga ma/ de ban
151a1(rgyud): dam tshig sdom pa ni// lA ma yis ni yang dag bstad// pad+ma'i sdom par 'dod pa ni// dum skyes ma can gzugs can ma// rin chen sdom pa'o// khabadag la/ lA ma rang nyid kyis zhus pa// rdo rje sdom sogs
151a2(rgyud): ji lta bu// ngo mtshar bdag gi bdag po sku// rdo rje dam tshig de bzhin spyod// pad 'khor de bzhini rin chen gyi// sdom pa yang ni ji ltar lags// de nas rdo rje can mchod nas// mnyes pas bdag la yang dag gsungs// 
151a3(rgyud): do'abo med ye shes// rtogs nas rdo gsum rnams la// sdom pa rdo rje gsum rnams la// skyed pa rdo rje sdom pa ni// dam tshig tsarnams thad kyi// shes bya lam gyi rjes skyob pa'i// sdom pa ro 'khor lo mchod pani// dam tshig rdza
151a4(rgyud): par 'dod pa yin// rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po no// steng dag na mkha'i bu ba 8// sdom pa bden pa'i dngos po kun// bangad gi rnal 'byor sdom pa'o// pad+ma a bad+hU ti'i ci// 'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa ni// sdom pa
151a5(rgyud): lo rnams// pad+ma sdom par brjod par bya// 'khor lo bde bar gshes/ sa pa'i lam// dbang sogs rnas su bskyed pa yis// sdom pa'i tshal de/ rnamasu ni// 'khor mo sde pa yin dab shad// rin chen rdo rje
151a6(rgyud): mgo bo yos// nor bur 'bab pa 'ongs pa yis// sdom pa'o srog thig le yang // rin chen sdom pa yin par 'dod// ma bshad pa las de rnams kyis// mkha' ge bdun pa ye shes mchog/ kha gdong la sogs ldan
151a7(rgyud): dang ni// 'den pa gnyis med mtshad nyid phyir// de ltar thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// gcig tu sdom pa'i mkha' gro yin// gtu mo 'bar ma la ni gzugs// rtse so so dang dbu ma ste// ye shes mkha' go de las bskye
151a8(rgyud): rnam pa kun reg skad cig las// byang chub sems kyi dbus ni// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i gzugs can gang // rdo rje mkha' gro ba shad// namakha'a' 'gro ba yi ni mchog/ glo bur byung ba bdag med pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po chu/ 
151b1(rgyud): skyes gzugs// rnal 'byor rang sems sems med kyang // rnal 'byor mkha' gro'i mtshan nyid// 'khor lo nang gi bdag nyid gzugs// thig le kun tu sbyor ba'o// mtshan nyid gnad dang mtshams la ni// kun tu ma
151b2(rgyud): rgyas skye bar 'gyur// 'du ba phyi dang nang bdag nyid// ye shes dngos rang bzhin laso// dam tshig sems dpa' gsum rig pa// skye dang 'chi dang bar rnams kyi// srid pa kun las shes par bya// spong bas dam tshig mkha
151b3(rgyud): skye// bdag nyid kun gyis mi shis kyang // 'gro ba mkhas pa'i lam gyis 'gyur// 'dod chags sgyu ma bcas na mkha'/ pad+ma mkha'agro rang nyid gtso// dbyangs yig de bzhin rnal 'byor dang / phyag rgya lhan skyes 'dod rnams
151b4(rgyud): // bgod bzhin du ni rtag tu skye// 'bang ba rin chen dbang mkha' go/  zhin khams ni rnam pa bdun// rnam shes bdun gyi mtshan nyid// chug/ te ri dang glang rnams kyang // rgya mtsho che dang rab tu zhugs
151b5(rgyud): de nyid nyi shu lnga bdag nyid// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgyus// khong yug la sogs stong nyid dang // rang bzhin skyes bu de bzhin du// 'od gsal ba dang zad ming // chos kyi dbyings dang mtshan nyid// thar dang
151b6(rgyud): de bzhin du// ye shes rdo rje sems lam bdag/ chos 'byung dang ni thog chen dang // gsang sngags tshul khyab bdag dang // lha skyes dang ni 'dus de bzhin// zug rje chen po 'ang rang nyid dang // bdag med ma dang kun de nyid/ @
151b7(rgyud): can stong lang nas yang // dpyir rgya mtsho'i ming dang yang / rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs can ni// A kun 'jig na gzing sems can rnams// nga gis sangs rgyas yon tan ldan// d+hA daM rnams dge ba mngon 'dod la/ 
151b8(rgyud): dang yongasu ngal ba med// wang rtogs pa thams cad spangs pa las// thob pa sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma// gsang sngags tshul gyi bdag nyid kun/ hA ni skyed pa'i gzugs can// sa de mi chos ni mi bdad te// mung dngos po na
152a1(rgyud): / cig 'jig bya'o// rdzas dang sna tshogs rang bstan chos/ rgya mtsho chen po'i mtshan nyid// lA ma yi rang gi mtshan nyidas/ ji lta ba bzhin rim gyis te/ rol pa'i myos las skyed pa ni/ rnal 'byor ma kun
152a2(rgyud): shes par bya/ ma sogs kun gyi 'khor lo li/ tsa lam nas rjes 'gro ma'o// yang na smra ma 'dzin par 'gyur// deni sgyu mche bzhin// bum pa'i ris spyod pa mos// 'bri ba'i grangs kyang gnyis po// dza
152a3(rgyud): mo can lha mo// kun tu spyod pa lA mar gnas// kha dog ljang snang lha mo ste// lhag ma mkha' go ma dang mtshungs// sred pa dang ni snang ba'i dngos// thams cad yi steng du gnas// he ru ka yi mdog dang gzugs// de ban
152a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro rnams// lhag ma 'khor dag rnal 'bying ma// dpa' bo rnams dang thams cad 'byung // 'khor mo'i rtsibs kyi dbusu sbyin// thugs sogs kha dog drug tu gangs// 'khor mo cha mnyam la
152a5(rgyud): bya rdo rje 'dra la khod de bzhin// ral grats+tshin gri gug gi// phreng ba rtag tu rim shes bya// phyi rol sna tshogs rdo rje 'phreng // mgo bo'i phreng bkra/ sa cad du'o// lA ma byang gi sems las bskyed// rnal phyo
152a6(rgyud): mchogs gcomo ste/ dus kyim rjes 'thun sems can don/ smon lam gyi namatshan nyid do/ bskal ba brdang po'i dbusu yang / rdzogs ldan la ni na ma gcog sogs/ de mau dusu shes bya ba// de bzhin rnam gzugs bya
152a7(rgyud): gling du'o// 'dzam bu'i gling ni chung ngun du'ang // bdag ni shAkyang rigs rjes 'gro// lhag ma gling lnga rnamasu ni// de bzhin gshegs rog rim paso// de phyir lA ma 'gro ba kun// sangs rgyas mchog gnas mtha' len// ma
152a8(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// snying stobs bya ba byed pa gsal// sa yi dbang phyug zhag la ni// mchu yi zla ba can du 'dod// zur sel zhes bya'i rlung da ni// 'gro dang zla ba zhes bya'i rtsa// ji srid 'chi ba'i dus nyid ba/ 
152b1(rgyud): 'dzin bzhin du ni mi nyam so// de ltar rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis// zla na nyid zhags rlung rnamaso// rtsa dang rtsa nas 'bab pa ste// mi ni bskyed pa rnal 'byor ma// rtsa mi tshogs ni thams cad la// skad cig las ni srog lo/ 
152b2(rgyud): 'gyur// rang bzhin de la shes byas nas// sdang sogs yon tan gyis rim pas// des ni sna tshogs sprul bdag dang // las kyi gnas ni mang po'o// rnal 'byor pa yi dngos gcig ni// lA ma mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid
152b3(rgyud): mya ngan 'das dang mtshan pa na'ang // gnyis po zhugs gyur ming med pa// ji ltar mi shes de la ni// bdag gos mchog tu 'du she so// sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpa'ang med par 'gyur// chos kyi sku sogs
152b4(rgyud): dngos po'o// dbang po rnams kyi don gyis ni// skye ba kun thob par 'gyur dbang po'i dngos po bden min yang // de tshe mi bden pas thob 'gyuradabang po gnyis kyi dngos nyid ci// gib ma yi ni skyes bu
152b5(rgyud): mtshungs//  na ma me pas ca m+bu'i su sa// de bzhin dbang po bden kyang // da dngos bden pa'i mtshan nyid// man ngag rnam pa mang po gzhan// mchog tu bsngags pa shes par bya// gtung ba la sogs bdog bkun
152b6(rgyud): bla ma la ni dbul ba bden// de ni mi bden pas spyad bya// de la brnyas par mi bya'o// 'di la sngags kyang bshad bya ste// lha mo kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dir// nye ba'i snying po sngags rnams la// kha sbyor mdzes pas rgyan
152b7(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje// nye snying rnam pa gsum du 'dod// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis// de bzhin dbu su lugs 'byung min// oM oM ba hrI/ dza he lA he ma hA yoM hUM hUM pa hUM Ta phaT
152b8(rgyud): hU~M Ta swA hA hA hriHphaT oM zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug ma rim las// rtsa dang tshigs ni shes bya ste// yi ge brjod pa'i bdag nyid kyi// gnyis dang gsum gyi rtsa bskyed
153a1(rgyud): yaM ge re yi ya // yang na thams cad bsdus pa yis/ bdag nyid chen po'i dus 'di'o// de phyir sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// rnal 'byor ma dag re ste// gal te sems dpa' ched khros na/ 
153a2(rgyud): spros pa'i khro bo ma// de bzhin gti mug 'dod chags sogs// rnal 'byor ma ni rtag tu spro// tshigs chung ba yis las 'gab pa// yum mchog lnga pa'ang 'thob 'gyur// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs
153a3(rgyud): yi ge re re rnal 'byor ma// ming ni de dang mnyam zhes bya// khyod la rdo rje mchog bsres pa'o// de ltar de nyid rtag brten nas// rna la'i 'byang phyag brgya dang ldan cig/ rtsed cing rgya cher rol par bya// srid dang mya ngan 'das
153a4(rgyud): dbus// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' ga rgya mtsho rnal 'byor
153a5(rgyud): ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las lA ma bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang sA gas dgod pa dang // 'khor lo sgyur ba dag la sogs pa'i rang bani na dang mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i rnam par
153a6(rgyud): bzhag pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya// sems can rnams la phan rtsi bas// khaN+Da ro hi'o gnas zhags nas// mnga' bdag rdo rje mkha 'gro dang // 'khor lo bzhi yi pad+mo ru/ rtsa na brgya dang
153a7(rgyud): shu la de rnams ming ni rig par// de kho na nyid snod la bshad// yul dbus ma dang ga ling ga ma dang // ma Di ma dang kaN+Da Ta mo me ru mo/ so hA mo ma la ya ma bingag ma/ 'ogro ldeng ma dang ta l-i ga ka mo/ mA la wa ma
153a8(rgyud): hA ra ShI ma/ ba ran+da mo kA ma ru bi ma// rA hA li mo a Ta li yul ma// b+ha Da mo lA Da dbus 'gyur me/ tir dud+haM mo dang dad dad Na Da ma dang bal yul ma// mnyan yod ma dang pAD+ha mo da Ni ka ka ra ma dang // b+hang ga lA mo Sha
153b1(rgyud): ma dang ha ri ki lam// gser gling ma dang sing ga li mo dang / Da ma Da mo kan+to ra ga mo// sin d+hu kha ba'i gnas ma tsU DI mo// ku luT mo dza Da ra mo pa tha ma// dzadz+nyA yu tam dang pa ru Na ma dang // u r+yan ma dang lam pa ka ma da
153b2(rgyud): dzA lan+d+ha ra ma da a ra bud ma dang / kha che ma dang ko sa la mo kAny+tsi ma/ dza yan+ta mo tr-i shak+Sha ma tsaM b+ha ma// lu ha ra ma pu ra ho ra ka mo dang // mu mu na ma kAm bo dza ma dang// b+han+do ma la gr-i ha de ba mo// pre Ta pu ri ma dang bab b+ha ra ma da
153b3(rgyud): bi la mi dang nye ba'i pi la mo// dung khrod ma dang nye ba'i dung khrod ma// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram mkhas mo// kla klom dang thams cad yul ma ste// rim pa dag cub zhi lha mo// lte ba'i 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma// rigs kyi rtsa
153b4(rgyud): shes par bya// snyid la'i 'khri lo de bzhin brgyad// mi nyam kun lo/ mahA// pra lag mo da byi ko Ta ma// 'phags rgyal ma dang pal chen mo/ 'bar ba'i gdong ma grub pa srid pal mo dang // ma hi lam
153b5(rgyud): kau ma ri sau ra ma// da ltar thams cad snying gnas// sgyu ma'i rnam par rang zhing ma'o// mgrin par 'khor lha mo yang // gtso bo mchog ni bshad par bya// cha chen bcu dag nyid yin te// khams rnams bcu dag de bzhi no// khrag
153b6(rgyud): dang khu ba rkang dang ni// rdul dang tshil dang lpags pa dang // sha dang rus pa rgyus pa dang // rnag dang sgyu ma rang byung dang // bshang gci ma khris pa mchil ma'o// ra ha s+ye sogs tshil gyi khams// de rnams myos 'bab mar// 
153b7(rgyud): bo ru ni lha mo cha cha/ 'khor lo sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsa// zhag rom pa thams cad du// mtshams kun rmad 'byung chen mo'o// nag mo gtsigs ma 'jigs rung ma// dga' ma 'das ma log 'den sa// nA mur+d+har+N+Na dang dag gzus
153b8(rgyud): ma lha mo dag/ 'azlog dbyangs can mo// nag bzang mo dang nag chen mo// nag sdom ma dang gzhan mi thug/ rgyal ma dang rnam par rgyal ma// mi 'jam ma dang rgyal ba mo// drag me snga ma dang mo dang / zla ba lam gyi bzhi mdas
154a1(rgyud): // gong gnas ma dang dag mig ma//  bo tra ma tso tsa ma// gtu mo dang ni gdol pa mo// bram ze mo dang dmangs rigs mo// rgyal po'i bu mo 'phral chen mo// lha rdzas chang gis 'gengs byed ma'o// de ljang rtsa yi 'kho
154a2(rgyud): kho ru khaN+Da ri hi nang 'go ma'o// bdag 'dir 'gob mo yin ci/ rang gi bdag pos bkar stsol cig/ lu rnam thams cad la ni khams// mkha'i go dngom po gcig tu 'gyur/ sa gzhi che bzhin shes bya ste// yul gyi
154a3(rgyud): phye yang sa gzhi gcig/ dum bu dram bur gyur 'i khams// yang na yul dang zhag dag 'gyur/ Da yi yi ge bstan de'i phyir// sgo nga mngal gyi mtshan nyid las// 'dir ni rnam shes bskyed par 'gyur// gang 'di'i gang gis
154a4(rgyud): khams rnams la// bzhir ni rnam par shes bya ste// las la du ma skyes ma rang nyid// sdig pa chen po 'phrog bzhin ma// bsad la khams ni thams cad// des ni sems can bral du ma skyes// shin tu las kun ma
154a5(rgyud): pa mo gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma/ rang gi 'gromalam bzhengs mchog/ nyon 'char ba'i dus dang ni// 'dod dang rgyu ska grwa mchog dang // nub kyi ba lang spyod gling du// 'dod chags chen po
154a6(rgyud): bzhin ma// dngos med byed pa min lha mo// gnyis med go' pang la brtan ma// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbu su// bskyed 'gyur rang gi sngags las skye// oM bAM sa~M dzA rba kha buN+De d+ha ba hi dza kA DA ye ke hUM nI ts+tsha ya
154a7(rgyud): phaT ba phaT r+N+Na sA ni hA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM sngags 'di rab tu sbyor ba yis// dkyi li 'khor 'dod pa thams cad la// lha mo re re rnams kyi ni// dbu su 'khor lo bzhi skyes ma// thabs deng shes rab bdag
154a8(rgyud): can thams cad chos 'byung dbus te// rna bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babs kyis ni de rnams rgyan// sha chen po nam bzhin du// 'jigs byed smra ni bsgrags pa'o// lA ma'i 'khor lo ba lang sha/ mkho nam
154b1(rgyud): ma la glang chen sha/ phag mo la ni sha thams cad// dam tshig sdom pa'i sbyor ba'o// gsang sngags bden par shes bya nas// sngags kyi yig brjod pa min// sems can kun gyi ngag gang de// sngags ni rnal
154b2(rgyud): ma ru grags// gal ta yig bsngags yin// gau Di'i yig pa dang mtshungs// rtsa yi bu gug ru// dbugs ni yi gar 'du shes pa'o// sngags kyi btung bas sems la ni// ji srid rkang mthar 'gog pa las// yul
154b3(rgyud): dbus yang 'ongs pa las// tshim bya nga gi 'khrul 'khor du// bum pa bzhin du btung 'a 'bag/ dkyil 'khor rang gi stan gnas nas// srog 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// sems dpas 'khor bzhin pa du ni/ 
154b4(rgyud): nor bu'i bu gar btsir bar bya// bu ga dgu ru sa bon kya rdo rje sogs pas bsgom par bya// yang na rtsa rnams thams cad sngags kyi yi ge 'di dbang bya// ma ka a ka ma sau ma~M bi da ta ma ma
154b5(rgyud): kA DA a b+ha lA mA ti da ni swa rI DA ga ShA ha su si DA ka siM hi bu ku dza ya dza ba au laM dza a kA ko kAM dza a kA ko kA dza tI tsa lu yu mu kAM b+ha de pre ba pra usma u kham+ba zhes bya ba ni lte ba ro// pre da u ma dz+ra si ma ko zhes
154b6(rgyud): ba ni snying khi ro// ra su ma sre me tsa mAM as+t+ra pA a sra bi mU pe shAM zhes bya ba ni mgrin pI'o// kr-i ka b+ha na tAM ba tsA gau o sa b+ha ma s+thA a dze bi a dze go du i tsa tsa gA rau kr-I tau tsa mA byA sU rA zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i 'khor
154b7(rgyud): lo la'o// yang na mi phyed ma la sogs pa'i ming can te// de rnams kyi yang yig dang po// thams cad zlum po'i rnam par ni// thig lnga rnams ni gdab par bya// brgyad dang bcu drug drag cu bzhi// sum cu rtsa gnyi
154b8(rgyud): ri'i mig 'dod// lte ba'i gnas ni thob na sa// srog nus pa rnams kyis 'khor// dzI sr-id a ba d+hU ti'i rlung // de srid 'khrul 'khor 'ding brjod// gal te dag gis de ltar byed// sngags ni 'jam snyan gyis bla
154b9(rgyud): thams cad mgo bo'i 'khor lor sbyin// 'khrul khor 'di ni blo chen po// srog gi rlung ni rnam 'dzin 'gyur// pad ma bzhi'i mdab ma'i dbyibs// ri'u mig 'khor lo rim thig gangag
155a1(rgyud): // sgras ni dris pur btab nas/ rtsa dgu po ni dgug par bya/ nad med mi rgas mdze med cing // rtag tu bkres dang sgom pa med// de ltar la sogs mtha' yas pa// nad dang mchi ba'i mthar thug
155a2(rgyud): med/  dkyil 'khor lngar ram yang na ni// 'khrul 'khor can kun 'bab par bya// khams dang skye mched gzhan la sogs// bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor ldan pas bza'// mdog dmar 'du shes lhag ma ni// 
155a3(rgyud): lA ma'i phyag dang gzugs cano// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal
155a4(rgyud): mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las dum skyes ma'i mtshan nyid dang skyed pa dang 'khor lo 'i bzhi'i rtsa'i rnam par gzhag pa'i ming 'dor bstan pa dang sngags dag/ 
155a5(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste le'u lnga'o// de nas gnan mchog bshad par bya// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par ma na// dpal he ru ka'i kun sbyor las// gzugs can ma yi mtshan nyid dge/ ma
155a6(rgyud): ldan dang ni las dang tshigs// sngon du gzugs can ma la rten// phyi nang bdag nyid can gzugasu// bde la gnas pas 'gro b.ra'agyur// 'ding ni rkang lag thams cad la// tshigs ni bcu gnyis nyid yin// lnga lngaru
155a7(rgyud): ni shes bya ste// bcu gnyis la rtsa drug cu'o// dkyil 'khor rnams la'ang 'bab pa ma// 'pho ba bcu gnyi su 'dod// g.yon pa dang ni g.yas pa la'ang // sngon du lu sogs sngags rig pas// lhag ma bu ga bzhi
155a8(rgyud): rnam so lta ba 'dems dang rtsibs log gnyis/ gru gsum de bzhin shes bya ste/ de yi sde rnams rtsa drug cu/ mtshams ni rnam pa lnga rab gsungs// nyi ma rgyu bar gang 'gro ba/ de 'gro zla bzla ba rnams// drug lnga
155b1(rgyud): sum cu'i cha rnam su// snying khar grags pa de bzhin gsungs// rtsa dgu ji ltar 'gro ba'o// mig la sogs pa'i bu ga rnams// sgrol rten nas gnas par 'gyur// mgrin par gang 'dra ba yi khams// de du gyur
155b2(rgyud): nas gnas pa'o// mi pad ma sogs sum cu gnyis// rgyud mang por ni bsdigs pa'o// de yi gzugasu gnas lha mo// gzugs can ma da'o rnam rtog pas// bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'dri'o// gzugs can ma yi
155b3(rgyud): ming ci gsungs// dgro ba thams cad gzugs med mdzod// rtsa yi bde sogs ming giso// 'gro ba'ang dbang po'i lam rnams// gang 'di'i gzugs kyi gzugs can ma// pa las thob pa'i bde ba ni// dbang gnyis
155b4(rgyud): rnam pa'i sbyor la so// gang dang gang gi rigs gang ni// da dang de yi 'gro bar bshad// bden pa kun las 'don par 'gyur// snga rigs kyi tshul las gzhan mi 'go// de phyir gzugs can ma 'gogs las// 
155b5(rgyud): lhan skyes rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol// lha motshan mo kha dog sar// lhag mdum skyes ma dang mtshungs// 'du byed phung po'i ga/ thugs dang ni// mi dang bud med sogs gzugs can// mnya med sems can
155b6(rgyud): don las phyir// gling 'di ru ni skyes 'gyur ro// lus dang bya ku la nags pa'i// zla ba rA si'i rang bzhin can// thabs dang shes rab bde bas kyang // dkyil 'khor dbu su bzhugs pa'o// yang dag sum cu bdun bdag nyid// ji
155b7(rgyud): ltar rim pas dpa' rnal 'byor// gsang sngags khaM dge sbyong ba ru// gzugs can gtso mor shes par bya// oM ba a dza gai rU ma pi maHnI hi ye oM ke swA hUM hU~M hUM hUM pa oM Ta bau phe Sha Ta Ta ha swa oM hA hA h+Na \u0f7f\u0f7f
155b8(rgyud): phaT pha haM/ de ltar rang bzhin las shes bya// sngon gyi cho ga'i las kyis ni// dbu ming bu gar phyin nas ni// dbugs ni rnam shes ngo bo can// sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa// ma lus skad cig de la mdzang / 
156a1(rgyud): // lus rang bdab ngo bo can// bsgoms dang thos dang mthong ba yang / 'grod bzhin pa na rtogs mi 'gyur/ 'di ni sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// gzugs kyi sku yang rnam pa gsum ste// sku gsum thugs kyi
156a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid// de ni 'dod dang gzugs gzugs mang // me long du ni gdong rdzogs pa// ji bzhin khams gsum la gnas// de yi gzugs dang gzhan gzugs can// gzugs dang gzugs la gzugs brnyan
156a3(rgyud): te grangs med pa yi 'jig tan khams// gzugs can sgyu mas bud med dang // thams ni skyes bu las can gyi// gnas med bud med skyes bu gcig gcig min gcig min min gzugs can/ gzugs kyi
156a4(rgyud): lus la sogs ngos la// mtshan byed mtshon bya med gzugs can mngon bya'o mtshan bya la// mtshon bya gzugs med mtshan nyid/ mchod med spyod yul de yang ni// mtshon pa po de'i
156a5(rgyud): spyod yu'o// ji ltar la lang rmi lam mthong // rang nyid shi ba mthong 'gyu ran dang // mthong bzhin du yang ngu bar byed// gzugs dang gzhan gyi gzugs can// de ltar kun gyi rang bzhin du// rdo rje ses
156a6(rgyud): dpa' rang gi dang // sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin dang // dam tshig sems dpa' chen po pa// byang chub chen po'i tshul sems dpa'// brtan dang 'gro ba sna tshog so// de lta'i gzugs ni ji ltar sngon// rtag pa rna
156a7(rgyud): gyis mi shes/ khyim pa nal phyor rtogs bya min// nar 'byor ma mi mchog thob pas// skye ba 'di nyid bshes 'gyur// skye babams cad byang nub bzhin te/ rmongs pa'i byas pas shes pa ma yin/ 
156a8(rgyud): 'dan pa byung ma nga / ma dang yin pa dod // glu smras pas ma dzin/ sgeg skyes la brgyal bar 'gyur/ sa phyor po rnams rgyal nas kyang/ chos kyi byung bu ngos
156b1(rgyud): pa'i dus du la sogs gso/ ba po rnams kyis bskum mdzad sa// g.yon cig sring po khyed// sems can 'ams kyi rang bzhi gro byed pa/ khyed sems rna rnamapa sa phyeb med/ cung tho bas na
156b2(rgyud): sprol par mdzad pa mo// slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi na// sku la thams cad rab tu nugs// slar yang spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// gci bo zhal nas spros par 'gyur/ rnam snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rlu / 
156b3(rgyud): slar yang zhal nas spro bar mdzad// bcom ldan thams cad bsdu mdzad nas// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud la ni// tshe du brjod pas tshan brjod mdzad// rnal 'byor rgyud kun la yang // rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen
156b4(rgyud): dbangar 'dir ni 'dod chags don yod grub// mi spyod pa dang spyan/ ma'i rgyud// mA ma ki dang gos dkang po// sgrol ma dang ni gzugs rdo rje// sgra dang de nga ro de bzhin// rig dang chos phyi
156b5(rgyud): grags dang // sa snying na mkha'i snying po dang // phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten da bad// sgrub kun sel dang bzang po dang // 'jam dpal dang ni byams pa dang // gshin rje'i sgra dang shes mthar mdzad// pad+ma
156b6(rgyud): mthar mdzad bgegs mthar mdzad// mi g.yo ba dang dbyug sngon can// 'dod dang stobs chen gnod mdzes dang // gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang // khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can// lhag ma rdo rje sems dpa
156b7(rgyud): de ltar rgyud kyi mang 'di ni// thabs kyi mang 'angan// thabs kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid// shes rab rgyud ni rang 'byung nyid// rang gi rang bzhin rtag tu gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnamasu// mi 'jig la
156b8(rgyud): rjes 'gro ba/ bskal pa sreg pa'i dus ni// gzhan du sonas yang dag gnas// zod pa'i dum la sogs dpang po// mingon mir+d+ha la sogs// ngos pa'i dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyis// rigs ni du ma 'byung ba'o// 
157a1(rgyud): // gzugs can ma yi gnas brtenas// dpa' bos la bsgyings par 'gyur// gzugs ni gzugs med gyur pa'i gzugs// bde mchog dang ni mnyam par mkhyer// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor
157a2(rgyud): las don sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ de rjem la 'grod de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan padag pos 'di gsung sa// zhes bya bad pal mkhan rgya mam 'byor pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gtsu
157a3(rgyud): can ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin rtsa'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang gnas kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang rgyud kyi mtshan nyid kyi cho go ste le'u drug pa'o// de nas rnal 'phyo mchog gis// cho ga mthong ba'i la
157a4(rgyud): kyis te// gang gis khwa gdong ma byung ba// de yis tshogs thar 'gom// nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste// khyu mchog 'pho dang bzang po ma// sa ga'i zla bar shes bya ste// sa lnga par ni 'dod pa yin// lha
157a5(rgyud): mo sgo na gnas pa mo// kA ni chos dbyings mar 'du shes// gnyis pa chos kyi sku dang ni// de las ling spyod rdzogs 'byung ba// s+ya ni sprul pa'i sku yin te// lte snying mgrin pa mgo bo las// bu ga bzhi rnams
157a6(rgyud): shes bya ste/ bya rog 'dra ba'i srog gdong can// de la rtag tu sngon spyod na// srog chags rnams ni skad cig gsad// klu rnams dgug par bya ba dang // char dbab pa dang rangs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang / byang chub che// 
157a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma kun rang bzhin pa// chos dang lo spyod sprul pa la// 'ad pa 'dod pas 'gro ba mo// sngags bden las kyis bdag nyid can// bya rog gtso mo de 'dun// rdo rje bag mo la ni// bya rog mni gan su son/ 
157a8(rgyud): sum cumadun rnam 'argya / sngags 'di pa na rgyum men/ mi phan rje ma k+Sha hU~M kleg sa pas te m+bu hUM gas pa yan hUM tsu sa mAn ma ma sa hrI hUM/ de na 'i zung rgyam
157b1(rgyud): thabs kyi rang bzhin can// thung ngu thabs kyi rang bzhin dang / ring po shes rab mngon par brjod// kha dog nag mo drag chen mo// lhag ma mkha' go ma dang mtshungs// gang phyir byang chub sems zhug// dacha bya rog las
157b2(rgyud): rgyal mo// nam khar bya rog bzhin 'khor ba/ bya rog gdong ma'i rlung gi so// gang phyir 'phur nong steng 'bung ba// de byir ngag dang steng du lha/ bya rog bzhin du ring 'phung nas// bya rig gling du sla 'ong ba'o// nga son pa
157b3(rgyud): bde chen po// lus kyis nyam su myong ba'o// bsod nams las kyis skye bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor gong nas gong du'o// bsod nams min ldan de bzhin 'di // dmyal ba bya rog dum bu ca na// pha rol phyin tshul rnam
157b4(rgyud): kyi yang sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par 'dod// ma byin len pas dmyal ba pa// bya rog bzhin du rtag tu bkres// de yi de ltar las dus// pi gang rang gis 'chi bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma ni de bsgoms nas// 
157b5(rgyud): bde chen nyamasu myong bar 'gyur// rnal 'byung ma yi spyod kun kyang // ngagis rang ni thob par 'gyur// las ma byas na gang gi ni// las can med cing las byed med// dang sems 'pho ba las yin
157b6(rgyud): las de las byed pa yang de// lus kyi dbyibs dang gzugs bdag nyid// sems med pa ni sems pa mchog/ lag pa rkang pa thams cad kyis// gang byas las byed par ro// de kun gyis nar khyer ba ni// yang dag
157b7(rgyud): las mdza' mtshan nyid// las kyang dag brgyud na gnyer/ mi dag rang gis spang bar bya// rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mchod pa'am// de bzhin bza' ba 'du ba ni// gong dang grong khyer gnas pa dang // ngi la sogs
157b8(rgyud): rtse chen du// dmatshig don du mchod par bya// rnal 'byor dngos grub 'bras rab sted// mkha ga mo yi gzugs brnyan kyang // khyab gnas rlung gi ming can te/ sreg dang thung mil mnyam gnas dang // byab byed
158a1(rgyud): // ji lta'i rim gnyis kyig/ mkha 'grod bzhin lA ma dang / dus skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// dug gdong khyi dang pag gdong ma/ rim pas klu dang du sbrul changs// rtswa sbyin nga ni no las rgyam/ 
158a2(rgyud): rtag tu brtan ma po nya gnyis// dga' dang skye ba zhes bya ba// mche ma dang ni 'joms ma mchog/ mdor bstan pa yi tshig 'di yang // rgyas bshad kun nas brjod par bya// phag mos mchod pa byas nas ni// rdo rje sede la
158a3(rgyud): zhus pa// ji srid srog sogs rlung rnams kyi// sa sau re re'i ming 'du shes// bdag gi ston pa ngo mtshar che// dus kun tu ni skyes par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang por gtso bo can 'dzin pa// 
158a4(rgyud): stong pa'i ngo bos grol bar 'gyur// rdo rje lta bu'i rlung dgod bya// rten ni snod kyi 'jig rten la'o// gang phyir 'jig pa thim 'gyur ba// de yi dbyibs tshul kyang med pa// de phyir zur sel zhes bya yang // 'gro ba dang
158a5(rgyud): na 'ong bar bstan mnyam gnas rig su song nas ni// sngon du gang dang gang rnams kyis// ngag tu brjod pa smra bar 'gyur/ sngon du bag chags ma lus pa'o// khyab byed 'gro ba thams cad la
158a6(rgyud): rgyas 'debs pas na las kyi rlung // klung ni khro ba'i ngo bo nyid// khyab byed bzhin tshig gnyis te/ du sbal ser sna'i ngo bo ni// smra ba yi ni mtshan nyid// rtsangs pa 'dod chags mnyam gnaso// thur sel phrag dog
158a7(rgyud): b+ha sbyin// nor rgyal gti mug bdag nyid// srog rlung ni gangs gnyis las/ dga' ba'i ye shes can shes bya// skyo ba de yi btags pa'o// de phyir mkhas pas so mar shes pa yis// gang phyir srog rlan
158a8(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid skye// ji ltar sa ni bcu gnyis las// thog ma de nyid bcu gnyis pa'o// bcu po rnams kyis de shes bya// gang phyi sa bcu'i dbang phyugo/ sa gcig rang bzhin rnams kyis ni// dzaM dzan
158b1(rgyud): ma chen mor 'dod// sbyin sogs pha rol phyin pa gang // lhan skyes yang dag byang chub nyid// thams cad kyi ni ning lon pas rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug ma mchog// bshad dang ma bishad gang ci rung // de kun byang chub
158b2(rgyud): tshul tsa no// slar yang bye ga dbyibs lha mo// de nas byed pa'i gzugs can ma'o// byed pa phyogs kyi gnas la ste/ rtsa gnas kun gyi bu ga'o// tha ma dang de las langs bsam gtan// khwa gdong mang du 'du shes
158b3(rgyud): de ltar rnal 'byor gtor thams cad// bla mi'i zhal las gsal 'thob 'gyur// bla ma gang de mi brnyas shong // ston byas de nyid 'dod par bya// 'phags pa'i go 'bang ma thob na// mnar med la sogs rnamasu
158b4(rgyud): 'tshad// kun nas bla ma gus pa las// byang chub bar du/ thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje saM mas dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhi gshegs// 
158b5(rgyud): bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i srog bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u bdun pa
158b6(rgyud): de nas gzhan gyi mtshan nyid mchog/ 'u gdong la sogs gang gsal ba// byed pa yang dag bya ba dang // thams cad mtshams ni bshad par bya// 'khrig pa sdig pa snron rnams ni// zla ba'i sbyor bas rtag tu gnas
158b7(rgyud): dug gdong ye shes thob nas ni// byini lam gsum 'gro ba mo// u dag shul gzi brjid gtsigs pa mo// ye shes lam dbang bza' ba las// lU/ 'dod la dga' ba sgyu 'phrul che// lha min la sogs skye rnam
158b8(rgyud): lang rkang pa'i mtheb mthar bcu gnyisu// / mdang yi shugs kyis 'gro b.rar gyur// rug gdong ma yi ming las yang // u ni u r+ya bu gang 'dod// la pul+lI ra ma la yar grags// A ni mu~M mu ni ning / 
159a1(rgyud): // kA ma ru ba ste// de bzhin sna 'dir ning kun 'dod// zhing kun dbusu gyur pa ni// glu gsum rnam pa'i bde ba'i mtha'// gang phyir gnas lnga'i bdag nyid kyi// mi zad ce ru ka'i go 'phang // yang na bdag gas
159a2(rgyud): sogasu// dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang // skyes gnas gnas lnga'i bdag nyid// snying lte rkan dang mgo bo dang // gsang ba ru yang rtsa kun gyis// skye gnas bu ga'i lnga'i bdag nyid// sgong skyes dang ni dod gsher skyes// 
159a3(rgyud): skyes brdzus te skyes pa rnams// sems can sangs rgyas yon tan bdag/ rigs lnga rab tu ston pa'o// nye ba'i gling du gnas ma yang // gtso mo'i gzugs can yang dag gnas// sngags kyi phreng ba las skyes
159a4(rgyud): rnams// sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid skye rnams// oM ba madz+ra hA su ka lU lA ka s+yA gI ya saM kon tsA b+hU hAM ya bai hUM Ta pa phaT Ta swA pa hA Ta oM swA hA hA// de ltar sngags de khe na'i bdag/ shes
159a5(rgyud): thabs kyi rang ba zhin can// kha dag ljang ser dag cher mo// lcag sa lA mdo ni ma tshungs// dkyil 'kho de'u su sgom byas nas// dur khyod gnas dang gnyis meng ba// kun spyod tsa rnams thams cad kyis/ 
159a6(rgyud): rgyas pa'i dga' ba'i spyod yulo// 'di ni 'tsho ba'i ting 'dzin dang // 'od gsal rnam pa'i chos nyid// bsrung ba'i las dang rnal 'byor ma// 'jig rten gyi ni 'den pa mo// rang bstan ches las gsungs pa yi/ 
159a7(rgyud): tshogs las kyang bya ba'o// kun gyi rnal 'byor yongs rdzogs nas// rgyud 'di yi ni spyod yu'o// 'on kyang rnal 'byor dkun kyang // mngang bsdus tshul na tshig 'di yin// so sor sdud du de bzhin du// bsam gtan
159a8(rgyud): phrag col 'dzin pa dang / rjesu dran nga 'dzin te// sgyu ba'imatshan nyid madran mi seM rdzud pa khwa gdang ma// drug gdong man pas ma gtan yod// srog nyid du na gnas pa khyo/ 'dzin pa la ni pags
159b1(rgyud): rjes dran gnas pa po nya mo// ting 'dzin brtan mang 'dod// mche ba ma ni rgyas bstan thob// 'joms ma 'bras bu kun bdag skyes// 'khor ba las ni grol gyur pa// rang gi sku ni sna ma mnyam// bdag byin rlab 'di phra ma
159b2(rgyud): dang // rdo rje bzlas rang mtshan nyid// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gter// de las lhag ma zung 'jug// mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba dang 'di// lam thams cad kyi mya ngan 'das// thog chen kun la rab 'jug pa/ sngags
159b3(rgyud): kyi theg pa ru ni byed// bya ba bstan chos dge sna tshogs// snying rje mnyes gshin pa yis byed// gang 'di'i dngos dang dngos po la// ye shes rnam pa'i rang 'byung gis// de 'ad ba yi sems rgyun las// bdag nyis rnal
159b4(rgyud): rnams kyis mthong // lus kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa/ rtsa yi gur na bshad par bya// spyi gtsug nas ni nor bu'i mtha'// mtshams dang mgri na pa rnam gnyis 'dod// rkang pa'i mthe bong mtshams mtha'
159b5(rgyud): dang nga sprin dbus de bzhin spro ba ste/ mtshan ma'i rtsa ba pral ba ga/ mig dang rkang pa'i sor me gnyis// ming med pa ni pus mos shes byin pa rna ba gnyis dag dang // rkang pa'i mthil dang snying gdas
159b6(rgyud): lte ba dang ni rtsab gzhung dang // bshang lam dang ni rkan shes bya// rkang pa'i tshigs dang mchu dag dang // 'khur ba 'khur tshos dag dang ni// 'dams dang mtshan khung gnyis dang ni// lag pa'i tshags dang rkang pa da// dbu
159b7(rgyud): pa'i tshigs dang nu ma gnyis// 'dzad pa thal gong 'dir mtsham so// 'jug ma nor bu gnyis dag dang // rkang pa'i tshig dang migan pa dang // dpral ba dang ni tshigs gnyis dag/ rna bug dag dang rtsa ba dang // bang dag gnyis kyi
159b8(rgyud): mtsham su 'ad // stan dag ni smon khugs dang // lde da mi yi sna gang dag/ de bzhin du ni rkan nga m+b+ha/ bo l+lag k+ko la gnyis dag/ del sogs 'dum ni// chad tshigs kyi gan du 'gyur/  mang skyed pa cing bya
160a1(rgyud): / byang sems bdag nyid che rnams kyi// btsan thabs sbyor ba'i cho ga ru// shes bya bla ma'i gsung gi so// zla ba zla ba'i chos gang du// tshes grangs de la rtsa ba'i ma// dkar po'i chos gcig la sogs
160a2(rgyud): nas 'di srid nag po'i mthar thugs par// shes pa byang chub 'bab pa'i rtsa// 'ug mo sgo la spyod pa mo// gang dang 'dra ba'i gdong de yi// de 'da'i sor mo phyag rgya ni// dbugs ni de dang 'dra bar bya// phyi dang nang gi bdag
160a3(rgyud): nyid 'dod// yang na rtsa rnams thams cad ni// tshor bya bcu gnyis kyis lhag pa'i// brgya yo tshig rnams thams cad ni// ji ltar gding gis rim paso//  dang de ni a lo 'bade// drag mo'i sgra ma dus kun
160a4(rgyud): depyid ma nas bya ba'i sgra/ tshig tu rtog pas brtags pa'o// de zhin gshegs pa'i dbyug dbyung ba// rdo rje tshang ltar btag gang dang gang gis 'ching bar 'gyur ga/ tshan gti srin tshan
160a5(rgyud): por 'gyur// de yis de yi rang bzhin gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin// rmongs dang mkhas rnams kyi dag la// mnga' bang ga thar pa chen por bzhugs// byed pa 'byung po zad kyi/ 
160a6(rgyud): phyug skye bo sna tshogs rnams// de phyir rtag tu lam nyams pa// sngon byas sdig pa'i las kyis te// nyams 'gyur bstan pa 'di la ni// bgro bya sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las
160a7(rgyud): rdos de'i bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' go de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' tshe rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen pos 'u gdong ma'i nges pa'i
160a8(rgyud): tshul dang yang dag pa'i tshig las bskyed pa srog ma sogs pa'i mtshan nyid le'u brgyar// de nas gzhan ni dzin cheg// khyi gdong rgyu mi phye ba shang bya// gang zhig nang shes tsam gyi// rnal phyor nas
160b1(rgyud): kyis mchog 'grub 'gyur// sna khyin rnal 'byor ma dbugs 'byid// rang gis 'jug dang 'byung bar 'gyur// dus kun tu ni gnyid log dang / sadapa bde ba yon che// nasna tshogs gan bu song nas ni// bdag nyid kyis
160b2(rgyud): ni 'de rig 'gyur// rgyal nyi shus lhag pa ni// des tshig bstan phyi mtshan nyid// de ltar khyi yi ming du ni// bde bskyed pa por shes bya// pad+ma'i skye gnas de rnams// A s+yai/ pad+ma ra~M kha ni rab rgyas pa// gtong dang
160b3(rgyud): spyod gar chen po// glu dang rol mo gnyid log dang // reg dang gos dang rgyan dag dang // me tog la sogs bsung can 'dod// 'thun par lta ba'i ma la sogs// mdzes ma rnams kyis ngag can te// sangs rgyas mchod so/ 
160b4(rgyud): stso ra'i btung la 'thung 'gyur dang // bskyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gra ma// bsti gnas 'gro ba la sogs kyis// mi ma dang ston mo 'dod pa lta ba/ bla ma'i gsung ni 'de chen po// mi dngam mo'i bsgrags pa dang / 
160b5(rgyud): rgong dang sgeg pa'i bya ba gang // mkhas pa rnams kyi yid dam pa// ste/ bo dang phyug nyid du// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// mchod phyag byed la sogs pas// bA ma gus las bde ba ste/ 
160b6(rgyud): dbul ba dang bud medo// spyod la sogs chos rnams la// las thaMd la mi 'jug// rgol ba rnams ni gzhom pa dang // sangs rgyas chos rnams bzhag pa dang // rnal 'byor ma dang bza' btung dang // sgom dang dga' ba bskyed
160b7(rgyud): pa dang / dbang po gnyis kyi bdag nyid skyes// sprin sogs pha rol phyin rnams kyi// las kyi skyid pa btsal bya dang / byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms dang // ye shes rnam sha smra ba dang // dbu
160b8(rgyud): tshul ni bzhag pa las// kun la dbugs dbyung sbyin pa dang // skar ba 'debs pa dgag pa dang // dge ba bcu yi las dang ni// klog dang kha ton byed mchog las// byang chub la la gnas pa yi// dpa' bo gnyis med
161a1(rgyud): // lba bu'i phyir// lus la ltos pa med pa yis// grong dang grong du gnas rnams kyi// de ltar gnas skabs gcig pa'o// gnas pa smad ya bshad par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud la ga
161a2(rgyud): don dam rnams la gsal ba yis// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnasu// dngos grub gtam rnams brjod pa dang // chos ni don chen 'du shes la// dusu 'du shes sgom pa po// 'gro drug spong ba'i 'du shes no// de nyid
161a3(rgyud): pa'i ming ca no// dngos rnams sgyu ma'i 'du shes dang // zhi sogs las kyi bde ba dang // pa dang bu las gcig min dang // gnas sogs 'gro bar spro ba can// nyon mongs phung po yongs gtong dang // ye shes phung po
161a4(rgyud): bskyed pa dang // slar yang 'khor bar mi 'di dang // 'khosdom pa'i rnal 'byor ldan// rtog pa po yi tshig bzung nas// rtog ldan min pa'i tshig spang bya// dbang po rnams kyi mi mthun min// @
161a5(rgyud): gyis ni mdzes pa yi// lhan cig skyes dang long spyod / sprul pa dang ni chos sku yang / 'du shes sad pa la sogasu// gas+ye ra srid 'tshar kun spongs bya// lhag ma dga' 'a bzhi pa na// smon
161a6(rgyud): rdzogs ldan la sogs la// rdzogs ldan du su rang po zhen skye// dga' ba sangs rgyas rdzogs ldan gang // sems can gsum ldan la phra skyes// rig pa des la sbom po skyes// gnyis ldan la ni bde ba med// rtsod
161a7(rgyud): dus cha yi rags pa'o// bad sangs rgyas yon tan thob/ smon lam gyis ni rang gi 'bras// de ltar bde skabs rnams kyis ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis rmad byung chen// gnas skabs gsum pa'i bde ba la// 8
161a8(rgyud): ba bcu dag rtag brtags pas// khams bcu drug tu shes par bya// rang bzhin skyes par gyur pa gsal// sman dang 'dra bar shes par bya// bdud rtsi zos pas pha rol 'gro// pad can dung dang sna tshogs can// 
161b1(rgyud): glang po ma dang bung ba'i ming/ 'khor lo rdo rje sgra snang ma// dub mo dang bu skye tshe// nyang rtsi spras dang ngo tsha dang // glog dang tsan+da nyi ma skyes// dmar po de bzhin sbrul gyi mig/ sman mchog du ni shes par bya// bde bas
161b2(rgyud): ba'i dus ni// khab sogs byed pa'i skad cig las// bya ba de dag zhar la dan// sbom por skad cig mthar 'gro ba'o// gnas skabs pa ni la bshad pa ni// yid can rnams kyi gangs brgyad// 'og dang 'pho 'gyu
161b3(rgyud): bzhin du// skyug 'gyur gnyid yur de bzhin// ltung 'gyur 'dzag 'gyur dang ni 'dir// g.yo 'gyur bar 'gyur ba nyid// rnal 'byor ma brgyad dkar mo sogs// bde ba'i rgyu yi gnas skab so// de ltar gnas
161b4(rgyud): rnam bzhi la// khyi gdong ming gis 'du shes gyur// yang dag pa'i go 'phangs 'dir// gang dang su yid gnas par/ 'gyur// yang dag rtsol ba la gnas nas// khyi ni gzhan gyi gang
161b5(rgyud): sngags bden spyod pa bdag nyid// dkyil 'khor dbus bsgom pa'o// oM ba badz+ra nA shA ma na ta a ka sA Ta ya oM ka~M ta~M ts+tsha ka hUM TA pa ya Ta swA Ta hA pha oM Ta swA hA/ sum cu rtsa bdud bdag nyid sngas
161b6(rgyud): shes rab thabs te dngos grub ster// kha dog dmar po dag chen mo// lhag ma dum skyes ma dang mtshungs// chu steng kang ka ta yugs sa// rang gi bdag bor ba gnas ma// nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste// sen
161b7(rgyud): bzhin du skyes// dbang gi las la lha mo ste// lha dang lha min sogs sngags rig/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sbrel ma chi// mchod pa las rnam thad la'o// snying kha'i pad+mar yongs bkug nas// bdud rtsi tshigs kun las
161b8(rgyud): skyes pa/ rdo rje sbu gu'i rab sbyor bas// sngar dang bsro ba la sogs pas// sku rdo rje sogs sngags kyi ni// byin gyis brlab par byas pa la'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sedel 'de ba'i mchog
162a1(rgyud): // rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpa la mkha' gogro rgya mtshorna la 'byor mi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khyi gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang bdes
162a2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi tshig sta le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bag gdong ma yi no// nyung ba rgya cher bshad par bya// dngos po de las ldog pa'o// phag mo rengs pa'i las rnams la// mi shes ri bo 'jos
162a3(rgyud): mchor slar khab ni rdo rje'i gdong de yang // skud pa bzhin du kun 'gro ba// byang chub sems kyi dga' chen po// ka keng rus bdud rtsi 'byin pa mo// de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags sogs kun// bzhi pa las 'das mi 'gyur
162a4(rgyud): ma de nas lha mo chen mo brgyad// mngal sogs bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid// thog mar bya rog bzhin sa bon// ma yi pad+ma la ltung ba'o// nub gtsigs ni phye ba yis// bya nas 'ug par gnas dang 'ang// zla ba gcig
162a5(rgyud): tu gnas nas ni// khyi yi dbugs ni 'phel ba las/ ga tu'ang yan lag bdag nyid can// btan mas skye gnas da las// po nya byis pa da'i tshe phyis// mtsham ma ni las bcom / 
162a6(rgyud): 'joms ma byang chub yan lag dgyes// ngos ga kun gyi 'bras 'thung ma/ yang dag pa la rtsol na 'di// gnan gyi lta ba nyi sogs kyo// 'jug pa zad bden pa ste// 'jug med dngos spyod yu'o// rkang gnyis
162a7(rgyud): bkang bzhi la sogs pa'i// rtsol ba'i yan la ga le 'jog ma'o// mthong ba dang ni rig pas kyang // 'jug med nyid rtag tu'o// kha dog ser mo dag chen mo// lhag ma gzugs can mang mtshungs// rdo rje gyi
162a8(rgyud): 'kho bus na// shes babs kyi ma bzhin can// mi ge gronan du srid pa// deba'i gling du gnas pa'o// sngags las banings pa'i lham rnams/  ni da nyi nyi so'o// ma ba dadu n+d+re munag pAH/ 
162b1(rgyud): sA gra ye mu hUM ladz+ra b+hi ba la na T+Ta yaT hUM swA hA hA ba mo Ta baT swahA// sum cu rtsa bcu bdag nyid kyis// gtso ma mchogi rnal 'byor sa/ dkyil la la khrig gdas la sogs ni/ bsdoms pa myur bakhrim sa ste/ 
162b2(rgyud): chen gnyis ni ba~M nas// shir dang so so 'dod cig dang // rdzing kyi mig gnyis btab byas nas// phung bu rang gdab par bya ba ste/ tshangs pa'i thog legs nas ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis pa gnyis gangan
162b3(rgyud): ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste// lte ba'i pad+ma de dang mnyam// snying po 'dab ma'i ngos nas ni// cha gsum du yang de shes bya// de yi tshe gcig 'khor lo gsum// lhag ma mtshan gyis goni ra// de yi sum cha phreng ba ste
162b4(rgyud): rdo rje pang+ga dang 'khor lo// rlabs rnams 'khor lo dbum las// dman te gnyis gcan sdom par smos// ka ba rnamapa ni su tu sbyid/ brgyad gsum 'khor lo gsum du'o// tsA las su
162b5(rgyud): 'gyur rta babs te// sgo khyud sgo yi cha cano// sngags bu rnams ni de'i phyed te// 'gram dang logs ni de bzhin// gzugs kyi snam bu dang na 'dir // rin chen phreng byed snam bu'o// mag bo'i phreng ba de yi phyir
162b6(rgyud): mun pa'i snam bu de bzhin// ka ba'i rtse las 'thon rtse'o// sna tshegs rdo rje 'od chen po'o// dil chang dab gos rnams dang // ba dad dril bu sgra sgrogs pa'o// de'i phyi chu skyes thams cad// snying po la sogs yang dag
162b7(rgyud): briHsna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng dang 'dir// lhag mar 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o// de'i phyi rol khor yug no// sa gzhi'i rim pas bri bar bya// gri gug phreng basbyin bya zhing // mgo dang lag bdag de bzhin/ snying po'i
162b8(rgyud): phyi rol du// rin chen phreng na yang dag bri// dur khrod brgyad pa bri ba ste/ kun nas gtum dag la sog so// sa bon rnang dgod par bya// thams cad gri gug las byung ba'o// yang na sku sogs rnams kyi ni// yi gen
163a1(rgyud): // kyi dkyil 'khor kun/ de bzhin skad cig rnam pas kyang // sa bon gyis ni dkyil 'khor dbyung // mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pa ni// rnam pa'i steng du sbyin bya ste// 
163a2(rgyud): rtsa bdun gzhan bya'o// gnag dang rtsa ba spangs pa ste// mchu ni 'phyang zhing mgon pa mtho/ mgrin pa rnamasu gos zung ste// rin chen lnga dang 'bru dang sman// de yi chu dang mdab ma'i tse// bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis dag
163a3(rgyud): byang gi ter ma las rnams kunal ste// kun nas pasgoms pa la sogs pa'o// rdo rje lha mo rnams dang do// zhib sbyong dza de/ khri rnams la/ dud rtsi lnga sogs rdzas rjem dbul// cim bya sogs rnams kyis/ 
163a4(rgyud): meng yang dag 'phel bar 'gyur// byi nas lis ni yang dag brtsam// du ma'i dung 'gro'i zhal lha mo// sum cu rtsa bdun gzugs can rnams las kyi rdo rje 'joms byas nas// ting 'dzin gsum gyi rnal
163a5(rgyud): ldan// bdud rtsi gnyis phyag drag mo ste// zhabs brtsabargyad ni rnams kyis ldan// rtsa ba'i zhal ni phag zhal te// ngos ga nyis dag tu dgu dgu'o// de yi steng du bdun bdun te// phyi nas gtsu
163a6(rgyud): ni bzhag par bya// g.ya su khyi dang lce spyang dang // byi la stag dang seng+ge dang // 'jigs byed mche can rta bong bu// de ltar ji ltar rim pa so// g.yon du ba lang ma he spyad/ ru sAl chu srin ri tshong dang // saM dang g.yag da
163a7(rgyud): mun dza dang / ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya// sbrul dang sram tshangs pa dang / sram da byi ba da ni dom/ mkha' lding bya rgod bya rog dang / 'ug ba bye gang khwa dang no// srin bya dang ni dung ba dang / rma bya zangs kyi gtsug
163a8(rgyud): bud can// phug ron 'di rnams thams cad la// rang bzhin mdog tu lo par bya// dkyil 'khor gyis bya des per ni// nga bzhin gang gi khams lal// smon sum cu gsum bdag ni// rang bzhin gyis na tsam
163b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// de yi gzugs brnyan gyi ni zhal// 'gro la byang chub byed bdag nyid/ zhabs rnams kyis mi 'byung po'i tshogs// me yi dbusu son pa gnon// g.yas pas khyab 'jug drag po dang / tshangs pa nyi ma med
163b2(rgyud): ni dbang po rlung dang 'den bral dang / ner sbyin ji lta'i rim pa'o// g.yon pa gshin rje 'dod pa dang // zla ba chu lha nod rgyas dang // sa dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang / sprin drag bu dang 'khor bsgyur te// de ltang bco brgyad
163b3(rgyud): dbyibs rnams ni// 'dus barmang byung bsngags pa'o// 'dzin 'gyur rang gi sems kyis ni// lha mo'i 'bas ni rdo rje 'dzin// g.yas par mtshon tsha tshogs kyang ni/ rdo rje ral grimadung dpal can/ dgra sta gI
163b4(rgyud): gug mda' dang ni// gas la shing phub dang tho ba dang / khong po Da ru chu gri dang // dbyug pa dang ni mtshon cigacig/ dud/ zangs dung byu gu dang / rba bya'i 'jug ma de bzhin te/ bya reg sgo
163b5(rgyud): pir dang ni// me yi thab dang ri bong dang // dbyug pa me long pi wang dang // rkang mge lag pa glob dang / sgyu ma sgra can ljags sgrogs dang // / ngos dang sgrogs dang nya rgya dang // mgo bcang 'bar ma mar nag dang / 
163b6(rgyud): byed gzugs te rim pa so// g.yon par dril bu phub rings mche// the bzhags pa thod pa dang // gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po po// phub chung yu can bsdig mdzub dang // g.yer ka'i phreng dang lcag sgrog dang // brag dang dur khre
163b7(rgyud): rdul dang ni// b+he ka Da ka lpags rlon dang / sgra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang // skul byed ro yi shing bu dang / brag dang pub dang mgo bo dang // gang rus zor ba de bzhin te// mig dang mkhal ma mnye me dang // spen pa dang ni phur ba
163b8(rgyud): so bon gang dang sog la dang // khab dang lus kyi lpags pa dang // sprid tshar 'bab dang shing ral gri// de ltang rim pas shes byas pa// bdun cu rtsa gnyis rgyud kyi rtsa re// gnyis lhag pa yi phyaganyis kyis// gla
164a1(rgyud): / bo'i lpags pa steng 'gos pa'o// khams gsum glang po la bzhugs pa/ dab pa bgegs ni 'acom pa'o// kun gyi kha dog rang bzhid te/ yang nag tsama'i kha dog bzhin/ mgon 'bring mom
164a2(rgyud): thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan rnams lus skyes pa'o// de ltar yang dag pa rtsel ba'i// gzugs brnyan can mar shes par bya// yang dag ngan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dngos dbye rkang gnyis bdag nyid// ting 'dzin
164a3(rgyud): bas kun bkang nas// 'od gsal ba la kun zab byas// rtag nas sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// sna tshogs dud 'go sogs skye'o// rang rang skad kyis chos kyang ni// rang rig skyes la ston par 'gyur// spu yi
164a4(rgyud): yi ges 'gro kun rgyas btang ste// lhan skyes rang bzhin de kho na nyid nga par bya// slar yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mo 'ong // phyugs gang yin pa 'i skye bo de rnams sangs rgyaso// dpa' bo thams cad mnya
164a5(rgyud): sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' 'de ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' go de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs// dpal mkha' gri rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mar rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las
164a6(rgyud): phag gdod ma bskyed pa dang dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i ri le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas brtan ma'i sbyor ba 'dir// bshad kyi sgom pa po rnams nyon// kun nas dus ni bzhi rnam su// zla ba gsum
164a7(rgyud): gsum pa ni lazhi// 'god dang mnyam pa sa bcings pa yi// mtshams med rnams ni rab bshad bya/ byang du 'god pa la sogs pa// brtan ma la sogs mtshams gnas ma// nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo// mgo yi
164a8(rgyud): zla ba dang ni ga'u// mo ha tini rtag tu de'i/ las gnyis dag tu shes bya ste// sbom po rnams kyi dus mi pa'o// tshob mchebs gcad pa gang // de yis gshin rje'i mche ma shes bya/ the ga ma yi ge gnyis na
164b1(rgyud): bcom ldan dus min 'chi ba ni/ mi rnams la ni ji ltar 'byung // gang gis don gyis bdag rig 'gyur// su zhig bdag la sprul par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// brtan mdus min 'chi ba ni/ 
164b2(rgyud): rang rang las kyis// skye bo kun la 'tshe ba yi// sdig gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa// de yis de ni dus min 'chi// khams dang dbugs ni 'chad par 'gyur// gzhan rnams kyis ni bcad pa yis// bza' btu phyin ci log
164b3(rgyud): tu 'gyur// sbyin pa rnyed pa dang bcas sbyin// dus min gyis ni nyams mi 'gyur// sbyin pa rnam pa gnyi su bshad// lus dang bsam pa las kyang // g.yon gyi sna yi sgo ru ni// zla ba rgyu ba'i rim pa yis// bgod pa'i
164b4(rgyud): srog ni nyi ma'i ste// a ba d+hU tI'i rlung rim pas// de yis ya yi yi ge ba da// ma yi yi ge dbus 'bab ma'o// da yig g.ya su song nas ni/ ro zhig dbum ma rgyu bar 'gyur// a yi yi ges gnas
164b5(rgyud): pa 'ab/ sgru banag pa 'i grob mo// tsan pa dkun bdag nyid rnams/ d+hi ya~M moM de'i ming du shes/ mang bsdus pa mo yi gen/ kha 'khor lnga rnam su brjod// denas ngos las
164b6(rgyud): bskyed// dus min slu bar rog par bya// de ltar bsod nams gcig nyid pa// gnas gnas bgrod pa'i lus can// ma tsho zhes 'di rnam sgrog ste// mkha' spyong go 'bang 'arjod par 'gyur// 'di ni kha dog nyi / 
164b7(rgyud): 'gyu ra lus smram pa ni dban no// ji ltar mkha'ag ma'i rim pas// mtshan ma mtshon cha sogs 'gyur// spong ba'i chos zhes bya ba gsungs// dkyila'i bar dbus kyi gartsa ma'o// rnam 'byer sum cu dun/ 
165a1(rgyud): gzhan rje sa stsogs// skye ba byed bya/  ba thams cad mnam gyu / dzarje sems pa' 'a ga/ rgyam pa god na gagags
165a2(rgyud): ldan ba dag pas 'di gsungs/ nas bya ba ni dngal mkho sa rgya tshorna ma 'bying ma'i rlud kyi rgyal pochen po las gzhan rje mchi ba ma'i rnam par bzhag pa dang bskyed pa'i tsha nyid des rkyen sde la ru bcugs
165a3(rgyud): de nas gshin rje tho na'o chang// gang gis 'am ba dang 'gyur bar// nA sh+yaM ka/ ru yang dag byung/ sprin drag can da bza' bor ldan/ pyid kyis mnyam po'i dus rgyan// tha nyam ba skyed mtshan nyid / ga
165a4(rgyud): rje gsod pa de yi ni// 'chi ba sbu ba'i 'khor lo la/ rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'ikhor lo tshar// lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya// lnga rnams nyi shu rtsa lnga ra ni// bcu gsum par ni bri bir bya// slar yang sum chug
165a5(rgyud): rnam muHgsum gnyis gcig ni lo yino// dus tshod me dang gnyis zla/ ba// zla ba'o tshes phyogs de bzhin mda'// gsum gnyis gtsigs bsu ni// rim pas phyi nas nyi byed sogs// nyi mag
165a6(rgyud): dang zhag dang gnyis// gsum bzhis dang nyi ma phyogs Nang tu kyi khrig/ sum cu bdun bdag nyid gsal ba'o// srog nus par shes bya ba// bsung gu yi ni bdag nyid// bcu dgu slar yang 'di ru ni// 'joms pa'i bad/ 
165a7(rgyud): nyid nus can// nyi mar bdun po mnyam son par// skye ba'i skar ma dang zla ba// gcig tu spyod par rtag rgyu las// rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag 'thob// bar gyi nyi ma rnams nyid ni// bcu drug gang su shes bya la// bdun cuH
165a8(rgyud): gnyis rib pa yis// lo yi rim pas yang dag sbyor// de phyir pho nya'i lha mo yang // dkyil 'khor bdag nyid can bsgom bya// gang du rtsa na srog spangs pa// dar ni 'di de 'bab par bya// steng du yal 'dab steng rtsa ba
165b1(rgyud): gsang ba yis ni dbugs bya ba'o// de ni mnyam pa mtshams kun te// mnyam pa ya yig gyis 'gugs ma'o// de nas gnang bcings pas nyams pas// ma yi yi ges thams cad bshad// 'og dang steng du bskyod na
165b2(rgyud): rnam rnon po'i moni wa snga bya// na rnams dang ni sdig mang rnami las kyi ra nga nyid nyams par 'a gyur de ni spyon pa sbyin bya ste// ba lang ma tsho non sog so// byang chub sems kyis lamadun// mdzes ma rnams kyi
165b3(rgyud): btung // deng yang rang gi yan lag las// byung ba'i sde sman btang bar bya// 'o ma dang mnyam bza' bya ste// glo ba la sogs mchis pa'o// g.yul ngo rang nyid 'gyel ba la// gale te nad na khrag chen po// the tsom spangs nas
165b4(rgyud): btung bya zhing // de yi sha yang bza' bar bya// yang na gang gis gan su// chi ltas zad nas song bar du'o// bza' ba 'o mas byas na bad// yang na sha rnams thams cad// gos 'jam rnams kyis yongs
165b5(rgyud): g.yogos nas// bdag nyid la ni dus kun tu// der ni gnas pa 'asro bya na/ mi dang ldan cig ces gnas bya// deng ni mu ngon kyang btud zhing / bza' chung ngu nyung // gshin rje bon bsgom bya ste// su ma
165b6(rgyud): bdun bdag nyid rang // gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid can// ser dmar gnyis kyi kha dog can// ser pos 'chi ba rings par byed// dmar pos dbang du 'gugs par byed// lhan skyes rdzogs byang chab dngos kyi// lte 'og
165b7(rgyud): mgrin pa rgan 'gro rnams// zab pas srog ni gzhan 'gal// phan tshun 'ug rnam su 'du 'gyur// de phyir kha T+wAM ga sgom ste// yan lag kha T+wA~M sbyor bso// sIng ka'i pad dbu su sems kyi// dkyil 'khor sngon cha'i chacan// 
165b8(rgyud): mdog ni ldan pa te/ byibs sogs gzugs can mi dang tshung // ma~M ba badz+ra pa li shum padzin d+ha ma hUM swA dz+wal phaT Sha Sha Te rje snga ga tra d+ha doHhA~M hU~M phaT swadz+ra yo dz+dza/ shes bathangs bdag nyid smras
166a1(rgyud): // sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor ma ni 'di rnams kun// bdud rtsi'i gzugasu bsgom par bya// de rnam snying khar dkar ba ni// 'khor lo thams cad rnams bsgom bya// de rnams nang du ra
166a2(rgyud): ming kyang // kha dog dkar mo 'od bcas pa// rtsa yi bu ga so so yi// nad da'ang rnam par bsgom par bya// rlon dang btses pa'i ri'i 'o ma// bdud rtsi lnga dang rangar byung ni// rdo rje'i rtse mos 'thungs pas kyang // dusu 'chi ba nyams
166a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// zag med nyid thob pas na// da la dus mi 'chi ci// de phyir yang dag rab spong ba'i// chos nyid gshin rje'i pho nyar shes// rdo rje btung byas rab bshad pa// las kyis rnam pa gnyisu 'dod// gcig ni phyi ro
