190b6(rgyud): thu ku Tu ku Ta ku Tu ku ny+tsa ku ny+tsa ku dz+nyA ku d+hA ku dzu ku dzu ku tshu ku ru ku tsu ku tsu ku du ku du ku g+haM ku g+hu ku gu ku gu ku lu ku khu/ ban d+ha ya bad d+ha ya/ bar d+hA pa ye bar d+hU pa ya/ brdza gardza/ gardza ya gardza yaM/ sho Sha ya
190b7(rgyud): she Sha ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tadz+nyA la/ s+pho Ta ya~M swai Ta la/ bi d+h+waM si oM bo d+hi si ye/ mi hi ya mai ha~M ye/ tA~M saM yaM trA se yai/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kaM pA wa ya kaM pA wa ya/ du re dur/ khu ra khur b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dza ra dza ra/ l-i'
190b8(rgyud): hUM hU h+ma da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+ha ny+dza b+hany+dza/ man+da ya man+da ya/ hr-i traM/ tsa la tsa la/ ma tsu la mA tsa la/ kU ra tse ta ye phaT/ sha tru ri bA rA ya hU me g+ha ni bA rA ya hI mau tsa ya me tsa ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ng+ra
191a1(rgyud): b+ha la du m+b+ha la/ kunArnam la pa shA ni la ma la Sh+TA na ya ma ba sngal ca sa ga/ jal tsa la la skal tsa la la pan na rnam na ldan padas thab tu lag
191a2(rgyud): dz+nyoHka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ kha ra She ri/ khu ru khu ru/ ga ra ga ra/ gu ru guM ruM/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ nga ngang ra/ du ru du ru/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tshar cha ra/ chu ru chu ru/ dza ra dze ra/ dzu ru d+hu ru/ dz+ha ra dz+ha ra/ dz+ha ru d+huH
191a3(rgyud): nyar nya ra/ nyu ru nyu ru/ Ta ra Ta ra/ Tu ru Tu ru/ dza ra dza ra/ tru ru thu ru/ Da ra Da ra/ Tu ru Tu ru// D+ha ra D+ha ra/ D+hu ru b+ha ru/ Na ra Na ra/ Nu ru Nu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru/ ba ra tha ra/ bu ru thu ru/ da ra da ra/ du ru dr-i ru/ 
191a4(rgyud): d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ na ra na ra/ nu ru nu ru/ pa ra pa ra/ pu ru phu ru/ pa ra pa ra/ pu ru pu ru/ Sha ra ba ra/ pu ru buM ru/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ mar ma ra/ mu ru mu ru/ ya ra ya ra/ yu ru yu ru/ ra rar
191a5(rgyud): ru ru ru ru/ la ra la ra/ lu ru lu ru/ wa ra wa ra/ wu ru/ wu ru/ sha ra sha ra shu ru shu ru/ Sha raSha ra/ Shu ru 'u ru/ sa ras ra/ su ru su ru/ ha ra ha ra/ hu ru hu ru/ k+Sha rak+Sha/ kU ru kU ru/ 
191a6(rgyud): hi hrIM hu~M hU~M ho haM ho haM haM haHgar+b+ha gar+b+ha dzA ti dzA ti da bA na~M/ dA ma ya dA ma ya/ sarba sha rI rA ya hU~M/ dza ye dza ya hUM/ bi dza ya bi dza ya hUM/ sa ra sa ra hUM/ bi sa ra bi sa ra hUM/ ag+na ye hUM/ ba ru Ne hUM/ a na la ya hUM/ 
191a7(rgyud): ba rA ya hU~M/ A kA shA ya hU~M/ sarba rog pa ha rA ya hUM/ bi Sha b+ha k+Sha NA ya hUM/ yan+d+ha bA ha nA ya hU~M/ kA lA g+ha ye hUM/ de bA ya hU~M/ ya mA ya hU~M/ ku be rA ya hUM/ de t+yA ya hU~M/ in+d+ra ya hUM/ b+hU tra ya hUM/ sarba satwA
191a8(rgyud): ya hUM/ brta tsakrA ya hUM/ d+harmad+hA ta we hUM/ mu khA ya hU/ nai tra ya hUM/ ka pA la mA la ne hUM/ b+hu dza ya hUM/ as+thA ya hA/ tsa ra NA ya hUM/ dza Ta mu ku TA ya/ ma sa mas/ ga sa ga sa/ ra stA ra sa/ b+ha ra ba ra/ ma Ta marba/ 
191b1(rgyud): tra Ta tra Ta/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ muny+tsa muny+dza/ g+ho rAn+ta ka ra pri yA ya bi gi phu da phu da/ ra ma ra ma/ pa ra mAt+sa rU pi Ne/ shin+ta ka rA ya puSh+Ti ban+ta nA ya/ lo ka pA la rU pi NaM sarba sha ri ra ru pa ya// br-ik+Sha gul+lo la tA
191b2(rgyud): ya sarba rU pi Ni sarba bstu ni ma ra NA ya ru pA ye b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha Na ru pA ya ni ro ba mA ya ni ro pa mu su kha ba ha sa ha sa bi la sa bi laM sa dr-i tA ba ya nI t+yA pa ya/ don di ya yo ga ya ni/ sra b+ha wa ma hAt+ma na shastA
191b3(rgyud): d+hA ra Ni wa raN ya nAn b+hI swai ra/ ts+tshe da ni tsu drub hu lu hu lu tsu lu tsu lu/ hU~M ha trA hA hA hU~M hU~M hU~M hu hA hA hrIHhUM hrIHhUM ho ts+tshaHhUMhaHhAhAdz+dzahrI/ rje N+ya dr-i bidzI pra pU pheM ba~M bo'i bA gA paHAHkuHrba trA Ta ma
191b4(rgyud): radzar dzad thaM de Sha dza \u0f7fdza tha ma dan ma da na/  hUM hA hUM hUMdz+dzahUM hUM hrI dz+dza hA hA hU~M hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA// / rtsa ba'i sngag so// dba' po tha ma cad mnyam skyer las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rje
191b5(rgyud): mkha'agro de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan bdag pos 'ad gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' bo rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rna ba'i sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u sna bcu drug
191b6(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gzhan lhur bshad bya ba// lus can rnams kyi tshogs// rdo rje sems dpa' snying kha ru// ma li dang sbyar rgyas gdab bya// rdo rje snying po'i ye shes dang // sems dpa' mkha' dang gcig pa// snying kha rnam
191b7(rgyud): shes pra mo// a li ga tu me yum yin te/ sbyor ba'ang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba// 'di ltar dbang po kun rgyas gdab// de phyir srung ba'ang a ha yin te// yig gang rtag tu 'joms pa med pa'o// lhag ma rnam snang brjod pa'i
191b8(rgyud): mthar// rdo rje bskyod pa las sgra'o// de'i phyir ji ltar mngon par ni// brjod pa las ni bzhengs pa'i gzugs// mi rnams kyi ni snying dbus// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa dang / lte ba'i
192a1(rgyud): // 'khor lo srung ba ste// oM bai byi ni sngags kyi gzugs// dbus mdzes ma dang rdo rje 'dzin// kha sbyar 'di ni srung ba che// ma byung dang por yang dag byung // 'khor lo kun gyi gsang sngags kyang // dngos grub
192a2(rgyud): kun gsel bshad par bya// oM ha baM hA baM hi bi hrIM hI phuru hU pU// ha be da ba ho bo ho ba~M ha ba haHbaHhUM hUMhUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swAhA// swA hA// thung dang ring po'i rang bzhin gyis/ thabs dang she rab thabs bdag nyid// ga
192a3(rgyud): rdo rje phag mo ni// gtso mo'i rnam par gnas pa na// oM baM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i// sngags kyi 'ang yi gi byin par bya// ye shes 'khor le skya gnas te// gdan kyang gsang ba par 'dod// thams cad bde ba'i rnar 'gyur/ 
192a4(rgyud): ba brtan dang 'gro ba dang // bde ba dkar po bde ba gnag/ bde ba kun tu ste/ sa de bzhin// bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs// rdo rje sems dpa' bden ra dan// rang byung bde ba mi rnams la// rang byung dkyil 'khor
192a5(rgyud): ldan du'o// rdzogs ldan rgyud srung 'di ni// rdzogs ldan nyid ni 'byung / ba'o// 'jig rten sna tshogs rdzogs ldan shes// sna tshogs khams rdzogs ldan de bzhin// sna tshogs 'jig rten khams rnams
192a6(rgyud): de ltar dus kun shes par bya// dus gcig la ni rdzogs ldan sogs// 'jig rten khams rnam su 'byung min// bcom ldan 'das ni bsnyen byas pas// kun tu bde bas khyab par spyod// gang du rtsod dus der rdzogs
192a7(rgyud): ldan/ gang du rdzogs ldan der rtsod dus// dar ni gsum ldan dang gnyis ldan// re re yi ni gnyis ldan te// rnal 'byor rgyud ni sum cu drug/ ma lus 'dus las yang byung ba'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ 
192a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpe' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' go de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mir rgyud kyi rgyal po las// rdo rje sems dpa' dang phag mo'i go
192b1(rgyud): bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o// de nas slar yang go cha yi// srung ba rnam snang mdzad kyi ste// mgo bor rgyas gdab de yi ni// gsang sngags na pa hi nyid// gyen du 'gro dus rnal 'byor ni// gang ga
192b2(rgyud): bde las byung ba'i las// de da'i dusu shes bya ste// gus pas mngon par srung ba'i sngags// di med mgo bor sbyar bya ste// 'di ni bad chen 'khor lo'o// rnal 'byor gtan du shes bya ste// gshin rje ma yis 'khyud bzhin/ aM
192b3(rgyud): mo sngags las skyes bdag nyid// shes rab thabs bdag rgyu yis ni// yA ro/ ma tsi/ ni no// de ltar khams rnams sbyar bar bya// lus la sogs pa kun thim pa// zung deng zung du 'byung bar 'gyur// dpyir gsum pa'i ye
192b4(rgyud): ni/ gshin rje ma ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 'pho ba lta bu bde ba'i thabs/ gsum ldan rkang pa gcig las// snang ba gang du 'dod par ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang nyid 'gro// gtso bo'i rnam pa yi ni gzugs slar yang
192b5(rgyud): nu bdun dag tu'o// sngags rnams kyi yig las byung ba// pral ba'ing busu shes par bya// sngon du bshad pa'i sngags la 'dir// gang zhig gang gi dang bai'i yig 'di yi sngags kun rim pa yis/ 
192b6(rgyud): de dang de shes bya/ lhag ma thams cad mnyam pa ste// sgom pa dang ni bzlas pa mchog/ bad yod min med pa'ang min// kun 'gro thad pa min pa'o// sgyu ma yis ni thams cad rmongs// mkhas pa sgyu ma nyid kyis gol/ 
192b7(rgyud): pasgyu ma pan la shas// sams bskyed pa'ang ban pa'o// de ltar na ma ci'i don to// mkhas pa lhag ma bde ba ste// rnam par snang gyur 'bar gyur pas// bde de rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o// gshin rje gnod pa'i rig ma te/ 
192b8(rgyud): gshin rje med brjod par 'gyur// gang phyir srung ba 'di dan pas// dus kun tu ni bya ba dang / snying kha dpral por ye shes mtshan nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams don chen phyig/ rgyud rnams kun ni bskyed par// rgyud bang dus
193a1(rgyud): / pa yi// rnal 'byor dag byed pa min// rgyud 'di yi ni rnal 'byor ni// rgyud thams cad du dga' byed yin// dkyil 'khor gtso mo gshin rdza mas// de nas slar yang bya ba spang // mngal du zhugs las gol
193a2(rgyud): ba dang / bskyed pa dang ni 'pho ba gnyis// gshin rje ma dang rnam snang mdzad// dar ni gzugs dang gzugs med 'gyur// bde dang sdug bsngal can ye shes// lha rdzas phyag rgyas ro mnya mo// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam skye
193a3(rgyud): las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' bo de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs// dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sa las rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
193a4(rgyud): pa'i go cha srung ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// de nas pad+ma gar dbang gi go cha'i srung ba bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags me nigasal bzhin pa// spyi bor 'go ba stobs chen te// swAhA hUM gi sngags yig dang
193a5(rgyud): tri ma rmongs pa'i rgyu ma yis// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin// na mkha'i 'khor lo'i gtso bo'o// kha yi pad+mar rmongs byed pa'ang // ro dang ro min srung ba// lci dang lda ni 'dus pa la// thig le de myeng rnal 'byor bas/ 
193a6(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba skyes pa na// ye shes can med ldan pa'ang med// mi dang mi mo la bstan pas// 'dul ba zhes bya rang sem so// dga' ba'i ngag gi tshogs rnams ni// chos sgrogs pa yis rgyu yi so// byang chub sems kyi tha
193a7(rgyud): ga ni/ de ru dbugs ni rgyu ba'o// bu ga rnam pa sna tshogs bshad// de rnamasu dbugs mngon rgyu so// bu ga kun tu haM sbyin bya// mi 'gyur mchog tu zhi ba'o// ma~M yaM zhing ste// mgo bo la// mi 'gyur mchog las 'dra ba'o// / 
193a8(rgyud): pa yis ni srong sbyor ba// yang dag lam du rab 'jud byad ngas na rmongs byed mar grags te// srid pa'i 'khor lo 'jab ma'o// srid med srid pa mchog kyang med// da naM kha spyad du brjod// sngags de nyid kyi sbyar ba yis// 
193b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sum cu bdun bdag nyid// gtso bo dpa' bo 'am lha mo ste// spyi gtsug dang ni kha'i dbusu// thams cad du ni srung byed dang // rtog pa tsam ni 'joms byed pa'o// pad+ma don dam pa'i ye shes// sangs/ 
193b2(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi byang chub gzugs// kun rdzob shes bya ni// gar dbang phyug tu brjod pa nyid// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs// byang chub rang gis thams cad rtags// sprul pa kun tu rmongs gyur pas// 
193b3(rgyud): lha me rmongs byed par 'gyur// pad+ma chos kyi 'byung gnas 'gyur// gar gyi dbang po rdo rje yin// dbang phyug lhar skyes zhes bye ste// byang chub sems ni g.yo ba'o// rang bzhin med dang bang rtag nyid// da ni kha sbyar du brjod// 
193b4(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha 'gro de'i zhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha'ag rgya mtsho rnal 'byor mi'i rgyud kyi rgyal
193b5(rgyud): po chen po las pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i srung pa'i ge tshar sngags gtan la gtab pa ste bcu dag pa'o// / de nas ha ru ka'i srang @// go cha slar yang bshad par bya// mgon dang dpung par
193b6(rgyud): 'ong ba ste// rnal 'byor ma ni mgo bo ra// bau Sha Ta ha sngags mnyam med pa// 'byung dang 'byung las byung ba srun// ho hi kun tu bskyod ma'i sngags// dephyir shes rab thabs bdag nyid// he ni sems bdag nyid rnal 'byor// 
193b7(rgyud): slar yang ru ni bdag nyid// ka lus kyi rang bzhin nyid rnal 'byed// sa 'og sa steng mthe 'jig rten// bde ba'i thog mtha' dbus ni// bau ShaT he rnams sa bon can// hri hri 'og dang steng shes bya// srog rlung ni bskyod pa
193b8(rgyud): yin gta nga dgang ba la goms dang / bum pa can gyi sbyor ba'i dus// do la dusu 'khor ba ni/ sum chu bdun bdag nyid shes bya/ da lnga dus ni bzhi rnams kyi// dza~M lta'i rim par de dong / sngags de nyid kyi
194a1(rgyud): gyis mchod pa mchog tu rmad byung // de ltar rnam shes brgyad dpas kyi// gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang lnga/ le'u bzhi yi rnal 'byor kyis// ji lta'i rim pas rtogs pa'o// spyod pa'i rgyud
194a2(rgyud): gsum pa yis// le'u ru ni byung ba dang // bya ba le'u bzhi pa ru/ rgyud ni rang nyid kyi la// da kho na nyid gdan skyes pa// slar yang gsum par brjod pa yin// bzhi pa ru ni gzhan gyi gdan// skyes pa ye shes pha rol 'ag/ 
194a3(rgyud): srung ba 'gro ba bzhi rnams kyi// lha dang mi dang 'di dang ni// klu yi 'ge bar mkhas pa yis// shes bya kun tu rgyu rnams kyi'o// de de'i rang dus rnams ni// bskal pa bzang por chud pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa
194a4(rgyud): 'gongs mi 'gyur// slar yang 'gongs med skye mi 'gyur// rang bzhin shes par gyur nas ni// sems can rang gi rang bzhin 'gyur// lta ba bdud cu gnyis rnams ni// kun tu bskyod ma'i las
194a5(rgyud): kyai lo/ nyan thos rnams kyi lta ba lnga/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lta ba gnyis// rnal 'byor spyod pa pa yi bdud// dbu ma pa mchog rnams kyo rgya // bcu dag pha rol phyin rnams kyi// gsang sngags
194a6(rgyud): pa'i sum cu dag/ bdun dang brgyad pa'i gnyis kyis dman// kun kyang sngags kyi bag pa'o// rtsa yi kun spyod rtse ba can// bla ma'i din las shes par bya// he ru ka ma rtsa ba mdzad// sra dang du mya ngan 'das dbus
194a7(rgyud): bzhugs// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' go de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal
194a8(rgyud): ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las ha ru ka la sogs pa'i srung ba'i go cha'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o// de nas rdo rje nyi ma yi/ srung ba bshad par bya ba ni/ hrI ts+tsha mo sngags 'di yos// mig dbang po'i dbus te/ rgyum
194b1(rgyud): gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// lta ba thams cad mthong gyur ba'o// ye shes rnam shes mchi ma yis// 'og dang steng du thim pa las// lta ba bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/ dus gcig du ni mthong bar 'gyur// mgrin pa'i thug/ 
194b2(rgyud): ru rdo lnga// gsang ba'i rdo rje can du gnyis// bdun ni snying khar yang dag bshad// brgyad ni klad pa'i rgya bu'o// bcu dag gtsug tor du ni 'gyur// lte dkyil 'khor du sum cu drug// ma lus rang gi las kyis bskyed/ 
194b3(rgyud): rang gi lta ba 'dir mthong 'gyur// 'di de bdag gi gdan yin te/ sa gsum lta bur mthong ba yin//  yig sems dpa' ma thun gyi// mtha' yas pa yi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / rdo rje nyi ma khyab parar gyur/ 
194b4(rgyud): dpyir mig ni srung byed pa'o// kun tu skrag byed mas 'khrud pa/ thugs sngags sgra sgrogs ma// skrag pa yi ge gnyis kyis ni// sdig bathams cad mtha byed pa'o// sum cu bdun 'dag
194b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi// dbusu gnyis ni bsgom par bya// sngon gsungs sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni// lha rnams kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// der mi na lta ba yos// de la srung 'byed par 'gyur/ rnam 'a
194b6(rgyud): yis na mkhar gang // slar yang ldan smras rdzogs byang chub// rnal 'byor ma ni lhar skyes gzugs// lhan skyes yi ge rnal 'byor ma// rnal 'byor ma yis lhan skyes zas// slar yang rnal 'byor mtha' gyur// @
194b7(rgyud): rgyas gzugs ni rnal 'byor ma// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs can ma// gnas kyi gzugs ni dal 'byor ma// byas dang byeng po 'ang do nyid// bsgrub bya mthong ba sta bar 'gyur/ gau cha'i yi ge slom pa la'o// ma
194b8(rgyud): ci rtsa ring ga/ der pos kyis ni ltung bar gyur // tshul 'di snyam pa med pa yi// sems cod den mim rmongs par 'gyur/ ma ga gong pa tsal gyis ni// las rgyal thams cad byeng par 'grang / 
195a1(rgyud): // bo thams cad mnyam sbyar las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha'agod bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' ga rgya mtshon la
195a2(rgyud): ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rdo rje nyi ma la sogs pa ri go'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas rta mchog srung ba/ thams cad bya ba byang dge ba'o// phaT haM sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis// kun nas mgo dang
195a3(rgyud): rkang pa'i mthar// mdzod bu'i dbus dgod bya ste// spyi gtsug dbusu rnal 'byor ma// mgo bor kun skrag ma shes nas// tshig kun dang ni na mkha' zhes byar// gtu mo'i gsang sngags paT phaT ste/ ye shes gdan
195a4(rgyud): dbang phyugs mar 'dod// rta mchog ting 'dzin dag tu yang // rnal 'a byod dngos grub smos ci dgas// rnal 'byor pa yis 'khor ba 'di// slar yang mya ngan 'das bkas pa'o// ye shes zhes bya'i rnam rtog kyang
195a5(rgyud): sngags pas gnyisu med pas bkas// haM yig kun mkhyen yod min na// skye bo thams cad smos ci dgos// bkur sti byed pa yod pa dang // / dbang po tshar gcod yod pa ste// rnal 'byor ga tu mo'i
195a6(rgyud): yon tan ldan// da ni bdud rtsor mngon par brjod// bad bcas the tsom med par ni// dbang po thams cad thos paso// dkyil 'khor sngon du gsungs pa yin/ dbu su dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// sngags la sogs pa
195a7(rgyud): kyang nga / kun gyis kun tu byas pa'o// las kyi bag chags rang gis bza'// phra mo'ang kun tu bcom par du'o// ngan pa thams cad sbar byas na// ra sa bal ltar yang pha rol 'gro// de ni gtum byed mar shes bya// phag
195a8(rgyud): mo'i rigs las byung co// zla bar 'chi ba'i ska ma yis// skad ma'i bdag po snying rjes su// slar yang medar bsdus bshad pa ni// rnal 'byor mni drug rnams dang / dba' bo gnasu byar med nying // dgos pa'i
195b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bcu gnyis// re re'i gan su shes par bya// deng ni gang yang byed du gzhug/ lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub mtshan nyid// lus can kun gyi bde ba ni// dbang gnyis
195b2(rgyud): las shes par bya// bug dag bum pa can byas pas// de dang 'dra ba'i bde thob 'gyur// lta ba'i 'og bu ga gsum// de yi steng du gsum de bzhin// 'gro dang 'ong ba gnyis gnyis te// glo cha bcu gnyis der de bzhin// 
195b3(rgyud): po yul gyi mtshan nyid kyis// dngos po'i bdag nyid der gar bad// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi nyid 'thung 'gyur// zang zing khams rnams za ba ste// steng dang 'og tu mtshon bltas pas// lhan smras bdag nyid rtsen par byed// 
195b4(rgyud): rjes dran dag sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po yos bya ba med// dpa' mthe/ mas cad mnyam skyer las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje ma/ 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'dig
195b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni nga'al mkhar ga rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyu la bo chen po las rta mchog la sogs pa'i go cha'i srung b.ri le'u s+ye shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gtor ma 'di nyid bshad/ 
195b6(rgyud): gyis ji lta ba bzhin// chos 'byung dbus son par ni// ji lta'i cho gas gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mkha' go'i gzugs// slar yang go cha sogs pas srung // de'i yang ting 'ja ni dmigs bya// pad+ma
195b7(rgyud): snod ni bzhag bya ste// phyi dang nang bdag nyid bya// a ba d+hU tI skye gnas bri// lta ba'i 'og dang steng bu ga/ pad+ma'i sdong brtag par bya// namakha' lnga yi bad rtsi ni// thams cad ngo mnyam par bya'o// phung po go kud dan/ 
195b8(rgyud): sogs// skye mched nams ni sha kun te// sparang babade po'i sems kyis te/ 'dod chags mi yis bsro ba'o// skyeng ba ma chog ni bdag nyid pa'o// srarje yang bdud cing byed pa ste/ bsam gtan phyag su rgyu rje/ 
196a1(rgyud): sku gsum dun byidan gyis brlag/ sngags da phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// ma'a'agro rnams spyad dang bya// rje mo mdung byas nges par ni// gung mo rtse sbyang mthas rdo rje// rtan par yang dag bcing byas nas/ 
196a2(rgyud): ba'i phyogasu yongs bzhag pas// bzlas shing bsgyur bas 'khor bar bya// rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta// sngags pas de byas pa mchog ste// spyi bor baM yig sgra yis ni// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhug
196a3(rgyud): pa'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug/ g.yon dang g.yas pa'i sbyor ba yis// snying khar phyag rgya sbyin par bya// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag gnyis kyi sa// bskor ba mkha' go ma'i de bad// oM A ral+li haH
196a4(rgyud): hUMH ho// badz+ra nA ki nA sa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya ho// rdo rje thal mo gyen la bye// mtshan mo phyed na gtor ma sbyin/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba yak+Sha rA kA sa b+hu ta pre ta pre ta pi shA tson mA dA pa s+pha ra Ta ka DA ki nA da ya i ma
196a5(rgyud): gr-ih+Nan+tu sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+ta ya thai baM ya theSh+Ti b+huny+dza tha dzig+hA tha pi ba tha mA ti kra ma tham ma sarba kAr+d+ha ya sata su khaM bi shud+d+ha ye ma ma sA tA la kA b+ha wan+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ sngags kyi 'jug pa jidzi sr-i
196a6(rgyud): zum pa can gyis gnas mi 'gyur// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'thob 'gyur te// dga' skyes bde ba'ang smos ci dgos// dpa' bo rnams kyi gtor ston mo// rnal 'byor ma rnams la de bzhin// dkyil 'khor chen por sbyor
196a7(rgyud): ba yis// bla ma gtso bo dun bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ming gang gang // dpa' bo rnams kyi yang de bzhin du// de dang de la sha dbul bya// myos byed pa chen steng ba' // 'khor lo mngon par zung du bya// yang na snga/ 
196a8(rgyud): bar zung ngu'o// gdan ni stag gi lpags pa ste// ston mo mi yi lpags par// snod chen rnam su btung ba dang // sngags pa skra grol ba mos// snod ni rnal 'byor mas shes bya// yang na gzhon ma yoso// rnam khyor / 
196b1(rgyud): 'khor lor dpa' bo rnams kyis te// dpa' bo rnams kyi ga ni la snod ni gzhon ma yi so// dar phreng dbu rgyan dag dang ni// rnam pa sna tshogs de de bzhin// klu lan gar byed sol snyan dang // dag ldan sogs dang das
196b2(rgyud): rnams dang // gtor ma'i snod rnams thams cad ni// sngags pas shar gyi phyogs na su// chang thams cad dang mchod pa yi// snod rnams der ni bzhag par bya// mchod bya mchod pa mchod pa'i rgyu// mchod bca
196b3(rgyud): po phan tshun du'o// 'khor lar rang gi slob ma byas// yang na mnyam gnag gzhan rnams// sngags pas skal med thams cad dang / mu stegs la sogs par bya// 'gro ba kun ni mchog tu dga' ba'i rang
196b4(rgyud): te/ rnal 'bying ma yi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gnas kyis// a re rer gti mug phyugs kyis mi sheso// lhan skyes mdzes ma blangs nas/ 'deb che lo gnos/ sham bus gsum ma lus 'gro ba
196b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi rang bzhin// snying rje'i gzhon ma dang lhan cig rol par bya/ sa// a re/ gang gis don dam la ni ma bsgoms pas// de yi sangs rgya sa nyid ni thob pa ma yino// a re/ nang dang phyi ni bye ba med bar
196b6(rgyud): shes par gyis// 'jig rten thams cad bsgral bar nus pa'o// a re/ de la sogs pa thams cad ni// gang dang der ni blang ba'o// nga yi rgyu da nga rtog pa yis// sngags pa'i snang bas glu blang bya// de la phyag ni
196b7(rgyud): nasu shar dang glu yang bya ba yin// snod ni pad+ma'i phyag tu ni// rang nyid brtul zhugs can gyis dbul// pad+ma'i lag par 'jung bya ste// de nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams phud chad bu// sor bsdu
196b8(rgyud): bar bya ba yin// bris po yi ni lhag mi yang // 'byung po thams cad la spyod bya// ji ltar yang dag 'byor pa yi/ de rnams la ni yon dbul bya// de ltar nyi mar rang bya// yang nanA bzla bang // dam tshig sung gyi
197a1(rgyud): / lo gcig la// nyi ma gtsigs ni bya ba'o// der ni sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad bklag// bkra shis pa yi ngag kyang bya// mkha' go ma rnams 'dus la mchod pa dang // dpa' bo rnams la bza' dang // btung
197a2(rgyud): khyod kyis dngas// khod la rtag tu srung dang mchog 'byor pa dang // yang na yid la 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par shog/ skye ba kun tu mchig tu bde bar gshegs pa yi// grub pa'i 'jig rten dbusu 'gro bar 'gyur
197a3(rgyud): bor shog/ dpa' bo gnyis med mchod pas skye ba 'di la ni// sdig bzang dang phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur bar shog/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' gro de ba
197a4(rgyud): gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungaso// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha ga rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gtor ma drang 'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum
197a5(rgyud): de nas gzhan pa rab bshashed// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gad ba dang // rmyi/ na srog thab dang de bzhin du// slob dpon rang nyid mchod bshad bya slar yang sa gzhi ma mnyam la// dkyil 'khor khru ni
197a6(rgyud): pa sta Ta ri yi steng la sogs pa dang // dag pa'i sa yi mthil du bya// der ni pus mo tsam du brko// slar yang mtho gang tsam brkos nas// chu yis dgang bar bya ba ste// ji srid du ni ma zad pa// de srid du ni rtsa ba'i snga
197a7(rgyud): mkhas pas 'dir ni bzlas par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi khyim bya ste// skye ba thams cad sreg par 'gyur// de ni dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// big gnyis kyang ni gdab par bya// tshangs pa'i thig legs gnyis/ 
197a8(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis gnyis gdab bya// slar yang de yi dbus btab pas// thig rnams dag cu rtsa bzhi'o// de rnams dbusu de mnyam pa// slar yang de rnamasu gdab bya// mdor na 'khor lo bzhi po la// nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa
197b1(rgyud): kun nas dum bu bcu dag las// tshon rtsi yis ni ri mo ba// lhag ma sgo yi tshad du ni// dbus ma'i pad+ma la sogs bya// 'on kyang dbus kyi pad+ma dar// sor ni bcu gnyis bya'o// 'khor lo gsum ni bzhi po la// dum bugs
197b2(rgyud): gsum bya ba yin// dum bu re ra la ni khwa// gnyis gnyis mkhas rnams kyis shes bya// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa ni// de phyir dkyil 'khor nyid 'gyur// sbom su sgra las nyi shur ni// gtsigs ma tshang tshad tsa ni// dri zhim
197b3(rgyud): po dang da spos kyis// ye shes thig skad la 'dag bya// gtor ma chen mo byin nas ni// phyi nas thig las 'dir brjod kyis// rdo rje phur bu sa gzhi la// mkhas pas spro ba yis ni bya// rang gi slob ma thig 'dzin
197b4(rgyud): gzhug/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis lte bar// sngags pa yis ni bar+b+hadapyas nas// steng du yang ni gdab par bya// de bzhin du ni gdab pa ni g.yon bsnor du ni bya ba'o// 'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba
197b5(rgyud): gter ma byin la bcag par bya// rtsa ba'i sngags ni brjod pa yis// ri mo bar snang la bdag bya// phyi dang nang du shes pa yi// sngags pas bdud rtsi btung bar bya// sa yi na mkhar gshegs bya zhing / slar yang
197b6(rgyud): de nyid du dgug bya// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rdo rje'i gom pas gar bya'o// lag pas rdo rje gsor bya zhing // ma sogs rnal 'byor ma dang rol// 'di kun gri gug mtshan ma rnams// dkyil 'khor pa rnams
197b7(rgyud): kyis bya'o// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas// slob dpon de yis khrus byas pa// dri ma med 'akrus legs bdug pa'i// gos ni yongasu gyon nas ni// dril bri'i sgra ni rab bya zhing // rnal 'byor ma rnams glu len
197b8(rgyud): dang sna tshogs sil snyan snod rnam dang // tsa tso'i ni skra grogs pa'o// dbang bskur ba ni sbyin bya zhing // rang slob ma la byi dang gsang/ rgyal po rkun mo sogs spangs pa'i// skye bo dang bral byegasu bya/ 'dir ni chag
198a1(rgyud): // skyon mang pos// man med sog su ltung bar 'gyur// ni dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i sbyir bsreg rnams kyi bab bya'o// thug po ni bayi ni thag/ klu bzhi pa'i rgyas pa la/ gru gsum pa ni dbung las
198a2(rgyud): parnga mngon spyod la ni zur drug pa/ zung bdun pa ni bskrad pa la// sdang bar dbyal gru brgyad ga/ zung dgu pa ni ngas pa la// bsad pa la ni zur lnga ste// las thams cad la zung bcu pa// kha dog rang bdag sbyong bso// rang gi hra/ 
198a3(rgyud): byung mtshan man/ ba rnams kyin bu ts+tshaH/ dming bar rdo rje dang kri grog/ ngami gro chen sna tshogs dong// gang ga nang de bzhin thab la na/ gleng ba de rnams byar// khru gcig pa dang khru ga nyis pa// khru byi
198a4(rgyud): dang ni// slar yang khru gnyis gsum dang bzhi// lnga drug bdun dang brgyad dang dgu// khru bcu ru ni yang dag bshad// thab kun ji lta'i ma paso// yam shing dang ni rdzas rnams dang / sreg lugs me tog thad dang // phyi na
198a5(rgyud): bdag nyid sbyor rnams kyis// rang rang gi ni las2// mngon par brjod par bshad pa'i las// rtsa ba'i sngags sog/ sa thams cad can// 'di yi sbyor ba'i cho ga'i las// rgyud rnams kun tu na
198a6(rgyud): byed// cung zad 'chad par 'gyur nyid// rgyud thams cad kyi bshad par bya/ zlum po lta bar skyes pa'i thab// snying kha ru ni klu bzhi pa// nor bu'i bu gar gra dag pa// mgrin par gA ni bdun pa ste// zung brgyad pa ni mgos
198a7(rgyud): mang phung dgu ru ni smin dbus// gtsug tor du ni zung lnga pa// zur bcu pa ni dpral bar te/ rlung las byung ba'i rtsa ba can// sreg rdzas khams rnam thams cad ni// rlung 'bab pa la bsreg par bya// de nyid dus phyir/ 
198a8(rgyud): kyi cwo ldan gyis las chung du'o// ma lanA dang ri sa nA// dgang gzer gnyis de bzhin/ ming sdod ma ba d+hA ti ste// tha ba na di'i bar dag du'aM/ las thang sbyin sreg ni/ 'jig rten 'di la bya ba yin// deng ni rjes da
198b1(rgyud): ba ni// the tso pa rnyed par bsred par bya// dgang gzang khru gang du 'gyur te// rgyar ni sor mo bani ba las// deng ni sor mo gnyis 'tsho bya// mchu yi sdug mo sor mo byed// busu rdo rje pad+ma dang / ma chu sdug rdo rje ldan pa
198b2(rgyud): na rtsa bar rdo rje song drug pa/ yu bo'i steng du dgang gzi sogs// drug gzang kyang ni de'i tshad la// steng du dang mdab lta bu yin// gang gi ba rnams byin tshang // khru gang ba 'am khwa dob// de'i byeng zung du ban bya ba
198b3(rgyud): po rnams la rab tu bshang // thog ma dang ni dbus dang mthar// sngags pas gang ba'i sreg lugs dbul// me ni dgug bya nga yang ni// ku sha'i bam po la bzhag bya// mchod yon zhabs bsil zhal bsil ni/ sna tshogs
198b4(rgyud): mngon par bsngags nas dbul/ ngar ni nya phyis bor ba gsum/ le ma'i steng du bzhag par bya// 'o ma'i snong ni yang bzhag nas/ de nas gos ni de'i steng du'o// sa bzhid dung ba sbyin bya ba/ sngon du kha mngon phyogs pa/ 
198b5(rgyud): zad du ni g.yas phyogasu// deng ni rdzas rnams banag/ par bya// sa gzhi ri mi gsum bri ste/ sgo gcig pa ni nub tu'o//  sa 'an thams cad / rgyal po nas brtsams gzhug par bya// thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i
198b6(rgyud): phyir rdo d+ha bla ma la dngul bya// drang srong phyag bani bsam bya ba// dbyug pa thab dang spyi blugs dang // dgrang phreng lug la zhon pa yi// kha dog dmar po rnam bsam bya// oM a h+ye hi ag+na ya ra sa rba sid+d+him+me bA yan+d+ra dz+wa la dzA pa
198b7(rgyud): ho Sha ma hA ri Sha mchede ba mu kha pA rI a smin san ni hi ta b+ha wa hU~M/ me spyan dang pa'i sngag so// oM AHpA d+yaM d+ha tA sa nA ye gr-ih+Na hU~M/ zhabs bsil gyi sngag so// oM baM AtsA ma na di Sha ye pra ya ts+tsha hUM/ zhal bsil gyi sngan
198b8(rgyud): mad+hur+thag tsug rnaMs ma margyad dam d+hA / mchad pon gyi sdig go/ ma pa bar masogate dzu kI ye che tsho da ha ta bcab / dra ma dz+ra gta tan rnaM mi kyis byi byed pa'i ldan na/ 
199a1(rgyud): rdzas bas sadam ma gyim nga yA bsu ming du yang dan pa ldan pa ma na sa she sbyi gyu'o// sa thams kyi ldan mo/ kyil 'khongs pa dang / 
199a2(rgyud): drang srong snying kar bsgom par bya// dam tshig me ni ra las rdzogs// ye shes me lha de dang mnyam// yang na 'bar bar sgom pa ste// zhi ba la sogs mdog du'o// me ni de ru bim bsam bya// sngags pas 'od kyi khyad par ni/ 
199a3(rgyud): snang ba re mar shes bya// rnal 'byor ma lnga'i bdag nyid kyi// gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin// nang bdag nyid ye shes gang 'dra// phyi rol yang ning 'dra bya// bsod nams tshigs kyi rgyu
199a4(rgyud): don dang // ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa phyi// der ni tsa ru bsgrub bya ste/ me la ban su dbul bya zhing // cung zad bdag nyid kyis spyad dang / sbyin bdag rnams la'ang sbyin par bya// gzhon nu mdzes pa gang byed/ 
199a5(rgyud): sna tshogs sil snyan rnams bkrar byas// sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan rnams kyi/ skye bo chen po brtson bzhin dang / me tog spos sogs kyis m+b+ha kha/ 'dus po'i dbus bya ba'o// tam bu la kun zang pa// 
199a6(rgyud): dgyes byed sbyin par bya ba yin// lhag ma gos dang so rtsi dang // gang ba'i sreg lugs sbyin par bya// rdo zho dang bral so rtsi dang // zhal bsil ba ni 'jug tu'o// ye shes me ni gshegs gsol te// sngags brjod pa yis ba/ 
199a7(rgyud): gsol bya// oM ag+na ye sarba sadz+ha Sha Ni ku ru me ya thA kA la sid+d+hi gats+tsha tu hUM hUM swA hA// me gshegasol ba'i sngagaso// dman dang chad sogs gang cung zad // de thams cad ni bzod pa mdzod// kun gyi lhag ma mi/ 
199a8(rgyud): ni 'bru// thams cad zab tu bsreg par bya// zhes bya dkyil 'khor thig mdong bsten// sbyin sreg zab dang cho ga mchog/ slob dpon mchod bya yang dag par/ rdo rje 'chang du byas nas ni/ mu tog gser dang rin chen rnams/ 
199b1(rgyud): blang rtam pani yul ljongs dang / bran po bran mo 'khor rnams dang // chung ma phun sum tshogs kun dang // gos zung dum rnams dang ni// dgyes pa'am sa la gcung zad// bdag tu lta ba dang bral bas// dbul rgya ga
199b2(rgyud): zhi bar gyis// bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyis// phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya// me tog spros sogs thams cad rnams// ston po'i mdun du dbul bar bya// maN+Dal mdun du bya ba ni// de ras dgu yi bdag nyid 'ang
199b3(rgyud): dbusu bA ma rdo rje ste// mdun du zad mdzes ma ste// byang du dga' ba'i mchog ma dang // nub tu shin+d+ra rtse ma dang // lho ru rol pa'i rdo rjem// snying rje la sogs grwa bzhi do// oM badz+ra sa tra gu ru pA de b+h+yaHsarba to ba ka ra Na ya swahA/ 
199b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang ming ni// brjod bya oM thog swA hA mtha'o// dpal bo tha~Md mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsus
199b5(rgyud): dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg dang slob dpon mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de nas 'khor
199b6(rgyud): 'dzags pa ni// sgrol byed rab gnas bshad par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud rgyal du// nye bar mkho ba thams cad rnams// slob dpon gyis ni rtag bzung bya// bya bar 'os pa gzhan de bzhin// 'jig rten smod pa
199b7(rgyud): srung phyir yin// sngar yang rang bzhin las skyes pa// rab gnas sgyu ma yis bzung bya// lugs ma 'am ni thang ka la// rang gzugs lha ni phyi rol spro// gang gi dus nyid la 'byung ba// gang gang lha ni lhag gnas pa'i
199b8(rgyud): de gzugs na dong dus kyi'o/ bde ba'i bdag nyid spros pa ste/ sa bon gang gi dang po'i yig 'char ba dbugs rgyu ba'i bdag nyid/ rlung dang nas shes 'dus las/ de'i tshe'i dusu gang gi gzugs/ bung su mchos
200a1(rgyud): de ci'i bde ba tshe/ rnal 'byong ma mau dgang gnas la// de las byung bar bya ba yin// lugs ma'am ni bang skul/ yang dag rig pas ngo rnams byug/ bdu rtsi lnga yis rdzas rnams la// bsres par gyur bas khrus bye
200a2(rgyud): dang ldan pos bum pa bzhin/ lha ning dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas// dem chos la sogs thams cad rnams/ ches kyi 'byung gnas nang du ste/ bzhugs pa gang gi gnas rnam su// dus thams cad dung ba gnas pa'o// 
200a3(rgyud): yi yi ge'i gnas bsgrubs nas// baM yig rdo rje sems dpa' can// ma yig rab tu gnas pa der// bzhi pa thog ma med yAng gags// thos pa gcig pa sngags kyi don// brda yi yi ga'i sngags can// dus
200a4(rgyud): rang gis// rab bzhugs rab tu mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa na mas cad tshig/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'o// sku gsung thug kyi tshig rnams kyi// rnal 'byor ma'i bcod gzhan gyi
200a5(rgyud): min b+ha ga rnams rgyud lnga rnams/ bya ba la sogs bla med mthar// bzhu gas pa de ltar dun ci/ rab tu gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa'o// sen pasmai la ba byas nas ni// rab tu gnas pa rgyud kun tu'o// 
200a6(rgyud): tsha lhag mos rnal 'byor ma'i// rgyu du gnyis med rab tu gnas// las dpe las bya gnyis byas nas// 'on kyang rang gis rig pa can// rang gis rig pa'i ye shas che// rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid lha// rang gis rig
200a7(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin las// rab gnas don rab tu bsngags// skye bo rnams la snying brtse bas// gzhan yang de bzhin rab smra bya// yang dag ye shes dkyil 'khor gyi// lha yi rnam par dag pa'o// bdun cu rtsa gnyis byan
200b1(rgyud): rnams ni// rgyud dag par ni rnam par brjod// phyag bzhi rgod pa la sogs pa// bzhi po rnams ni dag par 'dod// zhal rnams dag pa'i dngos po ni// lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub bcu drug/ bcu bdun pa'i
200b2(rgyud): yi du bshad sred dang mya ngan 'das zhabs gnyis// thams cad rgyan gyi dge ba ni// chos dang ches pa'i skye rnamaso// lhag ma 'jig rten khams kyi// rnam dag gsal dang mi gsal bal// rtsa ba'i sngags
200b3(rgyud): sogs dag pa yang // theg pa thams cad don ston pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma sogs thams cad// 'dir ni mngal skyes brjod pa pa'o// dkyil 'khor dag pa thams cad kyang // chos bsdus ston po yino// yan lag cu
200b4(rgyud): gnyis rnam dag pa// 'khor lo sbyar ba bcu gnyis// cha shas bcu dag rnam sa kyi bar// dur khrod dag par shes par bya// rgyud gang bdag las byung ba de// thad dag par shes par bya// kun mkhyen ye she
200b5(rgyud): ngan pad// de yi dag pa mngon brjid pa'o// rjes 'du shes nyid dang miH/ sa// so'i ye shes smra rnams kyi// ming rjod pa yi dag pa ni/ 'byong rnal 'byor mi rgyud // sgyu ma lha bro skye 'an
200b6(rgyud): kun rangadakyil 'khor 'khor lo sgyu ma 'o// gsungs pa rang gis rig ye shes/ gang dang der ni mngon brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i grub mtha'i mtshan nyid ni// bla ma'i zhal las kun shes bya// man ngag gis rna
200b7(rgyud): bzhin pa// so so mtshams la bde ba che// de tshe'i dusu dag pa gang // sangs rgyas spyod yul las dngag/ de phying rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyang // bde ba 'dod la 'byung bar 'gyur// yi ge re rer btags pa las
200b8(rgyud): dngom po'i gzugs kyi de dag 'gyung // phag mo'i gsang sngags nyid 'ashad pa/ dngos po pang de'i dag pa'o// dbang po dang yul mi bdebapa/ ngo mnyam do nyid spyod rnams kyi// chos kyi skub na dag par 'gyur/ 
201a1(rgyud): ni li spyong rdzogs su can/ sems ni sprul pa'i su yi ste// lus ni lcad skyes su ca no/ dri med la sogs slar yang dang / bzhi rnams kyi yang dag par yang// go cha'i sngags kyi dag tshan/ dab kyi
201a2(rgyud): kun gyi spyod pa'o// snying po dang ni nyo snying du// kha sbyor rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'o// 'byung dang 'byung las byung 'das pa// gtor ma'i sngags kyi dag par 'gyur// gnod mdzes sngags kyi dag pa gang // rnam rtog kun la
201a3(rgyud): phur 'debs pa'o// sna tshogs las kyi dge ba gang // de mi dag pa don dam can// khams thams cad kyi lnga rnams ni/ lpags dang sha sogs dag par 'gyur// 'dir mang smras pas ci bya ste// bde ba tha~Md rnam dag
201a4(rgyud): pa'o// gang gang dbang po'i lam rnamasu// gang gang de de'i rang bzhin gyis// ma chog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin ga/ rlos// dag pa mchog tu shes bya ste// gzhan gyi
201a5(rgyud): ba mi smra'o// dbang phyug la sogs lta bar ni// mdor bsdus dag par shes pa ra bya// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du// de ni 'grub 'gyur gzhan min// byang chub lam du gnas pa gang // gzung
201a6(rgyud): 'dzin par dam pa can// de yis ma rig mngon sbyin gyis// dbang phyug la sogasu blta'o// dpyir mang gis rig nga bzhin// rnam dag 'drin bshad pa yin// dpa' tshe thams cad mnyam spyod las// 
201a7(rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mang 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan padag pos 'di gsung // zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtshan la 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
201a8(rgyud): khaM'i rnam par dag pa dang de bzhin du gcuganas pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyis ces bya ba'i tshe lus nyi shurtsa lnga 'o// de nas phyag rgya lhan cig skyes/ byed rnams mngan nyid ba shad pa byad mi byod
201b1(rgyud): sogs ca rnams 'ang // ba ni yos lhag pa bshad pa yin/ pa phyed ma dang phra gzugs sa/ bzang mo g.yon ma g.yon phyogs sa/ rus la skyes ma sdom pa mo// dbang ma spyon dadam ma/ spyi ma dzan rgyu sbyin pa// 
201b2(rgyud): dngos ma su pa na de bzhin// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI spo ba'i ngag/ pra ban ngom grub ma dang // rgan mo skye bo kun 'thun ma ma// mdarab mo dang snying po ma// rab ba sum skor 'don ma k+Sha// gau tu mo bdud kyi bu mo dang
201b3(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma ma rA hUM// sum cu rtsa dag rtsa rnams la// re re la ni bcu gnyis te// thams cad dbye ba phye ba ni// slar yang phyag rgya mdor bstan pa'o// sor mo gcig ni bstan bya ste// de la sor mo gnyis bstan bya// 
201b4(rgyud): 'og dang steng du mnyam par ni// slar yang mthe bong bstan par bya// 'di rnams rtsa yi thams cad rnams// 'og dang steng du mnyam rengs pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pas 'gro bya mchog/ sna tshogs rim pas shes
201b5(rgyud): par bya// de la mtha'u chung rab bstan bya// de nga yang dag gnas byed pa'o// gang gi ming de ston 'an// de yi rab tu ston par sted// rdo rje nyi ma he ru ka/ rkyang ma snying ka'i pad ma // gang gi bsdigs
201b6(rgyud): ston pa na// gung mo rab tu bstan par bya/ rdo rje pad+ma'i rab sbyong bas// bde ba steng du 'bang bar bya// gang gi dpral ba ston pa na/ de yo byangs rangab bstan bya/ rang gis rig pa'i bde ba deng // phyag rgya dang bces kyi
201b7(rgyud): baper byung // gang gi 'khom sa sun po na// de lam pani rab bstan bya// gtsug te dang ni ster 'grog lag pa gnyis kyis ris ba bya// ga na mazhin ston pa ra// de yi me long sa btsun na/ 
201b8(rgyud): dbang ba rnams kyi srung / 'odags pa can mthong bar 'gyur/ gang ni lba bar bdag byed pa// de mi nye ba rang bstan bya// chos kyi byis rgya bzhin du/ rnam shes brgyad po snang bar 'gyur gang nanags 'o/ 
202a1(rgyud): / pa na \u0f7fde yi nyi ma rab bstan bya// stong nyid rje yang dag par// rtsa yi rnal 'byong nyid kyis mthong // gang gi khro gnyer ston pa na// de yi mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya// bdag nyid yang dag sbyor rol cing // rang
202a2(rgyud): rjesu myong ba shes// gang gi chu bo ston pa na// de yi rgya mtsho ba bstan bya// sa gcig gi ni rab 'byor pas// thams cad sar ni rab tu bsngags// gang gi dbus mo ston pa na// da yi rkang pa rab bstan bya// bod 'gong 'gro ba'i
202a3(rgyud): ni dbang po'i dngos po de 'gro'o// gang gi nu ma ston pa na// de yi gdan ni rab bstan bya// bde ba long spyod bdag nyid skyes// kun nas srid pa 'dzag par du'o// gang gi dpung pa ston pa na// de yi lag pa rab bstan bya// 26
202a4(rgyud): ba dbyug pa bzhin snang la// bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsreg par bya// gang gi brla ni ston pa na// de yi gsang ba rab bstan bya// ga tsu la dbyug pa'i rnam pa'i srog/ dbus ma rnamasu lang thim pa'o// gang gi lce ni ston pa na// 
202a5(rgyud): yi rkan ni rab bstan bya// gtu mo thams cad rtsa ru na bsdus nas rnam par gnas pa yin// gang gi mchu ni ston pa na// da yi kos kau rab bstan bya// thams cad chos nyid brjod medas/ dbang pa
202a6(rgyud): kun gyi dran pa bral// gang gi sor mo'i rtse ston pa// de mi sen ma rab bstan bya// srid pa'i rtse mor bde ba'i gzugs// gcod par nges par mthong bar 'gyur// gang gi sgra ni ston pa na// de yi phreng bar bas
202a7(rgyud): bya g.yo can sems can gyi ni ste// ye shes gzugs can du blta'o// gang gi spyi gtsug ston pa na// de yi rkang mtheb rab bstan bya// nor bu'i rgud pa bzhin du srog/ dbu mar 'ong ba mthong bar 'gyur// gang gi mgon
202a8(rgyud): ba ston pa na// de yi skye ba rab bstan bya// spyi blugs bdud rtsi ji lta bar// pad+mar skye 'gro thams cad mthong // gang gis nyi ma ston pa na// de ya ni mkha' bstan par bya// stong ka las byung 'jig rten kun// mchog tu chag
202b1(rgyud): med la shes 'byug / gang gas dasod pa smra/ rkang pa'i ma la di bstan bya// badra ma bu 'du mu mas de// dud cu'i su su 'dzag par 'argyad / gang nim go ma ston pa na// de yi du chub na
202b2(rgyud): kun gyi rtsa rnams kyis// nus pas na mkha'i gnas rnam su'o// gang gi ling ga ston pa dang / da yi rlog pa rab bstan bya// 'byung med 'gyur bar 'gro 'gyur ba// doni rdzog mtshams phyag rgya spyad// gang gi spyi drug
202b3(rgyud): ston pa na// ri bo de yi rab bsten bya// ri las thur du chu bo bzhin// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig rna bar reg/ rgyab kyi rgyud ni rab bstan bya// gang gis lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub// 
202b4(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul du thob 'gyur// gang gis gos ni sten pa na// de yi chen rtsi rab bstan bya// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du// skad cig gis ni bdag med mthong // gang zhig so yis mchu 'dzin pa// saM ni klos
202b5(rgyud): krig bstan par bya// bza' ba thams cad med pa nyid/ bag chags stobs kyis rnam par 'phel/ gang gi lce ni bskyod pa na rba bi'i lag pa rab bstan bya// bde bar kun gyi tshim pa ni// don yod
202b6(rgyud): las 'thob par 'gyur// gang gi lag pa'i 'khrig ma ston// de mi thal gong rab bstan bya// srog gi drung napas la dung ba// bum can 'khrul 'khor sogs kyi'o// gang gi rtsib logs ston par/ de mi mtshan lnga
202b7(rgyud): rab bstan bya// nang du lhan cig skyes pa dang // snying rje la yang reg pa'o// gang gi lag pa'i dbus reg pa// lag pa'i rgyab ni bstan par bya// bdag gis gzhan dang rang gi dus// mchog ma kye he mi shes pa'o// gang gi
202b8(rgyud): dgad bstan pa na// de yi du b.rab bstan bya/ mchog tu gnyis med zhugs pa las// 'dod chags yod chags dal 'a'ang nyams// gang gis gangadi ston pa na/ de yi klu no rab bstan bya// khams gsum
203a1(rgyud): / sgyu ma ru// gnyis kyi dngos po las mthong gyur// gang gi keng dus ston par// de yi rtse mo rab bstan pa// rtsa gsum po ni 'bar ba yis// 'chi ba slu bar 'ong ba yi// de ltar phyag rgya sum cu dru/ 
203a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i lan ni de bzhin mchog/ spud dang sring mor spyod par ni// rdo rje'i 'khor lor shes par bya// rab gtum rigs kyi bdag mor ni// gnas kyi gtso mor shes par bya// rab tu gsal ba'i mthar gyur gzugs/ 
203a3(rgyud): srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'byung bar 'gyur// ji srid gnyisu med spyod yul// g.yo ba'i chos kyang shes par bya// mkha 'og mchogs ma lus pa ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgya mtshor 'das// rab gtu ma yi
203a4(rgyud): gis shes par bya// thad bud med sgyu ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya kun gyis la dun pa 'o// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rang bzhin du// gsungs pa'i rang bzhin ma lus pa// de ni rdzu 'phrul rkang par 'dod// phyag rgya bar
203a5(rgyud): / ni ma lus pa// rnal 'byor ma bskyed mtshan nyid// sngon bshad chung ngun khang mchog/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbu su te/ sum cu bdun pad gnyid dbu su// sngags 'di thams cad rnal 'byo
203a6(rgyud): mkha' grom sogs bcu gnyis kyis// dus sbyor chu srin la sogs te/ rab gtum la sogs nyi shu bani/ dus de rnam bu 'byung ba yin// skad cig yud tsam la sogs pas// thad kyi ni 'pho ba gcig/ sh-i
203a7(rgyud): pra dang gis rnams kyi sa/ skye bo rnams kyi dus kyis no// longar gyur pa yi tshad kyis ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis// khar sog su dus byas nas/ ldog pa gnyis dgas ni mtshon gnyis dag btsunas
203a8(rgyud): bsgres byas pa/ me mi mu med pani no// brgyad bu cu lngas lhag pa'i brgya// ku tsid lnga la shes par bya// nyi ma gcig gi tshad kyang ni// dgakha' mig dang mig pa mig rna ba gcin med kyang ni/ mkha ma pa// 
203b1(rgyud): ro dang du 'chod// lo gcig gi ni tshad kyang ni// mkha' stong mig dang bug de bzhin// mkha' go ma kun shes par bya// gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid// rtsa ba'i sngags rnams kyi ni yang // rkang pa gnyis gnyis mnyam
203b2(rgyud): bar ni// rnal 'byur ma yi rkang pa gcig/ de rnams las ni lhag myur gang // hU~M phaT la sog spang bar bya// oM tr-i Na b+hU maHba shrI na tsaka~M dzA ya DA kaM ka bA ma ba hA Ne bI ya ra hUM bI hUM rI phaT shwa ra phaT ya sA hUM hUM hU pa? tsa
203b3(rgyud): hUMhUM phaT phaT swAd// zhes bya ba ni sngags// kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi me// skra gal 'jigs par mdzad pa mo// lha mo shes rab zas bdag nyid// lhag ma sngon bshad mtshan nyid ni// lha mo 'di rnams thad no// slar
203b4(rgyud): yong rtag tu rgya mtsho mnyam// rab mchog bde ba thob pa na// dgos pa mang po yang dag rig/ ye shes zla ba'i rang bzhin du// 'di ni 'char dang dub pa yon// tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i 'od gzugs gang // 'od zer mkhacwo
203b5(rgyud): mkha' go ma// 'od zer zhes bya rab bcing ba 'dang // ye shes 'bab par / tu nus// ri mo 'ang na mkha'i dbus rnam su// bogang bya rang gi ma las skye sa// de ltar rab tu ma ma'i yon tan// rab mchog la
203b6(rgyud): sogasu mtshon bya// dus thams cad du kun spyod pa// sngags las byung ba shes par bya// mchog dngas grub rgyu yis ni// 'du ba rnal 'byor mar rab gsungs// dngos grub rmi lam du ster ma// stes na dus kyis shes
203b7(rgyud): par bya// las ni gang da gang 'dra ba/ di dang de 'dra 'bras bu ste// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel nyid pas// rang nyid napa 'byor pas skyes 'gyur/ rgyu med cing da 'bras bu med/ mngon sum mngon sum min de bzhin// 
203b8(rgyud): 'di 'di'i bden pa smra rnams kyi// tshad ma'i bsten bcos las shes bya// dpa' bothams cad mnyam spyod las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde tsa'i mchog rdo rje mkha' gra de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan 'dag tsas
204a1(rgyud): 'di gsung so// dpal mkha' gro rgya mtshorna pa 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// rab tu gtum mo bdag po'i dkyil 'khor du nal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i brda yis gnas pa
204a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i spyod yul gyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gtum mig ma'i phyag rgya// rgyud gzhan na med bshad par bya// migo brda' ni shes bya ste// 'di thams cad kyang kha spyang yin// 
204a3(rgyud): ba dang ni mi btsums pa// g.yas dang g.yon dang g.yas 'gro dang // gyen du bskyod dang sA rtsa ra dang // sar lta dngos po'i mig can dang // khro dang zhum dang 'thun bud med// bu dang gnyen dang spun rnams dang // gti mug
204a4(rgyud): zhe sdang chags phrag dog/ skyon dang rgyal cher rlom dang // 'dod dang snying rje glen pa dang // sgyu mar lha dang ring du lha// 'gro dang bsam gtan phyed byed dang // thams cad phye dang dga' ba dang / tshad dang nad dang g.yul ngod
204a5(rgyud): chos dang bcas par lta ba mchog// gal te sum cu/ drug lta ba// 'di nyid rna la'i byor mas ster no//  nyid rkye na phyag/ rgya'i lan// rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtag sbyin pa// me long chu dang mcho
204a6(rgyud): pa dang // ral gi mapa'i ma 'i bong dang / namakha' bad+ma ku mu dang / mdo dang zla ba nyi ma dang // nor bu ru tig byi ru dang // gzhu ba'i gsong dpa radra ba dang // rabar 'grib ma ras lal dang // bAM ma rta blang sa ra b+ha/ 
204a7(rgyud): gar dang skrag deng 'dang ba dang // ra khrig patsad s+tha nye bar dang // gtong ma'i mi dkyil 'khor dang // ni dang rgyas dang bang dang no// bsad pa dang ni bskrad rnams kyis// lta ba ru ni bshad gyur pa// bad ni sum cu
204a8(rgyud): dran go/ ji lta'i tshim pas sbyin par bye/ de nyid rnam 'byor pa min// de rnams dgos pa bshad par bya//  ba'i rgyub pon pa'i srog/ ni men par myo sa man mchog// sum cu cu drug sems 'al gdernam
204b1(rgyud): bong shes par byan mi gi phyag rgya gang 'dab// de 'anga'i sogs ni rgyu bar bya// mgo la sogs pa'i tshigs kun tu/ rtsa rnams gnas ni bsgrub byas nas// mo phyed ma sogs steng 'og tu// dar ni blta ba chen
204b2(rgyud): po byad/ de ltar bdun cu gnyis shes bya// phun sum tshogs kun 'thob par 'gyur// gtum mig rnal 'byong ma'i bdag ma// sdang ba char gcod mdzad ma yin// byang chub phyogs kyi cho su yang // rnal 'byor
204b3(rgyud): kun shes 'gyur ba// gtu mig rnal 'byor ma rtag tu// brtson 'grus rdzu 'phrul rkang pa nyid// gtu mo'i rnam par rtog kun la// mig lta ba za ba yin// g.yo ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin ni// sems gcig du ni
204b4(rgyud): 'tshong ba yin// tho co'i sgyu spyod 'jig rten du// 'joms pa phyag rgya mkha' go skyes// kun rdzob dang ni don dam pa// long med par ni gnyis med byed// gnyis med mig ni 'dir de nyid// sangs rgyas kun
204b5(rgyud): gyis rab tu bsngags// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni snang bya da// rtsa rnams thams cad rab tu ston// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus ni tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// gtum mig ma ni thabs lnga
204b6(rgyud): ba sum cu rtsa bdun bdag nyid can// de yi tshum ma mngon brjod pas// thang byang chub rang bzhin can// sngags kyi yi ge las skyes pa// kun spyod rtsa yi bdag nyid can// de yi ji ltar kha dog gzugs// 
204b7(rgyud): gtum rnal 'byor ma yi'o// oM sa daM taSh+To sat+ka Ta pra b+hI ni Sha tra NA ya b+hai hUMr hUM pA pa ya Ta hUM Ta pa spr-i Ta hA phaT swA hA/ oM tsar+N+Nak+ShA ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// gang ba'i rig na su yang // rab tu gtum mo dus kun
204b8(rgyud): skyes pa zla ba nyal dpral ba ru// rimachen por zla ba ched/ 'bang ba 'dzin pa gtu mig me// ra phru mos ni za su byas// tshes gcig tu ni yang dag bshad // nyi ma'i rjes 'greng nges \u0f7fshad pa de/ 
205a1(rgyud): // rnal 'byor me re re'i// rang gzhing du mi rgya // re re yi yang nyi shu bani// smrar yang gnas dang nye gnaso// bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa'ang med/ yi ge las byung spangs pa yin// 
205a2(rgyud): dang dus min ngo bo'i bdag/ hUM phaT yi ges 'dod par gyis// yi ge las byung ba'i gzugs kyi// ha yi rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'byung // spun gyi spyod par tsum pa gang // 'jug dang ldog par byed pa'o// snying ka'i la
205a3(rgyud): khor shes bya ste// mi gi rang bzhin can snying ka/ snying kar gnas rang rnal 'byor ma// gtu mo lta ba'i steng nas 'angar// dpa' ba thams sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mched// rdo rje mkha' go de bzhin
205a4(rgyud): gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ gtum mog ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya dang bdag po'i rang bzhin rgya
205a5(rgyud): mig zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu bdun pa'o// de nas ngadag pa shang b+ha ga/ jo lta'i tshogs 'arda'i yi ga rnal 'byor ga bor 'ching ba las// shas nas myung du nges par grol// rdza la
205a6(rgyud): nA ma dang naM/ bi Shi haM/ rA dzi kA/ ba Ta ki paM Ta ka R+Shi/ kun du ra/ ka pU raM/ si l+la kaM/ swa yaM b+hU/ kastu rikA/ tsa sa ma/ khai l+la/ kak+ko laM/ k+ko laM kA linya dza raM/ shA li bAM raM/ a bya ki/ paM dr-i ba naM/ byany+dza naM/ mA la tinaH
205a7(rgyud): naM/ rat+na sam+b+ha baM/ gau/ ku da ha na gyi mU shu ra ma de ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// de bzhin dpa' bo spun rnams brda/ rnal 'byor ma de'i dgongs pa ni// kha yis brjod pa byed par 'gyur// skyes bu
205a8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma/ bud med cang shang lde bcu ba cang te ru zung med kyi 'khris pa// khu ba// khrag sha las skyes/ khrag/ bud med kyi gcin/ bshang ga lang ga/ pad+ma/ 'dus pa 'am/ ska ldan/ skye gnyis kyi/ 
205b1(rgyud): shi ba'i ro// rgyal po'i skyes bu/ dur khrod/ nya'i sha bya'i sha/ g.yul ngo'i khrag/ ba lang khyir glang po che/ rta/ mi bshang ba gcig khu bar khrag/ rkang mar/ de ltar yang ni brda yi lan// sngags pas rtag tu
205b2(rgyud): shes par bya// rnal 'byor dngos po shes rnams kyi// dus rnams kun tu bskyed pa ni// sprul pa sen sgrol ba po// zhing dang zhing du skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems ni zhu ba'i khams// sum cu rtsa drug ga
205b3(rgyud): kyang ni// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // na mkha' dang ni ye shes khams// de'i yang khams ni drug dag 'gyur// mngon pa'i gzugs sogs shes mthar// nges par bshad don smra ba po'i// rang bzhin gyis
205b4(rgyud): ni brdar shes bya// de raM'i bar du m+b+ha ma ni// 'od ldan pa shes gzugs can// sum cu rtsa drug khams rnams kyi// ra ba'i dus mtha' mkha' spyod pa// mi shes 'od zer de bsgrub na
205b5(rgyud): bde ba kun gyi gnas la bzhugs// gos kyi mtha' nas bzung nas ni// gnang dang gnad du rtse bar bya// ye shes kun rdzob spangs pa las// sgom pa 'ang rnam rtog bdag nyid// rdo rjes 'og sbyar
205b6(rgyud): nyid// rgya thams cad ni gzhig par bya// nan por sreg pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ mkhas pas 'od ldan yi ge'o// dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa ste// uD+yan gnas de bzhin du'o// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
205b7(rgyud): dbu bu ni lha yi bdag ma tshig sgom bya// gsang sngags bdon pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// sna tshogs yi ge rnams dbus son// sum cu rtsa bdun lha rnams ni// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nyid// oM
205b8(rgyud): kaM bi kA da la yu mA tA la dzaM b+ha ha ra bA na ya~M oM hUM grA hUM pa ya Ta hU~M phaT sA Ta hA phaT swA hA/ oM pra b+hA wa tI ye hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ kha dog gzugs ni sngon bzhini// rang gi 'od kyis rnal 'byor 'grub// oM yig bye mo
206a1(rgyud): // 'byung ba'i bdag/ srog gi rlung ni bskyod cing spyod/ skar ma'i bdag po kur mkhyen rnams// dbang po sogs kyi 'ang spangs pa yin// ya yig dang ni a yi gzugs// nang pa'i mthar dang mgron
206a2(rgyud): nAd tsam la thams cad rten// rang byung ches brjod pa yino// de ltar yi ga bzhi rnams ni// chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang yin// mi ni yid de'i cha'i ye shes/ de yod pas ni dpyod pa ste// 'jig rten dbus dngas
206a3(rgyud): la ni// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas spyod la byed// yon tan kun gyi 'khor lor yang // thar pa'i rgyu yis stong bar 'gyur// yon kun bdag stong pa nyid// 'khor bar 'di las thabs gzhan med// dpa'o thams cad mnyam
206a4(rgyud): sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// dpal mkha' go rgyam tshe rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'od lda
206a5(rgyud): ma'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyar cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa / 'o// de nas rnal 'byor mchog gtso ga// mtshon cha'i brda ni bshang byaste/ sna chen ma yis rab sbyor bas// srog dang rtsol ba'i
206a6(rgyud): bzhin can// 'di la dri la bu phub mche ba// gtun shing zhags pazod pa dang // gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga po taM// bub chung dang ni bsdigs 'dzub dang // g.yer ka'i phreng dang lcags thag dang // brag dang dung khrod rdul dang ni/ ma
206a7(rgyud): dang rnga dang lpags rlod dang // sgra yi thag pa sbyangs pa dang // ro sreg bskul ba'i shing dang ni// ga ti'i dbyug pa du'i dang mgo// keng rus dang ni zor ba nyid// mig dang 'khal ma gnyi ma dang / spen pa y-i ni phung lung / 
206a8(rgyud): bon gar dang sog le dang // bab dang spud bshes lpags pa dang / sprin char 'bab dang shing lcags kyu// de ltar rnal 'byor mas ster na// phyag rgya'i lan du brjod byab// rdo rje ram gi mdung rings dang // rtse gsum da
206b1(rgyud): sta gri gug mda'// gsal zhing phub dang tho ba dang // 'khor lo cang te'u chu gi dang // dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig/ dung dang zangs dung dbyug gsum// der ni rma bya'i mjug ma dang // bya rog sgo dang pir dang ni// me yi thab
206b2(rgyud): dang ri bo dang // dbyug zung me long pi wang dang // rkang mgo lag mag glo ba dang / s+thA ma sgra can lcags sgog dang // mdos dang stogs dang 'a rgyad nga// mgo med mar nag 'bar ba dang / 'jigs byed gzugs can nas bya ba/ 
206b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i lan du mngon brjod yon// rlung gi rang bzhin ma lus pa// de'i rig rnal 'byor mi'i khyim du'o// gang dang gang gi phyag rgya'i dbyibs// de de rnal 'byor ma yis lus// de yi rang bzhin rjes bzung ngam// char gcod
206b4(rgyud): pa yang byed par 'gyur// stong pa nyid ni bco brgya dang // khyad par du yang snying rje dang // sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres dang // de bzhin du ni khams btso ba rgyad// rnal 'byor ma yi rgya mtshan nyid// skye bo thams ca
206b5(rgyud): bar bya// sna chen ma yi rab sbyor bar// rang gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin// 'byung po thams cad kyi nim// mngon par sna tshogs nor bu bzhin/ hA yin/ bskyod pa'i nA da'i 'dag/ de bzhin kha dog bltas par
206b6(rgyud): 'phyar// nA dang gnas pa'i skud pa yang // de gzugs gnyis med phreng ba can// sgrub thabs man ngag sbyor bdag nyid// dbyangs dang gsal byed las sngon byung // chos dang las dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po'i
206b7(rgyud): rang bzhin can// yoM gcini mi rtog pa las/ phya rgya bani mngon brjod nyid//  nas ni yang rung tsho shes byan sems kyi rdzu 'phrul na bzhin//  rdzas rnal 'byong ma 'dus pa// namakha 'khor tsha
206b8(rgyud): pa yin/ sum cu bdun bdag nyid yi// bdag mo sna chen ma yino// sna yo thog ma tha mar dbugs// 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba can// dbus mtshon bya mtshan nyid bral// rnal 'byor ma kun rtse bar 'gyu
207a1(rgyud): / nu ma la ni dbyangs can 'gro// dbu su gang gang 'bab pa mo// sazhu 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis// srog dang thung ser cad 'dzin pa'o// rnam shes brda ru shes nas// mtshon med yang gzhom par bya// ga
207a2(rgyud): du sems ni gtong ba na// dar ni rdzu 'phrul gyis dpag bya// ye shes ma yi mngal nyid// thams cad du ni rnam par dpyad// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbusu ni// 'dir ni slar yang bsgom par bya// shes rab tha
207a3(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin// gsang sngags yi ge rnams las byung // mngag dang dbyibs ni sngon gyi ste// jigs byed mtshan ma nag mo can// oM dza ko bA Ti lA la ba kA li b+hu d+ha dz+wa la ya ga hA na hUM ya pa hU/ hUMSh+Ta swA pa hA Ta swA hA
207a4(rgyud): hoHoM mahA nA se hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// zhes bya'i gsang snga gas las rdzogs pa// 'dod pa kun gyi rang bzhin can// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha'
207a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chenalas sna chen ma'i mtshan nyid kyi brda' cho ga'i dzes pa zhes bya ba ste
207a6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas lus kyi tsA ma ni// mdzes pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya// dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'i sbyor bas/ lha rdzas lus skyes 'thob par 'gyur// mgo dang spyi gtsug dpal ba dang // g.yon dang g.yas
207a7(rgyud): ba'i rna ba dang // rgyab kyi rgyud dang dpung pa gnyis// sna dang smin ma mig dang kha// rkan dang snying kha lag pa dang // mtshan khung nub rtsib logs dang // lte ba 'doms dang 'phongs long ga// parla dang pus mo byon rkang pa// se tshe
207a8(rgyud): mtha' chen long bu dang // rkang pa'i mthil du thams cad du// rlig pa lag pa glang po'i lpags// mkhrig ma dpal ba'i ngos dang ni/ mtshams dang lto bar shes bya ste/ rtag tu rnal 'byor mas ster na// phyag rgya
207b1(rgyud): lan gyur rnal 'byor pas// ji lta'i rim pa sbyin bya ba// gling bu pi wang khar rnga dang // glu rnga rdza rnga rol mo dang // phreng bsgeg pa gang zangs dang // spos dang dri dang lha bshos dang // 'bras bu ma chags 'bras dang sdod// 1
207b2(rgyud): bsil mchod yon mar me phul// gos dang me long gdugs dang ni// bla re rnga yab de bzhon du// ba dan me tog phreng ba dang // rgyal mtshan dang ni da gtsang khang // mdung thung phreng ba phreng phye dang // slar yang del chung da ba dang / 
207b3(rgyud): seng+ge'i gdan dang cod pan dang // rin chen sna tshogs de banano// go dA bA ra'i nye gnas gzhugs// dang pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin can// dpa' bo me yi rab spyad bas// phyag rgya thams cad rab tu bshad// lhan skyes ska
207b4(rgyud): kyis ba'i zhes bya// sum cu dag dngos bdag nyid can/ phung po khams dang yul dang ni// dbang po las dang las can te// yul gyi sgra ni de bzhin 'dir / kun la drug drug rim ji bzhin// de rnams na
207b5(rgyud): du song ye shes// lhan skyes gzhan gyi dngos pa min// tshan mo nyin mo'i rab sbyor bas// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid// lha na skyes rnal 'byor ma de rnams// sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye// dam tshi/ 
207b6(rgyud): chen po 'das pa ni// pad+ma'i lta bar rig par bya// de las skyes pa'i rang phyag rgya// yul dang yul du rnam par bzhag/ rang rig rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba// 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod yul yin// 'dzag bzhon pa ni chen po nyid/ 
207b7(rgyud): bcu gnyis mo rnams nang du son// rdo rje'i rlung ni rab zhugs pa'i// dar ni kun dur rnal 'byor skyes// 'od zer slong ba'i bde ba yi// 'pho med rnams kyis bgrod par byos// de ltar go da ba ri shes byas nas// dad pa'i dab
207b8(rgyud): po'i rdo rje can// dpa' blo ma yi rang bzhin shas// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gtso mo yin// sum cu bdun bdag nyid rdo rjer// rang ming gsang sngags ldan pa ro// sna tshogs rnams rtog zas tsan// lhan skyes brtson 'gas
208a1(rgyud): // ming giso// oM ka pA la ru pA wa~M ta yA d+hA sho ma d+ha ru Thag shrA ba lA pu ya ny+dza tsU ya hUM hUM phaT hU~M phaT swA phaT hA phaT/ oM bI mi tA ye hUM hUM phaT/ phaT swA hA/ kha dog dang byibs sngon gyi ru// rnal 'byor makun
208a2(rgyud): gyi ni bya// gang phyir brtson 'grus yang dag 'pho// mngon par brjod pa yang dag 'byung // na mkha' lding gi sbyor ldan pas// 'dir ni the tsom med par byed// sngon du bstan pa'i ts+tsha ma ka/ mchog lce ru shes par bya// phyag
208a3(rgyud): rgya'i lan gzhan med// lan gyi lce ni dbang gnyis kyi'o// sna tshogs rgyud dang lus rnams // nga yis khyod la mang bshad// rgyud 'di la na rang sbyor ba/ ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur// ma rig pa dang ldang sems dang / skye
208a4(rgyud): rmongs gang yul spyod na// sangs rgyas nyid ni mi 'thob cing // nges par dmyal ba ra 'tshed par 'gyur// de phyir gus pa'i sems bdags// bya ba gus pas legs rig bya// sngon gyi rmongs pa med 'gyur zhing //

208a6(rgyud): rab ldan pas// sems chen por ni thim par 'gyur// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' go bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// dpal
208a7(rgyud): mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phyag dang phyag rgya'i lan dpa' bo'i blo gros ma'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi ming zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu pa'o// // khams thams cad kyi tsA ma ka/ 
208a8(rgyud): kyis bstan du gsol// gang zhig de med dngos po'i brda// bshad kyi sgrub mo mnyan par gyis// so yi mchu ni yongs bzung nas// bde bas bo l-i 'jigs par byed// phyi nas ye shes rab ston pa'i// 'di skad kyi
208b1(rgyud): ni tshig smra so// phyi mo'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis// bcu po gsum la drug ldan pa'i// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni// 'di las dam tshig dbye bar bya// ka kha ga g+ha nga ga tsa mdza dz+nya nya tsa TaTha Da d+ha NaTaM ta thad d+han/ 
208b2(rgyud): pa pha ba b+ha ma paM ya ra la wa ha yaM/ zhes bya rnal 'byung mas ster na// phyag rgya'i lan ni slar yang 'di// kA khA gA b+hA dA kaHtsA tsha dza dz+ha ny+dza tsaHTa rbA DA D+ha NA Shu tA thA da d+hA nA taHpa pA bya b+hA paHyA rA lA wA hA ya
208b3(rgyud): ltar phyag rgya'i khyad shes nas// lus can kun gyi sgo glegs yin// bu ga gnyis kyi rab sbyor bar// thams cad kyang ni yi ge 'angadra // 'og dang steng du 'dus byas nas// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gnyis med// 
208b4(rgyud): cig bzhi yi bden rnams kyis// de nyid dga' ba bzhi de bzhin// sde ba bzhi dang 'khor lo bzhi// e baM ma yA sku rnams ni// rgyud 'dir mdo bstan pa ste// rgyas bshad gzhan du rtogs ngan bya// 
208b5(rgyud): mi'u thung ma yi rang sbyor bas// cho ga sngags pas shes par bya// na ma/ 'dang mnyam sgo glegs phreng // mkha' spyod ma ru spyod pa rang / ngang / kyang skad kyi rang bzhin 'dag// 'gog par nye bar
208b6(rgyud): bar gyis// gsang chen sems dang sems byung rnams// mtha' ma gsal bar mthong ba yis// rin chen rdo rje las dga'i gzugs// bltas pa'i mtsham su mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad bden pa'i sbyor bdag nyid
208b7(rgyud): bzhi po ba ni yi bdag nyid can// rA me shwa ra dang dbang por// mchog tu rmad byung shes par bya// 'dod chags chags bral rnams bsres pa// de yi skad cig las byung mon// 'byung ba lnga yi bdog nyid las/ 
208b8(rgyud): mi ni dbu su bdud rtsi'i gnas// dbugs kyi 'khor lo rtag tu bde'i// de bzhin gshegs bza' bar bya// lha dang klu rnams bud med la// mkhas pa yis ni rol pa yin// de rnams kyis ni dus kun tu/ 
209a1(rgyud): // lus can kun gyi 'pho ba yang // sgo dgu'i bdags nyid na mkha' la// de rnams bzhi 'gyur du shes bya// de ltar sgo glags rnams ni// rtag tu sum cu rtsa dga' gyur// sgo yi phye ba mi shes la// 
209a2(rgyud): skyon dang yon tan ji ltar lags// 'pho ba'i dus tshod kyi ni tshad// yang dag rab tu sbyor ba nyon// mdzes pa'i gnas ni lam bzang pos// lam ngan gyis ni srid pa'i skyon// thig le lte ba steng rnams dang // mig dang sna
209a3(rgyud): rna ba dang // bshang ba dang ni gci ba'i s+ho// sgo dgu yin mtshan nyid// lte bas 'dod pa'i mtho ris dang // thig les gzugs kyi lus can rnams// snying gis steng gi gnas kyi ni// 'gro dang 'ong bar rab tu grags// na
209a4(rgyud): sbyin dngos po sna las// rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha// gal te mig nas ye shes bgod// mi rnams mi bdag bsgyur rnams 'gyur// srid pa'i sgo yis yi dwags rnams// gtsobs dud 'gro de bzhin/ 
209a5(rgyud): brgyad ci ngos rnams kyis// lum ngan rnams ni sha ba lag/ zhan gyi sgon gsum gsum ste/ mkhas pas tsa yo kun rgyud can/ nyi shu ba'adun rnams rgya na// sprin dun ma sogs
209a6(rgyud): 'o// sa dag ye shes gsum pon/  ro'i sgom rnams kyi/ brtson 'grus dbang ba'i ngas rnams kyi// thams cad nye spyod mtshan 'od// ma cu dun bdag nyid bu mun chud kyi mdog can bsgom
209a7(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje dkar mo sogs sa bon// sgo glegs gan su bzhag par bya// shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo// sa yi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba'o// sngags kyi yige rnams gyur pa ni// oM mA ni ti ka ga Ta Na muH
209a8(rgyud): khA ri hA pA hA ri ra ta bA ma ya na tra hUM la hU~M hUM pa hUMTA pa phaT Ta pa s+phA Ta tA swA hA oM khaT ri hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ da ltar sngags las yang dag byung // don dam sbyor ba las skyes pa'o// dbar po thams cad mnyam
209b1(rgyud): sbyor las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rdo rje mkha' go de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las mi thu
209b2(rgyud): ma'i yi ge'i brda'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // slar yang mchod pa byas nas ni// yang dang yang du zhus pa nyid// dngos po ye shes kyis phyag rgya// bcom ldan
209b3(rgyud): gtso bo ji ltar lags// bdag gis mtshan nyid bshad bya yis// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// lhan skyes bde dang stong pa dang // rang gis rig dang bad ba che// chos kyi sku dang long spyod rdzogs// sprul pa dang ni
209b4(rgyud): rmad byung che// 'od gsal sems dang bsam pa dang // zhi dang myang 'das spyod skyes dang // pha rol phyin dang gnyis med dang // thar pa dang ni dod dam dang // ye shes rnam shes byang chub dang // chos dbyings gra
209b5(rgyud): khyer de bzhin du/ pad+ma nga ni chos 'gyu nga/ slar yang bdag med ma/ ros do// ni dang sA dang bla ma dang // ngag dpa'i khrul med tog spang med // 'chud len dang ni sprob shid // lakhas pas sna
209b6(rgyud): ma'i rnam grang sa// ji ltar de ltar yig dang pa// thams cad lan gyi ts+tshom ma yin// ji ltar yi ge de bzhin don// dmyal ba la sdang shes par bya// lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'i sbyor bar// rnal 'byor pa khyod kyis rgya
209b7(rgyud): 'byang bar gyur pa'i sa bon gyi// de ni nA ma ma thams cad// ge sar ye shes khams kyi ni// rang gi rang bzhin du mtshan nyid// rang mod mnyam 'byor pa// pad+ma'i snying po ru ni gnas// r-i ni rnam shes 'ag ba ste// 
209b8(rgyud): yod kyis khams rnams cad du / ming gang bdag nyid skye ba ste/ dngom po'i ye shes rnams kyis byung // deng phyug thung po thams cad kyi/ ye shes yin pa dngos kun skyes// de tso ko Ta'i gan su te/ 
210a1(rgyud): / slar yang byang chub ngan dbang po// gang du ye shes bsam med pa// deng ni bstan pas thos par 'gyur/ 'dod chags bral bas gang dag gi bi ni kun 'gro'i ye sheso// rlung rnams kyi ni mkhar rnams
210a2(rgyud): dbang po rnams kyi bde de bzhin// Ti ni rdo rje'i nus par grags// yul rnams kyi ni gong du bgod// dran pa lhan skyes ye shes// gang du yid ni rab brjod pa// der ni dbang po'i byang chub kyang // shes nas rdo rje'i tshul bdag
210a3(rgyud): nyid// de ltar de nyid nges shes nas// rang gi rang bzhin du gnas bya// chos dang 'jig rten bcas pa spang // cung zad ming med bzung bar bya// yang na dngos po kun bdag nyid // yang na thams cad rnam par spang // 
210a4(rgyud): dngos dang dngos po can yod min/ dngos po med pa gsal mthong 'gyur pa dngos dang de ma med rnam par g.yo// thams cad mi bden las skyes// / bla ma rdo rje 'dzin nal las// brgyud pa'i rim pas
210a5(rgyud): phrang bar gyis// me yid kyil 'khor du lha mo// de phyir de yi ra tsa na na lus/ sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbus// sngon gyis gzugs can skam par bya// thams cad thabs dang ldan par 'gyur/ rdza
210a6(rgyud): kyi yi ge las byung ba'o// oM hU~M sa hUM ha kA dza ro su nAn+da raM ra nA ba mul+la khA b+ha ya ka hUM rA hUM ya phaT hUM phaT swA phaT hA phaT swA hA/ oM lang+ge shwa rI ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar shes byas gsang sngags che// dngos grub
210a7(rgyud): yang bas byed pa yin// las thams cad kyi rang bzhin te// brgya lan yang gzhan du min// dngos grub ri yi mi ca ni// nyi shu rtsa brgyad sman du'o// smon dag da ni snar mar 'gyur// mgo bo dang ni lag de bzhin// nas
210a8(rgyud): so dang ni rgyal nyid dang // skag dang mchu dang gzhan pa ni// shar b+ha ga dang byang gi dge/ mi bini nag pa sa dang // sag dang ni lha mtshams dang / sman dang sbubs dang mu snyed dang / chu smad dang ni bya bzhin dang / lagazha
210b1(rgyud): mo gru de bzhin du// mon ge dang ni khrums sto dang / khram smad dang ni nam gru dang / tha skad de bzhin bra nye dang // zla ba nyi ma rA h+ya dang // sari ma nyid dang spen pa rnams// rang rang dus nyid shes par bya// the tsom med pas bzung bso
210b2(rgyud): thams cad zla ba'i spyod bdag nyid// na mkha' la ni mnyam par gnas// 'chang bzhin pa yi rab sbyor bas// sngags pas chog shes par bya// dpa'o thams cad ma'am sbyar las// rdo rje se dang bde ba'i mchog/ 
210b3(rgyud): mkha' ga de ba'i ro gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' mo rgya mtshornal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya brda'i mtshan
210b4(rgyud): nyid dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dang // ming gi cho ga'i ye shes kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// slar yang gzhan bshang bya ste// dgos dang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// gang gis rnam par shes
210b5(rgyud): tsam gyis// sgrub pos dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// zla ba nyi ma ga zas bzung bar// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags mtshan nyid// bo ta gi nag mang por smra ba ste/ pr-i ta~M po ti gi ni lan yino// ga mu
210b6(rgyud): 'gro ba'o lum po ni 'ong zhes bya ba nyid// de ci grong khyer tsa Tu ka ma zhes bya// zungs shig pa'o// hr-id ya ni dpa' bo yin// kau ra ni sod cig pa nyid/ kar+t+ti ka ni dil bu'o// a li byed pa'o// shing 'khyil pa'i sku min
210b7(rgyud): sra gaN na pa ro gzhan pa ni// man than ni bdud tse ste/ nang phrad pa'o ShA la~M ka yang / mkhar rlo mngon ga dkyil 'khor/ a mu ka ni dung khrod/ kA khi la sgo 'o rdzas na// bram ze'o pa'i rgyal po rigs/ 
210b8(rgyud): bi ra ti rje'u rigs kru ni// dmangs an+ta gdol pa can// a li phyags DA ki ni// sring mo'o mu da ka tshil// lce yis so ga de bzhin du// rdzas kyis ltogs par rig par bya// tre sna da yas bsgos pa ste
211a1(rgyud): ma gas des byaganam gnam// tshan ma ga pa me chog sa bskob dang / da paH/  na rna mtsham par/ d+ha pra zhes bya sri bzhin/ d+hA mra braM mdzan na
211a2(rgyud): dz+rak+Sha// mang bu b+han mags s+ho// ba na jig ste/ ad+hA ra ma med cag te/ rgyalaman cang phreng bzhin/ la rma gang byeg sa/ maN+Dalan mamam pa ste/ mA ma ma gyi chen mad shes pa rgya/ skye
211a3(rgyud): ni sa ma tra dzad// phyugs tshod na ni skyes/ nan mo bzhin mchen/ marnaM te b+ha ni bsgo/ sa ni tshun sngag di banas spyan gdas pa'o// kha la legs rnaMm po men// mo ma rig pa ris pa man/  kyi
211a4(rgyud): tshe srung ba la reg pa// 'khrog pa'o/ dri la reg pa ni/ de ltar da ltar gyis zhes pa// mchog tu 'ju ma shes par bya/ 'dzidi ni dgos pa spang bshad pa// mkhas pa yis ni bsub par bya// byad ba rnam
211a5(rgyud): 'argyang ma shes bya/ dpa' bo kun tu dgos par// sna tshog sa dngom po'i rang bzhin gyis// ye shes shes bya rang bzhin pa dang / bskyed pa srid pa'i sbyong ba dang // spyang dral kun rdzob de bzhin du// sgyu ma 'chu pa
211a6(rgyud): 'khor ba dang / brtse ba rang bzhin brtags pa dang // gzhan gyi dbang dang yongasu gang dang // tu ro yaM 'khor lo sgom pa dang // sems dpa' byas dang tshul khrims dang // gtong ba brtul 'dapa' de bzhin// skad rtsos mkhan pa
211a7(rgyud): sman pa nyid// zo dang khams dang smra ba po// lhag ma rten 'brel lan lag+sa ni// bcu gnyis ma rig sogs shes bya// mA lA ba yi nya gan su// shing ging ma yi rab sbyor bas// ting 'dzin dbang po'i phyogs rnams/ 
211a8(rgyud): 'jug pa med dang 'jug pa mtshungs// dbang po 'dod chags chags bral dang // yang dag phun sum tshogs bdag po// mA ma ki rdo rje'i bu gar ni// spyi gtsug gnasu yongs gnas bya// 'phyang bzhin pa kha
211b1(rgyud): 'og tu ste// kam po rje yi phyag rgyar tshul// ba ni yang dag pa'i rgyud// rang bzhin sgyu ma'i nga mtshan nyid// de ltar byas dang ma byas kun// mkhas pas dbu mang mi sdong // nu'i dngos po'i ye shes 'dir// rnal 'byor
211b2(rgyud): bdud rtsi sku can te/ sma gi rgyu dang ni 'dra ba'i gzugs// bdag nyid gzugs can mthong bar 'gyur// ye shes shin tu bas g.yegs pa// kun 'gro ba yi lhar dan byas// gang 'da'i snying rje gnyis byar med// de 'da'i
211b3(rgyud): dngos por skyes ngan bya// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dbusu// sngon can grags pa bsgom par bya// gsang sngags bden pa'i gzungs bdag nyid// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus yin pa'o// oM sa marba hA b+hA shA ta
211b4(rgyud): na tra pri sa yA ka hI ra hUM ya pa hUM Ta hUM phaT phaT Ta swA pha hA Ta swA hA/ oM drA ma tsA ye hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA// de ltar sngags gzugs bdag nyi // kun tu 'grom can shes bya// mchod pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du// lhan skyes ma
211b5(rgyud): ma 'dus pa'o// ye shes mkha'i ga dngas bdag/ rnam byed mkha' gtsam yin// dbugs ni spab byas nas ni// slar yang rkyen kun tu 'gro// sa gsum po mi ri sri no// gzug kyi gtso mo brnam
211b6(rgyud): bya// yid ni nang du chud pa yis// 'dog pa'i dngos gab bsgom par bya// slar yang rdo rje phag mo yi// rnal 'byor pa yis rigs ldan mchod// lha rdzas mi yi bde ba ni// bsdus byas pa bas de mchogo/ ma mo'i gong
211b7(rgyud): khyer nyams dga' ba/ 'gro ba'i gtso bsgom par bya// 'di 'dra'i dus kyis ye shes ni// mkhas pas a 'dru 'i nang du'o// rnal 'byer pas bsnams sems bdag nyid// stong ba nyid gzugs dmigs bcan/ 
211b8(rgyud): de yi thams cad rig byas nas// sgyu 'phrul dba'i rang mtshan nyid// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' gro de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan 'dag pos
212a1(rgyud): // 'di gsung so// dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las shing gi ma'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i brda'i cho ga 'i sa pa zhes bya ba ste le'u sum cu rtsa gsuM po
212a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po rdo rje mkha' gre khyab bdag chen// phyag rgya yang dag rig pa'i gzugs// ji lta'i rigs pas bstan du gsol// phyag rgya bzhi yi rab sbyong bas// re re la ni dgu dag ste// las dang
212a3(rgyud): chos dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po bzhi pa yin// bad rtsa ltar dkar bud med dang / pad+ma'i dri ni gtong ba yin// pad+ma dang ni ud pal dri// kha dog tsam pa ka yi yin// dza ti dang ni tsam pa'i do// de yi gzugs
212a4(rgyud): dang mdog 'dzin ma'o// ga bur dang ni tsan dan dI// pad+ma dkar po'i lpags can pa'o// ri dwags lte ba dang mnyam di// ud pa la sngon po'i mdog can ma'o// ud pal sngo langab ljang ku la// do na nyid kyi
212a5(rgyud): tshon gyi// bal+li ka dang ud pal di// mu man da ni chungs ma'o// ta ke yo da nas bye/ dmar po ban du ka lpA Tu da/ Ta li ma l+li ki dI/ slar yang namakha'i kha dang/ dam+b+hir las kyi phyan
212a6(rgyud): rgyar 'gyur// chos kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya/ bde gshegs tshogs pa la dga' ba// mthar skyes rnal 'byor ma mchog yin// bsam gtan bzlas la rgyun tu dga'// bram ze mo ru rab tu bshad// rtag tu zhus
212a7(rgyud): dang gtsang sbra dga'// rje'u rigs kyi ni bud medo// rnam rtog med bdag nyid mi mo// rtul cing dpa' bo la rtse zhing // rgyal rigs kyi ni ring bzhin te// 'di ni mchog tu gtam dga' ma'o// las la yongasu rtse ba
212a8(rgyud): dmangs rigs gyo ni rnal 'byor ma'o// bde gshegs lus me rje suM chags/ mchog tu 'thud ma'i rnal 'byor ma'o// mkhas pa yi ni phyogasasu gsol/ chos kyi gan su khro med pa'o// dpa' po yi ni/ 
212b1(rgyud): rigasu skyes// rtag par sha ni za ma yin// bde bar gshegs pa'i lam srung ma// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa byed// khro ba rnams la mi khro zhing // mnyes par byed pa'i khung khyer ma'o// de ltar chos kyi phyag
212b2(rgyud): rgya ste// dam tshig phyag mngon brjod bya/ gtor ma mchod pa la dga' ma// dam tshig can du de mngon brjod// rab gnas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // don dam pa la dga' ma'o// 'gro ba rnams la dbang bskur
212b3(rgyud): mdzan la 'byor dmas tshigs can mar gags// chos kyi 'khor por rab bskor zhing // rtag tu dam tshig skyeng ma'o// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbu sa// mchog tu mang byung rtsen ma'o// dus thams cad du ga
212b4(rgyud): dang bcas// rab tu rgyas pa'i bzhis byed ma'i// rnab 'byo/ bu rnams bu bzhin sdang // rdo rje rnapa 'byor mdzod shes// dus suni du med ma// mtshan cha 'thebs pa'i mong can mar// mi mo rtag tu
212b5(rgyud): 'gro bzhin du// dam tshig brda' ni skyong ma ste// de ltar de tshig phyag rgya chen po rab bshad bya// lhan skyes zhing skyes lha mo dang // sngags skyes 'jig rten mgon po ma// sbyor skyes gnas skyes
212b6(rgyud): bzhin du// dam tshig lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma// pad can ma ni dus kun tu// phyag chen po rab bsngags pa'o// de ltar phyag rgya'i rang bzhin te// de mngon tshul bdag phyag rgya lan// gang zhig gang gi mdog dang / 
212b7(rgyud): de yi de ltar tshul dan bya// sa srungs ma yi rab sbyor bas// kA ma rU ba shes rab dbang // sems can kun gyi dgos pa'i phyir// phyag rgya 'dzin ba sgrub par bya// e yig ye shes rlung rnams ni// zla ba'i dkyi
212b8(rgyud): 'khor la rab zhugs// 'dod chags me yis rang bzhin bdeg/ thugs kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma// rdo rje gas pa'i las bzhengs ca// khams thams cad pa' pho med ma'o// 'das dang ma byon sa ng+yas
213a1(rgyud): // de dag sems can chen no// sems ni re re la yang ni/ sum cu rtsa drug las can ma'o// lus can gzugs ni des bzhin// zhing du kya la sogs pa'i gzugs chen po'i sngags kyi tshul
213a2(rgyud): bdag tu// sa la da ltar nyid rol 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs la yang // gzugs dang gzugs med shes mi 'gyur// gzhan gyi gzugs byas lha mo// sangs rgyas lam ni shes byed ma'o// dbang
213a3(rgyud): kun tu 'gro sangs rgyas// gang phyi shes rab pa rom phyin// de ltar de nyid nges shes pas// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs dang mtshungs// ye shes 'khor lor lha mo rnams// bdag mo 'dod pa kun sbyin ma/ 
213a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khong 'khor lo dbus ni// sngags kyi gan dgas can du byung ba'o// oM dza maT drAka ka lA la yab man+ta ku gaHni ya te hUM dza hUM la phaT hUM sA pha rA Ta ya swA hA/ oM oM rA ba tI
213a5(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// zhes bya'i sngags kyi sa bon du/ chog sbyin ma ni byung ba ste// kha dog dbyings ni sngon gyi can// ji ltar kunas thams cad du'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ 
213a6(rgyud): rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' go de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung mo// dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las sa srungs mi'i sgo'i phyag rgya'i
