235b4(rgyud): 'gyur// ra yi yi ges khrag khams// hA yig ri skye su la dod// s+ya yig di yi lo ma ste// pa yig lpags pa ru ni 'dod// ra yig g+han d+ha kar rab bshad// me yig me tog tu ngan bya// ra yig rA
235b5(rgyud): Nade bzhin// slar yang me yi yi ge shas yig kun tu dum sa skyes// rba yig yi ge rtsar 'dod// d+ma'i yi ge sdus skyes pa sha da// ni yig dri yi mar khu'o// sa yi yi ge so yi rdul// pa yi
235b6(rgyud): ge rgya mtsho skyes// spri yig pa mo de bzhin du// da yig snying po'i gabu'o// sgra dang gzugs yongs byung ba// khrag khu no bi no'i bar dag tu 'o// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dkar ba// rang rig pad+mar son pa'o/ 
235b7(rgyud): srub dang bsrab pa'i sbyor rnams kyis// rang 'byung gis ni rnam bsres pa'o// dbus ma'i mchog dbugs kyang ni// skad cig dmu mar bzung ba'o// ril bu rtag tu mchod pa ni// bdud rtsi gsang ba'i chu yin
235b8(rgyud): pe nya lhan skyes bdag nyid ni// dbang gnyis spyod las rtse ba'o// yid ni nang du song ba ni// khams rnams kyang ni zhu ba'o// rang khu big les sangs rgyas rnams// zhu gang sbyor ba las byung ba'o// sbrang rtsi khrag pa
236a1(rgyud): / gzung bcas// bcu drug 'dod ma las byung ba'o// tshogs dbus rab tu zhugs rnams kyis// 'di kun lhan skyes sbyar ba'o// ming med mthe bos khar bzhug pa// snyoms par 'jug las khrag byung ba'o// 
236a2(rgyud): zhi ba'i btung ba myang ba ni// 'bo ba'i dus las ma lus gang // 'di rnams bdud rtsi lngar 'gyur ba// 'phos las byung ba'i mi'i ming khu// mchod pazhi de bzhin bya ba ni// bzhi mnyamag bung bcas pa'o// lha dang mi
236a3(rgyud): rnams bad pa ni// dga' bkun las byung ba'o// bcu dag cha shas rin cheni// thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin can// de ltang dpa' bo zad ni// khams kyi rdzas rnams sbyar bya// bcud len de las byung ba ste// ga ca'o
236a4(rgyud): nas me rlung gis// mdzad pa dang ni bsad dbyas nas// 2rab dang ni bzag de bzhin// mdzad pa byang chub mdzag pa ste/ bsad pa yis kyang 'pho mod 'gyung// 'bo brtsa rnams kun tu ste// gzag
236a5(rgyud): blte ba'i pad+ma'o// de rnams bcing ba byas pa yis// mas thams cad du bajug par bya/ bsang ba dngos po gtam pa ste/ rgya sa pa 'jig rten khams rnamasu// sbyin bsregs mi gdong shes
236a6(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur nyid 'thob par gyis// thab tu bdud rtsi bsreg bya ste// 'jam po'i rdo rje mngon sum du// rnal 'byor ldan pas mthong bar 'gyur// sa thams cad la 'khyer bar byed// sreg ni gang gis chos
236a7(rgyud): can che// chos ni kun tu 'ge bar 'gyur// de yi rang bzhin brtson chen ma// sum cu bdun bdag nyid mchog tu// dkyil 'khor sngags las nges rdzogs pa// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid mchog lha mo che
236a8(rgyud): mo kha dog dkar// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ma// sems can thams cad dbang re gyur dang // 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur/ oM ga i ran+da sa dzA ta la bA sad rba pra sa bA tA da tA ma ne hA d+hu ma
236b1(rgyud): te phaT hUM swA phaT hA phaT swAhA oM mahA bir+ya yai huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags kyi de nyid bdag/ lha thams cad kyi sa ba nau// 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo'i di'i tshe ni// ri'u mig gcig dman lnga bcu ste// kha ches
236b2(rgyud): yang dag po byas nas// gsang sngags phreng ba 'di dgod bya// lugs las bzlog pas gnod mdzes sngags// ji lta'i rim pas dgod par bya// de tshe mi yi gzugs byas nas// slar yang zlum po sbyin par bya// 
236b3(rgyud): de la rtsa ba'i sngags bris nas// bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug pa'o// dbus kyi dus bur bsgrub bya ni// de yi sngags kyi nang bcug pa'o// gro ga sogasu sngags pas de// phyi dang gsang bar/ mtshon par bya// de ltar
236b4(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor rab sbyar bas// sa gsum po la bsgom bar bya// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyong las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' ga de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos
236b5(rgyud): 'di gsung so// 'di ni dpal mkha' go rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las brtson 'grus chen mo'i rab tu spro ra ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsang ba'i bcud len la sogs pa dang
236b6(rgyud): rgyas pa'i las dpal yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin ha ru ka'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas dpa' bo phyag rdor sogs// sngags pa thams cad bzhengs rnams kyis/ 
236b7(rgyud): bstod dang mchod dang phyag bcas pas// phag mo rab tu sad par byed// bdag gi ma yin lha mo kyes// lha mo kun gyis rab mchod ma// khyod ni 'di rnams kun gyi ma// ye shes snying mo phyag 'tshal 'dang // sems
236b8(rgyud): can kun la snying rje yi// gzugasu rang gis sprul pa mo// bdag la kun tu thugs rje yi// bka' rin chen po mdzad par rigs// bde ba chen po yongs bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan bdag po la de'o// rgyud thams cad kyi
237a1(rgyud): las tshogs kyi// sgrub pa'i thabs ni mi 'tshal to// gal te ji srid rgyud rgyud du// las thams cad ni bstan pa ni/ rnam dag ye shes thob rnams kyi// de tshe 'di ci phyir gsungs// rgyud 'di nyid du
237a2(rgyud): 'jug 'gyur bar// skye bo thad mi rigs// slar yang bshad pa skyod dang bcas// bdug gis ma shas the tsom mchis// phag mo ci yang mi gsung bas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zhugs nas// de yi ye shesu 'gyu
237a3(rgyud): te/ de yis lan ni gsung bar mdzad// bcom ldan chos kan bdag nyis kyi// ting 'dzin gyi yid ni// byas nas gsung ni brjod shad pa// phag mo'i ris thams cad kyiso// kya kye dpa' bo thams cad rnams// 
237a4(rgyud): shes shes bya gnyis 'dres pa'i// khyed kyi ye shes gang ma thong ba// de ni da dang de ru thim// 'on kyang so sor 'jug byed pa// sems can sna tshogs bsam paso// dbye ba med nyid rgyud chen por
237a5(rgyud): mkha' gro sdom pa dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor rgyud rnam sa ni// 'dus pa la sogs don chen po// de rnams kyis ni rgyud la de yi// sna tshogs don ni mngon brjod pa// de thad kyis las kyi
237a6(rgyud): tshogs// ldan pas rab tu gsal bar byed// rgyud du brjod bya brjod pa por// de yis phra mong 'jug par byed// nga pe'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid can// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs ldan// de la rnam par shes pa
237a7(rgyud): chos// thod pa yi ni dum bur bshad// sems can kun gyi las dang ni// nyon mongs bde bar shes par bya// gzhan du kun mkhyen rgyud la ni// yi ge skye bar mi 'gyuraro// lo gcig gi ni bar gyi ni// zla ba bcas
237a8(rgyud): de shes bya// dus tshod dag gi 'khor los bsgyur// san rmi lam lta bung mchog/ mi shes rims bsgos pa yis// de rnams kyi ni 'di mi rig/ sngar de mo'i rim pa yis// rnam par shes pa shes bzhin pang // 
237b1(rgyud): brag gnyis la stong dang mi// drug brgya yis ni lhag pa'o// dbugs kyi chu tshod drug cu la// zhag gcig du ni rab tu gags// snang do la'i dbugs rnams kyis// bskyung bas do la mtshan pa'o// gnyis kyi dbugs ni blo ldan
237b2(rgyud): gyis// phyir 'byung nang 'jug thim par 'gyur// rnal 'byer ba yis dgongs 'gyur te// kun mkhyen nyid nyer 'od min// bla zhing phra ba'i rnab 'byor du// gnas nas thams cad rnam par spyad// de yis ang ka phyi rol du// sa
237b3(rgyud): la bcu gnyis bzhag par bya// ji ltar nyi ma'i dbye bshad pa// yan lag bcu gnyis kyang de bzhin// rgyu skar dang ni bza' rnams kyi// 'char ba dus thams cad du'o// re re yi ni khams kyi ni// rang gi dusu 'ang 'chang bar
237b4(rgyud): 'gyur// du su 'chi dang dab nid gzhan// rim pa 'di yis lachad par 'gyur // da t+yA la sogs sbyor shes pas// 'di ni sbyor ba phyi ma la'o// nyi ma byang du bgrod pa yi// rgyal gyi zla ba sogs brtsams nas
237b5(rgyud): zla ba bcu gnyis de ltang du// rim pa rim pas bzhag padabya/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs brtsams nas/ snga gronas brtse blo lnga/ gyis// gsum laM bcu gsum da bzhin te// bzhi pa yang niradz+ra
237b6(rgyud): bzhi pa lnga pa bco lnga pa ru ni// bshad par bya yis da lta nyon// 'di rnams mnyam zhing mnyam ldan par// sgrub pos 'thun par bya ba yin// de la ma rig 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs// 
237b7(rgyud): mched drug dang reg pa dang // tshor ba dang ni srid bzhin// nye bar len dang srid pa dang // skye ba dang ni rga shi'o// de bzhin de hi ta sogs kyis// chu srin la sogs rA si rnams// bcu gnyis nyid du 'dod par bya// theg mar
237b8(rgyud): yig mu srin dang // de hi de bzhin gzhan// gnyis par mo hi ta rum pa// 'du byed tu ni gsal bar 'gro// gsum par bzang po dang ni nyi// rnam par shes par de rig bya/ bzhi par khru ma chog dang ni lug/ ming nga
238a1(rgyud): // gzugasu 'dod par bya// lnga pa ru ni ru sprul te// bri Sha skye mched drug mchog// drug pang chu srin dang 'khrig pa// rtag tu reg pa ru ni 'gro// bdun par dan karka Ta// de bzhin du ni tshor ba mchog/ brgya
238a2(rgyud): mi kir seng ge/ mchog tu 'thun ma sred pa'o// dgu par b+hi da dang bu mo// nye bar len pa du ni 'dod // bcu pa sems g.yengs pa dang srang // srid pa ru na rab tu brjod// bcu gcig ba ru rmi lam dang // dwi shrI ka dang skye
238a3(rgyud): bzhin// bcu gnyis pa ru sa'i dbang phyug/ gzhu dang rgas shing shi ba'o// de ltar sa'i dbang phyug sogs dang // rmi lam la sogs de bzhin gzhan// g.yang sogs b+hib+ho dr-i ka la sogs// de bzhin mi kar sogs da
238a4(rgyud): raN+Da sogs dang chu srin sogs// du sbal sogs dang khrumatsho ga sogs// bzang po sogs dang rmongs pa sogs// dpyir zla ba rnams bcu gnyis// 'di rnams nyi mar gang skyes pa// de yi ma
238a5(rgyud): nyid du ni 'dod// skad cig thang cig yud tsam du// chad pa'i shing du mtshon par bya// mig phye btsums par son pas kyang / shi na tu phra ba'i dus laso// la te sems ni ting 'dzin gnas/ 
238a6(rgyud): gyis sacu gnyis par ro// yang na ting 'dzin mi gnas pa// bang ma yi ni 'gro bar 'dod// dman pas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i// skye bo thams cad 'gro ba'o// mngon ma rnams kyi bde sdug bsngal/ las kyis
238a7(rgyud): kun tu ling spyod// gnyi su med pa'i dus can gyis// thams cad rang bzhin sa la skye// de ltar yin kyang dang skyes pa'i// rang gi las kyis 'bras bu za// de ltar rnam par bzung tsam gyis// thod pa'i dum/ 
238a8(rgyud): bu'i rnal 'byor ldan/ sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pa yis// khams kyi dbusu 'bab pa'o// rlung gi kun spyod du su ni// rnal 'byor pa ni skye bar 'gyur// nyi ma dgu dang nA ba dang // kho na mkhas pas
238b1(rgyud): bya/ de la rgyal srid rtsom par 'gyur// de lta nyid the tshom med// ro hi ta yi nyi ma smras// sa yis dbang phyug la 'chi 'gyur// sa yi kun spyod dus skyes pa// nyi ma brgyad dang zla ba dang // lo gcig na ni ma shin
238b2(rgyud): byang chub sems par the tsho med// rmi lam kun spyod du su// dpa' zhing rtul pod pha rol gnon// bsod nams dang ni sdig nyid 'dres// lnga bcu rtsa bzhin 'chi'o// sems g.yeng ba la dag yis gsod // de yi
238b3(rgyud): nyi mar skyes pa po// dag cu rtsa ba ni'o zla bstan// gal te shi bar ma gyur na// de ni 'byor chung phyi nas ni// phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba ste// b+hi tri'i nyin mo 'chi ba yin// de'i tshe'i nyi ma la skyes pa/ lnga pa gnyis
238b4(rgyud): dang gsum gcig// kha~M ni shi bar ma gyur na// de la 'dod do// kun dman zhing // ba dang mi ni bsod par ste// dka' thub dang ni 'dres pa yis// mi ki ra la rang khyim 'tsho// gang zhig de nyid 'dir skyes
238b5(rgyud): ra gnyis lnga gsum dgu'i lon no// de ltar gal te mchi/ na// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa mnyam// lugs sa mo la chur 'chi gang zhig de'i tshe nyi mar skyes// gnyis dang gsum gyi lon
238b6(rgyud): ni ma shin ni rje ldan te// sdig pa byed po nad dang ldan// mi dang mi mo rnams skal bzang // chu srin la 'chid nyid la// skyes pa bcu lnga gsum lnga yi// nyi ma zla ba lo rnams la// ma shin ni mngon na yang // yon
238b7(rgyud): yongs rdzogs te// mtha' skyeng ba yi rgyal por 'gro// ru sbal dang ni 'khrig par 'chi// de'i tshe nyi ma la skyes pa// gnyis brgyad dgu yi lo na 'chi// da ni shi bar me gyur na// tha ma la sems can du shes bya// dman
238b8(rgyud): dang gtso bor 'gro ba'o// khyu mchog la ni rang khyim 'chi/ de yi nyi mi la skyes pa// gnyis dang brgyad dang dgu ya ni// lon mkhas pas ma shi na// dbang phyug thams cad phun chog shing // dri sogs ni lta
239a1(rgyud): // ngan// bzang po la ni bsad nas 'chi// de nyid nyi ma la skyes pa// lnga dang dgu dang btsun ni// skye bo 'dir ni ma shi na// phongs shing chas ni phun sum tshogs// thams cad kyi ni rgyan pa ste// gti mug la
239a2(rgyud): 'pho'o// de yi nyi ma la skyes pa// gnyis dgu'i zla ba dang po lo// gal te de tshe ma shi na// thams cad dman zhing dmyal bar te// bas ma ngan sdig pa'i bdag nyid can// rkun mo la sogs pas bsad nas// ri ti ta yi
239a3(rgyud): mar 'chi// de ltar mdor bsdus shes bya ste// gal te ting 'dzin ma mthob na'o// skye rnams mngon sum byed pa yi// las rnams gzhan du 'thob pa yin// de nyid nye bar gang zhig na// de ni legs par bsrung bya ste// 
239a4(rgyud): bshad pa'i rim pa'i nyi ma la// 'grol bar 'di la the che ma med// thod pa'i dum bu rang nyid ni// 'di rnams gzhan byed bsgom par bya// mkha' gror bgrod pa'i gang zhig rtsa// de'i dbus bdas
239a5(rgyud): nyid spyad par byed// de ni sgonga'i rigs shes bya// gto ba skyod pas bsrung bar bya// rnal 'byar ba lus 'dzin par 'gyur/ dari na mthe'u chung bskyod par bya// rkang mthil dang ni spyi bor sgo/ 
239a6(rgyud): mtshams rnams kun tu bsrung bar bya// A li ka li mnyam byas nas// khams rnams la ni thim par bya// rnam par shes pa mi g.yo ste// thams cad de'i rang bzhin du bya// mgo bo'i dbus las nges par la
239a7(rgyud): 'og tu kha bltas 'bab 'gyur 'gro// de yi dbus phyogs phun tshogs pa// rnal 'byor pa de srid mthar 'grol// a ba d+hA ti dus grangasu// ji ltar gsal bar bshad par 'gyur// zla phyed lo gsum shes
239a8(rgyud): bya ba// skye ba'i dusu 'chi ba yin// lo brgya rnams kyi gang zhig tshad// de rnams dbusu brtag par bya// ro ma brkyang ma gnyis dag gi 'ang // skye ba'i zla ba nyid mtshor bya// zla ba zla bar 'joms 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa
239b1(rgyud): bzhi'iri cha can no// dbugs ni gcig gi grangs kyang ni// de phyir lo gnyis las gnyis 'gyur// sum 'gyur sogs pas thams cad rnams// de nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'gyur// mkha' bug mig tu shes par bya// phyi
239b2(rgyud): nas chu ched rnam su 'gro/ lo ni bcu gnyis bar du ni// lnga lnga yi yang chu tshod do// drug cu'i la nas nyi ma 'phel// sum cu rtsa bdun zla byed gsung// lnga lnga ru ni 'phel ba rnams// nyin mo'i chu tshod ang ka bya// skyes
239b3(rgyud): kun gyi 'chi ba ni// zla byed gsum deng lon shes// nyi shu rtsa bzhi ri lo rnams kyis// gang phyir mi rnams spyod ldan 'gro// sa yi khyim du zhugs nas ni// yid kyis 'chib slub ste// dpal ha ru ka gnas zhugs pa
239b4(rgyud): yaM thod pa'i dum bu bsam par bya// bgrang ba'i rim pa rnal 'byor gyis// nyin nag chu tshod mtshon par bya// ji lta'i dus mtshon pa yis// rim gyis rim gyis bya ba yin// byang du bgod pa'i dus ched du/ 
239b5(rgyud): lha mo rgyas sogs rim pa'o// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyu ra dang bzhi// mkhas pas nyin mo'i chu chod// mnyam pa'i dusu shes bya ba// rang gi dus sbyor du 'chad 'gyur// bcu pi gsum dang ngag
239b6(rgyud): ste rnga mtshan mo'i chu tshod rtsom par byed// rgyal dus kyi bye brag gis// de yi dbus las shes par bya// bcu la gnyis kyi bsgyur dang drag/ nyan rnams chu tshod ang ka bya// bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang bzhi// 
239b7(rgyud): ma'i rgu tsho du ni brtag/ bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang brgyad// nyi ma rnams kyi chu tshod bzhin// bcu la gsum bsgyur gnyis gcig pu// mtshan mo'i chu ched du ni brtags// mnyam dus dbu su gnyis sbyar nas
239b8(rgyud): sum cu gcig pur rab tu brtags// sum cu rnam pa gnyis rnams kyis// nyi na dag gi chu tshod 'byed// bcu pi rnam gsum gnyis gcig pu// nyin mo rnams kyi nyi mar brtags/ bcu po gnyis rnams dang ni
240a1(rgyud): / brgyad// mtshan mo yi ni ad ka bya// bcu po rnams gsum ang ka la// bzhi dang yang dag ldan pa'o// bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drung // mtshan mo'i chached ang ka bya// bcu la gsum gyi
240a2(rgyud): basbyang dang drag/ nyin dag ye shes can gyi 'ang nyin// btsu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang ba ni// rdul can rnams kyi chu tshod grags// lho ru bgrod pa rang bshad// nam zla'i dus kyis shes par 'byung // bcu la
240a3(rgyud): gsum gyis bsgyur dang ba ni// nyin byed chu tshod yongasu bshad// bcu la gnyis bsgyur dang drug// mtshan mo ri de bzhin mtshon par bya// bcu la gsum bsgyur gnyis gcig pu// nyin rnams chu tshad de bzhi
240a4(rgyud): brtul gnyis bsgyur dang drug/ mtshan mo'i cha tshod grags// bcu la gsum bsgyur pas mtshon pa// mnyam sogs chu tshod de bzhin te// bcu la gsum bsgyur mtshan rnams kyi
240a5(rgyud): bi shu'i dbu mu gnyis de bzhin// bcu la gnyis kyis/ bsgyur dang brgyad// nyid rnams kyi ni nyin mor sems// bcu po gsu ma 'gyur gnyis gcig pu// rdul can chu tshad du brtag so// cu
240a6(rgyud): po gnyis 'gyur dang ni dag/ nyin rnams chu tshod rim pa so// bcu po sum 'gyur dang ni bzhi// rdul can chu tshod rnams de bzhin// sum brgya de bzhin dag tu ni// chu tshod rnams kyi dbugs bska // chu tshod
240a7(rgyud): grangs ni drug cu ni// zhag gcig tu ni rnam par brjod// zla rnams rim pa ji lta bas// de bzhi ni rims rnams kyis mtsha no// chu tshed dbugs sogs yongs rdzogs pa// rim pas 'phel dang 'cha
240a8(rgyud): ste// las dang las min khyad par gyis// dbugs ni roms pas yongasu bzung // de ltar nam kha' mkhar de bzhin// zla migo chu tshod de bzhin du// lo gcig gir ni shes par bya// zhag rnams chu tsho
240b1(rgyud): mtshon paso// da ltar byas pas rnal 'bor pa// dus kyi 'chi ba slu bar 'gyur// lte ba'i dbu su pad+ma che// ji ltar rdo rje phag mo'o// mtshams kun son pa'i pad+ma la// ba mo dang 'ad 'dzag par bya// lta ba'i dbus
240b2(rgyud): mtha' bcu gnyis// 'gro ba 'ong ba byed pa nyid// srog gi thig le de bsod pa'ang / mtshams kun du ni 'bab pa can// blo ldan lo gcig sbyor ba yis// de nyid du ni thim par bya// til mang ma ni 'bar ba mi
240b3(rgyud): gzugs can kha ni 'og tu bltas// chu shing me tog dang 'dra ba// mkhas pa yis ni 'phyang bzhin pa'o// lte bar A yi rnam pa'i gzugs// thung dang ring po 'bar ma'i bdag/ phyag rgya lhan cig skyes pa'i gzum
240b4(rgyud): dbyangs dang phyi mo gnyis med gnas// sbom dang sprun mo bshad pa// rtul po bang ma rjod po dang // lhag par rjo nga zhin lha garno// thams cad de rnam su brtag so// gang phyi rang bdag nyid kyi bsku
240b5(rgyud): de phyir gzhan gyis kyang bsgrub bya// nub mthu 'jiga'adi nyid la// skye bo kun la yid ches byed// phyi nas gdul bya bal gro ba yin// rang gzhan gyis sems brnyan pas// dbyangs bcus
240b6(rgyud): ni thob byas nas// dge dang mi dge bshad par bya// 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams no// dbyangs kyi bdag po mtshan par bya// oM l-ig gis ni ye shes dang / mkhas pa chos don thams cad 'thob// a yig mi
240b7(rgyud): 'ching ba dang // rgas dpa'achi bar rnam nges bshad// srid pa'i 'jigs pa ma lus pa// mthong 'gyur lam las nyams par 'gyur// i yi yi ge yongs thob pas// sa yi dbang phyug du ni 'go// I yi
240b8(rgyud): yi ge yang dag 'thob// myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur// u yi yi ga thob pa yis// skye ba ngan par 'gyur 'gro ba'o// A yi yi ge gal te 'thob// yul la zhen pa can du 'gro/ e yi yi ge yang dag
241a1(rgyud): / 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'go// oM yi yi ge sems rmongs zhing // 'gro ba drug sogs 'jig par 'gyur// oM yig pha rol phyin pa yi// der ni sa 'thob rnam nges ston// o yig ang ka
241a2(rgyud): thob pa yis// dam tshig nyams par 'gob yin// aM yig byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mthong bas skad cig la dgol 'gyur// aHyig yang dag thob pa yis// phung po khams la the tsham za// de la sos
241a3(rgyud): pa ma lus pa// ma gsungs kyang ni bsgrub par bya// bla ma bstan bcas rang nyid// rnam gsum chos kyis yid ches bya// zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i dus bu can gyi rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs dang
241a4(rgyud): 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi ming can te zagasade 'cha'o// rab tu byed pa dang po'o// de nas keng rus chen po yi/ mtshan nyid bdag gis bshad bye/ bong 'dra'i rnal 'byor bad/ 
241a5(rgyud): nyid kyis// yid kyi shugs ni 'jug med bya// khams mnyam pa yi ra bo ni// spyi bo'i gan su bsgoms pa nyid// pang stsal skud pa kha 'ag bltas// glog ni kun tu 'gro ba mo// de yi dbu su
241a6(rgyud): mo che bong bu'i dbyibs can bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag tshogs// mchod pa chen po bsam par bya// de yi dbus dpa' chen po// rkeng rus chen po'i sbyor bso// skud pa rnams kyis
241a7(rgyud): dbus// srab dang bsrub pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// hA yig rnam pa yi ni gzugs// mgo las skud pa gcig po ste// me long rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// zod pa'i dbusu ngal bso bya// bum pa'i 'dud rtsi'i
241a8(rgyud): rgyun rnams kyis// khung bu'i dbu su'ang 'dzag par 'gyur// thi ma dang long spyod sogs dngos pos// sems kyi 'god pa bstan par bya// khung der bong bu'i rnal 'byor gyis// skye ba bdun yang mthong bar 'gyur
241b1(rgyud): ma lus byung ba'i dbyibs gsum dang // ma las byung ba gsum de bzhin// khams thams cad dang bdun po de// rnal 'byor sgom pas mthong bar 'gyur// bde ba'i rang bzhin khams kun gyis// keng rus chen po yang
241b2(rgyud): ngag byung // lA ma la sogs bsgoms pa yis// de la gnas pa'i gzugs mthong 'gyur// bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du// khrag gi nal can rtse gsum du// maM son pa yang dang / rnam papa shes/ tshe
241b3(rgyud): bsang mthong bar 'gyur// snga mar gla bo che sogs pa// dpa' rang bdag nyid kyis de mthong // chen po'i rtsa rnams thams cad du// keng dus srog ni nges 'gro bya// de bskyod bong bur shes bya ste// sna tshogs ra
241b4(rgyud): bzhin de mthong 'gyur// sa lu la sogs bza' ba'i dngos yang de dang 'dra bar dngos po kun// mthong ste de na yod pa min// khams thams cad kyang 'khrel pa'o// ji ltar skyes bur dus rnams kyis// gang chen
241b5(rgyud): khams kyi shes par bya// de bzhin kang rus che rnams kyis// sa li la sogs khams rkyen gyis// rang bzhin 'jig rte na pa dmigs pas// rang bdag nyid kyi gzugs de mthong // nam
241b6(rgyud): pa sna tshogs rigs de rnams// rnal 'byor 'dzin rnams kyis shes bya// ma rigs sogs nyid so la// de rnams kyis ni nang du grag/ sa// rims la sogs pa'i nad tsam gyis// nad chen rnam par mchod
241b7(rgyud): par bya// de la ma rig nyi mi'i nang // legs pa rnams kyis de bsrang bya// 'pho ba bco lnga pa la ni// 'chi 'am las ni dge mi dge/ ye shes me yi bdag nyid ches// nub lnga rnams ni gol bar 'gyur // rga shi
241b8(rgyud): yin dus ni// rabo pa gsum na 'chi ba ste/ yang na dge dang mi dge ba'i// las kyi bag chags mthong bar 'gyur// rang rig bde 'a bzung ba yis// nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur// skye bo'i nyi ma'i 'chi ba ni/ 
242a1(rgyud): / 'pho pa gsum pa na yang ste// las ni dge mi dger 'gro ba/ nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur// srid pa yi ni 'pho gsum na// 'chi bar 'gyur mtshan mo ni// lda na de rnams grol bar 'gyur// ya
242a2(rgyud): na da ni grol te// 'das pa bzhi pa'i dus rnamasu// bde ba de kun rtogs par gyis// de lta'i rigs 'gyur de rnamasu// ji lta'i rim pas shes par bya// len pa'i 'chi ba'i 'ab ba ni// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa
242a3(rgyud): na'o// gal te las ni dge mi dges// mtshan mo bcu na go bar 'gyur// bsod nams phun sum tshogs kun dang // b+h+rUM dang ldan pas 'pho ba med bsgrub// sred pa'i 'pho ba gsum na mchi// las ni dge dang mi
242a4(rgyud): dag ste/ nor bu'i nang sen la blta bya// mtshan mo bdun nangs gol te// nga yi ga la thetsom med// tshor ba'i 'pho ba ldan/ na ni// 'tsho 'gyur las kyang de bzhin/ dgu dang bcu dag na gal te/ 
242a5(rgyud): rdo rje pang dbus son pa'o// reg pa'i nyan mo'i 'pho ba/ ni// brgyud na 'chi ba ma shes par bya// de ltar las dge mi dge slong// yan lag dag gos thim par bya// gcig dman nyi shu nyi ma na/ 
242a6(rgyud): grol ba 'am yang na mi gro lo// skye mched dag gi 'chi ba ni// las dge mi dges blta bya ste// 'pho ba brgyad na shes par bya// khams kyi nad rnams de mthob 'gyur// nub bcu na ni grol 'gyur te// 'khor
242a7(rgyud): bzhi ru thim par bya// ming dang gzugs la 'chi ba'i las// gsum pa 'am ni lnga pa yi// 'pho ba dag ni shes par bya// mtshan mo brgyad na 'gro ba'o// sems ni thig le'i gnas son par// rten par gyur
242a8(rgyud): pa'i tshig bya// rnam par shes pa'i 'chi ba'i las// slar yang brgyad dang bcu pa yi// 'pho bar sa la shes par bya// yang na de nyid la 'grol to// bcu drug phyed phyed kyi gzugs can ye shes rlung gis bzul
242b1(rgyud): bar bya// 'du byed kyi ni'i'achi ba'i las// gsum dang bdun gyi de bzhin du// bltas par gyur pas 'pho ba yin// de yi lta bas gol bar 'gyur// thig le gnyis ni shes byas nas// steng du 'gro bas thim par bya
242b2(rgyud): 'di yis na de dang 'chi mang 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chag// sum cu bdun bdag nyid dge ba// slar yang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// keng rus chen po'i gtso bo yi// rnal 'byor ba yis thams cad
242b3(rgyud): mthong // zhes bya ba ni bong bu'i rnal 'byor la keng rus chen po sgom pa po'i// man ngag de kho na nyid dang ldan pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// de nas keng rus kyi sbyin pas// yul yul rang gi skye gnas skyes
242b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' gtso me// ye shes ldan pas shes par bya// an+ta dgod par rdul lha mo// rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi gtso// de yi gnas gnas lha mo// ka dam shing la dril chen ma// l+h+wam
242b5(rgyud): de yi rtag dpa' bo// zhing skyong zhal chen po yin no// king rus bde ba'i sgyu ma yi// bdag nyid cha las de 'byung 'gyur// de rnams keng rus kyis rgyas btab// ur+yan bu mi las steng som/ 
242b6(rgyud): rang khams las bzhengs rnam par shes// rim gyis yul thams cad du laH/ kal+lA 'i ri ding ba ru n+ya// de ko Tabi ta dza kaM/ e ru n+ya dang de nas grong // e la'i gong da khan// ma rU'i gang dang de bzhin du/ 
242b7(rgyud): puN+Da ba d+ha na yi zhing // dza yan+ti dang briSh+Ta grong // so so pa re dang de bzhin// u D+yan dang ni 'bar ba 'dzin// k+Shi re shi dang sgyu ma'i gong // a bu ka dang rgyal po'i khab// bod kyi yul dang de bzhon du mA la be dang bu
242b8(rgyud): lir sogs// nyi shu bzhi'i gnas yin no// ri yi rtse dang tA li'i shing // b+ha Ta a mra gseng de bzhin// ral pa'i shing dang gzhan gnon dang // ri yi rtse mor yang dag rten// thang chen po dang rtsa khung dang // 
243a1(rgyud): / shrat+tha dang khang pa brtsegs// u dum par shal ma li// karany+dza mya ngan med la rten// gser shing dang ni sA la dang // tsu ta d+ha tu di la la ki/ drag brtsegs pa dang sbrang rtsi'i shing // sngon du yang dag
243a2(rgyud): rten pa'o// rdul gyi skye gnas tshol ba'i lus// stobs chen dang ni rnal 'byor gnas// zod pa las dang rdul rab gtum// skye gnas dpa' bi tshil pa'i lus// stobs chen rnams deng khrag de bzhin// dpa' bo
243a3(rgyud): skye gnas nus las byung // skye gnas zla ba las byung dang // stobs chen rigs las byung ba dang // 'jigs byed khrag las byung de bzhin// tshil dang g.yul ngo tsha las skyes// me tog skye gnas gnyis de bzhi/ 
243a4(rgyud): slar yang de nyid tshi dran bya// 'di rnams rigs las byung lha mo// dan gcig skyes gzugs rlom yin// dpal chen mo dang ma yi kha// zhing skyong mchog gizhal can te// me yi gang
243a5(rgyud): can zhes gags pa// keng rus bde ba rig pa pa'o// 'di yi 'phro khwa 'dzin pa ni// rnal 'byor ma gnyis spro bar byed// de yis de 'dod/ sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo gnyis med yang dag rten// san
243a6(rgyud): rnams la phan don du// rdo rje dkyil 'khor du gnas te// kun tu spyod pa'i bgod gzugs kyis// yul thams cad du 'gro ba yin// lang dbang phyug ma byin brdzes sku// zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste// 
243a7(rgyud): gyen ma rdzes skra zhes bshad pa ni// keng rus bde ba'i rgyu can te// rnal 'byor me mchog khyad par ni// lhag ma sngon gsungs bzhin shes bya// rna ba gcus dang dag mo ste// zhing stong pa ni lus che no// de nas
243a8(rgyud): na rgyu can dang // mchog dbang phyug ma dag chen mo// gang rus bde ba'i stong pa yis// go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya// zhi ba'i gzugs dang medang ni// zhing skyong an+d+ra dgod pa'o// me dang 'phrul chen dag
243b1(rgyud): dang ni// sgra chen por yang shes par bya// keng rus kyi ni gtum mo ni// 'bar ba'i dbus bde ba che// me yi gdong dang brtson chen ma// zhing skyong 'o na da'i bu'i swa// brtson 'gas chen mo zhes grags pa// keng rus bde ba'i 'a
243b2(rgyud): gnas yin// dmar ser gags dang 'jigs mig ma// zhing skyong byin pa chen po ste// 'jigs byed ma dang spyan ma 'am// keng rus bde bas 'gengs byed pa'o// 'jigs chen ma dang stobs chen ma// zhing skyong glang po chen
243b3(rgyud): bo ste// yang na glang po'i rnam dang // zhing skyong glang po'i rna can te// gang rus bde ba la zhon pa/ rtsa thams cad du de'i rang bzhin// ba lang rnam ri'i rtse ma// zhing skyong 'jigs byed chen po ste// de nas slar yang sdug
243b4(rgyud): ma'i byin// keng rus bde ba la thim pa'o// bgrod pa mo dang 'jigs zhal ma// zhing skyong ba ni gtsigs pa ste// rmongs par byed ma zhal chen po/ klang rus bde ba las chags pa'o// ro langs ma dang ban/ 
243b5(rgyud): bzang mo// zhing skyong ba spre'i byin pa can// yang na gyen gtsigs can be ste/ gang rus 'deb la za ba'o// tsA mur+Na dang lha chen mo// zhing skyong bum ba'i rlig pa can// yang na lha mo chen ma
243b6(rgyud): dang // zhing skyong bum pa'i grul can te// yang na lha chen po yin no// keng rus bde bar gar byed pa'o// rab gus ma dang ra la gsum ma// zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste// yang na ral pa gsum zhes bya// ke
243b7(rgyud): rus bde da'i pha rol phyin// glog gi gdong ma del sgra ma// zhing skyong 'ug pa'i gdong can te// dil bu'i spre ru nges grags pa// 'dir ni kang rus bde za ba'o// me zhal ma dang lha chen mo// zhing skyong 'dzags
243b8(rgyud): par byed pa ste/ yang na lha chen por shes bya// keng rus 'de ba'i gzi tsan// karany+dza gnas ma de bzhin// gzhan yang dril bu chen mar grags// zhing skyong ba ni stobs chen to// keng dus bad bas mdzas
244a1(rgyud): yin/ gsang gags ma dang lha chen mo// dag gzugs ma dang stobs chen ma// zhing skyong sgra chen po dang no// gags po'i gzugs dang stobs chen te// keng rus bde las yongs byung ba'i// mchog/ 
244a2(rgyud): tu mi gyur/ kyo ldan// ga tu mo dang ni dag mo dang // zhing skyong ba ni 'bar bar gags// de nas yang na dgas po'i gzugs// keng rus bde ba'i cha lugs can// 'jig rten gyi ma gyen ska mo// zhing skyong ri rab chen po
244a3(rgyud): ste 'de nas yang na gyen brdzes skye// keng rus bde ba snom pa po li// 'dzegs pa dang stobs tshan pa// zhing skyong 'jigs pa de bzhin te// stobs po che dang 'jigs gzugs mo// keng rus bde ba'i snying po can
244a4(rgyud): srul mo dang ni lha chen mo// nang skyong brtul zhugs chen po ste// ke rus bde ba'i nus pa yis// da phyir dbang po kun bad ba'o// pi ban sa ma ril sgra// zhing spyong rna ba chen po can// yang na
244a5(rgyud): del sgrogs pa ste// keng rus bong ba 'dzag pa'o// lhan skyes grag/ sa ma 'byor gagis ma// dpa' po chen po de bzhin mchog zhing skyong shin tu thub bkanga' ste// keng rus 'dab dpog byed
244a6(rgyud): pa por dbang bskur mnyam ma skyes dbang phyug/ zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug ste// keng rus bde ba la gnas pas// rang nyid 'dod pa'i bde bar 'gyur// rdo rje mgo bo gad rtse gsum dang // dang dang rdo rje
244a7(rgyud): mdang thung dang // gtun shing zhags pa de bzhin du// rdo rje'i lcags sgrog lcags kyu dang // zhags pa gzhol dang kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag can dang / dbyug pa mdung thung gi gugs dang // mdung
244a8(rgyud): zung rdo rje lcags sgrog can// gri gug ral gri de'i zhin du// rdo rje dang ni mdung zung gshol// gad rdo rje kyod bzhin// chu srod rgyal mtshan tho ba'o// zhi bo'i zhal du shes bya dang // gtsigs ma dang ni dzaH
244b1(rgyud): 'jigs ma// chos kyi dbang phyug rab ster ma// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun mchog ma// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab steng ma// yang dag rmongs pa'i zhing ster ma// gtsigs ma rmongs pa'i zhing ma dang // 
244b2(rgyud): chen ma dang de bzhin gzhan// gtum zhal ma dang ngag 'joms ma// rmongs pa'i zhing gi 'jigs byed ma// dpa' bo kun la mchog ster ma// long spyod grol ba sdig 'joms ma// bde ba kun gyi mchog ster
244b3(rgyud): ma bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma// gtsigs ma dag cing 'jigs pa mo// sha'i gdan can ma dang ni gzhan// bde ba'i dbang phyug mchog ster ma// mdzes shing thams cad dgod ma dang // 'jig
244b4(rgyud): rten dngos grub ster ba mo// lha mo gtsigs ma 'dzegs par byed/ shin tu dag mo gzugs bzang ma// dbang phyug thams cad rab ster ma// dngos grub thams cad rab steng ma// 'jigs ma sgrub
244b5(rgyud): ma grags steng ma// nag mor gzugs dang ngag chen mo// dag thA/ mas cad kyi 'jigs pa non// thams cad dbang du byed ma dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs byed ma// 'khri

244b7(rgyud): an+d+rar dgod par 'khor lor bzhugs// ke la'i ring ni rol bzhugs// ba ru N+ya sad+d+hi si pa cing // lha mo'i mkhar du yi dwags gnas// bi ra dza ru shing leb bzhugs// er n+ya ru phag la bzhugs/ 
244b8(rgyud): de nas gong du yi drags bzhugs// e la'i grong du bong bur gnas// kha cher nor sbyin la ni gnas// ma ru'i yul du ma her gnas// gang du mgo yi rgyab tu ste// puM b+ha ba d+har rol gnas// dza yan t+ya ru
245a1(rgyud): / kang rus gnas// bri'u'i gleng du brtsegs par gnas// sa ba rad pa re ta la gnas// ka rany+dza gnas tsa ri trir// u h+yan du ni bdud la bzhugs// 'bar ba 'dzin par rol gnas// kI ri kar ni me la gnas
245a2(rgyud): sgyu ma'i grong du ro yi ste/ a ma bu ka ru seng ge gnas// rgyal po'i khab tu 'khor lor gnas/ bad kyi yul du yi dgas gnas// rong gnas mA la bar de bzhin// gang rus kyi ni rab sbyor bas// de lta'i zhing du dngos grub
245a3(rgyud): 'gyur / dkang rus las byung ba de ba ni/ rtsa ba'i rtsa ba las yongs las// mtshams rnams kun tu khyab par ni// ye shes khu ba de mthong 'gyur// mgo med las byung ba'i ngag 'di// khams de nyid ni za bar// dbang po
245a4(rgyud): gnyis kyi mkha' gnas nas// de yis bde ba mthong bar 'gyur/ thams cad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// mkhas rnams cung zad med par 'a gyur// de yi rang bzhin 'gro ba sgyu mar ni// lte ba sdus pa mthong bar 'gyu

245b1(rgyud): gzhan// g.yon par snod rnams bzhag byas nas// g.ya su khro bo bstan par bya// shing gcig dang ni dur khro dam// ri dang khro dang pyi Ta/ gong dang gong khur ngos rnams dang // khang stong lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // chu la
245b2(rgyud): 'gro dang thang la rgyu// sa dang ma mo'i khyim dang 'gam// nag mo dag mo dag tshan mo// lha sbyin yang dag rten ma dang // nag mo gtsigs dang 'jigs byed dang // dga' las 'das dang lag 'dan dang // tsA mur+t+ti dang dag
245b3(rgyud): ma/ lha mo dbu ma dang ni ma// rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub ma dang gzhan mo thug/ bzang nag mo dang nag chen mo// sbom nag mo dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang po zlab mo dag mo// sdad ma 'phyang ma sum cu

245b6(rgyud): ma gtso de bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po/ rdul med rnal 'byer stong pa nyid// rdo rje'i dbang phyug bka' yis ni// kun nas 'dir ni spyan 'di no// oM kak+ka ka D+hA na/ ba bA ban d+ha na// kha khA kha dan/ sarba
245b7(rgyud): ha na ha na/ b+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ che ge mo'i dgod pa mdzod cig tu hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT dzaHswA hA// bdad rtsis kha ni yongs bkang nas// lha thams cad ni mnyes par bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma sgom bya// las rnas
245b8(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// oM b+ha kA sarba yo ge shwa rI hu~M hUM dzaHswAhA/ dzaM lta'i la sogs longs sbyor ba// gtor ma'i la sogs yongs sbyar bya// ni dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni// dgug dang bsad dang dbye ba dang // rengs pa
246a1(rgyud): // gtor ma'i de nyid kyi// rnal 'byor rnams kyi las rnams kun// bsgrub bya'o ye shes lcags kyu yis// rang gi 'dod pa'i lha tshim bya// zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin gong // gong khyer ram ni ri bo ru// 
246a2(rgyud): po mang po rab tu bsdu// de yi tshogs ni 'dra ba'o// rtsa thams cad kyi kur spyod kyis// de yi srog kyang bsdu ba'o// rang gi mdud pa'i gnas 'dug pa// de ni lte ba snying khar 'dod// rnal 'byor mo la gus bdud pas// 
246a3(rgyud): sgrub pa pos ni mchog thob 'gyur// rtag tu gnas dang nye gnasu// sdod la lha yis mchog sterar gyung // gnas dang nyams pa dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi tshogs bsgrub par bya// bug rdol dang ni rgas pa das shu pa
246a4(rgyud): mdze sogs spangs pa ni// 'byung ba'i nyi ma thob byas nas/ de ltar legs mnyam gzhag pas sgrub// lha yi chu yis khrus byas te/ khyad par du yang bdud rtsi lngas// yan lag mar nag chen pos byug/ 
246a5(rgyud): de nyid kyi ni'i dug spos sbyin// nges par gru bzhig gsu rnam pa'i// dbus 'a'ad bas bya ba yin// ji lta bar ni sngon bzhin du/ sangs rgyas thaMd gisan du gzhug// gang mo rnam pa brgyad bya ste/ 
246a6(rgyud): hA hI hI hA hA hi he// zhes bya sgrub pa pos yis// mi yi sa bon yang dag zhon// rlung gi su ni phye ba yi// spyi bo'i gtsug tu sbyar byas nas// sa yi mthil du mchod byas nas// skye gnas dbusu dgod bya ste// 'ab
246a7(rgyud): bas zhu ba lte bar bya// skye gnas dbusu rim ji bzhin// bdag nyid bsam bya rnal 'byor pas// pho nyir 'od zer kunas 'khrigs// 'bar ba'i phreng ba rgya mtsho blta// da ltar rnam pa bsam gyur pas// rnal 'byor zad/ 
246a8(rgyud): bde ba'i gnas// rdo rje mkha' ge de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan padag pos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni keng rus kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// / de na mche ba rnam gtsigs pa'i// ting 'dzin sbyor
246b1(rgyud): gnas bshad bya ste// gzha 'gangs rim pa 'ong ba ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor pas yod// srog gi thig la son bsam pa// mtshams thams cad du da rgyud// gzhu dbyug mtshan mar bsam par bya// sgra thad ni bskul ba
246b2(rgyud): yis// kunas 'gangs bzhin pa yi mdar// dbus ma'i ltar 'jom pa yis// rnam par shes pa'i dben gnos bya// 'byung gnas thams cad bsad pa yin// bgod bzhin pa yi bde ba che// deng rig pa yis gzha
246b3(rgyud): da 'gro/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yis// rab sbyor rnams kyis ngas 'byung 'gyur// mtshon cha zad pa med 'joms pa// skye bo kun la 'jug par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yulas// gzhan gyi gong
246b4(rgyud): rnam su 'jug pa'i// sngon gyi sprul pa'i bag chags ni/ de la rgyun tu 'joms par byed// rnam par zhu ba'i bdag nyid che// ni dba'i gzugasu ster bar 'gyur// Sh+T+r-i zhes rkang pa'i mthil bar du
246b5(rgyud): nor bu'i skud pa bzhin du 'grod// na de mtshams kyi do dam par/ sa gsum po la lta bar 'gyur// de phyir skye bo thams cad la// mtshon bya mtsha nyid kyis 'byed// dbang po de rnams za
246b6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis dbugs skad ci smos// 'go ba gzhan du rab 'jug par// mchog tu rmad byung 'gro bar 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul da bar yang dag gnas// skye bo kun la rnam par blta// mig sogs rnam par shes
246b7(rgyud): ba ni/ rnamasu ni bskyod par byas// mkha' gre'i rnam par de shes bya// mkha' gro ma'i gzugs kyi gtso// dkyil 'khor sngon du sprul par ni// mche gtsigs la sogs bsgom par bya// rang gi khams ni
246b8(rgyud): bde ba'i gzugs// rang rang gtso bor bya ba yin// de las skyes pa'i mkha' gro che// mkha' go ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs/ thams cad chos 'byung sna tshogs pa'i// snying por gzhom du med zhi ba'i/ 
247a1(rgyud): chos kun gcig tu yongs bsdus pa// sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri/ mA li kA li mnyam byas nas// sde tshan rnams kyis longs brjes pa// 'dod don thams cad smrab byed pa// derang gnas/ 
247a2(rgyud): dpa' bos yang dag brgya// ye shes la sogs sku bzhi po// zhe bya 'thob 'gyur ji tsha med// steng 'og rtag tu dngos grib ster// bdag nyid po nya kun 'daso// yi ge lnga bcu sde tshan brgyad// de nyid mkhan
247a3(rgyud): mchog mad byung // sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor ram yang na// chung ngu'i rgyud dang 'ad ba mchog/ yi ge thams cad kyi ni tshad// sdom pa sogasu mtshon par bya// yi ge rnams dang ming rnams dang // sdom pa rnams

247a7(rgyud): gyi rigs can// kuny+dza me tog dang mnyam par// a yig la ni rkyen par 'dod// a yi sin+d+hu ra yi mdog// bzang po lnga par shes par bya// u yig dbang po'i gzhu yi 'od// U yig yi ge drag

247b1(rgyud): e yi yi ge dmar skya ste// oM sin+d+hu ra dmar mdog ma// o yi yige nyi ma 'angadra // 'od zer stong phrag gyen du 'bar// oM yi yi ge rtag 'bar ba// nyi ma bye ba dang mnyam 'od// zla phyed bzhin du thig le/ a

251b4(rgyud): ji ltar grol bar 'gyur// glu 'di yis ni dgyes pa byed// a mi tA b+ha dza nit+ta sam d+h+ya mA ga mA d+ha ha/ ma pA nya r-ISh+Ta many+dzari ga mA sAwA mA rI gr-i ma b+hu ya te/ sa rI re sau rA rA sA nI sa1
251b5(rgyud): ta ni sa mAnya sa nI// shI rI b+ha ga mA d+ham+ma d+ha smA d+ha sAH/ pA ya ma pA pA ma da mi te/ 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// 'di' 'i grol ba bsgrub par bya// a ba d+hU ti'i yang dbus// rnam shes 'a

251b8(rgyud): dag rig pa'i gzugasu thim// mdor bsdus ni khams lnga ste// gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod// dbang chen la na me yi sreg/ chu yis dbusu rab tu thim// myur du zhu nas dro b.rara'agyur// rlung gi nam
252a1(rgyud): la gnaso// chu yi tshogs ni skam byas pas// de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// sems ni stong nyid la son bya// stong nyid rnamakha'i khams la'o// na mkha' ye shes la 'jug bya/ ye shes
252a2(rgyud): sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// mkhas pas ye shes shes bya'i bdag// da ltar 'od dpag med par sgom// rtsibs brgyad legs par rgyan pa yi// shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom bya// bu med bri ba mi u
252a3(rgyud): kur d+ha si mi ro ma ka 'der// rlung du tuka bi mi dbang ldan du// rA si'i 'khor lo rim ji bzhin// de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod// a i u a o a~M aHsa bon rnams// bkra shis la sogs
252a4(rgyud): gzang lnga ni// shar la sogs par dgod par bya// ring po de nyid du dgod bya// a aHnyi ma zlar shes bya// nyi ma rU ba 'di/ rgol ba// ku li ri la nyi ma ste// gza' lhag gdong lnga pa 'dir
252a5(rgyud): gnas// mthar ni gang zhig lha ma yi// so so'i tshogasaza bar 'gyur// rA si rnams kyis rgyan pa yi// lagro/ kun la phan khong lo de// da ltar do la'i 'khor lo de// de ltar ngo la'i 'khor
252a6(rgyud): lor 'gyur// rgyu ska rA si dus dang zhag/ lug rnams ro hi ta sogs dang / zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// rgyu skar dus tshod yang dag 'a
252a7(rgyud): gza' dab nad ni de bzhin te// de lA rA si'i tshad kyis ni// skye ba'i lasu brjod pa yin// kar+t+ti ka dang bza' bo'i tshe// mig dmar de bzhin sprin dag ste// de la 'chi bar shes par bya// gal te rnal 'byor med
252a8(rgyud): na'o/ ma ga shI 'i mgo dang ni// gzar lhaganyi ma la spyo ba// mgul pa'i nad kyis nyin bzhin// khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'dzinag rgyal ri muga'i rgyu skar dang / gzang lhag 'khrig pa la mtshog tu/ 
252b1(rgyud): yir mchu'i chos brgyad kyi// tho rangs pa sangs la 'chi'o// ng+ge dang mchu yi rgyu skar dang // ches bcu spen pa seng ge la// nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste// gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kye'o// bu mo gnyis
252b2(rgyud): mar gul mas 'chi/ sa ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang // gzhu dang phur bu'i ri ma~M dang / gal te sangs rgyas mnyas gyur ba// srang la'i tshib pa shes par bya// sman dang bcu gnyis drug pa dang / phur cu sdig pam
252b3(rgyud): chu stong chu smad tshwas dgu dang / gro nini gzhu dang pasangs 'chi// gro zhin mes bdun zla ba dang / zla ba rgyal dang mu srin la nor med// khrums smad bcu gsum pa// zla ba mon gre bum pas mdzad// the skad brgyad
252b4(rgyud): ba nam gru dang // sman pa dang ni nya la 'chi// sems can kun gyi skye ba'i chos// dus smra bas ni shes par bya// sa bon gcig las skyes yon tan// gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyiso// rigs gnyis ni tsA
252b5(rgyud): byas nas// de'i dus sgyu rtsis brtsam par bya// sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas pas de'i rig su skye'o// 'bras bu shes bya ste/ mtshan nyid kyis rdo rje su gnas// 
252b6(rgyud): saM sogs 'khor 'brel ba de// rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid// 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom par bya// dbusu 'ong bag med mgon po// lhag mar mkha'og ma sogs
252b7(rgyud): de ni rnam shes skye gsal bar// las kyi 'bras bu de dang bya// thams cad bde ba kun sbyor las// de tshe gnyis med la rten pa'i// 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pa// bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsung so// 
252b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// rdo rje 'od kyi sbyor byas// ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya// lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas// de kho na nyid ye shes nus// seMn rnams kyi rnam nges pas// 'chi
253a1(rgyud): / mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba// de 'dra bdag gis bshad bya yis// rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon// lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni// de rnams ji ltar gsal bar dbye// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis
253a2(rgyud): te nga rnams kyi ni gtso bo mchog/ bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// byangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid// dka ba nag po'i phyogs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi na ni brjod/ de ni rnying pa dgu pa mche ga/ lus kyi
253a3(rgyud): mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid// gang gis shes tsam gyis ni// 'tshe ba'i dus lta bur gan sa// dbugs ni rnam par spros tsam gyis// lus can 'pho bo drug gnyis na// snga do ro hi ti yi char// de yis rtag
253a4(rgyud): ni mtshon par bya// sna dang mig phyogs dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtser// lce dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni// mgrin partsib logs de bzhin du// snying gi gur dang lte ba dang // brla
253a5(rgyud): dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// 'joms dang ling ga ga de bzhin// mgo bo dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs// mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du// dbugs ni'i chad cing 'chad pa'o// lus kyi mtshan
253a6(rgyud): ma dgu rnams te// 'chi ba'i dus ni bstan pa yi// nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni// 'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'// gang tshe nyi ma dag rnams no ni// gcig brjod pa ni rgyan pa yin// deng ni lo gsum
253a7(rgyud): 'gyur can te// sum cu dag cu rnams de bzhin// tsha shas de ltar gyi ni ched// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// nyi ma 'dun ni yongs thob nas// gang cha rlung ni 'bab pa na// lo gnyis yang dag rjod
253a8(rgyud): ba dang / dus kyi grangs cini n+d+he ba dang / nyi ma rnams ni bco brgyad kyi// gang zhig chad du yang dag brjod// zhag brgyad rnam su yongs btong bas// rlu ni gang tshe'i bab pa na// lo gnyi su ni yongs pashad pa/ 
253b1(rgyud): de yi 'tshe ba yi ni gangs// nges par de'i tshe 'chi ba ni// de yi zla ba rig byed grangs// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhing bshad// 'tsho ba yi ni dus grang so// lha mo nyi ma dgur 'bab na// lo gnyisu ni de 'tshe ste// nA gnyis
253b2(rgyud): nyi ma nyi ma yi// tshad ni sbyor ba'i lus can// lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis// lo gnyi su ni de 'tsho'o// nyi ma bcu gcig de bzhin du// gang tshe rtsa ni rab 'jug na// lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas// zla ba yang
253b3(rgyud): ni dgu'iri grangs kyis// nyi ma bco brgyad rab tu bshad// the tshom med par bshad pa'o// zhag ni bcu gnyis rab 'bab pas// lo gcig tu ni rab tu grags// zla ba yang ni lo'i grangs can// nyi ma rnams ni dus
253b4(rgyud): kyis mdzes// bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa// g.ya su 'gro bar 'bab pa na/ lo ni yang dag bshad pa ste// zla ba yang ni rig byed grag/ nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs na// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyi
253b5(rgyud): bshad pa'o// lha me gang che bdun gnyis// rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na// lo ni yang dag bshad// zla ba'i tsher ni yang dag grags// nyi ma rnams ni bcu gnyis te// de yi 'tsho ba'i chad
253b6(rgyud): yin// gang tshe bco lnga nyi mar ni// rlung ni de bzhin 'thab pa na// de tshe 'chi bar shes bya ba// lo gtsag na ni the tshom med// nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi// gang tshe brgyad gnyisu 'bab na// 'tsho ba zla ba bcu dang mi
253b7(rgyud): nyi ma rnams ni mchog grangs kyi// nyi shu zhi'i nyi rnams kyi// tshad du bdag gis bshad pa'o// nyi ma rnams ni bcu bdun du// nges par gang tshe rlung 'bab na// de tshe de'i tshad kyis ni// zla ba rnams ni dgu
253b8(rgyud): dang ni/ nyi ma bco brgyad na de bzhin// 'chi ba'i dus la the tsho med// nyi mi btso rgyang rgyu ba yis// zla ba yang ni brgyad na dang // nyi ma rnams kyang nyi ma'i grangs// dus kyi grangs nib shad pa'o// gang mgos/ 
254a1(rgyud): dman nyi shud ni// de la zhon pa spyod pa na// nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba// 'tsho ba zla ba bdun dang ni// nyi ma rnams ni dus grangs bshad// dus 'di rnams kyis mchog gdong can// gang che nyi shu ru ni spyod
254a2(rgyud): zla ba dag ni tshe dang 'bral// nyi ma nyi shu gcig rnam su// gang tshe nyi ma rab 'bab na// zla ba lnga ru yongs 'tsho ste// nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i gangs// nyi shu gnyis gang tshe 'bab// zla ba'i rig na tshe 'gro// nyi ma rnams
254a3(rgyud): ni nyi shu ba ni/ zla ba rig byed du bshad// lha mo gang mo nyi shu gsum// rlu ni rgyun tu 'bab pa na// de ni zla ba bzhid 'tsho ste// nyi ma dus rnamasu dran bya// nyi shu bya zhing rab 'bab pas// zla ba gisum dun shad pa
254a4(rgyud): nyin bcu gcig na de bzhin du// 'chi ba'i dus rna/ par brjod// dus kyi grangs ni mdor sdus nas// gong du sdod du ba dashad de'i phyir// bair gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang // bcu gnyis nyid kyi
254a5(rgyud): kyis ni// cha yi rim pas de sbyangs nas// bar gyigs la bar byas pa yin// blo dben rnams kyis rtogs don du//  'di rnams ni rab tu bstan// rnal 'byor ma rnams shin phra mo'i// 
254a6(rgyud): 'thun ma dus ni bdag gis bshad// lha mo de rnams kyi yid ches// khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro/ sna yi sha ni rnam chad cing // steng bltas ma ni de bzhin 'bab// de yi 'tsho bar shes byas pa// 
254a7(rgyud): ma bdun na the tshom med// mig gi gos ni yang dag chad gyen kha bltas ma mchog de bzhin// tshe shes dgu la yang dag zhon// lngas lhag pa na 'chad bzhin// go dA dAr+ya 'khur ba yi// nga su steng
254a8(rgyud): 'gro ba me// nyi ma bcu ru shes bya ste// nub gcig gis lhag/ de bzhin// rna ba g.yas la yongs rten nas// bzang mo steng du yang dag rten// bcu gcig cha shas la zhon te// 'chang pa bco brgyad na
254b1(rgyud): bzhin// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// lce la ri mo nag po can// lus can kun gyi 'tsho ba ni// na ma zla'i mtshan mos shes par bya// bcu gsum so yi bar du ni// gdong nag po ni reg de bzhin// 
254b2(rgyud): nam zla'i grangs kyi nyi ma rnams kyis// 'byung po rnams kyi bgod pa yin// rgyun tu mchi ma 'bab gang tsa// steng bltas mar ni rab tu grags// bcu bzhi pa yi dbyangs la zhan// bcu phyed kyis ni
254b3(rgyud): the tshom med// snying ka'i gzab ni zhom pa dang // steng du lta ma do mchog ma// gsum dang lnga ru mdzes lha mo// zla ba byed du the tsho med// lte ba'i dbusu sen lha mo// bcu drag ba dag can yongs rdzogs// 
254b4(rgyud): sen so'i khrag mad de bzhin zhag/ nyin rnams bcu chu the tshom za// bcu bdun pa yi rtsa yang ni// brla yi steng du bskams ba ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags// nyin gzhan nyin la ma
254b5(rgyud): med du byin bzung gi gang zhig rtsa// steng du bltas ma de bzhin mchog/ bco brgyad pa ru shes bya ste// nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis// gtsigs dman pa'o nyi shu 'doms// 
254b6(rgyud): ba'o steng du kha bltas mchog/ mnyam pas chad par 'gyur ba la// 'di yis 'tsho ba the tshom med// mtshan mar rol ldan mang grags ma// steng bgod mchog gi dbang phyug ma// bcu gnyisu ni yang dag
254b7(rgyud): grags// nyin rnams dus tshed the tshom za// bar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa// bcu gnyis nyid la the tshom med// lo yi rim pas sbyangs nas// bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa yis ni// drug dang sum cu bco brgya
254b8(rgyud): bcu// 'di na rna bas rim ji ltar// shes pa de ltar lha chen mo// rim gyi rim gyis dbye ba'o// lhag ma nyid ni bsdus pa 'gyur// mtsho ba yid ni shes par bya// yang dag cho ga 'di rnams kyis
255a1(rgyud): / rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// rab tu sbyor bas sog bkang bas// sangs rgyas lus la mchi ba smos// rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas// mdor bsdus pa yis 'chad par 'gyur// rdo rje'i laM sa nas
255a2(rgyud): son pa'i srog/ sAl ma bcu gnyis mthar bar du'o// sangs rgyas rje su ngan sbyor bas// 'dod pa lnga can la za 'gyur// gsang sngags chen po'i 'di li ni// gnas nas kun tu bgrod par bya// sgyu ma'i bdag
255a3(rgyud): nyid 'chi med 'gyur// rnam pa de za'i rig can// rtsa yi kun nas 'gengs po zhon pa// dngos po kun la gnas pa yin// skye bo kun gyi khams rnams ni// ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed// chos pa// 
255a4(rgyud): med pa 'dzag par 'gyur// gang zag rnams la rgod par 'gyur/ gnyis ka sgyu ma chen po ste/ snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yi na// mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems// mtshams
255a5(rgyud): rnams kun tu 'chi ba yin// 'cha ba yan// 'chi ba chen po sangs/ rgyas gzugs// rnal 'byor rnams la bde ster byed// dkyil la khor thams cad bzung po yis// thams cad bde ba
255a6(rgyud): bdag nyid 'gyur// 'khor lo 'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas// bde ba dam pa yang dag myang // rdo rje 'odadi ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma// lha ni mngon rtogs gzugs can
255a7(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can// srog kun yang dag sbyor ba las// mchog tu zag med bzhugs ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags// bcom ldan 'angs kyis 'di gsung
255a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'di rab tu byed pa bdun pa'o// / de nas phyag ni rdo rje sogs// byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te// 'di skad du ni gsol pa'o// gtso bo
255b1(rgyud): rnams sgrub thabs dang // de rnams rang sngags bdag la gsungs// gang gi thams cad dbang gyur pa// gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyis lags// lha la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// rdo rje sku yi rgyal po nyon// gang gis
255b2(rgyud): dag cho ga yis// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ dkyil 'khor bri nga byas nas ni// sku bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad// de la ma mo lha rnams dang // pho nya 'byung po gza' de bzhin// lus sral po ni chen po dang // rigs pa'i
255b3(rgyud): gsang sngags 'dir brjod bya// dbus ma yi ni nang gnas pa// srid pa dag pas bsgrubs pa yin// dus thams cad du bskyed pa ni// dkyil 'khor da ni rib 'bab can// ma mo dbang chen bsgrub bya dang // lha ni chu yi
255b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khod da// 'byung po ma la bsgrub bya ba// gza' ni rlung gi dkyi'akhor la// lus srel po ni rnamapa'i ste// rdo rje sku yi rab sbyor ba ye shes dkyil 'khor cha yis no// a ba d+hU tAM 'bab pa
255b5(rgyud): yin// dkyil 'khor lnga rnams kyi tha ma// de yi dusu gshegs par bya// de bltas nas ni phyi rol du// ras bris la sogs dkyil 'kho ra dgod// nag pa'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi le// 'byung ba'i
255b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// 'bum 'phrag bzlas pas de nas ni// ster 'gyur mdun du mngon sum du'o// tshangs pa zhi ba mo de bzhin gzhon phag// dbang mo nyid dang tsA mur+t+ti// tshogs kyi dbang mo de gdan mo// gnyis
255b7(rgyud): ba'i dum bur dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lce lus ngan dang // yi dgas dbang dang me stan can// bden bral dang ni rlung de bzhin// dum bu gsum par dgod bya ba// nyi ma zla ba mig dmar dang gza' lhag pur bu ba sangs dpa
255b8(rgyud): spen pa dang ni rA hUM'o// bzhi par tshangs khyab 'jug de bzhin// dag po gzhonu ngas par sgor// sa dang chu laM me dang rlung // 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams dang // mkha' go mar me 'dzab ma dang // kam po
256a1(rgyud): / dza khyab bdag de bzhin// 'byung po 'byung po'i gzugs kyis ni// rtag tu cho ga bzhin bsgrub bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// kunas phyi yi dkyil 'khor bro// ri mo sum bskor dbus
256a2(rgyud): byin pas// brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya// pad+ma mdab brgyad bri bar bya// lte ba zab ba'i spyod yul can// de yi dbusu rdo rje sku// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// cung zad mcha ba gtsigs pa yaM// @
256a3(rgyud): pa'i nal la khro dang bcas// kha dog sngon po dag chen po/ thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// nyi mang gar mdzad rol bzhugs// sum cu pa rnams 'jig par byed// sdig pags pa'i ni bza' 'dzin// bzang po
256a4(rgyud): gzugs can spyan gsum pa/ zod pa dang ni khiT+wAM 'dzin/ cing te'u gri lug gis ni brgyar/ shar dang lho dang nub deng ni/ byang du rib pa ji lta bas/ mkha' gro kAm po dze dam/ 'jib ma
256a5(rgyud): ma me'o// de ltar rdo rje sku yi do// mdo bsdum pa yi brjod par bya// lte bangar rdo rje rnam par 'gyur// po nyi rkang badrug grod ma'i// snang kha gsang ba mgrin pa ru// nyid rnam pa slar / 
256a6(rgyud): bya// de nas srog ni 'dzin bzhin pas// bsam gtan sems te gan gyis med// lha rdzas 'od zang bskyed par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ba rnams dang lus skyed/ las dang po yi sbyong ba yis// phyogs ba
256a7(rgyud): rnam par spro bar 'gyur/ hrIHmig las byung ba'i lha mo// pag mo phyag ni bzhi pa ste// gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin du// rgyal mtshan dang ni thong nga nyid// kha dog sngon mo dag chen mo// phag gi gdong can 'jigs
256a8(rgyud): rung ma'o// bang mig gis bris zhib mo// kha dog dmar po 'od chen mo// bod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid// kha TA Da mi ru de bzhin// hrIHyoM yigs gzhon nu ma// kha dog ser mo phyag ba ni me// rtse gsum
256b1(rgyud): dang ba dan gsum// gzhu dang mdar nyid de bzhino// hoHyi yi ge sa tsA muN+Di// kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma// kha T+wAM ga nyid thod pa dang // cang ti'u chang snod bzhino// oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo// kha dog
256b2(rgyud): dkar mo phyag bzhi ma// pad+ma nyid dang thod pa dang // gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog/ ga~M yig las ni tshogs dbang mo// kha dog ljang ku phyag bzhi ma// rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang // bgrang phreng dang ni la rtsa'o// 
256b3(rgyud): bI yig las ni khyab 'jug ma// kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi ga// 'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang // zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog/ AM l-ig las byung ba dbang mo// kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje mdung thung
256b4(rgyud): thod pa dang / bsdigs mdzub bcas zhag de bzhin// sa cad 'bar bzhin gyen brdzes sgra// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam pa ra grubs// ro la zhon ma spyad gsum ma// rked par sdug lpags
256b5(rgyud): dkris// shar sgor tshangs pa dri bya ba// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang // spyi blugs pad+ma da zhin// byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi
256b6(rgyud): pa ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang / thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin// lho ru drag po dri bya ste// du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi pa/ rtse gsum thong ba de bzhin du// zhags pa phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin// nub tu gzhon bri
256b7(rgyud): bya// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// dpa' bo mdung thung dbyug pa 'dzin// thod pa'i bgrang phreng 'dzin da 'dzin// dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum
256b8(rgyud): phyag gzhan thal mo sbyang ba'o// dbang po glang po la zhon pa// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi ste// rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang // thal mo sbyar ba byas pa mchog/ me ru lug la zhon pa ni/ kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa/ 
257a1(rgyud): // me yi thab dang thod pa dang // skrag nas de bzhin lag thal spyad// gshin rjer ma he la zhon pa// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// dbyugs pa de bzhin thod ba dang // kun tu skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin/ 
257a2(rgyud): bden bral mi la zhon pa ste// kha dog ste skya phyag bzhi pa// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kun nas skrag pas thal sbyang mchog/ lhar chu srin la zhon pa// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// zhags pa de bzhin thod pa dang / 
257a3(rgyud): zal mi spyang ba de bzhin gzhan/ rlung du dwags zhon ga/ du ba'i midag can phyag bzhi ste/ ba dan dang ni thod pa dang / de bzhin thal sbyang 'dzin pa mchog lus ngan du ni gteng la zhon// kha dog ser po phyag ni pa/ 
257a4(rgyud): po che dang thod pa 'dzin// thal sbyar byas pa'ode bzhin gnan// thams cad rgyu skad dang ni gza'// rang dkyil 'khor la gnas skam// rang gi dam tshig las byung ba// de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan / 
257a5(rgyud): che ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma// 'byung po rigs ma de zhin gzhan// de lta'i cho gar bya ba yis// de phyir re re sgrub par bya// dung khrod la sogs gnas rnamasu// sna tshogs dam tshigs tha rnam
257a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor long spyod rtag dgar la// pho nya'i las ni yang dag brtsam// rna ba rdo rje'i tshig yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba zhi na// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed// gnas/ 
257a7(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ de phyir rim pas mchod par bya// de nas di sogs dbul bya zhing // sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste// rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// oM hUM phaT sogs nang bcug pa'o// dbus bcos pa
257a8(rgyud): nas 'der ni thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas gzhan brdzes pa'i nang du// bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyi gzugs ca ta// ba dan gsum pa 'bar ba dang // rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog/ gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa
257b1(rgyud): nyid sa g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar// lhag ma sngon gyi gzugs can te// lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don// nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'gab 'gyur 'di la the tsho med// sku gsung thugs kyi
257b2(rgyud): rdo rje bdag// thams cad lus kyi rang bzhin can// gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa// bcom ldan gzugs kyi 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o// de nas 'dir ni bde rgyal po// rnal 'byor
257b3(rgyud): yis sad mdzad nas// ngag 'di yid ni 'dibar mdzad// blo gros chen po dus ci lags// kye rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus// myu gu can gyis skyes pa'o// sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po// myu gu can gyi sbyor bar
257b4(rgyud): bshad// gza' dang sgyu skar ches grangs ni// sems kyi dus mngon par brjod// gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus// rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde ba'i rgyu// 'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du// thub pa skyes mchog
257b5(rgyud): rnams kyis gsungs// de tshe myu gu can bsgom pa// sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid// myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te// sems las byung ma myu gu can// rgyu skar rA si bza' sogs pas// gang zhig
257b6(rgyud): du ni myu ga skyes// de yis myu gu can ngas byas// rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyang bya// dge ba 'am ni mi dag kun// tshes grangs rgyu skar gza' 'char ba// de rnams thams cad dus rnamasu// thams cad 'de bdag nyid skyes
257b7(rgyud): sgom ngar tau ma ni rnyed byed pa'o// ma b+ha ma nad 'joms pas spangs// ku swa A dus byed gzugs te// tshes grangs de ni yengasu spangs// mo bu ma bzang dang bkra shiso// ra bu a 'joms par byed pa'o// b+ha bu b+ha dus kyi gan
257b8(rgyud): kyis b+ha pre bu rnyed pa byed pa po// mi gu d+ha nor la sogs par mdzad/ tra mu a dus gzugs can/ dri shu pA dge pa rnams bye// d+hi shu bA na dang 'joms pa yi/ b+hu D+ha shu gshin rje'i mchenano// glu ma kI grags
258a1(rgyud): / dang bsod nams 'thob// b+h+ra ma A gdung byed pa po// bA ra ma 'chi ba'i dus cano// me'i gdan du mi ki ra// slar yang gshin rje ra ra nA spang // srin por bco lnga pa nyid dang // khyu mchog chu lhang spang par
258a2(rgyud): sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du// gtar da rmi lam can de bzhin// bzangs po mog gsum pa nyid du// 'byung po'i nyi ma shar de bzhin// zla ba dang ni nyi sog chas// de rnams res mo rab bshad bya// bzang po yug
258a3(rgyud): sa mo de bzhin// sems g.yengs 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas// skye bo kun gyi ma yi ni// cha yi rgyu bar shes par bya// khyu mchog mi ki ra nyid dang // rmi lam bco lnga po de bzhin// zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag gags// rim pa
258a4(rgyud): 'di rnams rnam par brjod// zha la me ru yang dag gnas/ sto/ la rlung gi gan su'o// de ltang de'i dbus gnas pa'o// phyog su gdung byed yang dag gnas// zla ba nyid las byung ri mo// mnyam par blta bas
258a5(rgyud): mnyam par 'gro// zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis/ shesar ba can gyis des da spangs/ mchi ba dang 'brad ma bltas pas// bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin// dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa// rA hUM
258a6(rgyud): rgyu bar grags pa yin// dkar dang gcig shos cho ga yis// blo gos mthar thug pas shes 'gyur// rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par// rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed// / skye bo rang gis byas pa yi// las
258a7(rgyud): 'di shes par 'gyur te// las de yis ni dus rnams ni// the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa// de srid du ni ngas rab 'jug/ rnal 'byor pa rnams nyam su myong // yang dag byang chub gnas
258a8(rgyud): 'gyur// de ni myu gu can du grags// kha dog dmar po 'od chen po// myu gu myu gu'i gzugs can// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i nang son pa// gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs
258b1(rgyud): ye shes myu gu rnam bsgoms las// las rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur// thams cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las// sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa// rgyu rnamasu ni rtag bzhugs pa'i// rdo rje rgyu mas
258b2(rgyud): 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje'i gar byas nas// rnal 'byor mas 'do di'o// ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che// las dang 'brel pas 'byung bar 'gyur// sngon ni las ni rnamanyam
258b3(rgyud): bas rgyun nyams pas na 'od med pa// 'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis// stong rje mnyas gshin pas bka' stsa la// sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang // sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa// mdor bsdus pa
258b4(rgyud): pa yis bshad bya yis// khyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyon// rdo rje ral pa cad sbyor bas// las kyi nang du sgrub par 'gyur// ra re mi ni sbyor ba yi// de ni rang 'byung du gan so// shin tu dad pa la gnas
258b5(rgyud): pas// dbang po thams cad 'du bar bya// de yi ral bas rtag jig rten// ral bar ming gis 'ching ba yin// dga' ba kun las khye da 'byed pa'i// rdo rje'i sku khyod 'thob par 'gyur// de phying banatsha
258b6(rgyud): thams cad dang // dge ba'i las las zad par 'gyur// skye bo chen po de 'byung ba// gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur// rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'a byung // del bu'i sgra ni tho
258b7(rgyud): byas nas/ de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ rtswa dgu rtse mo gcig pa dang / rtse lnga rtse mo gsum pa can// de ltar la sogs da'i bu che/ tsam stong gibar du'o// sgra brjod pa yis dngos po yis// spros pa med cing
258b8(rgyud): po ge med// rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' ga rgya mtsho dag/ de yi sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung // de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i ba ge// gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin// sngon bshad rtsa can de rdo rje
259a1(rgyud): // gang du yid ni rnam 'gro ba// chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can// de nyid du ni gsor bar bya// byi'i dal bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya// dril bu rtag tu cha gsum can// lha yis
259a2(rgyud): yang dag rgyan par byas// re re yi ni lha'i bdag po// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas// de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o// lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan// dal bu de la pad so
259a3(rgyud): bya ji ltar de rnams kyi ni rgyan// de bzhin dril bu'i ska ragaso// lha ni sgo dang ga rnamasu// phyogs brgyad rnamasu bya ba nyid// ji ltar rnal 'byor ba'i mtshon bya// de rnams zhal nas rtse mo mthon// dum pa sogs dang zham
259a4(rgyud): gnyis la'8// steng du rigs mtshan ma can// 'di la yid la rtse che// tshad ni gnan du bshad pa yin// de na ning gi gzugs can bdag / de pyi sgra ni rnam mtshon na// thig le'i gzugs mi
259a5(rgyud): khyab bdag che// rdo rje 'dza dang mnyam par bya// de ltar ngam 'i sbyor ba las// sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya// ra dA 'i bur yang dag grags// rdo rje rdo rjer brjod par 'gyur/ 
259a6(rgyud): ral can bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor du ni yang bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' go kun// de tshe nang du mngon par gzhug/ thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las// rdo rje ral pa can byung ba// rdo rje
259a7(rgyud): bu yang dag brtan// bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba tshe// dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas// bdag gis mngon gsu du gshad kyis
259a8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis// lus can kun gyi lus gang la// gdan ni stong phrag gnas pa ste// de rnams la yig dgod pa ni// ka sogs ha yig mthar de bzhin// yon la sogs dbyangs rnams
259b1(rgyud): yig/ khams re re la yi ge rnams// slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye sa bya// gtu mo stong phrag bdag nyid can// mtshams kun du ni gnas pa 'thang// khams thams cad kyi de
259b2(rgyud): gnas las// dpa' bo'i long spyod 'thob par 'gyur// 'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po// bdag med pa yi bdag tu bzhag/ gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o// de ltar
259b3(rgyud): stong phrag gi ni l-I// dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang gnas// sman thams cad dang nye ba'i yin// sbas pa'i bachud len gsungs pa'o// phyi rol rnams kyi'ang yi ge bdang // de'i ming nyid du shes par bya// me tog 'dras
259b4(rgyud): sogs sde tshan gyi// dang po'i ming ni stong phrag can/ mas kyi ni bcud len bsgrub// gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ ji lta'i rim pas rigs sogs kyi// ka sogs thabs cad sman
259b5(rgyud): chen te// las smra ba yo rgyud gzhan du// dang ni nges par/ sal rigs bya// dang po'i mgon po rnams bsgoms nas// !sa rnams thob par bya ba yin// yang na grung rnal 'byor rnam
259b6(rgyud): kyis// bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba// des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sde tshan rnam pas yong sgor las// bad rtsi'i tshogs mtshams gzugs ldan pa'o// grub pa'i
259b7(rgyud): sman rnams rang bzhin can// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// 'dres pas mchod pa byas nas ni// grong khyer gsum
259b8(rgyud): gyi nang byung ba// ston pa rdo rje che ci lags// gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags// sprul pa gang du bzhud pa lags// chos nyan pa yi dusu yang // ci zhig gis brtan par byas// lha dang lha mo yin dang mi
260a1(rgyud): // ci yi ngag gis 'gro dang 'ong// mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni// sngon gyi ji bzhin bshadu gsol// mngon par tshig mtshams mtshan nyid ni// ji ltar rim pas bshad kyi nyon
260a2(rgyud): tu zab mo'i don chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyim ma shes/ sems cadan rnams kyi rang sdung can// bdag gi nges par mdor bsdus pas// rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du// khams dang mtshan mang gnas
260a3(rgyud): can/  lus dang ngag sems dag pa yi// gong khyer gsum rnam su 'byung ba'o// sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs// nges par las chung bar 'gro'o// yang na dus rnams thams cad du// ji ltar ma long la bzhin
260a4(rgyud): mthong // sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas/ sems kyang de la gnas la'o// rdo rje la sogs ti gyis// lha la sogs pa de rnams rmongs// de yis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis// rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu skyo
260a5(rgyud): bas rtag tu spru la// rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul// 'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste// hUM yi ge'i sgra yis ni// ston pas 'khro ra lor can ston byas// chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs pa ru// nyi shu
260a6(rgyud): lhan cig skyes gdan du// ngag gi spyod pas mnyon par byed// dor song nas ni de la thom// de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi// slob dpon khyab bdag ches shes bya// rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid// de'i mtshan nyid
260a7(rgyud): bshad par bya// sems can kun la phan bdag nyid// mi 'jigs pa ni ster nyid dang // sngags dang rgyud kyis sbyor ba shes// sbyong ba bzo dang sgyu rtsa la sogs// 'thun pa'i ngag dang thad la// bu gcig pa ltar 'thun
260a8(rgyud): pa dang / gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dgar// bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhol// ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed// 'tshe ba med cing bden pa'i ngag/ sen kun la thugs brtse dang // lam du 'dzud pa/ 
260b1(rgyud): de mthar phyir/ kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang // bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol son// mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma// phyag rgya brda' ni byed pa po// de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang // skye ba 'di la de bzhin/ 
260b2(rgyud): gshegs// rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbu su// rdo rje hUM mdzad sgom pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste// bde ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma// sgra rnamasu ni sgra yis shas// rdo rje hUM mdzad can khyab bdag
260b3(rgyud): pa'i lhag mar gyur ya shas// dang po'i mgon pa'i mgon po'i rgyu yin// sems kyi nyim su myeng po ni// de phyir sran phra mo'i rang bzhin can// spar shol khamasu yang dag gags// de nyid kyis ni khyang nas 'ongs// 
260b4(rgyud): mkha' gro rgya mtshor rtag nges pags gsum de yi rade bzhin byas// de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo// shing rtsin gzhani sog ma bzhin// 'di yis bgrod pa ma shes pas// byis pa mi shes pa yis
260b5(rgyud): bcings// mtha' yi bde ba gsung ba'o// bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chang // lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po// bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu ga
260b6(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gang gis sgrub pa po// 'grub pa'i bsam med sbyor bshad byad ni shin bzang bar sbyor bas// spyod dang rtul zhugs bshad par bya// lhun gyis grabar gyur da'i spyod pa// dngos grub 'dod rnams
260b7(rgyud): kyis shes bya// phyi rol gnyis med sbyong bdag nyid// spyod pa de ni rab tu bsngags// kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la// dbang po grong khyer yang dag rten// gang de rnamasu spyod pa yod// yid kyis brtul zhugs
260b8(rgyud): bstan par bya// srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis// gong dang bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya// bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can// yang dag me long la mthong 'gyur// zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas// lus
261a1(rgyud): // lus la thim par gyis// sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas// phyag rgya chen por yang dag gags// phyag rgya lnga sogs lus la gnas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// bdud rtsi la sogs pa
261a2(rgyud): zang lhan gcig rnal 'byor mdol ldan// chags pa'i sems kyis sgom pa ste// mi 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis// yid 'di la ni gos pa med// 'jigs med rnam pa
261a3(rgyud): sems kyis ni// mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro// sa gzhi gang du spyod pa na// rnam shes brgyad du shes par bya// blo ldan spyod dang brtul zhugs ni// bde ba can du de rtsan to// dang po'i sbyor bar yo
261a4(rgyud): brten nas// phyi nas yid kyi rab tu bshad// srog thams cang na mnyam sbyor bas// dbang po'i gong khyer bde ba yis// ye she spyod ba'i brtul zhugs 'dzin// bac+doMs kyi 'di gsung so// zhes
261a5(rgyud): ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// de nas skye bor rig sa kyi no// khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas// de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur// de la nga
261a6(rgyud): po lnga dang bdun// brgya de dang bcu gsum bco lnga dang // bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog/ tha skar la sogs shes bya ste// lha rnams tshegasu ngan par bya// bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum// 
261a7(rgyud): gnyis pa dang ni dag de bzhin// byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum// mi yi tshogasu ngan par bya// gsum pa dang ni bcu nyi dang // dgu pa dang ni nyo shu gsum// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu dag pa// bco brgyad pa dang
261a8(rgyud): bcu dgu pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dgrags pa// srin po'i rigasu dran par bya// ra rigs gsum dang brgyad pa dang // klu ni bzhi dang lnga pa'o// dag pa nyi shu dgu/ khyi yi dngos por bshad pa'o// bcu dang bcu gci
261b1(rgyud): byi ba ste// byi la de bzhin dgu pa'o// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu dag pa// rtag tu de ltar brjod pa'o// bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga// khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob bo// thog ma tha ma bong bu yi// rig su de rnams rab tu/ 
261b2(rgyud): grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// da ni ma her mngon par brjod// thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug/ rta yo rigasu rab tu brjod// nyi shu pa dang ny+tsa gnyis// spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o// gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de shA
261b3(rgyud): glang po yi ni rig su 'gro// nyi shu gsum dang nyi shu bzhi// mi ste stobs ni che ba yin// nyi shu gtsigs pa sre mo ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad// stobs dang bdag byed pa'i sgra skad// bshad kyis da
261b4(rgyud): mnyan par gyis// mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te// gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa yin// skar mar dus kyi rtsa son par// 'dzin po po na nges par 'tsha// lug dang srang dang karkaDa/ chu srin mthon po la ngan
261b5(rgyud): bya kI Ta bum sang khyu mchog ni// brtan pa'i bya bar rig tu bstan// nya dang 'khrig pa de bzhin 'dir// gzhu dang bu mo 'dren ma la'o// bla ma nyi ma sa'i skyes bu// ngan spong rA hu zla bud med// garba
261b6(rgyud): lhag bkra shis ma ning ste// mkha' dkyil 'khor la gza' gang yin// de ltar rigs rnams gzhan du// byang chub sras po mo'i gyur// rdo rje bzang por de bshed// rab sbyor rnams pa'i sems kyis ni// g.yo/ 
261b7(rgyud): bar rtsa ru son pa'i sems// dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan// byang chubs zon rnams 'bab pa/ byang chub sems rnams kyi rig so// snying rje son pa'i yid kyis ni// mis kyi nyi ma lag pa yin// yang da
261b8(rgyud): rab ster rtag tu ldan// rigs med rigs can kyang medo// srid pa rtse mo tsam du ni// bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus so na pa// me long gi ni yul la zugs// gang 'ang mthong ste de medo// de 'angang byang chub se
262a1(rgyud): / rnams// bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can// de yi nad du zhu ba'i sems/ de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod no// nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbusu// rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya// shes rab tha
262a2(rgyud): cho ga yin// gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can/ dus dang dus min tshwa'i bdag nyid// ngos med ma yid byed pong bzhugs// byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che// bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsung so// 
262a3(rgyud): bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis// bde kun bdag nyid du skyed bshad// don dam pa yi sbyor ba yis// de'i zhin nyid du rab 'jug bya// 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byer gyis/ 
262a4(rgyud): sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// sa rnam la ni rab tu bshad// 'khor lo drug dbyibs me nis yi dbus bya ba yin// thad du migs sngags tshigs// bzhi
262a5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bri bar bya// de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnams/ srog ni yo ge'i rnam pa can// yi ga'i cha rnams bzang po ni// spangs nas dbus ma'i gnas pa yin// stong par nges par thim byas chu
262a6(rgyud): 'og dang steng du blta bar bya// rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo 'o du/ rnal 'byor dang phyug de srong byed// khams kan rab tu zhugs pa la// sems kyi spyod pa can co smos// de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa// dpa' bo chen po'i dom
262a7(rgyud): cano dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa yi// bsnun dang sgrub pa la sogs spangs// 'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin po yis ni// nyi ma dang po zad med can// rdo rje'i lam nas langs pa'i sems// gang phyir brgyud pa'i rim pas/ 
262a8(rgyud): de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs re'u mig can// dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams// sngags kyi 'khor lo 'god par bya// ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa' bo rnams// bcu gnyis rnams
262b1(rgyud): 'khor lor son// gang zhig gang gi ming sngon gyis// de dang de yi gnasu bri// gzhan gyi sngags kun 'di rnams la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sku la sogs pa'i bzlas kun dang // de bzhin dag sogs
262b2(rgyud): bzlas pa can// sems sogs bzlas pa thadang // de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// de nas dpa' bos 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs byed chen po dbus rnamasu// me yi ba
262b3(rgyud): can bsgom par bya// shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis// 'byung po'i tshogs ra kun spyod bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang // dag po rangs par byed yi ga/ las dang rjes 'thun gzugs bsgom te// 'bang ba'i rnam pa sogs
262b4(rgyud): dgod bya// 'chib spu zhing de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor dang ni/ na bar 'gro// nad na dang 'jom bya zhing / thig le thig ler tshim pa // de ltar chog ri bya ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas nas phu
262b5(rgyud): gdag/ 'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yos// rkang pa bzhi du rtsa brgyad// oM hrI hrI phaT kyi yig mtha'/ ji lta'i rim pas 'od ku la'o// na maHshrI badz+ra DAka mahA nA~M ra nI ri shwa rA ya/ tri d+hu lA na na/ 
262b6(rgyud): bko pA ba nA ya// daMSh+Tot+ka ta b+hi Sha NaM b+hai ra bA ya// sha ta sa ha sra na twA ya/ bi d+yAd dzi hA ya/ kaM kI la mA lA d+ha ra NA ya/ ko Ti la kA b+h+ra dzI yaM/ dzA lA ba lI D+ha la ga nA ya/ ba ru pu bA shi d+ya te shA lA la// kalpA mr-i gA ba
262b7(rgyud): ShA ya/ bi ka Te mu kha hI hA ra bA ya/ mA ti ga Na pa ri pu ri ta man+ta ya/ sa ha dza su na ri bal+la b+ha ka rA ya/ ts+tshats+tsha kA ro tsA ra Na mu ShA ya/ ma hA sh+ma na pri yA ya// sarba b+hU ta saM d+ha sa na ka rA yaM/ many+dzu ka wAn+ta s+t+ri
262b8(rgyud): dzA la/ dza TA ka lA pa/ ma ku TA ya/ kha T+wAM ga ka pA la shU la b+hi ne na d+ha ri Ni/ ma hA sa mu dme ba lA ya/ byA g+h+r-i tsirmA ma ba ra d+ha ri Ni/ She tA la saM g+ha mdzan ka rA ya/ ma hA biny+dza ni bA ri Ne/ sha d+hu ni sum+b+ha ka ra
263a1(rgyud): // tra sa ma hA sA ha sr-i ka ro mA ba n+yarba rti ne// sha ta saha sra mu khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra pra b+hA ya/ ma hA pi shi ta ru d+hi ro ba sa hA ri noH/ sarba mA ra ba la d+ha si ta/ sr-i Sh+Ti sa hA ra kA ra kA ya/ sarba
263a2(rgyud): bA nAM sho Sha Na stam+b+ha na bi drA ba NA ya/ an+ta mA la d+hA ri Ne/ su me ru kaM bi ta nA dA ya/ kro d+hi bigra ha d+ha ra NA ye// ma hA kA sha ti li kA ta ma na/ bud+d+ha ko Ti sa ha sra kA tsA na ya/ dz+nyA na mri ta baR+ShA pa NA ya/ sarba ka
263a3(rgyud): pra bar+t+ta nA yan/ ban+d+ha na ka rA ya/ sarba bi kalpa b+hany+dza ne ka rA ya/ mun+na ba li lag+ni sha rI rA ya/ pa ra kr-i ta yan+ta man+ta nA sha nA ya/ ma hA rak+ShA ka rA ya/ duSh+TA nAM ba dI la ne/ d+harmo da ya ka rA ya/ kro d+ha s+pha ra s+pha ra NA
263a4(rgyud): in+d+ra dz+wa la sarba satwA ta ma ne/ gra sta bA da pra bA/ nga mam te/ de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang // rab tu mang ba rgya che sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming // sems can ming gis shes pa
263a5(rgyud): // sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// kham sa gsum rnams yongs bzhugs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa/ na gyi gtso// bcom ldan sngags pas 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni
263a6(rgyud): rab tu byed pa bco lnga pa'o// de nas mig la sogs dbang po// kun gyi mngon shes cho ga 'ashang // mig mi bzang gi rab sbyong bas// rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub bya// gang du byang chub sems gnas pas// de
263a7(rgyud): ni mig gis nges par lta// rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog/ sems ni mig tu shes par bya// rtsa rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas// saur rlung ni dbab par bya// gang nyid du ni skyes du su// de yi du su thim nas
263a8(rgyud): 'gro don mngon shes mig rnams kyi// sems 'di yis ni 'gro bar 'gyur// skye 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs// yid kyis sgra ni nyan par 'gyur// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni// lho rdzas dr-i ru rjes
263b1(rgyud): byar lha rdzas ro yi rab sbyor bas// lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis// lce yi mngon shes la brten nas// dbu ma'i pho nya skyes pa yin// lus kyi reg pa'i rnam pa yis// mchog tu zag med bsgrub bya/ sngo
263b2(rgyud): gyi bag chags dran pa la// de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro/ nyin zhag mtshan mo mnyam byas nas// chu tshod dag ca nyid dang ni// chu'i srang dag cu tham pa dang // g+ha Ti kar yang sbyar bar bya// rgyar ni sor mo bcug nyi
263b3(rgyud): lang dbang su sor brgyad nyid yin te// guny+dza dag cu'i tshad la ni// sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o// skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang // kiSh+Ti mig btsums phye ba dang // se gol gtogs par shes bya ste/ 
263b4(rgyud): dbugs rgyu'i mngon par shes paso// pha rol phyin dag tshul bdag gis// chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya// dus dang dus min sel ba'o// mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya// mtshon mtshan nyid rna myong
263b5(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid// sems 'di sna tshigs gzugs can te// srog chags rnams kyis gang 'grod pa// bdag med rang bzhin 'thob papar gyur// 'dud pa rnams kyi
