263b6(rgyud): phrad pas gnas// gzugs byed 'gyur da'i dngos po// mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can// chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' gror de shes bya// thung sel lam rtag rten nas// slang yang tshe
263b7(rgyud): nang du ste// srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis// mig ni lnga ru shes par bya// 'dzag pa med pa'i sa bon 'dzag/ ye shes mkha' go ma'i sbyor ldan// sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi// mngon shes byed do
263b8(rgyud): sogs lnga pa// de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs// rnal 'byor kun gyi mchog yino// dngos po'i rang shes can lus/ ring du yingasu spangs pa yin// thams cad lus mnyam sbyor las// lhan cig/ 
264a1(rgyud): // skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa// dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa// bcom ldan mig gi 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu dag pa'o// / de nas lha mos phyag byas nas// de bzhin mchod pa
264a2(rgyud): chen po byas// stobs po che'i spyon sreg ni// bdag po chen pos bstan du gsol// mkhas pas rgyun tu nang bdag gi// sbyin sreg bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// stob po che yi rab sbyor bas// khams rnams kun
264a3(rgyud): gyis dgang blag te// bde ba thab tu yang dag thob// nyi zla dgang gzar drug gzang ngo // slob dpon gnyis med med la// yang dag rig pa'i gzugasu sreg/ sna tshogs mkha' gro rnam 'di med// gsang sngags ra
264a4(rgyud): bzhin mtshan nyid// yang shing rtsa ru yang dag grags// gang phyir sa khri las skyes 'bras// tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin// 'di ru mar na byang chub sems// khrag ni sbrang rtsir shes par bya// 
264a5(rgyud): srog sogs rlung rnams du'o// gcin dang bshang ba dag de ltar/ tsan+da dang nau gla tsi'o// me tog rtag tu khrag tu gags// mchi lnga lung pa 'bras thug yin// bud shing so sems can rus
264a6(rgyud): mdor bsdus pa las lpags pa gos// me yis thab kyi dbus ni// skra dang ba spu lta ru 'gyur// sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni// sna tshogs 'bru ste de la sregs// rim gyis mkha' go rdzogs
264a7(rgyud): sem pa// mes gang ba'i sregs blug su shes bya// dbang po thams cad gong byed de// de yis bag chags klu le no// sna tshogs sgra chen pos ril mo// snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin// srog parnas kun
264a8(rgyud): gyi bdag po yi// stobs po cheni bsgom par bya// las thams cad pa'i skyon sreg no// des mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur// 'jig rten mchog khams kun tu// yid ni da ru yang dgar la// gang rtse'i du
264b1(rgyud): bde gyur pa// de'i dusu rab tu gnas// sbyin sreg nang bdag nyid mthong bas// rmod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin// 'jig rten 'das ye shes// de rnam dbus mar thob par bya// mtshams rnam kun tu khong sh+lo ga
264b2(rgyud): sems chen po ni bsod par 'gyur// rtag pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni// de las byung ba bza' bar bya// mtshan bya mtshon byed rab bcos pas// gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yin// sgra mo'i bdag nyid
264b3(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// de la thim par byed par 'gyur// kham kun yang dag sbyor ba las// ye shes gnyis byang med mtshan nyid// me yi gzugasu rtag bzhug pa'i// bcom ldan thab khung gis 'di gsung // zhes bya
264b4(rgyud): ba ni rab tu ba ba bcu bdun pa'o// de nas rdo rje bang 'du ba// ji bzhi/ bshad kyi mnyan par gyis// rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas/ a ba d+hU ti can dngos grub// rnal 'byor ma la yang ngag rol// don dam
264b5(rgyud): pa yi nyams la gnas// de yi sbyor bas gol bar ni// gnyis med rgyu rnams kyis 'gyuraro// lus kyi nyamasu myong bzhin pa// byis baM rnams kyi byang chub 'od// ha yig drug dang ldan pa mi
264b6(rgyud): sa bon rdo rje'i nor bur dgod// a ba d+hU ti'i rtsal 'bab ste// stang du kha ltas dpral bar bson// srung ba'i dusu blo ldan gyis// rang gis lag pas rdo rje bzung // byang chub sems la rtsen byed la// rgas dang
264b7(rgyud): ba ring ba yin// srin pa'i skyon las goms pa yis// srid gsum da yi rang bzhin 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor bas// nyi ma re re bsgrub par bya// de ri dusu gang mthong ba// dngos po kun la ltung ba bya// 
264b8(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po'i tshul bdag nyid// rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du// bstan bya ba ston pa por 'gyuraro// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni/ seMn don ni nges par bya// sku bzhi tha
265a1(rgyud): / rnal 'byor gyis// bden min bdag gis bshad mi bya// rin chen rdo'i rang bzhin can// sbyor bskyes ye shes gyen du bgrod// pho nya rnams kyi gtso nyid bya// 'dod chags me yis dgyes par bya// 
265a2(rgyud): byang chub sems ni rtag bzung bar// lce yis bya yis lag pas man// lhan skyes 'bros pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyi gzung // phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te// de nas gtung ba bya ba yin/ 
265a3(rgyud): stobs zad kyang bza' bar bya// sA li skyes sogs 'bad pa so// sbyin sreg kun kyang de nyid kyis// dbang la sogs pa gang gang byed// de de'i thod par bya ba ste// de nas sa bon 'dab par bya// de rnams rdzas kyi
265a4(rgyud): spang ba dang // gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bya/ de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra ba'i gzungs 'jug 'gyur// ril bu 'am ni skud pa ni// dab 'a bo rang nyid gis gsungs pa'o// b+ha gi'i dbus rnas
265a5(rgyud): bsgos pa'o// rin chen rdo rje can de sman// dkyil 'khor khams rna mas kun gyi ste// spangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin// gang dang gang gi la sa kyi ni// de dang da'i ming cad sngagaso// sa bon kun gyi
265a6(rgyud): yongs spyod las// de ni rtag tu smad rnams te// bcom ldan las kyi phyog rgya ni// rtag tu 'tshang bas 'dri gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bco brgyad po'o// de nas 'khong ba'i mthar gnas pa'i// mkham
265a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid 'ashad par bya// rta grin gyi ni rib sbyor bas// pho nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya// ha yig skye gnas dbusu te// ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o// gau yig dbu ma'i pad+mar te// wa maM yige snying
265a8(rgyud): kha ru// rnal 'byor cha la 'dzin bzhin pa/ dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed// rmongs pa nyid ni zad 'phrog/ gang yin gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur// mgrin par rtag tu tshigs gcad ni// mgrin par ngag tug/ 
265b1(rgyud): ba nyid// tshe brta yi dbyibs 'dir ni// gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin// de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba// sngon du ma'i gnang du'o// nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// khams gsum bor ni bskor bar 'gyur// nams
265b2(rgyud): nyi mas mdzes byas nas// byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs// rnal 'byor ma yi chu skyes mchog/ sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang // lamathong ba ni thad la// de nyid nyi ma
265b3(rgyud): rtag snang bar// mtshan mo'i mun paM dag po phrog/ rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son par// rta yi mgon po bsgoms yin// gong gi sangs rgyasu 'gro ba// sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur// bgegs rnas
265b4(rgyud): nang nyams 'gyur te// sprin la sogs pa'ang nyams par 'gyur/ kun gyi sdig pa'ang 'phrog par byed// rang gi dga' ba shang mtshan nyid// mchod sbyin dus kyis rten du// thams cad skad cig lasgru
265b5(rgyud): 'gyur// khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis// de tshes 'og dngos grub 'gyur// bdag med 'di rnams de lha mo// yan lag gtsigs rol bar byed// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste// sbyin
265b6(rgyud): sreg a ga sog de bzhin// ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod chags kyi ni 'dod chags bsgo// me yis tshig la gdang bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags kyos 'dod chags// 
265b7(rgyud): par gyur pas mi 'chi // de nyid thab so yid kyi las// dge ba'i mtshan nyid can bya'o// nang du byed pa ma yin te// gus pa'i yid kyis dbu mar gnas// phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes// de nyid sa
265b8(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba sogs// sen 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba// de rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas pang// kun tu phye ba yod ma yin// lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste/ 
266a1(rgyud): / tshad ma pa rnams tho ca can// thad tshig ni rnam shes pas// ye shes can rnams de'i phyi shes/ mkha' gro thams cad mnyam sbyor las// namakha' rnam su bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan 'jig sa/ 
266a2(rgyud): 'jig rten par// rtag tu zhug pas 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// de nas rab tu 'joms yon// bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// na mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yi// rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyi
266a3(rgyud): 'chags pa dang ni 'jig rnam su// gang zhig stong pa de srog chag// khams rnams de 'dar shes bya ste// dul ba'i sbyor bar yang dag gnas// zla ba'i gzugasu yongs grags pa'i// rang gi rang bzhin las skyes
266a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang // doni ngab 'joms la brjod/ dus thams cad g.yo ba med// g.yo ba 'am 'dir ni mi mthong // de ni bang bdag nyid rlung // bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o//  lngas
266a5(rgyud): ra sogs sbyar bas// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar steng po// sgra dang tshig yang de shes bya// 'di gsal ba dang snang ba gsum// de phyir na mkha snying po yang // mkha' go spyod rnams kyis shes bya/ 
266a6(rgyud): gi dbu mo'i sbyor ba yis// srog de 'arang rab tu bsngags pa yin// de yang kun bzhi shes bya ste// me long du yang rab tu bshad// chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang de// dmyal sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te// sangs rgyas
266a7(rgyud): chub sems rnams kyi// gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor// zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag meda'apho// de'i dus rnam par bzhag med 'gyur// rnal 'byor byis pas bgod bya min// 
266a8(rgyud): mkha'i khams rnas thams cad kyi// de yi snying por rab tu bstan// de dag shes rab thabs gnyis// gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid// srid pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyud// dbang po'i dbu su sbyong bar bya// sangs rgyas
266b1(rgyud): 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams// sa yi nang du rtsen par 'gyur// de ltar rnam bcas de nyid dang // rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs// sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun// gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur/ 
266b2(rgyud): dbu yang blta rnams kyis 'ga' ste// ya shesaM der 'di rdzogs pa'o// gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod// tshes dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog/ gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi// tshul mtshan chos de 'dod
266b3(rgyud): ba dang // gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can// gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag/ tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// 'dir mang smra bas tsa bya ste// chos dbyings gal te 'dod
266b4(rgyud): kyang // na mkha'o snying po'i gzugs can gyi// sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya// shan pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs// bsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa// de kun de'i gnas nyams dga' ba// lam rdza/ 
266b5(rgyud): skyobs rnams kyi gol 'thob// nges par dkyil 'khor dbus na/ su/ gzugasu bsdoms pa bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub thob// rnam shes kun gyi
266b6(rgyud): sbyor bdag nyid// stong nyid snying po gcog pu ba// bcom ldan dab la joms rnam pa yi// rnal 'byor la zhugs pas 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed nyi shu pa'o// de nas lha mos mchod byas te// 
266b7(rgyud): phyag byas nas ni 'di gsol to// rang gi rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung bar mdzod// ra rog ye shes las byung ba// ji lta'i tshigs pas bshad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas/ 
266b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgod par rang // dkang po'o tshes gcig la sogs nas// ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur// thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis par na mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs// gsuM ba
267a1(rgyud): 'dir dbyibs dang 'ang// bzhi par dben gyi gzug ca no// lnga par rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid// dag par khams drug 'byung ba yin// bdun par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs// brgyad par pad+mar brjod pa
267a2(rgyud): yin dgu pa ru ni bcud len te// bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyiso// bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs// bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs// bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste// bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhi no// 
267a3(rgyud): pa nyid rA hu ste// thig la zhes bya bcu dag pa// rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni// rang gi rig par shes par bya// dpal he ru ka yi spyod pa yis// 'khor lo bzhi rnamasu smrab bya// rgas po med cing 'chi ba med// nad dang
267a4(rgyud): mdze sogs spangs pa yin// lte ba re shr-I yi yi ger gyur/ he yig snying khar dgod par bya// du yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste po dbang ga yi yi ge'o// thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// rang gis
267a5(rgyud): bang 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnam pa bsudag ni// / 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag med// gnas dang gan su 'pho ba nyid/ dbu ma'i nang du rab tu bzhugs// 'khor lo ra ni yi mdas som
267a6(rgyud): rang gis rog pa mtha' yas mchog rigaso rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// byung bar rnam par shes par bya// sems chen po ni sang bzhin pas// don yod mthong bas 'thob parar gyur// rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyu
267a7(rgyud): te/ dus thams cad du nges par gnas// lo spyad sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du// gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong // bzhi pa rab mang bdag med pa// dpyar de rnams mtha' long spyod// de ltar 'khor lo bzhir gnas
267a8(rgyud): nas/ nges par lam du 'gro ba par gyur/ shos rib de nyid rtogs byas na sa// nyim sa thabs kyi de nyid can/ rdul gyi sbyor ba 'byung ba ste// nag po'i phyig mug pa 'di mdo// bcu drug rnams kyi marnams
267b1(rgyud): nyi ma nyid ni bar bar du'o// stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bang zhing 'bar// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus rnamasu// dpal he ru ka bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// rdo rje dga'
267b2(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur// gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor// gtso bo rang rigs bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu bye nyi cu gcig po
267b3(rgyud): de nas lus sogs lha rnams kyis// ston mo mngon par bshad par bya// pad+ma gang dbang phyug nyid kyi// rab tu sbyor ba 'di byung // rtsa ni pad+mar yang dag grags// srog gi rlung gis gang byed// byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug
267b4(rgyud): de rnams kyi ni nang du bzhugs// rang gis rig pa bza' bang bya// snying rje'i kha yis gdung bar bya// gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol sgyu ma'i rdzasu 'gro rnams 'grub// thams cad de'i rang bzhin du/ 
267b5(rgyud): babaza' ba med par bye// pad+ma ga dbang bsgom bya ste/ lta rim pas mtshon par bya/ pa yig gzhan gyi gong du 'go// ba/ na pa~M thaMd t+pa li yig/ na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te/ rkyen yig
267b6(rgyud): bde ba'i lha can yin// shwa yig rta la sogs pa'i stobs// ra yig dga' rol rgyu can yin/ srid dang mya ngan 'das kun la// de yis rab tu sbyor bar bya// mtshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kun// bde mchog phyi ma
267b7(rgyud): shes par bya// 'god pa 'di rnams la rten nas// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rang // he ru ka dang bde mchog nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtsog// pad+ma gar dbang phyug de la// sbyor ba kun la shes par bya// 
267b8(rgyud): ye shes yang dag gags// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes can// gnyis po gnyis med yang dag byung // lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin// shis po thaMd de la gnas// khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug/ gang bye
268a1(rgyud): pa yi sku chen la// de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya// na mkhar zhen pa'i sbyor ba yin// mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gre/ rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbu sa// lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol bar gyis// 
268a2(rgyud): 'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las// de rnams kyis ni dgar bar byed// gang dang gang gis las rnams la// de dang de'ing bsgom par bya// sgrub po rnams kyi byang chub rtser// sangs rgyas thams cad du'o// de nas bdad ni
268a3(rgyud): bcom byas nas// gar byed bzhin pas pad+ma 'dzin// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms shing // tshe son pa rnams gnas par byed// 'dod pa thams cad 'gru bar gyur cing // rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid pa spyod/ 
268a4(rgyud): gis sems kyis dngos 'grub 'thob// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// gzhan du srid pa'i spyod bdag nyid// sems can thams cad rab 'jug pa// 'khrul zhing chud zos mu steg rnams// bstan pa rnams la rab
268a5(rgyud): bya ra bag chags nang pa yongs spangs nas// phyi nas rang bzhin bsta/ na par bya// bza' ba thams cad mnyam spyo lngas// bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas// bcom ldan pad+ma gar mdzad pa'i// de
268a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas de gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi// mtshan nyid bshad kyi sa lha mo nyon// gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang
268a7(rgyud): da ni ye shes chen por brjod// rnar snang bzhin pa de bzhin// sems dpa' chen po'i ming cano// spu khung rtse mo thams cad las// de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen po// de rnams bu gar rab tu zhugs pa// 'a
268a8(rgyud): lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son// ji ltar mngal mar zhugs pa// de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs// g.yob 'gog par byas pa yis// de 'dang zad mthong bar 'gyur// gang mthong ba ni mthong nyid// gdong gis son
268b1(rgyud): ni blta bar gyis// mi dang mi mo lha sogs kyi// gzugs ni pad+ma'i 'dab chu bzhin// srog chen po dang shes bya ste// shi ba'i dus las nges par 'thod// aM gi yi ge yid la bya// dbus rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya// 
268b2(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni hU~M yig spro// gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan// sems la oM gyi yi ger 'gyur// lus la gnas par mtshon par bya// haM yig mchog dang po yis// ye shes dngos po rnamasu sprul// chos
268b3(rgyud): gyi dbyings rnams kyi dbus// dem snang mdzad kyi sgom pa'o// dud rtsi'i rgyud 'dzag pa rnams kyis// sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bya// bye ba stong phrag grangs kyi ni// rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur// 'ad pa ma
268b4(rgyud): kyis mi 'pho ste// 'dod na bde ba rnam par spro// da tshe rnal 'byor ma mnyas nas// dngos ga thams cad steng bar byed// sdug dang mi sdug rnam spyod pas// rnal 'byor ma la mi bya'o// myur
268b5(rgyud): stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs// rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya/ sna tshogs du mo'i skad kyis chos// de rnams lus ris can gyis nyan// rnam snang mdzod dang mi bskyod dang // rin chen dbang a ra
268b6(rgyud): ka don yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la sogs// shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyang // de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig/ 'go dag gol bar byed nyid dang / bde 'a bo rnams 'jug pa'o// blo ldan
268b7(rgyud): sor sen don// gnyis med dngos por byid par 'gyur// mi shes nyon mongs gzhom don du// tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya// khams thams cad kyi til mngangon// dgas pa med pas bya ba yin// rnam snang sgyu
268b8(rgyud): bas su du bya 'am/ byug pa'ang de nyid kyis bya'o// da yis sna nas sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu'o// rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid lo// gnyis pa tha kun sbyor lo/ 
269a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar pa stsol// bcom ldan thams cad dag pa'i sku// rab gol mdzad pa 'di gsung so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gsang chen bshad bya sna
269a2(rgyud): mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas pa min// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas// gnas thams cad du yang dag bzhags// rdo rje mi byed ye shes te// sems dpa' snying po ston pa'o// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// 
269a3(rgyud): rje sems dpar rab tu grags// zla ba rdo rje rab sbyor bas// gnas rnams bgod pa bstan par bya// pu li'i ra las lte bar 'bab// dzA lan d+ha ra ra yang dag gnas// ur+yan du ni kun tu stong // a ra buM dar bza' ba dang
269a4(rgyud): btung cano// ge dA ba ri ra rol pa ste// ra me shI ring rgyal dang pham// bko Ti rdza su 'dzin// mA la wer rnal 'byor ma'i gtso// kA ma ru bar tshig 'grub po// oM Dar mngon sum dngos grub ster/ tri sha kun
269a5(rgyud): / dbang rnams kyi// myur du dngos gras rab tu 'jug/ ko sa lar rnal 'byor dngos grub ste// ka ling kar phra mo'i dngos grub skye// lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub// kAl+lI bsad pa'i dngos gru'o// 
269a6(rgyud): ma la yang 'thun pa 'greb// pre ta pu ring rang gi lta ba/ gri ha de ba tang bkas gnang ba// lhan skyes 'pho med sau rany+dza ra// gser gla du ni pa don 'grug// nA ga re gnas kyi dngos grub ster// sin d+har sta
269a7(rgyud): 'grub de bzhin du// ma rung 'chi med ngos gru'o// ku lu tar pa bzhin dngos grub tu// de nyid rnal 'byor rnams la skye// rdo rje sems dpa' rtag bsgoms nas// thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos// gnas sog/ 
269a8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dbusu// kham su gyur pa'i tshetshan med dngos gru'o// ku lu ta reng bzhin dngos grub// mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran// dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste/ thad bdag nyid ston gnas/ rtag zhu
269b1(rgyud): gnyis med rnam pa ste// sen 'jig rten las ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis// nA da'i dbus les yang dag byung // de nyid du ni thims nas 'go// gnas par de ni mngon par yod
269b2(rgyud): de ltar thad cho ga bzhin// dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag/ de ni nus par rab tu gshes// skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i// nus pa thams cad rang 'jugs// dngos med ma min
269b3(rgyud): ba'i gzugs kyis// dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa// thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa' rab tu grags// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi gtso// sgyu ma'i sa
269b4(rgyud): kyi dngos grub ni// 'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de ltar dpa' bo gtso bo sa
269b5(rgyud): las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya// nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyes dga'// thams cad gsang chen gyi gan su// gsang chen rgyas par ba shad pa can// kun spyod chog ba shad par bya// sngon bshad
269b6(rgyud): khams kyi 'du shes ni// gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnams can// de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya// dpa'o nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi// tshe'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// zlum po
269b7(rgyud): du// thig le nyid ni bzhag par bya// de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// bskor bas ting 'dzin rdo rje 'gyur// shar la sogs par ri mo bzhin du// rdo rje'i 'khor lo sogs par 'pho// dkyil 'khor du ni lha zad/ 
269b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma kun tu shes par bya// bdun nu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya// nyin zhag rnamasu yongs 'pho bya// reng yi ni srog 'byung ba/ sum cu rtse bdun phyed bcas pa'o// nyi khri brgya phrag bcu dag ni// nyin zhe/ 
270a1(rgyud): / la ni shes par bya// lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa// de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug/ rnal 'byor de dngos bsgom rnams la// sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor// 'di rnams kun nyid dpa' 'o
270a2(rgyud): gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can la// thi dang lo spyod bdag bye bas// dus dang dus chod ze bar byed// 'di lta'i cho ga 'bya ba yis// kun tu gnas pa bdag ma yin// rnal 'byor mtshogs dang dpa' bo// de ni bdag dang
270a3(rgyud): gi rim bzhin// sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad// bdag dang bdage spyod yul med// yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa/ gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o// de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten mongs de kho na nyid rnams
270a4(rgyud): spangs pas dngos grub mo 'thog/ rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du/ de dang de yi mchog ye shes// 'od gsal sgyu mi bdagasasgyu ma'i 'jig rten la bshad// kye lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin
270a5(rgyud): pur bstan// lha dang lha min sa gsum 'joms pa phyog tshal// dbang po dang ni 'jig rten pa yis mi shis te// mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod par byas// gang zhig las thad pa'i// 
270a6(rgyud): gzugasu bsgom par byos// srid nga mya ngan 'das par ston pa gal ci// sgyu ma gti mug gis ni ri mong gnas// seMn thag pa da dung nyams pa ga la byed// de ltar yongasu dgyes pa'i mgur bcom ldan rang nyid kyi
270a7(rgyud): gsung so// de/ dadakyil 'khor rnams dang ni// byang chub dusu byung bar gyis/ dpa'i thams cad mnya' spyod las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha 'grod bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan 'dag pas
270a8(rgyud): gsung so// 'di ni dpal mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor me'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid phyu da kyi dod ston pa po gsang chen thod pa zhes bya ba'i le ru ste lnga pa'o// de nas rnal khyen
270b1(rgyud): ma dpa' bo// rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang // rdo rje mkha' go khyab pa'i bdag/ bcom ldan bdag po la bstod pa// khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul// dngos dang dngos sad rang bzhin can// dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni ga
270b2(rgyud): chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur// chos dang chos min pa yi gzugs// chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis med// bdag gis sprul pa'i dngos po yis// 'jig rten kun gyi'ang 'dzin can te// bdag nyid chen
270b3(rgyud): ster ba po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa// khyod kyis dam tshig bsten pa ste// gzhan mon dam tshig nyid las byung // bdags bsod nams rjes sgom pas// byang chub tu ni yid bsgrub so// ston pa mchog/ 
270b4(rgyud): bad la bzhugs/ de yis sen don mdzad pa'o// haM gau yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// nga rgyal can gyi bgegs skrag 'gyur// khyed kyis nye bar bsten pas ni// de rnams la ni skye 'am med// dade ba'i rgyal po
270b5(rgyud): nyid du brtson// byang chub kyi ni yid 'grod // khyed dang thabs gcig 'dres par 'gyur// gong bu gcig tu gnyis med pa zhugs// de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che// mchod pa bzhin ba ston mdza
270b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid// mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed// phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas// gnas pa yi ni mchod par dran// bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa// gnyis med mchod pa da
270b7(rgyud): pa ror bzhi pa ches dang rnal 'byor dag/ 'dzin pa yi ni mchod pa'o// de lha'i mchod pa la brten nas/ thams cad byas pas las rgyal por// 'gyur rdo rje mkha' go ni// glu gsum du ni mnyes bya ste// sngon
270b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// go pa g.yon pas thams ca du// pad+ma yi ni bskor nas snod// sngags pa rnams kyis bzung bar bya/ sngon du rdul 'byor ma la no// snga grol po yis gtong mi spyod// rnal khyong ma ku
271a1(rgyud): // skyes ni// kha yis bzung nas dkrug par bya// de yi lag par son pa'i dpal// gang su yis kyang dbrog mo nus// ji ltar bde bas bde ba bzung // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya// rtag tu dam tshig
271a2(rgyud): bar bya// spun gyi spyod pa'ang bsten par bya// snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing // dbang rnams ni mi rtag par// bsgom bya snang ba med pa yis// rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas// rdo rje pad+ma snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya na
271a3(rgyud): gi bdag nyid mchog/ stong pa nyid gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// dngos po thams cad spang bar bya// don dam can de nyid 'dir bya// rtag tu byang chub sems dan bya// man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis// man ngag thad
271a4(rgyud): par bya// ji lta bas cig thob pa yis// sa thams cad ni thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin man ngag thams cad kyang / man ngag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur// byis pa rnams dang rgan po dang // rnal 'byor ma rnams thad
271a5(rgyud): mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yi na// mi mnyam pa yi ngos grub 'joms// dmyal ba la sogs ltung / bar 'gyur// rgan po yon kun gnas pa// de rnams
271a6(rgyud): bas byang chub ster// khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir/ byis pa rnams dang de bzhin yang // gnyis bcas rnal 'byor ba rnams kyi// me tog bskor ba la sogs bya// kun tu smod pa'i ngag mi bya// 'dod mi 'dod min
271a7(rgyud): sbyor bral bya// ma byin par yang blang bya zhing // rtag tu srog chags bsad par bya// sems can rnams la brdzun smra zhing // ma sogs rnal 'byor ma la 'grod// 'khor lo mchod pa rgyun tu bya// bza' bya lnga la sog
271a8(rgyud): pa skyed// da yi bsod nams kyis 'grub pa// dus thams cad du 'gegs med dang // grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma mthong bas// rngasam pa gzhan reb tu 'jug/ dab po thod sa te sbyor las// rdo rje sa deng 'de ba'i mchog
271b1(rgyud): mkha' gro dri bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan 'dag pos 'di gsung so// dpal mkha' po rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las bstod pa dang // mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyisu med pa'i dam tshigs ste/ 
271b2(rgyud): pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // rgyud 'di rab tu byung ba ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// mtshan nyid thams cad yongasu rdzogs// mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs// sum cu bdun bdag nyid
271b3(rgyud): nal 'byer// gnyis med mkha'i sgo rgya mtsho dang / rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rgyud chen po// 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs can te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// dus thams cadadu zhal na gnas// yi ge kun gyi
271b4(rgyud): za ma tog/ 'bum phrag sum cu dag dang po// mkha' gro rgya mabashad// chen por chung ngur gsungs pa'o// ri rab kyi rdul tshad kyi/ mkha' go thams cad kyis gsung so// mtha' yas shi
271b5(rgyud): ni mu med nyid// rtsod pa'i dus kyi sa'i nang du// bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs// shAkya seng+ges gsungs pa'i rgyud// rnal 'phyo/ ra pha rol son pa'o// nyan pa ston par nga nyid// 'chang po skye
271b6(rgyud): bo gzhan kyang // legs par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba'i// de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur// bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis// bdag las 'grod pa de thob// ma mo thod 'dus rnams kyis/ 
271b7(rgyud): gnas rnamasu bsdu so// gcig la gcig gis bzhed pa ni// gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'debs mdza/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ tshig 'di la ni mngon par dag la// ldog pa rnams la
271b8(rgyud): grol bar 'gro// srid pa las ni 'gro bar byos// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ba'i mchog// rdo rje mkha' go de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsung so// dpal
272a1(rgyud): // mkha' gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rgya mtsho dag la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang / ye shes dang / sdom pa dang / bya ba dang / de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang / mkha' gro rgya mtsha
272a2(rgyud): las 'di rnams dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogaso// dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen po yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsugs lag kha' chen por rgya gar gyi paN+Di te chen no/ 
272a3(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon rtog pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus deng sa pa 'gan na med pa snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can/ phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing char gyis tshi
272a4(rgyud): par mdzad pa/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shAkya'i sras po rgyal ba'i snga'i zhal sde nas dang / 'odakyi lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong d+haR+Ya ston gyis mnyam cing bsgyur ba'o// 
272a5(rgyud): phyis gang zag chos kyi spyad can dpal mchog dang po'i rdorjer-i bka'i tshul dang yang bstan te// zhus gtugs legs par byaso// mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnas
272a6(rgyud): kyi skud des gsungs de med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bas ma dbang gis// gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dkar// de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing / cheng zhugs nas// g.yu/ 
272a7(rgyud): / ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgod rnams 'thab par mi brtson ma// de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brang naso// kho bos gzhan don nus min na yang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur// 'di la gtu
272a8(rgyud): dang bla ma rang gis blo gos skyon gyis ni// sgra don 'gal bar gyur pa bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' gri'i tshogs dang bstan dga' lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs// 'di la
272b1(rgyud): thob pa'i dge bdi med cung zad des// 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig/ bdag gis srol btod tsam 'di la// sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyis// skad gnyis smra bas gzigs pa na// skyon du
272b2(rgyud): gyur snang btsos par zhu// phrag dog sgo nas mi 'phya zhing // rje su yi rang ba yang mdzod// rdzogaso// // ca rgya gar skad/ shrI ma hA sam ba ro tan+ta rA dzo nA ma/ bod skad du// dpal bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya/ 
272b3(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdagis thod bdus cig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga
272b4(rgyud): bzhugs te// 'phags pa dgara' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bskor cing // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu
272b5(rgyud): dbusuM phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad bdang / phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// dbus ma g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtsugs te/ 
272b6(rgyud): lag pa thal mo sbyang nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kyang rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yis// bskyed pa'o rnal 'byor mtshan nyid dang // rdzogs pa yang ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan lha lnga
272b7(rgyud): mnyan par 'tshal// rlung dang me dang chu dngas// de bzhin na mkha' ji ltar lags// rnam pa lnga ni ji ltar lha// gtso bo yul dag de bzhin ci// phyi dang nang du gnas pa yi// sku gsum sbyin rlabs ji lta ru// lha mi
272b8(rgyud): sku ni ji ltar lags// gtso bos de bzhin lha mo gsungs// zla ba nyim ci zhig lha// lam lnga po ji ltar lags// lus kyi rang bzhi ji lta bu// de bzhide rtse yi gzugs ni tso// rtsa yi gangs kyi tshad ni du/ de
273a1(rgyud): // de bzhin lus kyi gong bu ci// sbas pa'i dam tshig ni brda// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi// gnas la sogs pa'i brda du zhig/ ji ltarang sa la sogs pa 'thob// mtshan
273a2(rgyud): ma ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur// khyed kyi las ni bcu gnyis gang // sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar 'gyur// ba gang brang dag ni ji ltar rigs// bzlas pa'i gangs ni zhig lags// lha yi rnab khyor ni/ dkyil 'a' bri ba du zhig
273a3(rgyud): mchis// sngags kyi dngos grub ci zhig lha// gzhon nu ma yi mchod pa ci// byang dang bya min nyi ma ga/ gtso bo myos byed gtor ma ci// bdud rtsi lnga sogs ji ltar lha// lcags kyu lnga sogs ji ltar 'gyur// dkyil 'a
273a4(rgyud): bri ba bshad du gsol/ thig gdang poni ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltangs ni yongasu spyad// srung ba'i 'khor mo dza ltar 'gyur// slong dzin gyi dbye ba gang // dza ltang tsA ba ma yong su dzu
273a5(rgyud): dbang bskur ba yi grangs ni du// bzhi pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ dus kyi nges pa ji lta bu// de bzhin 'chi ba bslu ba gang // dus bzhi'i mngon du zhig mchis// gling bzhi pa ni ji ltar lags// dus
273a6(rgyud): dang dus mi ni dngos grub ci// spyod pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud du ni// rnal 'byor rgyud ni ji ltarar gyur// mdo sde'i grangs ni ji lta bu// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa du// rab gnas sreg ma
273a7(rgyud): sbyin dang // sngags kyi dngos gab ji ltar ra gyur// bcud kyis lan ni ji ltar lha// myos byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur// gsang sngags ji ltar 'byung 'gyur lta// sngags btub ni ji ltar 'gyur// tshar bcid pa ni tsa
273a8(rgyud): zhig ste// ga tson rjes bzung ji lta bu/ bcom ldan de nyid rnams niH// stong pa nyid dang snying rje gang // stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci// ji ltar de bzhon nyid rang bzhin// chos rnams thams cad mongs shes
273b1(rgyud): sgom pa'i mtshan nyid gtso bos gsungs// dpal bde mchog 'byung ba'i rgyud las zhu ba ri le'u ste dang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje gsang ba 'byung ba 'di nus pa le gso le
273b2(rgyud): so// de nas de'i phyir bskyed pa yi// rim pa'i sgom pa yang dag bshad// sna tshogs las kyi rang bzhin gyis// skye gnas bzhi po rnamasu 'gyur// spong skyes mnga' nas skyes pa dang // dod gsher dang ni brdzus skyes
273b3(rgyud): rnams// ngang pa khrung khrung rma bya dang // ne tso bzhad tshogs sgong skyes te// gang po ma he ba lang rta/ bong bu mi sogs mngal nas skyes// srin bu 'bru dang phye ma leg/ nya la sogs pa drod gsher skyes// lha dang dmyal
273b4(rgyud): ba'i sems can rnams// de bzhin par do'i srid pa dang / bskal pa dang / po pa la sogs// 'di rnams brdzus skyes sems cano// shar gyi lus 'phags pa lang spyod// de bzhin byang gi sgra
273b5(rgyud): mi snyan// gling gsum po yi mi rnams ni// longs spyod chen pos ya nga dag mtsho// blan rmongs bye brag mi phyed cing // rtog med rnam pa ra spyod med pa'o// 'dzam bu gling de legs skyes
273b6(rgyud): las kyi sa par rab tu gags// legs byas nyes par byas pa'i las// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams// skye ba sngon gyi rnam smin 'dor// skye bo rnams la snang bar 'gyur// rgyags dang ser sna gtu
273b7(rgyud): sems rnams// g.yo sgyu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang // chags sdang gti mug la sogs kyis// rims dang nad la sogs pas gzir // 'dza m+bu gling pa'i gtso bo mchog/ yul dbu su ni skyes pa ste// sngon rgya
273b8(rgyud): dag pa la ltos nas// dbang po rno shing rtul por 'gyur// mi ru skyes pa 'bras bu'i dam pa dang po ste// rang gi khyim nas nges 'byung rnyed pa gnyis pa yin// rab tu byung nas dge ba slab pa gsum pa ste// 
274a1(rgyud): rtse gcig yid ni bor gyur pa bzhi par gsungs// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin// mi rnams kyis rab mi shes te// thog med dus kyi nyon mongs kyi// bag chags rab tu bsags byas pas
274a2(rgyud): dpyir sngor byas las ni// skye dang 'chib yang dag 'byung // chags pa mi rnyed de srid du// zhag bdun par do srid pa gnas// srid pa bar de sems cad ni// mgon po ri'i grod pa ji bzhin du// 'di ltar
274a3(rgyud): las kyi zhags pa yis// 'gro ba drug tu rab tu ste// bai ma'i bun spyong sogs ni// skrod pa'i spyi bos mthong byung nas// ta la zhon bzhin rnam shes ni// rlung gi gnon pozhin nasu// skad cig zang
274a4(rgyud): nyid la ni// shin tu myur bar 'ongs gyur nas// shin tu dag da/ bcas stobs kyis// kha yaM lam nas 'jug par 'gyur// na stong phrag bdud cu gnyis// rab bskul da yi skad cig
274a5(rgyud): laT A li ka la zhu byas pas// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob/ khu ba khrag da'i dbusu ni// thig le'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ dang po'i rnam pa nung nur po// mang
274a6(rgyud): bo ni gnyis pa yin// ltang ltar po skyes gsum pa ste// de bzhin bzhi pagong gor po// rlung rnams kyi ni bskul tsam gyis// sha yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur// zla ba lnga gyur sa 'on las// yan lag lnga/ 
274a7(rgyud): ni rab tu skye// zla ba bdun na sgra dang sA// sen mo rtags ni skye bar 'gyur// zla ba brgyad na dbang po dang // lus kyi yan lag 'byung bar 'gyur// zla ba dgun yang dag rdzogs// zla ba btsun sems dang ldan/ chu
274a8(rgyud): mu rang bzhin mo spyod pa/ yang mer ba ni ni chen 'byung // 'od dpag med mgon ltar ltang 'o// gong gang ba ni don mod dgug// 'khra 'byung rnam pa snang mdzad// rnam pa lnga ni btsun pa yin// di ma ldan
274b1(rgyud): ni mo spyod pa// sa bon rang bzhin 'od dpag med// gong bu rin chen 'byung ldan te// ro cig 'dres pa rnam snang bzhugs// skye gnas dbus rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas// g.yon nas khub
274b2(rgyud): zhes bo shad// g.yas nas de bzhin khrag yin// de dag gcig tu 'das gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no// las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas// rlung gis yang dag bsgyur na su// chos kyi 'byung gnas
274b3(rgyud): sgo ru ni// gdong ni nges par phyogs par 'gyur// dku ga ya su ni brtan na su// cog bur mngon par phyogs te gnas// ku g.yon yang dag brten nas ni// shes rab ltor ni mngon phyogs 'gyur// mkhas pa/ 
274b4(rgyud): sa bon lhung ba'i rim// dus kyi skad cig yang dag mtshon// g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang // thams cad du ni skyes bur 'gyur// g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang // nges par bud med rnamasu 'gyur/ 
274b5(rgyud): ka'i dbus rgyu'i sa bon gang // rtag tu ma ning 'gyung ba'o// / khams pa yir shes par bya// me yi khams ni ma yi'o// lpag sa pa sha dang khrag rnams ni// ma las skyes shes pa
274b6(rgyud): pa ste// rgyus pa rkang dang khu ba rnams// pa las skyes shes bshad pa yin// drug po 'di dag bsdus pa'i lus// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed
274b7(rgyud): rnam shes de bzhin te// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin du// phung po nges par skye ba yin// srid pa bskyed pa'i rim shes pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i phyir// 'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i// 
274b8(rgyud): de nyid gsungs pa rnams kyis bshad// 'di ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rimigs par dbye ba ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gang zhig gshes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub thob/ 
275a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa ni// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la rten nas// chos dang long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim
275a2(rgyud): bsgrubs pas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor nas gsung so// dbang po dman pas bskyed rim gyi// dkyil 'khor sgom zhing bsam par bya// dbang po rnon pos skad cig ni/ rnam pas sems tsam dkyil
275a3(rgyud): 'khor bsam// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgoms pa ni// khams gsum gzhal yas khang bdag nyid// srog chags rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa// de dbus ska
275a4(rgyud): cig rnam pa yis// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnal 'byor/ oM AHhUM gi sngags kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ mtho ris sa stengs 'og tu// skad cig gis ni sku gcig duH
275a5(rgyud): skad cig rnam pas rnal 'byor te// skad cig rnam bas gsang sngags 'don// dbang po kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha 'gro dra ba'i bde ba mchog/ khams bzhi pa dang phung po lnga/ 
275a6(rgyud): bzhin yul dag bdag nyid ni// khrag 'thung lha mo'i ye shes te// de la tha dad mi brtag// dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid rgyas btag/ de bzhin mkha' mnyam stong pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin nyid bdag nyid
275a7(rgyud): thabs ni snying rje'i stobs yin te/ zung du 'jug pa rnam rtog bral// dkyil 'khor snying po mchog yin// rnam par mi rtog sbyong bsams kyang / de tse ma rtog bsam mi khyab// da yang rnam pa kun gyi
275a8(rgyud): mchag mad pa'i dang po rnam pa med/ de nyid ma dgas yon dag rtag tu srid pas 'ju ba rjod/  tshogs spros pa'i do pa med / rtag tu 'byung ba da // skye med pa pa dzin/ 
275b1(rgyud): / gyis 'di las skye ba yang dag 'byung // bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig/ mi shes rnam par mi mthong bas// gzugs med gang du'ang mi gnas shing // 'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o// kun rdzob skye ba 'byung
275b2(rgyud): na chad pa min byid dngos mad min// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang dngo su// chos thams cad lhan cig skyes// bdag byin rlab par rang 'byung ba// mi shigs 'jig pa med pa ste// skye ba med pa'i ro myong ba ma/ 
275b3(rgyud): sgom pa yang ni da nyid// stong nyid so sor rtogs pasad/ bsam gtan shes rab du yangar gyur// chos kun yongasu shes pa yi// sgom pa de nyid sgom med pa'o// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba che// phyag rgya chen
275b4(rgyud): po mchog de bzhin// nga nyid chos la 'jug pa'i phyir/ pade rnams dbye bas rab bstan pa// bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis/ gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e ba
275b5(rgyud): yig la rab gnas// sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi las// rnam kun mchog gi sdom pa'o// sdom pa byang chub bde mchog te// bltar med brjod du med pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi
275b6(rgyud): gsang ba ni// 'dus pa chen po'i mchog yin te// bdag byin rlab pa'i rim pa'i// bla ma'i don gyis gsal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rib pa nges par bstan po'i rim par phye ba ste gsum
275b7(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas dpyir 'byung ba bzhi'i// mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya// dngos po dag ni ma lus gang // de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ngos po rten// mes ni thams cad 'tshed par
275b8(rgyud): byed// mu mas 'ju bar byed pa ste/ rlung gis lhan cig bskyod par byed// nag par yul gyis stong par gnas// deng ni thams ched de las skyes// gang du gcig ni gnas pa dang / bani po kun kya te/ 
276a1(rgyud): bar gnas/  shing ljon pa khril shing songs// sems po lta bu'i rnam shes tsam// gang dga'agro drug sems can rnams// rnam shes bcas pa lta bung gnas/ de ltar srid pa'i dngos pa
276a2(rgyud): kun 'ablo dang ldan pas shes par bya// sems can rnams ni 'chi ba na// yan lag nyid lag thams cad kyi// rlung ni thams cad bskyod par 'gyur// skad cig de la me dod 'dor// chu ni rtag tu bskams
276a3(rgyud): gyur nas tshor ba med pa 'gyur// lus la sogs pa'i sa khams kyi// sra ba nyid tsam gnas par 'gyur// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba dag/ thams cad du ni 'byung bar 'go// lha dang lha mini me rnams ni// 2
276a4(rgyud): ba med par skye mi 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten skyong la sogs// thams cad la ni lhan gcig gnas// rig byed grub maH'a thams cad kyis// rtag tu 'dod cing sgom pa ste// gang phyid tha
276a5(rgyud): cad kun tu 'gos stengs skyes pa kun la gnas// 'byung ba bzhi po gtso bo mchog/ bstan bcos kun las ya nga dag blta/ ma ni 'tshe ba'i mtshan nyid de// chu ni bdud rtsi'i
276a6(rgyud): bo nyid// sa ni zhing tsam nyid du gnas// de la rtag tu gnas pa'i lha// rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug ste// lha lnga yi ni rnam pa ru// rnam shas de ni yongasu 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor 'dud
276a7(rgyud): shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam par shes// ma long lta bu mnyam nyid dang // so sor kun tu rtog pa dang / de bzhin bya ba sgrub pa dang / tshes dbyings shin tu rnam dag ste// ye shes 'di dge
276a8(rgyud): rab tu gnas// rnas snang mdzod dang don chen 'byung // 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// de bzhin ma bskyod pa nyid de// rnam zer ro cig rdzogs byang chub// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin de/ 
276b1(rgyud): ro dang reg bya chos de bzhin// yul drug tu ni shes bya ste// 'di dag rnam par dag par bshad// khams ni bco brgyad shes bya ste/ de dag phung po'i rang bzhin nyid// yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya/ 
276b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byar byed// mo la sogs pa bsgom bya ste/ mig gi dbang po'i rnam shes ni// thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnam 'phrul yin// ngo bo nyid gsum rnam dag don// 'ang gsal 'o
276b3(rgyud): go 'bang 'gyur// sgra dang rdo ba rnam shes ni// dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid// sna dang de dang rnam shes kyang // de bzhin rnam dag shes par bya// ro dang lce dang rnam shes ni// don dam nyid du rnam par
276b4(rgyud): dag/ lus dang reg bya rnam shes kyang // sgyu ma ste bu'i ngo bor skyes// yid dang chos dang yid rnam shes// snying po nyid bu rnam par dag/ rnam shes drug ni kun gzhi ru// 'jug pas
276b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa yin// 'od gsal ba yi ge/ 'phang thob/ he ru ka dpal yang dag gnas// yul dang yul can sbyor ba yos// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur// rnam pa
276b6(rgyud): kun gyi mchog gnas pas// yul ni rnam dag shes par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// gcig la de bzhin gsum du brtag/ skabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum// sku gsum rnam par
276b7(rgyud): grol ba gsum// zhal gsum yig gsum lha gsum te// khams gsum pa yi rang bzhin nyid/ dkyil 'khor gsum dang rnal 'byor gsum// lam gsum du ni bstan pa sa// dam tshig
276b8(rgyud): gsum dang ga pagasu de zhin nu da gzung zugs/ shes pa da ni ngas nyid dang/ de mi skyo ba gsus pa'i/ chos po 'thung gan yang bzhin cis/ dzaH
277a1(rgyud): mthong ba dang // 'khor sum mi dmigs sbyor ba yis// sngags gsum gyi ni ring nyid nyid// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi/ rtsa gsum gyi ni rang gi dngos// phyi rol 'jig rten pa yi
277a2(rgyud): lha la sogs pa'i bdag nyid nang // phyi nang dag pa nyid kyi phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni sangs rgyas thob// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du// lha ni mngon sum dmigs par bya// rnam pa kun gyi mchog rang
277a3(rgyud): bzhin// lha mor yongasu brtag par bya// dang po'i lha mi rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bzhugs// gnas dang zhing la sogs pa'i brda'// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa/ de bzhin gnyis med

277a5(rgyud): mkha' gre dra ba'i gzugs kyis ni// he ru ka dpal/ yang dge sbyong// de dag mi phyed ngo bo nyid// sgom par nga yis bshad ba yin// de dag thams cad gnyis mang thob// gzung dang 'dzin dang na
277a6(rgyud): ba rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa ste// phra ba sems kyi rang bzhin 'gyur// bsam dang bral ba'i de nyid ni// go 'bangs mchog ces yong sa grags// 'di ni'i byung ba bzhi dang rnam pa lnga dang / yul drug
277a7(rgyud): rnam par dag po rim par bya ba ste bzhi pa'o// de nas zla ba nyi ma lo// rab tu phye ba yang dag bshad// g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ba ste// g.yon du
277a8(rgyud): bzung nas ni// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'jug pa'i// zla ba'i rtsan 'og bltas par/ oM li zla bar yang dga' bag// g.ya su lte ba nas bzung nas// rkan gyi gnasu rab 'jun pa'o//  ma'i cin ste
277b1(rgyud): gas /  na mang can tu ga/ sa la sgon gnas po nas/ rtswa gnyis rgyu ba'i 'tshan da ni// rgya gson 'jug pa'i lam yin te// g.yas pa 'byung ba'i mam mno// nyi gang nas brnams rdzunan
277b2(rgyud): nub kyi bar ni nyin mo ste/ nub pas nasa'irtsams dza srad de// shar ba'i bar ni mir 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan mo zhag yin te// mel tse thun zhes brjod pa yin// thun pa ni nyin mor shes bya ste// de bzhin mtshan
277b3(rgyud): mo'ang thun bzhi pa'o// zhag gcig la ni 'phro ba yi// yan lag bcu drug rnams yin te// thun ni byed byed rtag tu rlung // sna yi bu gang yang dag rgyu// yang ngor chos gcig nas bzung nas// nyin
277b4(rgyud): zhag gsum gyi thun byed la// zla ba'i rlu ni r+g+ha'i de nas zhag gi sum nyi ma'i rlung // go rims 'dis ni ji srid du// ya ches bco lnga'i bar du // mang nge'i tshis gcig nas bzung nas
277b5(rgyud): nyon zhag gsum du snga da ni// nyi ma'i rlung du grags pa rgyu// de bzhin tshas ni bco lnga'i bang // thun ra yi ni ban cha rnams// chu tshod du ni brjod pas na// nyid zhag gcig la rtsa
277b6(rgyud): rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis shes par bya// nye ni zheg cig la dbyug gu yi// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni// rtsa dang chu tshod phye dang drug gu// thun gyi brgyad cha zhesu bshad// sna spre'i rlung ni'i'abyung 'ju
277b7(rgyud): 2// dbugs gcig tu ni rab tu grags// rlung gi sbyor ba la mkhas pas// dbugs drag srog tu shes par bya// srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang // dbugs gsum rkang pa'ang de dang ldan// nyi ma byang du rgyu dus
277b8(rgyud): kyi nga nyi ma dang po'i dbyug gu yin// nyi mi lhor ni rgyud dus kyi// mtshan mo'ang ni de bzhin 'gyur// thug gu ri re'i 'phel 'gri ba ni// dus kyi dbyings shes par bya// dbugs na dag pa bzhi / 
278a1(rgyud): so ma lal/ nas na /  nas nyim / sa kyi skyed sgyul /  ni thog
